NOTE_NN BY_NNP THE_NNP SPECIAL_NNP CALCUTTA_NNP MEDICAL_NNP BOARD_NNP ._.
The_DT following_VBG eleven_JJ cases_NNS have_VBP been_VBN reported_VBN to_TO the_DT Medical_NNP Board_NNP as_IN cases_NNS of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, besides_VBZ certain_JJ cases_NNS in_IN the_DT Fort_NNP ,_, which_WDT ,_, on_IN enquiry_NN ,_, proved_VBD to_TO be_VB ordinary_JJ non-venereal_JJ buboes_NNS :_: -_: *_VB One_CD case_NN in_IN Howrah_NNP ._.
*_VB One_CD case_NN in_IN Chatawallah_NNP Lane_NNP ._.
*_RB Two_CD cases_NNS in_IN Manicktolla_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Two_CD cases_NNS in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP General_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
*_VB One_CD case_NN in_IN Raja_NNP Raj_NNP Bullub_NNP Street_NNP ._.
*_VB One_CD case_NN in_IN Armenian_JJ Street_NNP ._.
One_CD case_NN in_IN Wooltadanga_NNP ._.
One_CD case_NN in_IN Garden_NNP Reach_NNP ._.
One_CD case_NN in_IN Warris_NNP Bagan_NNP Lane_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT cases_NNS marked_VBD with_IN an_DT asterisk_NN ,_, the_DT plague_NN bacillus_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN found_VBN in_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN the_DT persons_NNS attacked_VBD ._.
Three_CD others_NNS were_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB cases_NNS of_IN simple_JJ enlarged_JJ glands_NNS ,_, fever_NN and_CC bronchitis_NN and_CC intestinal_JJ obstructions_NNS respectively_RB ._.
The_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT examination_NN of_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN the_DT two_CD cases_NNS in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP General_NNP Hospital_NNP is_VBZ not_RB known_VBN to_TO us_PRP ._.
As_IN a_DT full_JJ history_NN of_IN all_PDT these_DT eleven_JJ cases_NNS is_VBZ contained_VBN in_IN the_DT appendix_NN to_TO this_DT report_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB necessary_JJ to_TO recapitulate_VB them_PRP here_RB ,_, and_CC a_DT summary_NN of_IN the_DT conclusions_NNS drawn_VBP from_IN these_DT will_MD therefore_RB be_VB sufficient_JJ in_IN this_DT place_NN ._.
The_DT bacillus_NN is_VBZ also_RB said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN identified_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN in_IN Raja_NNP Raj_NNP Bullub_NNP Street_NNP which_WDT terminated_VBD fatally_RB ._.
This_DT case_NN was_VBD first_RB reported_VBN by_IN a_DT homoeopathic_JJ practitioner_NN to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP by_IN postcard_NN on_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT 2nd_JJ November_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD seen_VBN by_IN Drs_NNP ._.
Cobb_NNP and_CC Simpson_NNP on_IN the_DT 3rd_CD at_IN 5-30_JJ P.M._NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT man_NN died_VBD in_IN their_PRP$ presence_NN at_IN 6-30_JJ the_DT same_JJ evening_NN ._.
They_PRP reported_VBD it_PRP ``_`` as_IN a_DT fatal_JJ case_NN of_IN true_JJ plague_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT Board_NNP of_IN Health_NNP did_VBD not_RB hear_VB of_IN this_DT case_NN till_VB the_DT following_JJ day_NN ,_, after_IN the_DT body_NN had_VBD been_VBN disposed_VBN of_IN ,_, and_CC then_RB only_RB from_IN private_JJ information_NN ._.
An_DT interval_NN of_IN nearly_RB ?_. 4_CD Description_NN of_IN Plague_NNP :_: [_NN APP_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._.
20_CD hours_NNS occurred_VBD between_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT case_NN was_VBD first_RB seen_VBN by_IN the_DT homopathic_JJ practitioner_NN and_CC the_DT time_NN it_PRP was_VBD inspected_VBN by_IN Drs_NNP ._.
Cobb_NNP and_CC Simpson_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN that_DT Drs_NNP ._.
Cobb_NNP and_CC Simpson_NNP did_VBD not_RB call_VB in_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT medical_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT Board_NNP ,_, who_WP would_MD have_VB been_VBN only_RB too_RB willing_JJ to_TO go_VB and_CC see_VB ``_`` a_DT true_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT omission_NN is_VBZ the_DT more_RBR unfortunate_JJ ,_, because_IN doubt_NN had_VBD arisen_VBN in_IN the_DT public_JJ mind_NN regarding_VBG the_DT diagnosis_NN of_IN the_DT previous_JJ cases_NNS ._.
Drs_NNP ._.
Dyson_NNP and_CC Robson-Scott_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN they_PRP heard_VBD of_IN the_DT case_NN ,_, proceeded_VBD to_TO the_DT spot_NN and_CC made_VBD minute_NN enquiries_NNS concerning_VBG it_PRP ,_, with_IN the_DT result_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD clear_JJ that_IN other_JJ reasons_NNS existed_VBN for_IN the_DT enlargement_NN of_IN the_DT glands_NNS in_IN the_DT groin_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD reported_VBN to_TO be_VB one_CD of_IN the_DT prominent_JJ features_NNS of_IN the_DT case_NN ._.
The_DT most_RBS noticeable_JJ point_NN in_IN the_DT suspicious_JJ cases_NNS that_WDT have_VBP occurred_VBN is_VBZ the_DT fact_NN that_IN all_PDT the_DT patients_NNS in_IN whose_WP$ blood_NN the_DT plague_NN germ_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN found_VBN recovered_VBN ,_, with_IN the_DT single_JJ exception_NN of_IN the_DT case_NN in_IN Raja_NNP Raj_NNP Bullub_NNP Street_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN this_DT case_NN ,_, as_IN already_RB stated_VBN ,_, the_DT symptoms_NNS noticed_VBD can_MD reasonably_RB be_VB ascribed_VBN to_TO other_JJ causes_NNS ._.
Another_DT remarkable_JJ fact_NN is_VBZ that_IN none_NN of_IN these_DT six_CD sporadic_VBP suspicious_JJ cases_NNS produced_VBD any_DT infection_NN either_RB in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN or_CC even_RB amongst_VB the_DT people_NNS who_WP attended_VBD the_DT sick_NN ._.
Looking_VBG only_RB to_TO the_DT clinical_JJ symptoms_NNS set_VBD forth_NN in_IN the_DT appendix_NN to_TO this_DT report_NN ,_, we_PRP have_VBP no_DT hesitation_NN in_IN expressing_VBG our_PRP$ emphatic_JJ opin-_JJ ion_NN that_IN none_NN of_IN these_DT cases_NNS ,_, including_VBG the_DT fatal_JJ case_NN of_IN Bipin_NNP Behari_NNP Dutt_NNP ,_, can_MD properly_RB be_VB described_VBN as_IN cases_NNS of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB inferred_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, from_IN the_DT reports_NNS which_WDT have_VBP come_VBN before_IN us_PRP that_IN the_DT diagnosis_NN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC Dr._NNP Cobb_NNP is_VBZ based_VBN not_RB so_RB much_JJ upon_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS as_IN upon_IN the_DT supposed_VBN presence_NN in_IN their_PRP$ blood_NN of_IN a_DT microscopic_NN organism_NN stated_VBN to_TO be_VB ``_`` the_DT plague_NN bacillus_NN ._. ''_''
We_PRP proposed_VBD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, to_TO examine_VB the_DT evidence_NN bearing_NN on_IN this_DT point_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO state_NN how_WRB far_RB the_DT conclusions_NNS arrived_VBN at_IN by_IN Drs_NNP ._.
Cobb_NNP and_CC Simpson_NNP are_VBP borne_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT independent_JJ investi-_JJ gations_NNS carried_VBD on_IN by_IN our_PRP$ colleague_NN ,_, Dr._NNP Cunningham_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Cunningham_NNP has_VBZ received_VBN from_IN M._NNP Haffkine_NNP a_DT type-culture_NN and_CC several_JJ microscopic_NN preparations_NNS of_IN the_DT plague_NN bacillus_NN as_IN occurring_VBG in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
These_DT agree_VBP in_IN their_PRP$ characters_NNS with_IN those_DT described_VBN as_IN characteristic_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN bacillus_NN as_IN found_VBN in_IN China_NNP ,_, and_CC there_EX can_MD be_VB no_DT reasonable_JJ doubt_NN that_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP bacillus_NN is_VBZ the_DT same_JJ as_IN that_DT which_WDT is_VBZ regarded_VBN by_IN M._NNP Yersin_NNP and_CC Professor_NNP Kitasato_NNP as_IN the_DT speci-_JJ fic_NN cause_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Cunningham_NNP has_VBZ also_RB personally_RB obtained_JJ twenty_NN microscopic_NN preparations_NNS and_CC fifteen_JJ cultures_NNS of_IN blood_NN from_IN seven_CD distinct_JJ cases_NNS of_IN supposed_JJ plague_NN ,_, six_CD of_IN which_WDT occurred_VBD among_IN men_NNS in_IN the_DT Shropshire_NNP Regiment_NNP ._.
The_DT microscopic_NN preparations_NNS show_VBP nothing_NN ,_, except_IN that_DT ?_. APP_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._. ]_VB
its_PRP$ causes_NNS and_CC characteristics_NNS ._.
5_CD some_DT of_IN the_DT subjects_NNS suffered_VBD from_IN anmia_NN ;_: while_IN the_DT cultures_NNS have_VBP without_IN exception_NN remained_VBD absolutely_RB sterile_JJ ._.
A_DT series_NN of_IN cultures_NNS and_CC preparations_NNS of_IN local_JJ origin_NN was_VBD received_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Cunningham_NNP from_IN Drs_NNP ._.
Simpson_NNP and_CC Cobb_NNP ._.
None_NN of_IN these_DT exhibit_VBP the_DT characters_NNS of_IN the_DT standard_JJ type_NN ._.
In_IN one_CD instance_NN only_RB does_VBZ the_DT growth_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN colonies_NNS present_JJ some_DT similarity_NN to_TO that_DT of_IN the_DT type_JJ specimen_NNS ;_: but_CC in_IN this_DT case_NN the_DT microscopic_NN characters_NNS do_VBP not_RB resemble_VB those_DT of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP bacillus_NN ._.
In_IN another_DT case_NN the_DT culture_NN yielded_VBD an_DT absolutely_JJ pure_NN growth_NN of_IN a_DT large_JJ staphylococcus_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ of_IN common_JJ occurrence_NN in_IN the_DT air_NN ;_: while_IN the_DT corresponding_JJ blood_NN preparation_NN showed_VBD evidence_NN of_IN contamination_NN from_IN other_JJ sources_NNS in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN slender_NN bacilli_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT third_JJ culture_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT pure_JJ growth_NN of_IN a_DT form_NN of_IN schizomycete_NN or_CC fungus_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT neither_CC the_DT colonies_NNS nor_CC their_PRP$ constituent_JJ elements_NNS bore_IN the_DT remotest_NN resemblance_NN to_TO the_DT plague_NN bacillus_NN ._.
A_DT fourth_JJ culture_NN prepared_VBN from_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN Bipin_NNP Behari_NNP Dutt_NNP contained_VBD large_JJ bacilli_NN ,_, probably_RB of_IN a_DT putrefactive_JJ character_NN ,_, along_IN with_IN minute_NN cocci_NN and_CC diplococci_NN ;_: but_CC in_IN the_DT microscopic_NN preparation_NN of_IN the_DT blood_NN only_RB the_DT large_JJ bacilli_NN could_MD be_VB recognised_VBN ._.
The_DT remaining_VBG cultivations_NNS of_IN local_JJ origin_NN are_VBP pure_JJ cultivations_NNS of_IN cocci_NN and_CC diplococci_NN not_RB agreeing_VBG in_IN character_NN with_IN the_DT type_NN specimen_NNS ,_, and_CC not_RB distinguishable_JJ from_IN forms_NNS which_WDT are_VBP liable_JJ to_TO occur_VB in_IN ,_, and_CC on_IN almost_RB any_DT organic_JJ medium_NN as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN contamination_NN ._.
As_IN the_DT phenomena_NN of_IN three_CD out_IN of_IN the_DT four_CD cases_NNS expressly_RB referred_VBD to_TO above_IN furnish_JJ conclusive_JJ evidence_NN that_IN actual_JJ contamination_NN occurred_VBD ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT certain_JJ proof_NN that_IN in_IN the_DT remaining_VBG cases_NNS the_DT minute_NN organisms_NNS discovered_VBN were_VBD really_RB derived_VBN from_IN the_DT blood_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Bipin_NNP Behari_NNP Dutt_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ clinical_JJ symptoms_NNS we_PRP have_VBP already_RB discussed_VBN ,_, a_DT specimen_NNS of_IN blood_NN and_CC some_DT blood-cultures_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO Dr._NNP Cunningham_NNP ,_, together_RB with_IN portions_NNS of_IN a_DT rat_NN into_IN which_WDT 2_CD cubic_JJ centimetres_NNS of_IN a_DT culture_NN of_IN blood_NN had_VBD been_VBN injected_VBN ,_, causing_VBG its_PRP$ death_NN after_IN thirty-one_JJ hours_NNS ._.
The_DT specimen_NNS of_IN blood_NN and_CC the_DT cultures_NNS showed_VBD ,_, as_IN has_VBZ been_VBN mentioned_VBN above_IN ,_, unequivocal_JJ evi-_JJ dence_NN of_IN contamination_NN by_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN large_JJ bacilli_NN ,_, probably_RB of_IN a_DT putrefactive_JJ character_NN ,_, which_WDT must_MD have_VB gained_VBN access_NN to_TO the_DT preparation_NN from_IN outside_NN ._.
This_DT being_VBG so_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ clear_JJ that_IN the_DT smaller_JJR cocci_NN and_CC diplococci_NN which_WDT were_VBD also_RB found_VBN may_MD equally_RB have_VB been_VBN the_DT result_NN of_IN contam-_JJ ination_NN ._.
Nor_CC does_VBZ the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT rat_NN after_IN inoculation_NN afford_NN any_DT grounds_NNS for_IN inferring_VBG the_DT specific_JJ character_NN of_IN the_DT germs_NNS contained_VBN in_IN the_DT culture_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT the_DT animal_NN was_VBD inoculated_VBN ,_, for_IN the_DT bulk_NN of_IN actively_RB decomposing_VBG fluid_NN injected_VBN into_IN the_DT animal_NN was_VBD relatively_RB equivalent_JJ to_TO over_IN a_DT pint_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN an_DT adult_NN human_JJ being_VBG and_CC was_VBD ?_. 6_CD Description_NN of_IN Plague_NNP :_: [_NN APP_NNP ._.
I._NNP quite_RB sufficient_JJ to_TO cause_VB death_NN by_IN mere_JJ blood_NN poisoning_NN ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, had_VBD the_DT enormous_JJ number_NN of_IN microscopic_NN organisms_NNS introduced_VBD into_IN the_DT rat_NN possessed_VBD the_DT specific_JJ character_NN attributed_VBD to_TO them_PRP ,_, the_DT blood_NN and_CC tissues_NNS ought_MD after_IN death_NN to_TO have_VB absolutely_RB swarmed_VBN with_IN the_DT organisms_NNS ,_, whereas_NNS in_IN fact_NN only_RB a_DT very_RB scanty_JJ sprinkling_NN of_IN minute_NN cocci_NN and_CC diplococci_NN could_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT specimens_NNS submitted_VBD to_TO Dr._NNP Cunningham_NNP ._.
Looking_VBG to_TO the_DT evidence_NN as_IN a_DT whole_JJ ,_, we_PRP have_VBP no_DT hesitation_NN in_IN expressing_VBG our_PRP$ opinion_NN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT evidence_NN that_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN true_JJ bubonic_JJ plague_NN has_VBZ yet_RB occurred_VBN in_IN Calcutta_NNP ;_: and_CC that_IN the_DT cases_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN reported_VBN to_TO us_PRP as_IN plague_NN were_VBD so_RB described_VBN on_IN the_DT strength_NN of_IN an_DT opinion_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT origin_NN and_CC character_NN of_IN certain_JJ microscopic_NN organisms_NNS ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN confirmed_VBN by_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN an_DT independent_JJ inquiry_NN conducted_VBN by_IN an_DT expert_NN of_IN long_JJ experience_NN in_IN bacteriological_JJ research_NN ._.

NOTE_NN BY_NNP BRIGADE-SURGEON-LIEUTENANT-COLONEL_NNP CUNNINGHAM_NNP ._.
In_IN a_DT previous_JJ note_NN regarding_VBG the_DT alleged_JJ bacteriological_JJ demon-_JJ stration_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP in_IN October_NNP and_CC November_NNP ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN shown_VBN that_IN the_DT evidence_NN was_VBD of_IN no_DT value_NN on_IN the_DT following_JJ grounds_NNS :_: -_: 1st.-That_CD in_IN certain_JJ cases_NNS there_EX was_VBD unequivocal_JJ evidence_NN that_IN the_DT samples_NNS of_IN blood_NN from_IN which_WDT cultivations_NNS of_IN alleged_JJ plague_NN bacilli_NN had_VBD been_VBN obtained_VBN were_VBD ,_, from_IN the_DT outset_NN ,_, contaminated_VBN from_IN external_JJ sources_NNS ._.
2nd.-That_CD the_DT growths_NNS present_NN in_IN what_WP were_VBD affirmed_VBN to_TO be_VB type-specimens_NNS of_IN cultivations_NNS of_IN Calcutta_NNP plague_NN bacilli_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN obtained_VBN from_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN different_JJ alleged_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, were_VBD absolutely_RB different_JJ in_IN different_JJ instances_NNS ._.
3rd.-That_CD in_IN no_DT case_NN did_VBD the_DT growths_NNS accurately_RB correspond_VBP in_IN character_NN with_IN those_DT of_IN type-specimens_NNS obtained_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP from_IN M._NNP Haffkine_NNP ._.
4th.-That_JJ specimens_NNS of_IN blood_NN ,_, taken_VBN from_IN cases_NNS ,_, which_WDT on_IN bacteriological_JJ grounds_NNS had_VBD been_VBN affirmed_VBN to_TO be_VB unequi-_JJ vocal_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, failed_VBD to_TO yield_VB any_DT growths_NNS whatever_WDT when_WRB taken_VBN and_CC cultivated_VBN under_IN conditions_NNS unfavourable_JJ to_TO extraneous_JJ contamination_NN ._.

?_. 7_CD APP_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._. ]_VB
its_PRP$ causes_NNS and_CC characteristics_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP now_RB to_TO point_VB out_RP that_IN all_DT of_IN the_DT so-called_JJ Calcutta_NNP plague_NN bacilli_NN may_MD be_VB readily_RB obtained_VBN from_IN specimens_NNS of_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN per-_JJ fectly_RB healthy_JJ animals_NNS under_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN brief_NN exposure_NN to_TO air_NN ,_, even_RB in_IN scrupulously_RB clean_JJ localities_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN my_PRP$ laboratory_NN is_VBZ ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT air_NN is_VBZ in_IN no_DT way_NN exposed_VBD to_TO any_DT special_JJ chances_NNS of_IN bacterial_JJ contamination_NN ._.
The_DT data_NNS derived_VBN from_IN the_DT following_JJ experiment_NN will_MD probably_RB be_VB sufficient_JJ to_TO demonstrate_VB this_DT ._.
On_IN the_DT 11th_CD December_NNP 1896_CD about_IN 30_CD C.C_NNP ._.
of_IN blood_NN were_VBD drawn_VBN from_IN the_DT jugular_JJ vein_NN of_IN a_DT perfectly_RB healthy_JJ fowl_NN ,_, under_IN strictly_RB aseptic_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, into_IN two_CD sterilised_JJ test_NN tubes_NNS ,_, A_NNP &_CC B_NNP ,_, stoppered_VBD ,_, as_IN usual_JJ ,_, with_IN cotton-wool_JJ plugs_NNS ._.
Half_PDT an_DT hour_NN later_RB the_DT plug_NN was_VBD removed_VBN from_IN tube_NN A_NNP and_CC small_JJ quantities_NNS of_IN blood_NN were_VBD introduced_VBN into_IN four_CD watch_NN glasses_NNS exposed_VBD to_TO the_DT air_NN for_IN 20_CD minutes_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB set_VB in_IN an_DT incubator_NN ._.
Cultivations_NNS from_IN these_DT specimens_NNS subsequently_RB yielded_VBN growths_NNS ,_, which_WDT in_IN all_DT microscopical_JJ and_CC macroscopical_JJ characters_NNS were_VBD identi-_JJ cal_JJ with-_NN 1st.-The_JJ only_RB growth_NN yielded_VBN by_IN a_DT cultivation_NN of_IN blood_NN sent_NN to_TO me_PRP by_IN Dr._NNP Cobb_NNP ,_, and_CC derived_VBD from_IN an_DT alleged_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN at_IN Chinsurah_NNP ._.
2nd.-The_JJ growth_NN from_IN another_DT type-cultivation_NN obtained_VBN from_IN a_DT man_NN named_VBN Feney_NNP in_IN the_DT Station_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC sent_VBD to_TO me_PRP by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP as_IN a_DT type-specimen_NNS of_IN plague_NN bacilli_NN ._.
3rd.-The_JJ large_JJ putrefactive_NN bacillus_NN which_WDT was_VBD present_JJ in_IN the_DT original_JJ specimen_NNS of_IN blood_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT bouillon_NN cultiva-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT latter_NN ,_, sent_VBD to_TO me_PRP by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP as_IN evidence_NN that_IN a_DT man_NN named_VBN Bipin_NNP ,_, who_WP died_VBD in_IN Calcutta_NNP early_RB in_IN November_NNP ,_, had_VBD been_VBN suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT tube_NN B_NNP containing_VBG the_DT other_JJ sample_NN of_IN blood_NN was_VBD sealed_VBN up_RP after_IN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS to_TO avoid_VB evaporative_JJ loss_NN ,_, and_CC showed_VBD no_DT signs_NNS of_IN decom-_JJ position_NN up_IN to_TO the_DT 31st_CD December_NNP ,_, or_CC three_CD weeks_NNS after_IN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN taken_VBN ._.
Three_CD cultivations_NNS of_IN it_PRP were_VBD then_RB made_VBN and_CC yielded_VBN no_DT growth_NN whatever_RB ._.
On_IN the_DT 3rd_CD January_NNP portions_NNS of_IN the_DT clot_NN were_VBD removed_VBN ,_, set_VBN in_IN four_CD watch_NN glasses_NNS ,_, exposed_VBN in_IN the_DT open_JJ laboratory_NN for_IN 20_CD minutes_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB placed_VBN in_IN an_DT incubator_NN ._.

1_CD ._.

To_TO obtain_VB the_DT microbes_NNS with_IN certainty_NN a_DT patient_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB select-_JJ ed_NN at_IN the_DT height_NN of_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS ,_, with_IN glands_NNS largely_RB increased_VBD ,_, and_CC before_IN any_DT injections_NNS had_VBD been_VBN made_VBN into_IN the_DT glands_NNS ._.

5_CD ._.
For_IN making_VBG a_DT preparation_NN ,_, an_DT ordinary_JJ or_CC a_DT grooved_JJ needle_NN ,_, a_DT spirit_NN lamp_NN ,_, a_DT microscopic_NN slide_NN and_CC 5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
carbolic_JJ lotion_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB prepared_VBN ._.
Then_RB proceed_VB as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Wash_IN the_DT skin_NN just_RB over_IN the_DT swollen_JJ gland_NN with_IN carbolic_JJ lotion_NN ._.

6_CD ._.

7_CD ._.

564/107-P._JJ ,_, dated_JJ 2nd_CD Feb-_JJ ruary_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO submit_VB the_DT following_JJ report_NN on_IN the_DT vitality_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN microbe_NN in_IN the_DT chief_JJ grain_NN exports_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
My_PRP$ experiments_NNS have_VBP been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP with_IN numerous_JJ specimens_NNS of_IN the_DT following_JJ articles_NNS :_: -_: Linseed_NN ._.

3_CD ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO test_VB whether_IN the_DT microbe_NN was_VBD still_RB present_JJ in_IN a_DT liv-_JJ ing_NN condition_NN in_IN a_DT specimen_NNS of_IN previously_RB infected_VBN grain_NN ,_, my_PRP$ method_NN has_VBZ been_VBN to_TO make_VB an_DT extract_NN of_IN this_DT grain_NN and_CC to_TO inject_VB it_PRP into_IN a_DT mouse_NN ._.
The_DT great_JJ susceptibility_NN of_IN mice_NN to_TO bubonic_VB plague_NN and_CC to_TO infectious_JJ diseases_NNS in_IN general_JJ ,_, while_IN advantageous_JJ in_IN one_CD sense_NN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN disadvantageous_JJ in_IN another_DT ,_, in_IN that_DT the_DT mice_NN might_MD have_VB died_VBN owing_VBG to_TO the_DT presence_NN of_IN other_JJ microbes_NNS than_IN the_DT bubonic_NN in_IN the_DT grain_NN ._.

4_CD ._.
My_PRP$ first_JJ experiment_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP with_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN microbe_NN derived_VBN from_IN cultures_NNS on_IN agaragar_NN ._.
Two_CD cultures_NNS ,_, each_DT about_IN a_DT week_NN old_JJ ,_, were_VBD employed_VBN ._.
Of_IN those_DT ,_, one_CD had_VBD been_VBN derived_VBN from_IN a_DT patient_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT other_JJ had_VBD been_VBN recently_RB isolated_VBN from_IN a_DT rat_NN found_VBN dead_JJ of_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
The_DT growth_NN was_VBD scraped_VBN off_RP the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT jelly_NN and_CC well-shaken_JJ up_NN in_IN 15_CD cubic_JJ centimetres_NNS of_IN bouillon_NN ._.
The_DT mixture_NN was_VBD then_RB placed_VBN in_IN a_DT burette_NN ._.
A_DT sample_NN of_IN the_DT grain_NN to_TO be_VB tested_VBN ,_, weighing_VBG about_IN a_DT kilogram_NN ,_, was_VBD placed_VBN in_IN a_DT previously_RB sterilised_VBN stoppered_VBN foot-glass_NN ._.
One_CD cubic_JJ centimetre_NN of_IN the_DT bouillon_NN emulsion_NN of_IN the_DT microbe_NN was_VBD then_RB poured_VBN into_IN the_DT foot-_JJ glass_NN ,_, care_NN being_VBG taken_VBN that_IN it_PRP should_MD fall_VB into_IN the_DT centre_NN of_IN the_DT grain_NN ._.
The_DT stopper_NN was_VBD replaced_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT foot-glass_NN was_VBD immediately_RB vio-_JJ lently_RB shaken_VBN for_IN about_IN a_DT quarter_NN of_IN an_DT hour_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN this_DT time_NN all_DT traces_NNS of_IN moisture_NN from_IN the_DT bouillon_NN that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN added_VBN had_VBD com-_JJ pletely_RB vanished_VBN ._.
On_IN shaking_NN ,_, a_DT cloud_NN of_IN dry_JJ dust_NN could_MD be_VB seen_VBN in_IN the_DT air_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT foot-glass_NN ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO avoid_VB inhaling_VBG this_DT presumably_RB ?_. 12_CD Description_NN of_IN Plague_NNP :_: [_NN APP_NNP ._.
I._NN infected_VBD dust_NN ,_, the_DT next_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT experiment_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT open_JJ air_NN ._.
The_DT grain_NN was_VBD poured_VBN from_IN the_DT foot-glass_NN into_IN the_DT linen_NN bag_NN in_IN which_WDT I_PRP had_VBD received_VBN the_DT specimen_NNS ._.
From_IN the_DT bag_NN a_DT bulk_NN of_IN about_IN 40_CD cubic_JJ centimetres_NNS was_VBD poured_VBN into_IN a_DT measuring_NN glass_NN that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN previously_RB sterilised_VBN ._.
This_DT small_JJ bulk_NN of_IN grain_NN was_VBD then_RB wetted_VBN with_IN sterile_JJ bouillon_NN and_CC stirred_VBD up_RP with_IN a_DT glass_NN rod_NN ._.
About_IN a_DT half_NN to_TO a_DT quarter_NN of_IN this_DT bouillon_NN was_VBD sucked_VBN up_RP into_IN a_DT pipette_NN and_CC injected_VBN into_IN a_DT mouse_NN ._.
The_DT white_JJ mice_NN employed_VBN had_VBD generally_RB been_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ possession_NN for_IN some_DT time_NN ._.
Each_DT lived_VBD in_IN a_DT separate_JJ cage_NN ._.

In_IN reply_NN to_TO your_PRP$ enquiry_NN as_IN to_TO whether_IN I_PRP have_VBP ever_RB found_VBN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN microbe_NN in_IN grain_NN and_CC flour_NN ,_, I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO state_NN that_IN ,_, although_IN I_PRP have_VBP examined_VBN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN specimens_NNS under_IN different_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, I_PRP have_VBP never_RB succeeded_VBN in_IN detecting_VBG it_PRP ._.

19_CD 2_CD ._.
In_IN reply_NN I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO state_NN that_IN as_IN my_PRP$ researches_NNS are_VBP not_RB complet-_JJ ed_NN ,_, I_PRP can_MD only_RB form_VB provisional_JJ conclusions_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
So_RB far_RB as_IN my_PRP$ researches_NNS go_VBP ,_, they_PRP tend_VBP to_TO show_VB that_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ microbe_NN whether_IN derived_VBN from_IN cultures_NNS or_CC the_DT organs_NNS of_IN deceased_JJ animals_NNS ,_, and_CC whether_IN placed_VBN on_IN cotton_NN or_CC sheep_NN 's_POS wool_NN or_CC gunny_NN cloth_NNS ,_, uniformly_RB dies_VBZ out_RP within_IN six_CD days_NNS ._.
Owing_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN epi-_JJ demiological_JJ evidence_NN tends_VBZ to_TO show_VB that_IN clothing_NN may_MD in_IN rare_JJ cases_NNS convey_VBP the_DT infection_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP unwilling_JJ to_TO draw_VB any_DT definite_JJ conclusion_NN from_IN my_PRP$ researches_NNS at_IN present_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ that_IN under_IN other_JJ con-_JJ ditions_NNS the_DT microbe_NN might_MD present_VB a_DT greater_JJR resistance_NN in_IN wool_NN than_IN I_PRP have_VBP hitherto_VBN found_VBN it_PRP to_TO possess_VB ._.
However_RB this_DT may_MD be_VB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ some_DT priori_JJ probability_NN that_WDT cleaned_VBD wool_WP would_MD be_VB less_RBR likely_JJ to_TO retain_VB the_DT infection_NN than_IN dirty_JJ clothes_NNS more_RBR or_CC less_RBR saturated_VBN with_IN human_JJ secretions_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
In_IN my_PRP$ experiments_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT microbe_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO die_VB out_RP in_IN six_CD days_NNS ,_, the_DT wool_NN was_VBD tightly_RB pressed_VBN into_IN widemouthed_JJ bottles_NNS immediately_RB after_IN infection_NN ._.
In_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC I_PRP presume_VBP in_IN Karachi_NNP ,_, after_IN washing_VBG ,_, the_DT wool_NN is_VBZ exposed_VBN to_TO sunlight_NN ,_, which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ every_DT reason_NN for_IN believing_VBG would_MD tend_VB to_TO hasten_VB the_DT disappearance_NN of_IN the_DT infection_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT trade_NN in_IN wool_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN native_JJ merchants_NNS adds_VBZ greatly_RB in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN to_TO the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN enforcing_VBG sanitary_JJ precautions_NNS ._.
The_DT only_JJ attempt_NN at_IN disinfection_NN that_IN I_PRP consider_VBP feasible_JJ would_MD be_VB that_IN the_DT bales_NNS should_MD be_VB painted_VBN with_IN five_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
carbolic_JJ acid_NN on_IN arrival_NN at_IN the_DT docks_NNS under_IN the_DT super-_JJ vision_NN of_IN a_DT port_NN official_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
In_IN dealing_VBG with_IN this_DT almost_RB ,_, but_CC not_RB quite_RB ngligeable_JJ risk_NN of_IN importation_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, I_PRP suggest_VBP that_IN the_DT English_JJ Government_NNP should_MD adopt_VB a_DT modification_NN of_IN the_DT plan_NN that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ already_RB employed_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN cholera_NN with_IN conspicuous_JJ success_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT last_JJ two_CD cholera_NN epidemics_NNS in_IN Europe_NNP ,_, nearly_RB every_DT country_NN was_VBD invaded_VBN by_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN spite_NN of_IN quarantine_NN ._.
England_NNP alone_RB had_VBD no_DT cholera_NN and_CC no_DT quarantine_NN ._.
The_DT method_NN adopted_VBD was_VBD to_TO allow_VB suspected_JJ persons_NNS to_TO go_VB where_WRB they_PRP pleased_VBD ,_, provided_VBD their_PRP$ names_NNS and_CC addresses_NNS were_VBD known_VBN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD kept_VBN under_IN careful_JJ supervision_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN cholera_NN developing_VBG they_PRP were_VBD immediately_RB isolated_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT disease_NN thus_RB prevented_VBN from_IN spreading_VBG ._.
I_PRP suggest_VBP that_IN this_DT system_NN should_MD be_VB applied_VBN ,_, mutalis_FW mutandis_NN ,_, to_TO suspected_VBN goods_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
That_DT is_VBZ to_TO say_VB ,_, that_IN the_DT importation_NN of_IN wool_NN in_IN bales_NNS should_MD be_VB allowed_VBN ,_, but_CC that_IN the_DT health_NN of_IN factory_NN hands_NNS employed_VBN in_IN handling_VBG it_PRP should_MD be_VB carefully_RB supervised_VBN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN among_IN such_JJ hands_NNS ,_, if_IN immediately_RB recognised_VBN ,_, would_MD present_VB no_RB more_RBR danger_NN to_TO the_DT community_NN than_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN cholera_NN under_IN similar_JJ circumstances_NNS ._.

I._NNP Plague_NNP and_CC animals_NNS ._.
No_DT ._.
8_CD ._.
Despatch_NN from_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
28_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 25th_CD September_NNP 1897_CD ._.
``_`` We_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO acknowledge_VB the_DT receipt_NN of_IN your_PRP$ telegram_NN ,_, dated_VBD 18th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, inquiring_VBG whether_IN our_PRP$ advisers_NNS apprehend_VBP any_DT risk_NN of_IN infection_NN with_IN plague_JJ poison_NN of_IN animal_JJ lymph_NN prepared_VBD within_IN plague_JJ areas_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN so_RB ,_, what_WP precautions_NNS are_VBP being_VBG taken_VBN in_IN the_DT matter_NN ._.
``_`` 2_CD ._.
In_IN reply_NN we_PRP have_VBP to_TO state_NN that_IN we_PRP have_VBP consulted_VBN the_DT Surgeon-_NNP General_NNP and_CC the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
We_PRP have_VBP also_RB availed_VBN ourselves_NNS of_IN the_DT expert_JJ opinions_NNS of_IN Dr._NNP J_NNP ._.
A._NN Lowson_NNP ,_, Plague_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN ,_, and_CC Mons_NNP ._.
W._NNP M._NNP Haffkine_NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT question_NN whether_IN cattle_NNS are_VBP liable_JJ to_TO plague_VB infection_NN ,_, and_CC append_JJ copies_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ reports_NNS for_IN Your_PRP$ Lordship_NNP 's_POS information_NN ._.
The_DT result_NN of_IN these_DT inquiries_NNS goes_VBZ ,_, in_IN our_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, to_TO establish_VB that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT appreciable_JJ risk_NN of_IN any_DT plague_JJ infection_NN from_IN animal_JJ vaccine_NN prepared_VBN with_IN the_DT precautions_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN observed_VBN ._.
The_DT grounds_NNS for_IN this_DT view_NN may_MD be_VB stated_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ ._.
``_`` 3_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_, the_DT Sanitary_NNP and_CC Medical_NNP Advisers_NNP of_IN this_DT Government_NNP consider_NN that_IN ,_, even_RB if_IN theoretically_RB there_EX might_MD be_VB a_DT risk_NN of_IN plague_NN poison_NN affecting_VBG animal_JJ lymph_NN prepared_VBD within_IN plague_JJ areas_NNS ,_, yet_RB in_IN practice_NN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT strict_JJ antiseptic_JJ precautions_NNS observed_VBN in_IN the_DT preparations_NNS of_IN the_DT calf_NN before_IN inoculation_NN and_CC the_DT care_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT lymph_NN is_VBZ collected_VBN and_CC stored_VBN ,_, the_DT risk_NN is_VBZ reduced_VBN to_TO a_DT minimum_NN ._.
The_DT calves_NNS are_VBP most_RBS carefully_RB examined_VBN by_IN skilled_JJ Veterinary_NNP Officers_NNPS and_CC none_NN but_CC the_DT most_JJS healthy_JJ are_VBP used_VBN as_IN 'Vaccinifers_NNS ._. '_''
Great_NNP care_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN of_IN them_PRP during_IN the_DT time_NN they_PRP are_VBP developing_VBG vaccinia_NN ,_, and_CC any_DT sign_NN of_IN disease_NN during_IN this_DT period_NN is_VBZ most_RBS carefully_RB looked_VBD for_IN ._.
In_IN fact_NN the_DT precautions_NNS taken_VBN render_NN it_PRP almost_RB impossible_JJ for_IN anything_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT best_JJS lymph_NN from_IN absolutely_RB healthy_JJ calves_NNS being_VBG taken_VBN ._.
``_`` 4_CD ._.
This_DT supposition_NN is_VBZ very_RB strongly_RB supported_VBN by_IN the_DT test_NN of_IN actual_JJ experience_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP vaccine_NN lymph_NN is_VBZ prepared_JJ and_CC sent_VBD out_RP from_IN only_RB two_CD centres_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, Bombay_NNP and_CC Karachi_NNP ,_, in_IN both_DT of_IN which_WDT plague_NN till_NN lately_RB existed_VBN in_IN a_DT highly_RB epidemic_JJ form_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP reports_NNS that_IN ,_, though_RB numerous_JJ consignments_NNS of_IN the_DT lymph_NN have_VBP been_VBN sent_VBN to_TO various_JJ places_NNS since_IN January_NNP last_JJ ,_, there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT report_NN or_CC even_RB suspicion_NN of_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN having_VBG resulted_VBN from_IN its_PRP$ use_NN ._.
Nor_CC has_VBZ there_RB been_VBN any_DT case_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT calf_NN ,_, either_RB in_IN Bombay_NNP or_CC Karachi_NNP ,_, has_VBZ ,_, after_IN supply-_JJ ing_NN lymph_NN ,_, developed_VBD plague_NN ._.
They_PRP have_VBP ,_, on_IN the_DT contrary_JJ ,_, all_DT remained_VBD healthy_JJ ._.
``_`` 5_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ in_IN fact_NN very_RB doubtful_JJ whether_IN cattle_NNS are_VBP susceptible_JJ to_TO plague_VB ,_, at_IN all_DT events_NNS ,_, to_TO anything_NN like_IN the_DT same_JJ degree_NN as_IN human_JJ APP_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._. ]_VB
its_PRP$ causes_NNS and_CC characteristics_NNS ._.
21_CD beings_NNS ._.
There_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT record_NN of_IN any_DT disease_NN or_CC deaths_NNS among_IN cattle_NNS in_IN the_DT many_JJ places_NNS where_WRB the_DT epidemic_NN has_VBZ raged_VBN in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP which_WDT could_MD be_VB attributed_VBN to_TO plague_VB ;_: and_CC ,_, as_IN will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP 's_POS report_NN ,_, in_IN Cutch-Mandvi_NNP inquiry_NN has_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN cattle_NNS remained_VBD perfectly_RB healthy_JJ ,_, while_IN the_DT plague_NN was_VBD at_IN its_PRP$ worst_JJS in_IN that_DT town_NN ._.
The_DT so-called_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN in_IN cattle_NNS have_VBP ,_, at_IN least_JJS in_IN one_CD instance_NN ,_, been_VBN pronounced_VBN by_IN competent_JJ veterinary_JJ opinion_NN as_IN renderpest_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP reports_NNS that_IN he_PRP carried_VBD out_RP experiments_NNS in_IN Hong-kong_NNP in_IN conjunction_NN with_IN the_DT Colonial_NNP Veterinary_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, in_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD proved_VBN that_IN cattle_NNS ,_, after_IN direct_JJ inoculation_NN with_IN pure_JJ culture_NN of_IN plague_NN bacilli_NN ,_, did_VBD not_RB develop_VB plague_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, with_IN the_DT excep-_JJ tion_NN of_IN temporary_JJ fever_NN and_CC refusal_NN of_IN food_NN ,_, remained_VBD healthy_JJ ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, plague_NN bacilli_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB found_VBN microscopically_RB or_CC bacterio-_JJ logically_RB in_IN their_PRP$ blood_NN ,_, nor_CC were_VBD there_EX any_DT signs_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN enlarged_JJ glands_NNS ,_, along_IN the_DT chain_NN of_IN lymphatics_NNS from_IN the_DT spot_NN where_WRB the_DT inoculation_NN was_VBD made_VBN ._.
Mons_NNS ._.
Haffkine_NNP 's_POS experiments_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, like_IN Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP 's_POS in_IN Hong-kong_NNP ,_, tend_VB to_TO prove_VB the_DT immunity_NN of_IN cattle_NNS generally_RB from_IN plague_NN ._.
Mons_NNS ._.
Haffkine_NNP injected_VBD hypodermically_RB horses_NNS ,_, goats_NNS ,_, cows_NNS ,_, and_CC sheep_NN with_IN considerable_JJ doses_NNS of_IN virulent_NN plague_NN cultures_NNS ._.
The_DT operation_NN caused_VBD an_DT attack_NN of_IN fever_NN from_IN which_WDT they_PRP all_DT ,_, except_IN the_DT goats_NNS ,_, recovered_VBN in_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN with_IN perhaps_RB local_JJ swelling_NN and_CC suppurations_NNS at_IN the_DT seat_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ._.
The_DT goats_NNS alone_RB ,_, without_IN developing_VBG any_DT acute_JJ disease_NN ,_, lost_VBN condition_NN ,_, gradu-_JJ ally_RB wasted_VBN away_RB ,_, and_CC after_IN a_DT considerable_JJ time_NN many_JJ of_IN them_PRP suc-_JJ cumbed_NN ._.
He_PRP further_RB states_VBZ that_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT cows_NNS gave_VBD birth_NN to_TO a_DT calf_NN during_IN the_DT period_NN she_PRP was_VBD operated_VBN on_IN ,_, and_CC both_DT cow_NNS and_CC calf_JJ re-_JJ mained_VBN healthy_JJ ._.
Finally_RB ,_, Mons_NNS ._.
Haffkine_NNP considers_NNS that_IN his_PRP$ experi-_JJ ments_NNS show_VBP that_IN no_DT spontaneous_JJ plague_NN infection_NN ,_, which_WDT in_IN nature_NN can_MD take_VB place_NN with_IN much_JJ smaller_JJR doses_NNS of_IN virus_NN than_IN those_DT used_VBN by_IN him_PRP on_IN horses_NNS ,_, cows_NNS ,_, goats_NNS ,_, and_CC sheep_NN ,_, is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO affect_VB these_DT animals_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ concurs_NN in_IN this_DT opinion._NN ``_``
6_CD ._.
Under_IN these_DT circumstances_NNS ,_, we_PRP have_VBP come_VBN to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT apparent_JJ reason_NN to_TO apprehend_VB any_DT risk_NN of_IN plague_NN poison_NN affecting_VBG animal_JJ lymph_NN prepared_VBN with_IN the_DT special_JJ precautions_NNS taken_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC Karachi_NNP ._. 9_CD ._.
Remarks_NNS on_IN the_DT Treatment_NNP of_IN Bubonic_NNP Plague_NNP by_IN James_NNP Cantlie_NNP ,_, M.B_NNP ._.
At_IN first_JJ sight_NN it_PRP would_MD seem_VB as_IN though_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN plague_NN was_VBD a_DT subject_NN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ useless_JJ to_TO discuss_VB ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ repeatedly_RB stated_VBN 22_CD Description_NNP of_IN Plague_NNP :_: [_NN APP_NNP ._.
I._NN that_IN we_PRP have_VBP no_DT cure_NN for_IN plague_NN ._.
We_PRP have_VBP no_DT ``_`` cure_NN ''_'' for_IN many_JJ ,_, nay_JJ ,_, most_JJS ,_, of_IN our_PRP$ diseases_NNS ,_, yet_RB experience_NN has_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN ,_, although_IN no_DT specific_JJ treatment_NN is_VBZ known_VBN ,_, still_RB with_IN care_NN ,_, judicious_JJ nursing_NN and_CC medical_JJ supervision_NN ,_, ailments_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN typhoid_NN ,_, cholera_NN ,_, and_CC zymotic_JJ diseases_NNS generally_RB ,_, can_MD be_VB ,_, and_CC are_VBP ,_, conducted_VBN to_TO a_DT successful_JJ termi-_JJ nation_NN ._.
Much_JJ therefore_RB as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ desirable_JJ to_TO know_VB what_WP will_MD ``_`` cure_VB ``_`` the_DT disease_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB consistent_JJ with_IN our_PRP$ behaviour_NN in_IN other_JJ illnesses_NNS to_TO stand_VB by_IN and_CC wait_NN until_IN it_PRP is_VBZ discovered_VBN what_WP form_NN of_IN attenuated_JJ virus_NN may_MD be_VB tried_VBN as_IN a_DT specific_JJ remedy_NN ._.
Once_RB for_IN all_DT let_VB it_PRP be_VB understood_JJ that_IN in_IN no_DT disease_NN does_VBZ one_CD get_VB such_JJ immediate_JJ results_NNS from_IN careful_JJ and_CC prompt_JJ medical_JJ treatment_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT direct_JJ outcome_NN of_IN watchful_JJ nursing_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN plague_NN ;_: and_CC per-_JJ haps_NNS one_CD ought_MD to_TO add_VB to_TO that_DT ``_`` in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Europeans_NNPS ''_'' ._.
Natives_NNS ,_, whether_IN of_IN China_NNP or_CC India_NNP ,_, succumb_VBD more_RBR readily_RB to_TO plague_VB than_IN Europeans_NNPS ._.
There_EX are_VBP one_CD or_CC two_CD reasons_NNS for_IN this_DT :_: I_PRP ._.
A_DT native_JJ seldom_NN comes_VBZ to_TO a_DT doctor_NN (_( a_DT European_NNP doctor_NN most_JJS of_IN all_DT )_) until_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ well_RB advanced_JJ ._.
2_CD ._.
In_IN point_NN of_IN stamina_PDT the_DT poorer_NN natives_NNS are_VBP a_DT long_JJ way_NN below_IN northern_JJ Europeans_NNPS ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT inherited_JJ dislike_NN of_IN the_DT native_NN for_IN all_DT forms_NNS of_IN stimulants_NNS ,_, be_VB they_PRP medicinal_JJ or_CC alcoholic_JJ ,_, during_IN illness_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT belief_NN of_IN the_DT natives_NNS in_IN the_DT old_JJ adage_NN that_IN ``_`` to_TO starve_VB a_DT fever_NN ''_'' is_VBZ correct_JJ ._.
The_DT difference_NN between_IN Europeans_NNPS and_CC natives_NNS was_VBD well_RB illustrated_JJ ,_, during_IN the_DT 1894_CD epidemic_JJ in_IN Hong-kong_NNP ,_, by_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN out_IN of_IN II_NNP British_NNP patients_NNS ,_, 9_CD recovered_VBD ,_, a_DT mortality_NN of_IN only_RB 18.2_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
;_: whilst_VBZ the_DT Chinese_JJ died_VBD at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN something_NN like_IN 95_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
This_DT favourable_JJ result_NN can_MD not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB ascribed_VBN altogether_RB to_TO racial_JJ influence_NN ;_: it_PRP was_VBD rather_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT effect_NN that_IN medical_JJ treatment_NN and_CC good_JJ nursing_NN had_VBD upon_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT British_JJ patients_NNS were_VBD seen_VBN early_RB in_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
They_PRP could_MD take_VB ,_, and_CC stand_NN ,_, stimulants_NNS ,_, medicinal_JJ and_CC alcoholic_JJ well_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT result_NN was_VBD the_DT satisfactory_JJ number_NN of_IN re-_JJ coveries_NNS which_WDT took_VBD place_NN ._.
Even_RB with_IN such_JJ Asiatics_NNS as_IN would_MD submit_VB to_TO similar_JJ treatment_NN ,_, most_JJS markedly_RB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT Japanese_JJ doctors_NNS ,_, were_VBD the_DT satisfactory_JJ results_NNS of_IN treatment_NN during_IN plague_NN manifest_NN ._.
The_DT attendance_NN of_IN the_DT doctor_NN must_MD be_VB prompt_JJ ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ treatment_NN must_MD be_VB decisive_JJ ._.
In_IN fact_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT first_JJ five_CD days_NNS of_IN illness_NN in_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT doctor_NN must_MD be_VB within_IN a_DT few_JJ minutes_NNS '_POS call_NN ._.
To_TO each_DT ward_NN of_IN a_DT hospital_NN a_DT doctor_NN should_MD be_VB assigned_VBN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN a_DT valuable_JJ life_NN is_VBZ at_IN stake_NN in_IN a_DT private_JJ house_NN ,_, medical_JJ aid_NN must_MD be_VB obtainable_JJ in_IN a_DT few_JJ seconds_NNS ._.
The_DT changes_NNS are_VBP so_RB rapid_JJ in_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT feature_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN so_RB fulminant_JJ ,_, that_IN without_IN immediate_JJ treatment_NN being_VBG possible_JJ success_NN is_VBZ hopeless_JJ ._.
APP_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._. ]_VB
its_PRP$ causes_NNS and_CC characteristics_NNS ._.
23_CD NURSING_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT hospital_NN ward_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT first_JJ five_CD days_NNS of_IN illness_NN ,_, practically_RB two_CD patients_NNS require_VBP an_DT attendant_JJ to_TO themselves_PRP if_IN the_DT utmost_NN good_JJ possible_JJ is_VBZ to_TO be_VB done_VBN ._.
A_DT nurse_NN must_MD never_RB let_VB her_PRP patient_VB out_IN of_IN sight_NN for_IN a_DT moment_NN ,_, be_VB the_DT patient_JJ asleep_NN or_CC awake_NN ._.
She_PRP can_MD not_RB leave_VB the_DT ward_NN or_CC room_NN ,_, without_IN posting_VBG a_DT deputy_NN ,_, for_IN any_DT purpose_JJ whatever_NN ._.
No_DT nurse_NN should_MD be_VB on_IN duty_NN for_IN more_JJR than_IN eight_CD hours_NNS at_IN a_DT time_NN ;_: still_RB better_RBR is_VBZ it_PRP to_TO follow_VB the_DT four_CD hours_NNS ``_`` watches_NNS ''_'' kept_VBN at_IN sea_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN nurses_NNS required_VBN may_MD seem_VB outrageous_JJ ,_, but_CC we_PRP have_VBP in_IN many_JJ illnesses_NNS a_DT day_NN and_CC night_NN nurse_NN for_IN private_JJ patients_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT more_RBR is_VBZ demanded_VBN in_IN this_DT the_DT most_RBS fatal_JJ illness_NN known_VBN ._.
Of_IN course_NN plague_NN comes_VBZ in_IN epidemics_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN nurses_NNS is_VBZ limited_JJ ,_, no_DT doubt_NN ;_: but_CC we_PRP must_MD not_RB lose_VB sight_NN of_IN what_WP is_VBZ necessary_JJ in_IN considering_VBG what_WP is_VBZ expedient_JJ ._.
Shortly_RB ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB put_VBN that_IN a_DT liberal_JJ supply_NN of_IN doctors_NNS and_CC nurses_NNS is_VBZ essential_JJ if_IN the_DT lives_NNS of_IN the_DT plague-stricken_JJ ,_, be_VB they_PRP native_JJ or_CC European_JJ ,_, are_VBP to_TO be_VB saved_VBN ._.
Enough_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN said_VBD as_IN to_TO the_DT rapidity_NN of_IN the_DT onset_NN ,_, the_DT develop-_JJ ment_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT fatality_NN of_IN plague_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT importance_NN of_IN early_JJ treatment_NN in_IN the_DT disease_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT requisite_JJ promptness_NN in_IN its_PRP$ administration_NN understood_NN ._.
The_DT symptoms_NNS and_CC signs_NNS change_VBP so_RB rapidly_RB ,_, and_CC in_IN such_JJ varying_JJ successions_NNS ,_, that_IN no_DT stereotyped_JJ line_NN of_IN treatment_NN can_MD be_VB followed_VBN ._.
Now_RB it_PRP is_VBZ delirium_JJ which_WDT calls_VBZ for_IN relief_NN ,_, now_RB cardiac_JJ distress_NN ,_, or_CC vomiting_VBG may_MD supervene_VB ;_: or_CC an_DT unexpected_JJ loss_NN of_IN pulse_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT collapse_NN totally_RB without_IN warning_VBG ,_, may_MD carry_VB off_RP the_DT patient_NN before_IN any_DT help_NN is_VBZ obtainable_JJ ._.
The_DT much_RB despised_VBN legend_NN ``_`` Treat_NNP symptoms_NNS as_IN they_PRP arise_VBP ''_'' is_VBZ the_DT maxim_NN in_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT word_NN ``_`` promptly_RB ''_'' were_VBD added_VBN ,_, the_DT summary_NN of_IN plague_NN treatment_NN is_VBZ before_IN us_PRP ._.
The_DT disease_NN caused_VBN by_IN a_DT bacillus_NN ,_, the_DT toxic_JJ effects_NNS of_IN which_WDT upon_IN the_DT blood_NN give_VB rise_NN to_TO functional_JJ derangements_NNS of_IN possibly_RB all_DT organs_NNS ,_, but_CC most_JJS markedly_RB of_IN the_DT nervous_JJ system_NN ,_, central_JJ and_CC periphe-_JJ ral_NN ._.
The_DT poison_NN is_VBZ so_RB acute_JJ that_IN ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN the_DT glandular_JJ inflammation_NN ,_, but_CC little_JJ structural_JJ change_NN is_VBZ met_VBN with_IN in_IN the_DT more_JJR vital_JJ organs_NNS ._.
The_DT cardiac_NN trouble_NN which_WDT is_VBZ so_RB marked_JJ an_DT accom-_JJ paniment_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ evidently_RB a_DT functional_JJ one_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT result_NN of_IN derangement_NN of_IN the_DT nervous_JJ supply_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN ._.
This_DT has_VBZ constantly_RB to_TO be_VB borne_VBN in_IN mind_NN when_WRB the_DT subject_NN of_IN drugs_NNS is_VBZ dealt_JJ with_IN ._.
The_DT subject_NN of_IN segregation_NN ,_, temporary_JJ hospitals_NNS ,_, quarantine_NN ,_, and_CC disinfection_NN generally_RB ,_, are_VBP not_RB dealt_JJ with_IN here_RB ._.
I_PRP propose_VBP merely_RB to_TO deal_VB with_IN general_JJ and_CC medicinal_JJ treatment_NN ._.
?_. 24_CD Description_NN of_IN Plague_NNP :_: [_NN APP_NNP ._.

GENERAL_NNP TREATMENT_NNP ._.

This_DT leads_VBZ one_CD to_TO the_DT be-_JJ lief_NN that_IN subcutaneous_JJ incision_NN of_IN the_DT gland_NN may_MD be_VB attended_VBN with_IN beneficial_JJ results_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT method_NN of_IN surgical_JJ procedure_NN not_RB without_IN precedent_NN ._.
Early_RB free_JJ incision_NN of_IN the_DT gland_NN is_VBZ not_RB to_TO be_VB recommended_VBN ,_, nor_CC can_MD excision_VB be_VB in_IN any_DT way_NN justified_JJ ._.
The_DT disease_NN is_VBZ a_DT polyade-_JJ nitis_NN and_CC of_IN so_RB extensive_JJ a_DT nature_NN that_WDT eradication_NN of_IN infected_JJ glands_NNS is_VBZ an_DT impossibility_NN ._.
A_DT gland_NN ,_, when_WRB swollen_NN ,_, red_JJ and_CC painful_JJ ,_, may_MD be_VB smeared_VBN with_IN glycerine_NN and_CC belladonna_NN ,_, or_CC poulticed_VBD to_TO relieve_VB pain_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, when_WRB fluctuation_NN is_VBZ perceptible_JJ ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB opened_VBN ,_, but_CC further_JJ procedure_NN is_VBZ useless_JJ ._.

W._NNP M._NNP HAFFKINE_NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO communicate_VB the_DT following_JJ facts_NNS relating_VBG to_TO the_DT possibility_NN of_IN protective_JJ inoculation_NN against_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ researches_NNS I_PRP have_VBP found_VBN different_JJ media_NNS which_WDT give_VBP rich_JJ cultures_NNS of_IN the_DT plague_NN bacillus_NN ,_, permitting_VBG to_TO cultivate_VB them_PRP in_IN abundant_NN and_CC concentrated_JJ quantities_NNS ._.
The_DT virulence_NN of_IN these_DT cultures_NNS is_VBZ shown_VBN by_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN 1_CD or_CC 2_CD minims_NNS are_VBP sufficient_JJ to_TO communicate_VB certain_JJ death_NN to_TO the_DT largest_JJS rodents_NNS ._.
The_DT destruction_NN of_IN the_DT bacilli_NN in_IN the_DT culture_NN by_IN delicate_NN processes_NNS ,_, such_JJ like_IN the_DT addition_NN of_IN essence_NN of_IN mustard_NN ,_, of_IN very_RB weak_JJ solutions_NNS of_IN carbolic_JJ acid_NN ,_, or_CC by_IN desiccation_NN ,_, or_CC by_IN heat_NN ,_, deprives_VBZ these_DT cul-_JJ tures_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ fatal_JJ properties_NNS ,_, and_CC makes_VBZ a_DT dose_JJ 40_CD to_TO 50_CD times_NNS bigger_JJR than_IN the_DT fatal_JJ one_CD ,_, quite_RB harmless_JJ to_TO the_DT animals_NNS ._.
But_CC ,_, while_IN depriving_VBG the_DT cultures_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ noxious_JJ properties_NNS ,_, the_DT above_NN processes_VBZ leave_VBP to_TO them_PRP the_DT powers_NNS of_IN protecting_VBG the_DT system_NN against_IN fatal_JJ infection_NN ._.
Rodents_NNS which_WDT have_VBP had_VBD an_DT injection_NN of_IN such_JJ cultures_NNS (_( with_IN microbes_NNS killed_VBN in_IN them_PRP )_) ,_, when_WRB infected_JJ five_CD days_NNS after_IN the_DT prophy-_JJ lactic_JJ treatment_NN ,_, stand_VBP easily_RB a_DT dose_NN of_IN virus_NN which_WDT would_MD be_VB fatal_JJ to_TO ten_VB other_JJ non-protected_JJ animals_NNS ._.
Having_VBG established_VBN these_DT facts_NNS ,_, I_PRP caused_VBD myself_PRP to_TO be_VB inoculated_VBN on_IN the_DT 10th_CD of_IN this_DT month_NN to_TO observe_VB the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN the_DT operation_NN in_IN man_NN ._.
?_. APP_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._. ]_VB
its_PRP$ causes_NNS and_CC characteristics_NNS ._.
33_CD The_DT injection_NN was_VBD done_VBN in_IN the_DT flanks_NNS with_IN 10_CD cubic_JJ centimetres_NNS of_IN a_DT culture_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT microbes_NNS were_VBD killed_VBN by_IN heating_VBG during_IN one_CD hour_NN at_IN a_DT temperature_NN of_IN 70_CD C._NNP The_DT symptoms_NNS produced_VBD consisted_VBN in_IN pain_NN at_IN the_DT seat_NN of_IN inocula-_JJ tion_NN and_CC in_IN a_DT rise_NN of_IN temperature_NN ._.
The_DT highest_JJS point_NN reached_VBD was_VBD 102_CD F._NNP ,_, 8_CD hours_NNS after_IN the_DT injection_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD accompanied_VBN by_IN slight_JJ headache_NN and_CC feeling_NN of_IN faintness_NN ._.
The_DT temperature_NN got_VBD again_RB normal_JJ 24_CD hours_NNS later_RB ._.
The_DT bowels_NNS remained_VBN normal_JJ ._.
The_DT pain_NN at_IN the_DT seats_NNS of_IN inoculation_NN was_VBD mostly_RB felt_VBN next_JJ morning_NN while_IN getting_VBG up_RP from_IN bed_NN ._.
It_PRP extended_VBD ,_, on_IN the_DT left_JJ side_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT region_NN above_IN the_DT Poupart_NNP 's_POS ligament_NN and_CC on_IN the_DT right_NN ,_, towards_IN the_DT axilla_NN ,_, without_IN reaching_VBG it_PRP ._.
Since_IN the_DT next_JJ day_NN the_DT pain_NN gradually_RB disappeared_VBD ._.
A_DT small_JJ nodule_NN remained_VBD afterwards_NNS at_IN the_DT seat_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ,_, but_CC got_VBD rapidly_RB absorbed_VBN ._.
These_DT symptoms_NNS show_VBP that_IN the_DT operation_NN is_VBZ perfectly_RB harmless_JJ to_TO men_NNS ._.
These_DT observations_NNS made_VBD in_IN the_DT laboratory_JJ lead_NN to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN the_DT inoculation_NN ,_, as_IN described_VBN above_IN ,_, will_MD increase_VB the_DT resistance_NN of_IN man_NN against_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT extent_NN of_IN that_DT protection_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT modifications_NNS to_TO be_VB introduced_VBN in_IN the_DT method_NN for_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN increasing_VBG that_DT protection_NN ,_, can_MD be_VB shown_VBN only_RB by_IN observation_NN on_IN man_NN during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ._.
The_DT most_RBS important_JJ facts_NNS to_TO be_VB solved_VBN by_IN such_JJ observations_NNS are_VBP the_DT following_JJ :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Which_WDT are_VBP the_DT doses_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO produce_VB in_IN man_NN a_DT marked_JJ increase_NN of_IN resistance_NN against_IN the_DT conditions_NNS of_IN infection_NN as_IN they_PRP exist_VBP in_IN nature_NN ?_.

I_PRP ._.
Between_IN the_DT 23rd_CD and_CC 29th_CD of_IN January_NNP last_JJ nine_CD cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN have_VBP occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT jail_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT five_CD proved_VBD fatal_NN ,_, the_DT population_NN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN numbering_VBG 345_CD souls_NNS ._.

III.-A_JJ case_NN of_IN death_NN from_IN cause_NN other_JJ than_IN plague_NN following_VBG soon_RB after_IN inoculation_NN ._.

Summary_NNP ._.
Amongst_NNP the_DT 7,905_CD persons_NNS inoculated_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, and_CC who_WP all_DT came_VBD from_IN the_DT most_RBS threatened_JJ localities_NNS and_CC houses_NNS ,_, there_EX were_VBD (_( besides_IN the_DT occurrences_NNS in_IN the_DT Byculla_NNP House_NNP of_IN Correction_NNP described_VBD apart_RB )_) -_: (_( a_DT )_) two_CD persons_NNS who_WP were_VBD already_RB unwell_RB at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN inocu-_JJ lation_NN ,_, and_CC who_WP developed_VBD unmistakable_JJ plague_NN within_IN the_DT next_JJ 12_CD hours_NNS ;_: they_PRP eventually_RB succumbed_VBD ;_: (_( b_NN )_) and_CC 16_CD persons_NNS who_WP were_VBD attacked_VBN more_JJR than_IN 12_CD hours_NNS after_IN inoculation_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT recovered_VBN ._.

39_CD I_PRP am_VBP specially_RB confident_JJ with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT number_NN of_IN fatal_JJ cases_NNS reported_VBD ,_, whereas_NNS in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS with_IN recovery_NN there_RB may_MD have_VB been_VBN neglect_JJ in_IN reporting_VBG some_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_, as_IN a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS were_VBD exceedingly_RB mild_JJ ._.

(_( c_NN )_) Finally_RB ,_, there_EX was_VBD one_CD case_NN only_RB where_WRB ,_, for_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN ._.
a_DT question_NN arose_IN whether_IN the_DT plague_NN inoculation_NN did_VBD not_RB do_VB any_DT harm_NN ._.

From-MONS_NNP ._.
W._NNP M._NNP HAFFKINE_NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO submit_VB a_DT report_NN ,_, by_IN Surgeon-Major_JJ Lyons_NNS and_CC myself_PRP ,_, on_IN the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Lower_NNP Damaun_NNP and_CC on_IN the_DT effect_NN of_IN preventive_JJ inoculation_NN there_RB ._.
The_DT delay_NN in_IN forwarding_VBG this_DT report_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN ,_, while_IN the_DT observations_NNS collected_VBN in_IN Damn_NNP were_VBD being_VBG studied_VBN and_CC classified_VBN ,_, two_CD epidemics_NNS occurred_VBD ,_, one_CD after_IN another_DT ,_, in_IN Lanowlie_NNP and_CC in_IN Kirkee_NNP ,_, in_IN conditions_NNS which_WDT permitted_VBD of_IN making_VBG a_DT very_RB accurate_JJ investigation_NN on_IN the_DT effect_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ._.

43_CD The_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT Damaun_NNP epidemic_JJ appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: The_DT town_NN of_IN Damaun_NNP is_VBZ divided_VBN by_IN a_DT river_NN into_IN two_CD parts_NNS :_: Lower_NNP Damaun_NNP ,_, the_DT largest_JJS business_NN part_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT Fort_NNP ,_, or_CC Upper_NNP Damaun_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT Government_NNP house_NN and_CC the_DT Government_NNP offices_NNS are_VBP situated_VBN ._.
The_DT plague_NN attacked_VBD almost_RB exclusively_RB three_CD of_IN the_DT villages_NNS which_WDT make_VBP part_NN of_IN Lower_NNP Damaun_NNP ,_, namely_RB ,_, Lower_JJR Damaun_NNP proper_NN ,_, having_VBG ,_, in_IN ordinary_JJ times_NNS ,_, a_DT population_NN of_IN 5,000_CD inhabitants_NNS ;_: Katheria_NNP ,_, the_DT property_NN ,_, of_IN Shet_NNP Sorabjee_NNP Damaunwalla_NNP ,_, with_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 4,700_CD ;_: and_CC Khadiwadi_NNP ,_, with_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 1,200_CD ._.
This_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN was_VBD in_IN active_JJ business_NN communication_NN with_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presi-_NNP dency_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ densely_RB populated_VBN ,_, the_DT inhabitants_NNS living_VBG in_IN small_JJ houses_NNS crowded_VBN together_RB ._.
The_DT Fort_NNP was_VBD cut_VBN off_RP by_IN a_DT cordon_NN from_IN Lower_JJR Damaun_NNP as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ began_VBD to_TO increase_VB in_IN proportion_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD only_RB some_DT 1/2_CD dozen_NN imported_VBN cases_NNS ._.
The_DT first_JJ attacks_NNS came_VBD to_TO notice_VB in_IN February_NNP last_JJ ,_, and_CC occurred_VBD amongst_JJ new_JJ arrivals_NNS from_IN Bulsar_NNP ,_, a_DT neighbouring_VBG town_NN which_WDT was_VBD badly_RB affected_VBN at_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC amongst_JJ sailors_NNS from_IN Karrachee_NNP arriving_VBG at_IN Damaun_NNP by_IN sea_NN ,_, in_IN native_JJ crafts_NNS ._.
Before_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ month_NN local_JJ cases_NNS began_VBD to_TO appear_VB among_IN the_DT fishermen_NNS ,_, who_WP have_VBP their_PRP$ busti_NNS close_RB to_TO the_DT river_NN ,_, where_WRB crafts_NNS are_VBP moored_VBN ,_, behind_IN the_DT Damaun_NNP Municipal_NNP School_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT last_JJ days_NNS of_IN the_DT month_NN a_DT hurried_JJ exodus_NN of_IN people_NNS began_VBD from_IN Lower_NNP Damaun_NNP ,_, increasing_VBG daily_RB as_IN the_DT epidemic_NN gained_VBN in_IN intensity_NN ,_, until_IN ,_, on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD of_IN March_NNP ,_, the_DT Governor_NNP placed_VBD a_DT cordon_NN along_IN the_DT river_NN ,_, and_CC stopped_VBD communication_NN between_IN the_DT Lower_NNP and_CC Upper_NNP parts_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN ;_: while_IN a_DT week_NN later_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT 30th_JJ March_NNP ,_, the_DT Bombay_NNP Government_NNP ,_, on_IN their_PRP$ part_NN ,_, closed_VBD British_JJ territory_NN to_TO the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN Damaun_NNP ._.
By_IN this_DT time_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD estimated_VBN ,_, over_IN 2,000_CD people_NNS had_VBD quitted_VBN the_DT place_NN ._.
The_DT worst_JJS period_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN corresponded_VBD to_TO the_DT month_NN following_VBG the_DT closing_NN of_IN the_DT Damaun_NNP frontiers_NNS ._.
The_DT climax_NN was_VBD reached_VBN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN April_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT daily_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS remained_VBD stationary_JJ for_IN about_IN 8_CD days_NNS and_CC then_RB began_VBD to_TO decline_VB ._.
The_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS which_WDT occurred_VBD in_IN one_CD day_NN was_VBD 80_CD ._.
Up_RB to_TO the_DT 25th_CD of_IN April_NNP the_DT daily_JJ mortality_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD closely_RB watched_VBN by_IN the_DT Parsee_NNP Community_NNP who_WP kept_VBD peons_NNS on_IN the_DT burial_NN and_CC burning_VBG grounds_NNS ,_, was_VBD recorded_VBN officially_RB from_IN the_DT information_NN given_VBN by_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS coming_VBG to_TO the_DT Registration_NNP Office_NNP to_TO declare_VB cases_NNS of_IN deaths_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ families_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT 25th_CD April_NNP ,_, the_DT Governor_NNP placed_VBD a_DT guard_NN of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ on_IN the_DT burial_NN and_CC burning_VBG grounds_NNS ,_, and_CC on_IN that_DT day_NN ,_, though_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS reported_VBN by_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS was_VBD 11_CD ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN bodies_NNS disposed_VBN of_IN in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT guard_NN was_VBD 34_CD ._.

*_NN As_IN the_DT immunity_NN of_IN the_DT inoculated_VBN in_IN Damaun_NNP will_MD be_VB estimated_VBN from_IN a_DT comparison_NN with_IN the_DT mortality_NN in_IN the_DT uninoculated_JJ population_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ essential_JJ ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO avoid_VB the_DT possibility_NN of_IN exaggerating_VBG the_DT power_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ,_, to_TO take_VB for_IN guidance_NN the_DT lowest_JJS figure_NN admis-_JJ sible_JJ as_IN representing_VBG the_DT real_JJ death-rate_NN in_IN the_DT place_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT follow-_JJ ing_NN calculations_NNS ,_, therefore_RB ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN plague_NN which_WDT occurred_VBD in_IN Damaun_NNP from_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ up_NN to_TO the_DT visit_NN of_IN the_DT Scientific_NNP Committee_NNP is_VBZ accepted_VBN as_IN 2,093_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT number_NN authenticated_VBN by_IN an_DT enquiry_NN in_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT affected_JJ families_NNS ._.
This_DT figure_NN gives_VBZ an_DT average_JJ daily_JJ mortality_NN from_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ up_NN to_TO the_DT time_NN of_IN placing_VBG guards_NNS on_IN the_DT burial_NN and_CC burning_VBG grounds_NNS ,_, as_IN being_VBG close_JJ upon_IN 26_CD deaths_NNS a_DT day_NN ._.

Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT great_JJ pressure_NN of_IN work_NN during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, no_DT method_NN for_IN keeping_VBG up_RP the_DT strength_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN bacilli_NN has_VBZ been_VBN worked_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT microbe_NN from_IN which_WDT the_DT plague_NN lymph_NN was_VBD manufactured_VBN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO gradually_RB sink_VB in_IN virulence_NN till_NN it_PRP became_VBD almost_RB harmless_JJ when_WRB inoculated_VBN into_IN rodents_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD lymph_JJ thus_RB weakened_VBD that_IN was_VBD used_VBN in_IN the_DT subsequent_JJ inoculations_NNS ._.

I._NN a_DT difference_NN in_IN result_NN in_IN direct_JJ correspondence_NN with_IN the_DT difference_NN in_IN the_DT material_NN used_VBN ,_, as_IN will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT following_VBG table_NN :_: -_: 1,017_CD inoculated_VBN on_IN the_DT first_JJ occasion_NN had_VBD 49_CD cases_NNS (_( 4.8_CD per_IN cent_NN ._. )_)

The_DT total_JJ mortality_NN and_CC the_DT percentage_NN of_IN deaths_NNS to_TO cases_NNS amongst_IN the_DT inoculated_VBN on_IN the_DT second_JJ occasion_NN ,_, though_IN they_PRP were_VBD exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT risk_NN of_IN infection_NN during_IN the_DT milder_NN period_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, was_VBD ,_, respectively_RB ,_, 2.2_CD and_CC 1.6_CD times_NNS higher_JJR than_IN amongst_VBP those_DT inoculated_VBN on_IN the_DT first_JJ occasion_NN ._.
Also_RB as_RB mentioned_JJ already_RB ,_, Dr._NNP Poiares_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ operations_NNS used_VBN doses_NNS considerably_RB lower_JJR than_IN those_DT given_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Kalapesi_NNP ._.

with_IN 14_CD deaths_NNS (_( 5.2_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, case_NN mortality_NN 66.7_CD per_IN cent_NN ._. )_) ._.
Thus_RB amongst_VBZ the_DT inoculated_JJ with_IN reduced_JJ doses_NNS ,_, small_JJ though_IN their_PRP$ death-rate_NN (_( 5.2_CD per_IN cent_NN ._. )_)
was_VBD when_WRB compared_VBN with_IN the_DT death-_JJ rate_NN in_IN the_DT uninoculated_JJ population_NN (_( 24.6_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
)_) ,_, the_DT total_JJ morta-_JJ lity_NN was_VBD 4.5_CD times_NNS and_CC the_DT case_NN mortality_NN 2.1_CD times_NNS higher_JJR than_IN that_DT amongst_VBZ the_DT inoculated_JJ with_IN larger_JJR doses_NNS ._.
This_DT variation_NN of_IN the_DT results_NNS ,_, answering_VBG faithfully_RB to_TO the_DT variation_NN in_IN the_DT strength_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT doses_NNS given_VBN ,_, shows_VBZ the_DT direct_JJ connection_NN of_IN cause_NN and_CC effect_NN in_IN the_DT two_CD series_NN of_IN facts_NNS ,_, and_CC makes_VBZ it_PRP probable_JJ that_IN it_PRP will_MD be_VB in_IN our_PRP$ power_NN to_TO improve_VB upon_IN the_DT results_NNS obtained_VBD in_IN Damaun_NNP ._.
It_PRP also_RB indicates_VBZ ,_, when_WRB the_DT actual_JJ figures_NNS are_VBP examined_VBN ,_, that_IN the_DT plague_NN prophylactic_NN has_VBZ a_DT greater_JJR influence_NN upon_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS than_IN upon_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN attacks_NNS ._.
This_DT result_NN repeated_VBD itself_PRP in_IN all_PDT the_DT observations_NNS collected_VBD up_RB to_TO the_DT present_JJ on_IN the_DT plague_NN inoculation_NN ,_, and_CC seems_VBZ to_TO stand_VB in_IN a_DT comprehensible_JJ connection_NN with_IN the_DT plan_NN followed_VBD in_IN working_VBG it_PRP out_RP ._.

55_CD The_DT above_JJ satisfactory_NN results_NNS were_VBD obtained_VBN in_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS virulent_JJ outbreaks_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN observed_VBN in_IN India_NNP in_IN the_DT present_JJ epidemic_JJ ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT 9_CD weeks_NNS which_WDT corresponded_VBD to_TO the_DT highest_JJS stage_NN of_IN that_DT outbreak_NN ._.

No_DT ._.

1_CD ._.
I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO acknowledge_VB the_DT receipt_NN of_IN the_DT Board_NNP 's_POS letter_NN ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 14th_CD instant_NN ,_, requesting_VBG information_NN on_IN the_DT alarming_NN and_CC fatal_JJ disease_NN raging_VBG in_IN various_JJ places_NNS dependant_VBP on_IN this_DT Zilla_NNP and_CC Collectorate_NNP ;_: and_CC ,_, in_IN reply_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN of_IN submitting_VBG for_IN their_PRP$ consideration_NN the_DT result_NN of_IN my_PRP$ enquiries_NNS on_IN this_DT subject_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Previous_JJ ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO entering_VBG into_IN detail_NN of_IN the_DT history_NN and_CC nature_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN which_WDT has_VBZ for_IN such_PDT a_DT length_NN of_IN time_NN been_VBN raging_VBG to_TO the_DT westward_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD not_RB be_VB amiss_JJ to_TO set_VB out_RP with_IN a_DT short_JJ descrip-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT soil_NN ,_, climate_NN ,_, and_CC inhabitants_NNS of_IN that_DT division_NN of_IN the_DT penin-_JJ sula_NN of_IN Guzerat_NNP ,_, commonly_RB known_VBN by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Jhlwar_NNP ,_, the_DT more_JJR immediate_JJ scene_NN of_IN its_PRP$ ravages_NNS ._.
3_CD Jhlwar_NNP ,_, the_DT most_RBS northern_JJ district_NN of_IN the_DT peninsula_NN ,_, derives_VBZ its_PRP$ appellation_NN from_IN the_DT tribe_NN of_IN Jhalla_NNP Rajpoots_NNP ,_, who_WP ,_, in_IN former_JJ times_NNS ,_, formed_VBD the_DT chief_JJ portion_NN of_IN its_PRP$ inhabitants_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ bounded_VBN to_TO the_DT east_NN and_CC south_NN by_IN Goelwar_NNP ,_, part_NN of_IN Kthiwar_NNP proper_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Run_NNP to_TO the_DT north_NN and_CC west_NN by_IN Kthiwar_NNP proper_NN ,_, part_NN of_IN Hallar_NNP ,_, that_IN part_NN of_IN the_DT Run_NNP termed_VBD Null-khanta_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Company_NNP 's_POS district_NN of_IN Veerun-_NNP gaum_NN comprised_VBD within_IN the_DT collectorate_NN of_IN Ahmedabad_NNP ._.
The_DT prin-_JJ cipal_JJ towns_NNS are_VBP Limree_NNP ,_, Wudwar_NNP ,_, Drangadra_NNP ,_, Hulwud_NNP ,_, and_CC Dundoo-_NNP ka_NN ;_: the_DT three_CD former_JJ have_VBP a_DT Thakore_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ._.
Of_IN these_DT however_RB the_DT Thakoreship_NN of_IN Limree_NNP is_VBZ far_RB the_DT most_RBS extensive_JJ and_CC has_VBZ suffered_VBN most_JJS from_IN the_DT destructive_JJ ravages_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT face_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN presents_VBZ in_IN general_JJ a_DT flat_JJ level_NN surface_NN denuded_VBD of_IN vegetation_NN ,_, except_IN in_IN the_DT more_JJR immediate_JJ neighbourhood_NN of_IN towns_NNS and_CC villages_NNS ._.
The_DT soil_NN for_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT rich_JJ black_JJ loamy_NN mould_NN ,_, here_RB and_CC there_RB intersected_VBN with_IN portions_NNS of_IN salt_NN marshy_JJ tracts_VBZ branch-_JJ ing_VBG off_RP from_IN the_DT Run_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT vicinity_NN of_IN Drangadra_NNP and_CC Wudwar_NNP it_PRP assumes_VBZ a_DT more_RBR gravelly_JJ appearance_NN :_: the_DT chief_NN products_NNS are_VBP wheat_NN ,_, gram_NN ,_, and_CC cotton_NN ._.
The_DT principal_JJ river_NN is_VBZ the_DT Khadur_NNP ,_, a_DT small_JJ stream_NN which_WDT takes_VBZ its_PRP$ rise_NN in_IN a_DT hill_NN called_VBN Mandwa_NNP in_IN Kthiwar_NNP ,_, whence_NN ,_, flowing_VBG in_IN an_DT easterly_JJ direction_NN by_IN Palliad_NNP and_CC Ranpour_NNP ,_, it_PRP loses_VBZ itself_PRP in_IN the_DT Run_NNP near_IN Dhollera_NNP ._.

II_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT climate_NN differs_NNS but_CC little_JJ from_IN that_DT of_IN Guzerat_NNP in_IN general_JJ ._.
The_DT constant_JJ exhalation_NN however_RB of_IN noxious_JJ effluvia_NN throughout_IN the_DT year_NN from_IN the_DT extensive_JJ tracts_NNS of_IN salt_NN marsh_NN ,_, covered_VBN with_IN profuse_NN and_CC rank_NN vegetation_NN within_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT tides_NNS which_WDT surround_VBP the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT Gulf_NNP of_IN Cambay_NNP ,_, and_CC project_NN for_IN many_JJ miles_NNS within_IN land_NN must_MD doubtless_VB exert_VB a_DT pernicious_JJ influence_NN on_IN the_DT atmosphere_NN in_IN its_PRP$ vicinity_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD probably_RB confer_VB on_IN it_PRP the_DT property_NN of_IN retaining_VBG within_IN certain_JJ limits_NNS the_DT proximate_NN causes_NNS of_IN a_DT disease_NN ,_, whether_IN con-_JJ tagious_JJ or_CC the_DT reverse_NN ;_: when_WRB once_RB introduced_VBN ,_, this_DT may_MD possibly_RB be_VB thought_VBN too_RB hypothetical_JJ an_DT inference_NN ,_, but_CC little_JJ doubt_NN can_MD exist_VB that_IN such_JJ exhalations_NNS tend_VBP materially_RB to_TO corrupt_VB the_DT air_NN ,_, thereby_RB rendering_VBG those_DT who_WP inhale_VBP it_PRP more_RBR immediately_RB predisposed_VBN to_TO receive_VB the_DT fomites_NNS of_IN a_DT disease_NN lurking_VBG in_IN their_PRP$ neighbourhood_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT principal_JJ inhabitants_NNS of_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN are_VBP Grassias_NNP of_IN the_DT Rajpoot_NNP tribe_NN of_IN Jhalla_NNP ,_, Brahmins_NNP of_IN the_DT Shravoe_NNP or_CC Jain_NNP sect_VBP ,_, Khoombies_NNP ,_, Kolies_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT few_JJ Bhoras_NNP ._.
6_CD ._.
As_IN it_PRP is_VBZ at_IN all_DT times_NNS a_DT matter_NN of_IN difficulty_NN to_TO obtain_VB from_IN native_JJ authority_NN information_NN whereon_NN reliance_NN can_MD be_VB placed_VBN ,_, and_CC as_IN they_PRP invariably_VBP either_DT exaggerate_NN or_CC distort_VB the_DT subject_NN of_IN their_PRP$ communi-_JJ cations_NNS whenever_WRB such_JJ refer_NN to_TO circumstances_NNS beyond_IN their_PRP$ limited_JJ comprehension_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN any_DT prevailing_NN disorders_NNS ,_, etc_FW ._.
To_TO the_DT following_VBG remarks_NNS therefore_RB on_IN the_DT origin_NN ,_, symptoms_NNS and_CC progress_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN now_RB raging_VBG to_TO the_DT westward_NN ,_, the_DT Board_NNP 's_POS indulgence_NN is_VBZ solicited_VBN ,_, no_DT case_NN having_VBG lately_RB fallen_VBN under_IN my_PRP$ personal_JJ inspection_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
In_IN tracing_VBG the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN question_NN the_DT natives_NNS agree_VBP in_IN referring_VBG the_DT period_NN of_IN its_PRP$ first_JJ introduction_NN to_TO the_DT Hindoo_NNP year_NN or_CC Sumwut_NNP 1873_CD =_NNP A._NN D._NNP 1817_CD ,_, three_CD years_NNS subsequent_JJ to_TO the_DT dread-_JJ ful_JJ famine_NN which_WDT raged_VBD with_IN such_JJ destructive_JJ fury_NN over_IN Guzerat_NNP and_CC Kthiwar_NNP ._.
It_PRP first_RB broke_VBD out_RP at_IN Dhollera_NNP ,_, where_WRB they_PRP say_VBP it_PRP was_VBD intro-_JJ duced_VBN from_IN Moorvee_NNP ,_, a_DT town_NN in_IN Kthiwar_NNP proper_NN ;_: they_PRP are_VBP not_RB quite_RB agreed_VBN as_IN to_TO the_DT precise_JJ mode_NN of_IN introducing_NN ;_: some_DT alleging_VBG it_PRP to_TO have_VB been_VBN conveyed_VBN by_IN merchants_NNS and_CC petty_JJ traders_NNS from_IN Kutch_NNP ,_, others_NNS referring_VBG it_PRP to_TO those_DT people_NNS who_WP used_VBD annually_RB to_TO come_VB from_IN Kutch_NNP in_IN the_DT cotton_NN season_NN (_( February_NNP to_TO May_NNP )_) with_IN their_PRP$ wheels_NNS for_IN separating_VBG cotton_NN from_IN its_PRP$ seed_NN ._.
They_PRP ,_, however_RB ,_, coincide_NN in_IN the_DT material_JJ point_NN of_IN its_PRP$ having_VBG been_VBN imported_VBN from_IN the_DT westward_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ worthy_JJ of_IN remark_NN that_WDT although_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD in_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Dhollera_NNP ,_, three_CD people_NNS only_RB were_VBD attacked_VBN ,_, all_DT of_IN whom_WP died_VBD ._.
From_IN Dhollera_NNP it_PRP spread_VBD over_IN the_DT neighbouring_JJ villages_NNS of_IN Burrad_NNP Rojka_NNP ,_, Peeplce_NNP ,_, etc._NN ,_, and_CC reached_VBD Dundooka_NNP ;_: it_PRP continued_VBD in_IN this_DT neighbour-_JJ hood_NN till_VB the_DT close_NN of_IN 1817_CD (_( diffusing_VBG its_PRP$ baneful_JJ influence_NN amongst_VBD the_DT villages_NNS situated_VBN on_IN the_DT Run_NNP )_) ,_, being_VBG the_DT same_JJ disease_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT ?_. APP_NNP ._.
