61_CD Board_NNP allude_NN in_IN the_DT concluding_VBG part_NN of_IN the_DT 3rd_CD paragraph_NN of_IN their_PRP$ letter_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP gradually_RB decreased_VBD ,_, but_CC did_VBD not_RB disappear_VB altogether_RB ,_, for_IN several_JJ insulated_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD constantly_RB occurring_VBG in_IN the_DT numerous_JJ villages_NNS of_IN the_DT Dundooka_NNP and_CC Limree_NNP districts_NNS ;_: it_PRP continued_VBD lurking_VBG in_IN this_DT manner_NN till_VBZ the_DT beginning_NN of_IN last_JJ year_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP broke_VBD out_RP with_IN renovated_JJ fury_NN at_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Buriad_NNP in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN April_NNP ;_: this_DT place_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN 3_CD miles_NNS to_TO the_DT westward_NN of_IN Dhollera_NNP ;_: it_PRP raged_VBD here_RB till_VB the_DT setting_NN in_IN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN two_CD months_NNS 40_CD families_NNS were_VBD literally_RB annihilated_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN June_NNP it_PRP spread_VBD to_TO Rajka_NNP village_NN ,_, 3_CD coss_NN to_TO the_DT west_NN of_IN the_DT former_JJ ,_, and_CC nearly_RB depopulated_VBD it_PRP ;_: during_IN the_DT rains_NNS it_PRP diffused_VBD itself_PRP over_RP a_DT large_JJ tract_NN of_IN country_NN ,_, carrying_VBG consternation_NN and_CC certain_JJ destruction_NN wherever_IN it_PRP went_VBD ;_: it_PRP manifested_VBD equal_JJ virulence_NN at_IN several_JJ places_NNS (_( though_IN remote_NN from_IN each_DT other_JJ )_) much_RB about_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN June_NNP it_PRP first_RB appeared_VBD at_IN Limree_NNP ._.
The_DT fatal_JJ effects_NNS and_CC dreadful_JJ ravages_NNS it_PRP made_VBD here_RB were_VBD so_RB awful_JJ that_IN the_DT poor_JJ ,_, terrified_JJ inhabitants_NNS ,_, after_IN losing_VBG from_IN 1,500_CD to_TO 2,000_CD of_IN their_PRP$ number_NN ,_, deserted_VBD the_DT place_NN entirely_RB for_IN a_DT time_NN ,_, leaving_VBG a_DT few_JJ to_TO perform_VB the_DT last_JJ melancholy_JJ rites_NNS of_IN burning_NN or_CC Lurial_JJ to_TO such_JJ of_IN their_PRP$ relatives_NNS and_CC friends_NNS as_IN were_VBD lingering_VBG under_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC who_WP ;_: they_PRP were_VBD aware_JJ ,_, had_VBD but_CC a_DT short_JJ time_NN to_TO suffer_VB from_IN its_PRP$ known_VBN rapidity_NN and_CC certainty_NN in_IN terminating_VBG fatally_RB ,_, a_DT person_NN attacked_JJ seldom_NN surviving_VBG the_DT third_JJ day_NN after_IN its_PRP$ commencement_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
Subsequent_JJ to_TO the_DT dispersion_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN Limree_NNP ,_, the_DT disease_NN abated_VBD in_IN violence_NN there_RB ,_, only_RB to_TO break_VB out_RP with_IN increased_JJ vigour_NN in_IN several_JJ other_JJ towns_NNS ,_, and_CC villages_VBZ both_DT to_TO the_DT east_NN and_CC west_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, where_WRB it_PRP successively_RB manifested_VBD itself_PRP ,_, and_CC some_DT of_IN which_WDT it_PRP en-_VBZ tirely_RB depopulated_VBN ._.
It_PRP should_MD be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN while_IN this_DT work_NN of_IN destruction_NN was_VBD going_VBG on_IN ,_, the_DT rains_NNS were_VBD pouring_VBG down_RP in_IN torrents_NNS ,_, the_DT whole_JJ surface_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN between_IN each_DT village_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ generally_RB situated_VBN on_IN a_DT rising_VBG ground_NN or_CC artificial_JJ hillock_NN ,_, presented_VBN to_TO the_DT view_NN but_CC one_CD sheet_NN of_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN thus_RB impeding_VBG the_DT communication_NN betwixt_FW different_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, and_CC confining_VBG the_DT inhabitants_NNS within_IN the_DT precincts_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ respective_JJ habitations_NNS compelling_VBG them_PRP as_IN it_PRP were_VBD to_TO inhale_VB an_DT atmosphere_NN already_RB overladen_VBZ with_IN morbid_NN effluvia_NN ,_, additional_JJ strength_NN was_VBD given_VBN to_TO the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ victims_NNS were_VBD ,_, as_IN it_PRP may_MD readily_RB be_VB supposed_VBN ,_, proportionately_RB numerous_JJ ._.
11_CD ._.
The_DT utmost_JJ eastern_JJ limit_NN of_IN its_PRP$ progress_NN hitherto_NN has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT village_NN of_IN Ballole_NNP in_IN the_DT Limree_NNP district_NN on_IN the_DT western_JJ bank_NN of_IN the_DT Run_NNP ,_, and_CC about_IN 25_CD coss_NN west_NN of_IN this_DT city_NN ;_: it_PRP has_VBZ not_RB hitherto_VBN made_VBN its_PRP$ appearance_NN to_TO the_DT eastward_NN of_IN this_DT salt_NN marshy_JJ Bett_NNP ._.
The_DT destruc-_JJ tive_JJ course_NN of_IN this_DT dreadful_JJ scourge_NN seems_VBZ to_TO confine_VB itself_PRP principally_RB to_TO such_JJ of_IN the_DT native_JJ population_NN as_IN subsist_NN entirely_RB on_IN vegetable_JJ diet_NN ,_, ?_. 62_CD Previous_JJ history_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN India_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._.
Mr._NNP Orton_NNP ,_, in_IN proceeding_VBG from_IN Kaira_NNP to_TO Bhore_VB in_IN October_NNP 1820_CD ,_, had_VBD information_NN of_IN the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN this_DT disease_NN at_IN Rhadanpoor_NNP Summer_NNP and_CC other_JJ towns_NNS and_CC villages_NNS about_IN the_DT latitude_NN of_IN 23-40_JJ ,_, at_IN different_JJ periods_NNS while_IN it_PRP was_VBD prevailing_VBG in_IN Guzerat_NNP ._.
JOHN_NNP SCOTT_NNP ,_, S._NNP M._NNP B_NNP ._.
10-10-1836._JJ namely_RB ,_, Brahmins_NNP ,_, Soonars_NNP ,_, Durzees_NNP ,_, and_CC Khoomthees_NNP ;_: those_DT using_VBG animal_JJ food_NN with_IN few_JJ exceptions_NNS generally_RB escaping_VBG ._.
What_WP is_VBZ singular_JJ and_CC may_MD tend_VB to_TO corroborate_VB an_DT idea_NN of_IN its_PRP$ being_VBG under_IN certain_JJ circum-_JJ stances_NNS contagious_JJ is_VBZ the_DT fact_NN that_IN when_WRB it_PRP once_RB obtains_VBZ a_DT footing_NN in_IN a_DT particular_JJ tribe_NN or_CC profession_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN Banias_NNP ,_, Soonars_NNP ,_, tailors_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, it_PRP seldom_RB abates_VBZ without_IN having_VBG gone_VBN through_IN every_DT individual_NN of_IN such_JJ tribe_JJ resident_NN at_IN the_DT same_JJ place_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN general_JJ making_VBG victims_NNS of_IN them_PRP all_DT ._.
Symptoms_NNS and_CC effects_NNS ._.
12_CD ._.
From_IN the_DT native_JJ definitions_NNS of_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN this_DT disease_NN ,_, one_CD might_MD be_VB led_VBN to_TO infer_VB the_DT existence_NN of_IN two_CD distinct_JJ diseases_NNS ;_: this_DT supposition_NN might_MD at_IN first_JJ seem_VBP corroborated_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ having_VBG separate_JJ names_NNS for_IN each_DT ._.
The_DT one_CD they_PRP term_NN Ghaut_NNP no_DT rogue_NN or_CC the_DT knotty_JJ disease_NN ;_: the_DT other_JJ they_PRP distinguish_VBP by_IN the_DT appellations_NNS of_IN Kogla_NNP no_DT rogue_NN and_CC Tao_NNP no_DT rogue_NN ,_, signifying_VBG the_DT expectorating_VBG disease_NN and_CC the_DT fever_NN disease_NN ;_: these_DT ,_, though_RB equally_RB severe_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ characteristic_JJ symptoms_NNS and_CC similarly_JJ fatal_NN in_IN their_PRP$ effects_NNS ,_, may_MD only_RB be_VB aggravated_VBN varieties_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ disorder_NN ,_, acted_VBN upon_IN by_IN a_DT vitiated_VBN atmosphere_NN and_CC other_JJ local_JJ causes_NNS which_WDT could_MD only_RB be_VB successfully_RB developed_VBN by_IN personal_JJ investigation_NN ._.
They_PRP describe_VBP the_DT Ghaut_NNP no_DT rogue_NN to_TO possess_VB the_DT following_JJ symptoms_NNS :_: -great_NN and_CC general_JJ uneasiness_NN of_IN the_DT frame_NN ,_, pains_VBZ in_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, lumbar_JJ region_NN and_CC joints_NNS on_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN the_DT attack_NN ,_, hard_RB ,_, knotty_NNS and_CC highly_RB painful_JJ swellings_NNS of_IN the_DT inguinal_JJ or_CC axillary_JJ glands_NNS (_( whence_VB the_DT name_NN )_) appear_VBP in_IN some_DT instances_NNS ;_: the_DT parotids_NNS are_VBP affected_VBN in_IN 4_CD or_CC 5_CD hours_NNS ,_, fever_RB supervenes_NNS ;_: these_DT symptoms_NNS go_VBP on_IN increasing_VBG in_IN violence_NN ,_, attended_VBD with_IN great_JJ thirst_JJ and_CC delirium_NN until_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT attack_NN ,_, when_WRB death_NN closes_VBZ the_DT scene_NN ;_: and_CC should_MD the_DT patient_NN survive_VBP the_DT third_JJ day_NN ,_, they_PRP begin_VBP to_TO conceive_VB hopes_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ re-_JJ covery_NN ;_: suppuration_NN of_IN the_DT glandular_JJ swellings_NNS occurs_VBZ on_IN the_DT fourth_JJ or_CC fifth_JJ day_NN ,_, the_DT other_JJ symptoms_NNS gradually_RB diminish_VBP in_IN force_NN ,_, the_DT fever_NN assumes_VBZ a_DT milder_NN aspect_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT patient_NN regains_VBZ his_PRP$ strength_NN in_IN 12_CD or_CC 15_CD days_NNS ;_: such_JJ favorable_JJ terminations_NNS are_VBP however_RB rare_JJ ._.
13_CD ._.
This_DT form_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN into_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Ballole_NNP in_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN December_NNP last_JJ by_IN a_DT Banian_NNP of_IN the_DT place_NN who_WP had_VBD returned_VBN from_IN Dewpoora_NNP whither_NN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN on_IN business_NN and_CC where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD raging_VBG at_IN the_DT time_NN ;_: the_DT night_NN after_IN his_PRP$ return_NN he_PRP complained_VBD of_IN great_JJ uneasiness_NN ,_, pains_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$ loins_NNS and_CC joints_NNS attended_VBD with_IN fever_NN ;_: these_DT symptoms_NNS continued_VBD increasing_VBG throughout_IN the_DT night_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT next_JJ morning_NN he_PRP perceived_VBD swellings_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ inguinal_JJ glands_NNS which_WDT were_VBD exceedingly_RB painful_JJ during_IN the_DT day_NN ;_: he_PRP became_VBD delirious_JJ and_CC complained_VBD of_IN intense_JJ thirst_NN ;_: no_DT abatement_NN occurred_VBD on_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN which_WDT he_PRP died_VBD ;_: every_DT person_NN belonging_VBG to_TO this_DT man_NN 's_POS family_NN ,_, both_DT male_NN and_CC female_NN ,_, died_VBD within_IN the_DT space_NN of_IN 10_CD days_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ disease_NN ;_: APP_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._. ]_NN
Previous_JJ history_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN India_NNP ._.
63_CD it_PRP spread_VBD to_TO the_DT other_JJ two_CD Banian_JJ families_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, committing_VBG similar_JJ ravages_NNS ._.
After_IN remaining_VBG about_RB 15_CD days_NNS from_IN its_PRP$ first_JJ intro-_JJ duction_NN ,_, during_IN which_WDT period_NN it_PRP destroyed_VBD about_IN 30_CD of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS out_IN of_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN nearly_RB 200_CD ,_, it_PRP disappeared_VBD ._.
14_CD ._.
The_DT following_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD in_IN May_NNP 1817_CD at_IN Dhollera_NNP while_IN I_PRP was_VBD there_RB on_IN business_NN ._.
It_PRP happened_VBD in_IN a_DT lad_JJ 14_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP stated_VBN the_DT symptoms_NNS and_CC treatment_NN from_IN the_DT best_JJS of_IN my_PRP$ recollection_NN ,_, and_CC though_IN it_PRP terminated_VBD fatally_RB ,_, I_PRP am_VBP inclined_JJ to_TO think_VB bleeding_NN and_CC the_DT use_NN of_IN brisk_JJ cathartics_NNS in_IN the_DT early_JJ stage_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN would_MD go_VB a_DT great_JJ way_NN in_IN arresting_VBG the_DT progress_NN of_IN this_DT destructive_JJ malady_NN ._.
15_CD ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD ushered_VBN in_IN with_IN considerable_JJ pain_NN in_IN the_DT head_NN and_CC loins_NNS ,_, sickness_NN at_IN the_DT stomach_NN and_CC vomitting_NN of_IN bilious_JJ matter_NN ,_, tur-_JJ gidness_NN of_IN the_DT eye_NN ,_, full_JJ strong_JJ and_CC hard_JJ pulse_NN ,_, skin_FW dry_NN and_CC intensely_RB hot_JJ ._.
I_PRP immediately_RB gave_VBD him_PRP a_DT strong_JJ cathartic_NN of_IN jalap_NN and_CC calomel_NN ,_, and_CC took_VBD away_RB 12_CD ounces_NNS of_IN blood_NN ;_: the_DT symptoms_NNS subsided_VBN in_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD hours_NNS after_IN the_DT operation_NN of_IN the_DT medicine_NN ,_, but_CC returned_VBD with_IN in-_NN creased_JJ violence_NN ;_: the_DT following_VBG morning_NN when_WRB I_PRP repeated_VBD the_DT medicine_NN and_CC bleeding_NN this_DT partially_RB relieved_VBD him_PRP ;_: an_DT exacerbation_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT symptoms_NNS took_VBD place_NN in_IN the_DT evening_NN with_IN an_DT enlargement_NN of_IN the_DT glands_NNS in_IN both_DT armpits_NNS which_WDT continued_VBD to_TO increase_VB throughout_IN the_DT night_NN ,_, but_CC without_IN assuming_VBG any_DT circumscribed_JJ appearance_NN as_IN in_IN common_JJ bubo_NN ;_: he_PRP died_VBD at_IN sunrise_NN the_DT third_JJ morning_NN from_IN the_DT attack_NN ;_: this_DT boy_NN was_VBD living_VBG in_IN a_DT small_JJ hut_NN surrounded_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ relations_NNS who_WP of_IN course_NN per-_NN formed_VBD all_PDT the_DT requisite_JJ duties_NNS his_PRP$ situation_NN required_VBN ,_, but_CC not_RB one_CD of_IN them_PRP was_VBD affected_VBN by_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Of_IN five_CD of_IN other_JJ cases_NNS the_DT first_JJ symp-_JJ tom_NN yielded_VBN to_TO brisk_JJ cathartics_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT same_JJ compound_NN where_WRB these_DT cases_NNS occurred_VBD ,_, there_EX were_VBD upwards_NNS of_IN 200_CD people_NNS ,_, including_VBG children_NNS ,_, all_DT of_IN whom_WP came_VBD from_IN the_DT same_JJ district_NN ._.
16_CD ._.
The_DT other_JJ form_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, known_VBN to_TO the_DT natives_NNS by_IN the_DT names_NNS of_IN Kogla_NNP and_CC Tao_NNP no_DT rogue_NN and_CC which_WDT at_IN present_JJ prevails_NNS most_JJS ,_, they_PRP describe_VBP as_IN exhibiting_VBG the_DT undermentioned_JJ symptoms_NNS ._.
High_JJ fever_NN attended_VBD with_IN burning_NN and_CC excruciating_NN pains_NNS about_IN the_DT scrobiculis_NN cordis_NN ,_, skin_FW intensely_RB hot_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT patient_NN feels_NNS as_IN if_IN his_PRP$ body_NN within_IN was_VBD on_IN fire_NN ,_, hiccough_NN with_IN deep_JJ and_CC oppressive_JJ breathing_NN ensue_NN ,_, he_PRP also_RB feels_VBZ a_DT pricking_JJ sensation_NN all_DT over_IN his_PRP$ body_NN as_IN if_IN it_PRP was_VBD perforated_VBN with_IN pins_NNS ,_, considerable_JJ pains_NNS in_IN the_DT chest_NN and_CC joints_NNS ,_, and_CC about_IN the_DT navel_NN ,_, delirium_NN ,_, great_JJ anxiety_NN ,_, and_CC thirst_RB follow_VBP ;_: at_IN length_IN the_DT patient_NN hawks_VBZ up_RP clots_NNS of_IN blood_NN ,_, the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN breathing_VBG increases_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP generally_RB dies_VBZ the_DT second_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT attack_NN ._.

17_CD ._.
I_PRP shall_MD not_RB presume_VB upon_IN the_DT Board_NNP 's_POS patience_NN further_RB by_IN attempting_VBG to_TO investigate_VB the_DT laws_NNS by_IN which_WDT this_DT malady_NN is_VBZ controlled_VBN or_CC account_NN for_IN the_DT causes_NNS that_WDT produce_VBP it_PRP ;_: I_PRP shall_MD merely_RB state_NN that_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN has_VBZ in_IN my_PRP$ humble_JJ opinion_NN been_VBN erroneously_RB given_VBN to_TO it_PRP ._.

From-THOMAS_NNP WHYTE_NNP ,_, Esq._NNP ,_, Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Medical_NNP Board_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP now_RB the_DT pleasure_NN to_TO acknowledge_VB the_DT receipt_NN of_IN your_PRP$ letter_NN ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 19th_CD February_NNP ,_, directing_VBG me_PRP to_TO institute_VB some_DT inquiry_NN into_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN a_DT disease_NN ,_, said_VBD to_TO be_VB contagious_JJ ,_, now_RB raging_VBG in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Kthiwar_NNP and_CC districts_NNS subordinate_VBP to_TO the_DT Collec-_NNP torate_NN of_IN Ahmedabad_NNP ._.
I_PRP was_VBD already_RB moving_VBG ,_, for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT above_JJ direction_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN my_PRP$ receiving_VBG your_PRP$ letter_NN and_CC shall_MD first_RB submit_VB for_IN your_PRP$ consideration_NN a_DT kind_NN of_IN journal_NN of_IN the_DT principal_JJ facts_NNS ,_, which_WDT I_PRP collected_VBD from_IN the_DT places_NNS where_WRB I_PRP visited_VBD ,_, and_CC after-_JJ wards_NNS with_IN such_JJ remarks_NNS as_IN a_DT careful_JJ consideration_NN of_IN facts_NNS has_VBZ produced_VBN ._.
The_DT town_NN of_IN Morvee_NNP is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ place_NN ,_, surrounded_VBN with_IN very_RB high_JJ walls_NNS ,_, situated_VBD pretty_RB high_JJ on_IN the_DT bank_NN of_IN a_DT fine_JJ river_NN ._.
Neither_DT in_IN it_PRP or_CC its_PRP$ neighbourhood_NN do_VBP there_RB appear_VB to_TO exist_VB any_DT of_IN those_DT causes_NNS which_WDT are_VBP understood_JJ to_TO produce_VB the_DT common_JJ Intermittent_NNP or_CC Remittent_NNP fevers_NNS of_IN this_DT country_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT character_NN of_IN the_DT place_NN has_VBZ in_IN general_JJ been_VBN remarkable_JJ for_IN health_NN ._.
The_DT whole_JJ space_NN within_IN the_DT walls_NNS is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, crowded_VBD with_IN houses_NNS ;_: and_CC although_IN the_DT popu-_JJ lation_NN at_IN present_JJ is_VBZ very_RB thin_JJ ,_, they_PRP were_VBD probably_RB filled_VBN with_IN inhabit-_JJ ants_NNS before_IN the_DT place_NN was_VBD visited_VBN by_IN famine_NN and_CC sickness_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT subject_NN of_IN this_DT paper_NN ,_, distinguished_VBD all_DT over_IN this_DT district_NN by_IN the_DT general_JJ name_NN of_IN ``_`` Ghaut_NNP ''_'' (_( and_CC which_WDT from_IN the_DT exact_JJ similarity_NN between_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN that_DT now_RB raging_VBG at_IN Moolee_NNP and_CC Sila_NNP ,_, and_CC those_DT described_VBN as_IN the_DT common_JJ appearances_NNS in_IN 1817_CD is_VBZ unquestionably_RB the_DT same_JJ disease_NN )_) prevailed_VBD for_IN five_CD months_NNS in_IN this_DT town_NN ,_, three_CD years_NNS ago_RB ._.

Previous_JJ history_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN India_NNP ._.
65_CD hot_JJ months_NNS ,_, without_IN undergoing_VBG any_DT change_NN from_IN the_DT change_NN of_IN weather_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ in_IN general_JJ stated_VBN to_TO have_VB carried_VBN off_RP fifteen_JJ hundred_CD people_NNS ,_, which_WDT account_VBP ,_, I_PRP should_MD think_VB ,_, is_VBZ exaggerated_VBN about_IN two-_JJ thirds_NNS above_IN the_DT actual_JJ number_NN ._.
It_PRP must_MD remain_VB a_DT subject_NN of_IN conjecture_NN ,_, however_RB :_: for_IN the_DT different_JJ statements_NNS vary_VBP so_RB much_RB as_IN to_TO set_VB all_DT accuracy_NN at_IN defiance_NN ._.
The_DT same_JJ doubt_NN exists_VBZ regarding_VBG the_DT proportion_NN between_IN the_DT deaths_NNS and_CC recoveries_NNS ;_: some_DT declaring_VBG that_IN one_CD in_IN ten_NN recovered_VBN ,_, others_NNS that_IN not_RB one_CD in_IN fifty_NN did_VBD so_RB ,_, and_CC a_DT barber_NN surgeon_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN informed_VBD me_PRP that_IN two_CD thousand_NN recovered_VBN and_CC two_CD thousand_VBP five_CD hundred_JJ died_VBD ;_: he_PRP said_VBD he_PRP never_RB meddled_VBD with_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, till_NN after_IN the_DT fifth_JJ day_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ the_DT principal_JJ part_NN or_CC whole_NN of_IN the_DT danger_NN was_VBD at_IN an_DT end_NN ._.
His_PRP$ practice_NN consisted_VBD entirely_RB of_IN hot_JJ stimulating_VBG applications_NNS to_TO the_DT bubos_NN ;_: he_PRP gave_VBD no_DT internal_JJ remedies_NNS ._.
I_PRP saw_VBD and_CC examined_VBD four_CD of_IN the_DT recovered_JJ men_NNS ,_, which_WDT number_NN ,_, although_IN so_RB small_JJ ,_, seemed_VBD to_TO be_VB procured_VBN with_IN diffi-_JJ culty_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD serve_VB to_TO show_VB how_WRB few_JJ actually_RB survived_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT houses_NNS of_IN the_DT three_CD first_JJ no_DT other_JJ person_NN had_VBD been_VBN affected_VBN ;_: in_IN two_CD there_EX was_VBD no_DT more_JJR than_IN one_CD bubo_NN ;_: the_DT third_JJ had_VBD three_CD ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT whole_JJ only_RB one_CD suppurated_VBD ._.
The_DT fourth_JJ was_VBD a_DT Mussulman_NNP who_WP took_VBD care_NN of_IN cows_NNS and_CC sold_VBN milk_NN and_CC ghee_NN ;_: his_PRP$ house_NN ,_, from_IN his_PRP$ descrip-_JJ tion_NN ,_, was_VBD very_RB close_JJ and_CC ill_JJ aired_VBN ;_: out_IN of_IN nine_CD composing_VBG his_PRP$ family_NN ,_, seven_CD had_VBD been_VBN attacked_VBN by_IN the_DT same_JJ disease_NN ;_: he_PRP was_VBD first_RB taken_VBN ill_RB ,_, two_CD were_VBD seized_VBN two_CD days_NNS after_IN ,_, and_CC the_DT rest_NN successively_RB at_IN about_IN an_DT equal_JJ distance_NN of_IN time_NN ._.
Three_CD died_VBD and_CC four_CD recovered_NN ._.
They_PRP all_DT had_VBD first_VBN a_DT severe_JJ fever_NN which_WDT deprived_VBD them_PRP of_IN their_PRP$ reason_NN ;_: on_IN the_DT second_JJ day_NN in_IN all_DT who_WP recovered_VBD the_DT consequent_JJ debility_NN was_VBD very_RB great_JJ ,_, and_CC convalescence_NN extremely_RB slow_JJ ._.
None_NN of_IN these_DT four_CD men_NNS entertained_VBD the_DT smallest_JJS suspicion_NN of_IN contagion_NN ;_: one_CD said_VBD he_PRP could_MD not_RB tell_VB how_WRB he_PRP caught_VBD the_DT disease_NN ,_, unless_IN it_PRP was_VBD from_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, to_TO whom_WP he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN married_VBN about_IN six_CD months_NNS before_IN ,_, and_CC who_WP then_RB had_VBD a_DT little_JJ itch_NN up_IN her_PRP$ thigh_NN ._.
He_PRP seemed_VBD to_TO puzzle_VB him-_JJ self_NN very_RB much_JJ however_RB in_IN accounting_VBG for_IN his_PRP$ illness_NN ,_, being_VBG not_RB at_IN all_DT sure_NN that_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN had_VBD been_VBN the_DT cause_NN of_IN it_PRP ;_: and_CC the_DT other_JJ three_CD could_MD assign_VB no_DT reason_NN whatever_WDT ._.
Indeed_RB ,_, no_DT one_NN in_IN the_DT towns_NNS considered_VBD the_DT disease_NN as_IN contagious_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT Thakoor_NNP or_CC chief_JJ brother_NN seemed_VBD to_TO have_VB proved_VBN very_RB satisfactorily_RB in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ person_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD not_RB so_RB ._.
He_PRP with_IN a_DT laudable_JJ kindness_NN and_CC anxiety_NN for_IN the_DT welfare_NN of_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS had_VBD been_VBN in_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN frequently_RB visiting_VBG the_DT sick_JJ ,_, comfort-_JJ ing_VBG them_PRP ,_, enquiring_VBG into_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN their_PRP$ complaints_NNS ,_, handling_VBG and_CC touching_VBG them_PRP ,_, and_CC all_DT with_IN complete_JJ impunity_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, we_PRP may_MD safely_RB infer_VB that_IN casual_JJ intercourse_NN is_VBZ unattended_VBN with_IN much_JJ danger_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ ,_, likewise_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ not_RB readily_RB com-_NN municated_VBN by_IN the_DT touch_NN ,_, and_CC possible_JJ that_WDT confinement_NN to_TO the_DT same_JJ b_NN 9_CD 66_CD Previous_JJ history_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN India_NNP ._.

apartment_NN is_VBZ in_IN general_JJ necessary_JJ for_IN its_PRP$ production_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN which_WDT did_VBD not_RB suffer_VB was_VBD the_DT Thakoor_NNP 's_POS palace_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT very_RB large_JJ ,_, well_RB aired_JJ place_NN ,_, elevated_VBN above_IN the_DT other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN in_IN a_DT slight_JJ degree_NN ,_, and_CC contains_VBZ about_IN one_CD hundred_CD people_NNS ,_, all_DT of_IN whom_WP enjoy_VBP a_DT perfect_JJ immunity_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT opposite_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT river_NN ,_, less_JJR than_IN a_DT quarter_NN of_IN a_DT mile_NN distant_NN ,_, on_IN a_DT very_RB high_JJ and_CC exposed_JJ situation_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT small_JJ village_NN called_VBN Moorba_NNP ,_, not_RB one_CD of_IN whose_WP$ inhabit-_JJ ants_NNS were_VBD attacked_VBN ,_, although_IN a_DT daily_JJ and_CC hourly_JJ communication_NN was_VBD maintained_VBN during_IN the_DT whole_JJ period_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ five_CD months_NNS ._.
The_DT people_NNS say_VBP that_IN the_DT river_NN set_VBN bounds_NNS to_TO the_DT disease_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT same_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT river_NN with_IN Morvee_NNP the_DT disease_NN was_VBD communicated_VBN to_TO a_DT village_NN two_CD coss_NN off_IN ,_, called_VBD Moolee_NNP ;_: but_CC the_DT situation_NN of_IN this_DT village_NN is_VBZ low_JJ ,_, close_JJ and_CC ill_NN aired_VBN ,_, being_VBG surrounded_VBN with_IN jungle_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ more_RBR probably_RB therefore_RB that_IN Moorba_NNP ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ exemption_NN to_TO its_PRP$ high_JJ and_CC airy_JJ site_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN Moolee_NNP suffered_VBD from_IN the_DT opposite_JJ causes_NNS ._.
Wuccaneer_NNP is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ walled_JJ town_NN ,_, seated_VBN at_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN a_DT moun-_JJ tain_NN of_IN considerable_JJ height_NN and_CC on_IN the_DT bank_NN of_IN a_DT very_RB fine_JJ river_NN ,_, distant_JJ about_IN eighteen_JJ miles_NNS from_IN the_DT Morvee_NNP ._.
While_IN this_DT disease_NN raged_VBD at_IN the_DT latter_JJ place_NN ,_, it_PRP likewise_RB paid_VBD Wuccaneer_NNP a_DT visit_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS say_VBP that_IN it_PRP came_VBD from_IN Morvee_NNP ._.
Here_RB it_PRP lasted_VBD no_RB longer_JJR than_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS ,_, and_CC was_VBD almost_RB solely_RB confined_VBN to_TO one_CD class_NN of_IN people_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, the_DT Borahs_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ occupation_NN is_VBZ the_DT manufacture_NN of_IN cotton_NN cloths_NNS ._.

83_CD 1755_CD ._.
Moscow_NNP was_VBD the_DT scene_NN of_IN an_DT outbreak_NN in_IN 1770_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN 1813_CD the_DT disease_NN prevailed_VBD at_IN Malta_NNP and_CC in_IN 1834_CD at_IN Cairo_NNP ._.
In_IN India_NNP the_DT disease_NN has_VBZ ever_RB had_VBD a_DT home_NN ,_, and_CC prevails_VBZ off_RB and_CC on_IN till_VB the_DT present_JJ day_NN in_IN British_NNP Garhwal_NNP and_CC Kumaun_NNP ._.
In_IN 1813_CD the_DT plague_NN was_VBD present_JJ in_IN Central_NNP India_NNP and_CC Rajputana_NNP ,_, Kutch_NNP and_CC Kattywar_NNP and_CC was_VBD first_RB noticed_VBN at_IN Kumtakole_NNP ,_, and_CC spread_VBD throughout_IN Wagar_NNP during_IN January_NNP ,_, February_NNP and_CC March_NNP 1816_CD ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN that_DT year_NN had_VBD extended_VBN to_TO Scinde_NNP where_WRB the_DT mortality_NN was_VBD great_JJ ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD still_RB prevalent_JJ in_IN Central_NNP India_NNP in_IN 1819_CD and_CC dis-_JJ appeared_VBN in_IN 1821_CD ._.
Nothing_VBG more_RBR was_VBD heard_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN Central_NNP India_NNP till_NN July_NNP 1836_CD ,_, when_WRB it_PRP broke_VBD out_RP at_IN Pali_NNP ,_, a_DT town_NN of_IN Marwar_NNP ,_, whence_NN it_PRP spread_VBD to_TO Jodhpore_NNP ._.
It_PRP prevailed_VBD at_IN Deoghur_NNP ,_, in_IN Meywar_NNP ,_, in_IN March_NNP 1837_CD ,_, and_CC thereafter_RB extended_VBD to_TO Jalia_NNP and_CC Ramghat_NNP in_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Ajmere_NNP ._.
The_DT disease_NN all_DT but_CC disappeared_VBD towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN 1837_CD ,_, but_CC in_IN November_NNP of_IN that_DT year_NN it_PRP again_RB broke_VBD out_RP in_IN epidemic_JJ form_NN at_IN Pali_NNP ,_, and_CC continued_VBD till_RB February_NNP the_DT following_JJ year_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ more_RBR than_IN probable_JJ that_IN the_DT plague_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN into_IN Pali_NNP and_CC Rajputana_NNP in_IN 1837_CD from_IN the_DT Levant_NNP ,_, as_IN the_DT ``_`` Chhipis_NNP ,_, ''_'' who_WP printed_VBD the_DT pieces_NNS of_IN plain_NN cloth_NNS brought_VBN from_IN the_DT coast_NN from_IN Bhow-_NNP nagar_NN and_CC Surat_NNP ,_, were_VBD the_DT first_JJ effected_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT Himalayan_NNP districts_NNS of_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT disease_NN occurs_VBZ comprise-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) Garhwal_NNP bounded_VBD on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN Tibet_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN Kumaun_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN Bijnor_NNP and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN Tehri_NNP and_CC Dehra_NNP Dun_NNP ,_, and_CC (_( 2_CD )_) Kumaun_NNP now_RB divided_VBZ into_IN two_CD revenue_NN districts_NNS ,_, Almora_NNP and_CC Naini_NNP Tal_NNP ,_, bounded_VBD on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN Tibet_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN Nepal_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN Garhwal_NNP and_CC on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN the_DT Tarai_NNP ._.
These_DT contiguous_JJ districts_NNS lie_VBP between_IN north_JJ latitude_VBP 28_CD 14_CD '_POS 15_CD ''_'' and_CC 31_CD 5_CD '_POS 30_CD ''_'' ,_, and_CC east_JJ longitude_NN 76_CD 6_CD '_POS 30_CD ''_'' and_CC 80_CD 58_CD '_POS 15_CD ''_'' ,_, and_CC embrace_VBP an_DT area_NN of_IN 11,038_CD square_JJ miles_NNS ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT population_NN numbers_NNS close_RB on_IN 1,000,000_CD souls_NNS with_IN an_DT aver-_JJ age_NN of_IN 72_CD to_TO 76_CD persons_NNS to_TO each_DT square_NN mile_NN ,_, living_VBG at_IN elevations_NNS from_IN 1,500_CD to_TO over_IN 11,000_CD feet_NNS above_IN sea-level_NN ._.
For_IN practical_JJ purposes_NNS the_DT entire_JJ population_NN may_MD be_VB classed_VBN as_IN Hindu_NNP ,_, as_IN very_RB few_JJ Musalmans_NNPS ,_, etc._FW ,_, are_VBP natives_NNS of_IN the_DT hills_NNS ._.
The_DT greater_JJR proportion_NN of_IN the_DT popula-_JJ tion_NN live_VBP at_IN from_IN 3,000_CD to_TO 6,000_CD feet_NNS above_IN sea-level_NN ,_, overlooked_VBN by_IN the_DT crowning_VBG peaks_NNS rising_VBG from_IN 20,000_CD to_TO over_IN 25,000_CD feet_NNS of_IN the_DT great_JJ Himalayan_NNP range_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
Outbreaks_NNS of_IN the_DT plague_NN in_IN these_DT Himalayan_NNP hill_NN tracts_NNS ,_, the_DT most_RBS mountainous_JJ in_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, are_VBP of_IN two_CD kinds-_JJ 1st_CD ,_, spontaneous_JJ outbreaks_NNS ;_: 2nd_CD ,_, outbreaks_NNS caused_VBN by_IN importation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Previous_JJ history_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN India_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._.
Spontaneous_JJ outbreaks_NNS are_VBP frequently_RB associated_VBN with_IN ,_, and_CC some-_JJ times_NNS preceded_VBN by_IN ,_, a_DT great_JJ mortality_NN among_IN rats_NNS ,_, mice_NNS and_CC other_JJ rodents_NNS ,_, etc_FW ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT plague_NN or_CC pestilence_NN of_IN the_DT hill_NN tracts_VBZ is_VBZ distinguished_VBN from_IN all_DT other_JJ fatal_JJ febrile_NN malignant_JJ diseases_NNS by_IN its_PRP$ extreme_JJ virulence_NN ,_, rapid_JJ course_NN ,_, fatality_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT enlargement_NN of_IN the_DT lymphatic_JJ (_( inguinal_JJ ,_, axillary_JJ ,_, cervical_JJ ,_, etc_FW ._. )_)
glands_NNS ,_, -the_NNP characteristic_JJ lesion_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN when_WRB death_NN does_VBZ not_RB ensue_VB within_IN the_DT first_JJ three_CD days_NNS from_IN extreme_JJ virulence_NN and_CC direct_JJ shock_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ nerve_NN centres_NNS ,_, It_PRP has_VBZ the_DT shortest_JJS period_NN of_IN incubation_NN probably_RB of_IN all_DT known_VBN diseases_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP may_MD prove_VB fatal_NN within_IN 24_CD to_TO 48_CD hours_NNS after_IN exposure_NN to_TO infec-_JJ tion_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ clear_JJ evidence_NN that_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ communicable_JJ from_IN the_DT sick_NN to_TO the_DT healthy_JJ ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT disease_NN appears_VBZ ever_RB and_CC anon_VB in_IN village_NN or_CC hamlet_VB situat-_JJ ed_NN ``_`` on_IN precipitous_JJ mountain_NN side_NN ,_, in_IN gorges_NNS reached_VBN only_RB by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT cradle_NN swung_NN on_IN a_DT rope_NN above_IN a_DT boiling_VBG flood_NN of_IN snow_JJ water_NN low_JJ down_RB in_IN a_DT hill_NN valley_NN ,_, in_IN secluded_JJ spots_NNS reached_VBN by_IN dubious_JJ pathways_NNS winding_VBG up_RP a_DT wooded_JJ glen_NN starting_VBG from_IN the_DT river_NN far_RB below_IN ,_, or_CC up-_JJ land_NN slope_NN close_RB to_TO the_DT sources_NNS of_IN a_DT river_NN formed_VBN by_IN a_DT waterfall_NN ,_, in_IN secluded_JJ places_NNS ,_, wilder_NN it_PRP would_MD be_VB hard_JJ to_TO find_VB in_IN all_PDT the_DT hills_NNS reach-_JJ ed_NN by_IN a_DT footpath_NN winding_NN over_IN a_DT high_JJ mountain_NN and_CC near_IN where_WRB the_DT Margari_NNP stream_NN arises_NNS in_IN cuplike_JJ valley_NN surrounded_VBN by_IN high_JJ moun-_NN tains_NNS ,_, on_IN a_DT spur_JJ hillock-shaped_JJ ,_, on_IN the_DT slopes_NNS of_IN opposing_VBG mountains_NNS ,_, on_IN hills_NNS of_IN moderate_JJ height_NN ,_, in_IN bends_NNS of_IN a_DT river_NN hemmed_VBN in_IN by_IN the_DT hills_NNS ,_, on_IN three_CD sides_NNS on_IN the_DT brow_NN of_IN a_DT hill_NN which_WDT stands_VBZ out_RP from_IN the_DT mountain_NN behind_IN it_PRP ,_, on_IN the_DT slope_NN of_IN a_DT great_JJ mountain_NN overlooking_VBG the_DT valley_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT river_NN runs_VBZ ,_, on_IN green_JJ hillock_NN backed_VBN by_IN high_JJ mountains_NNS ,_, and_CC on_IN a_DT spur_NN of_IN rock_NN jutting_NN into_IN a_DT narrow_JJ valley_NN ,_, ''_'' overlooked_VBN by_IN the_DT highest_JJS Himalayan_JJ peaks_NNS capped_VBD with_IN the_DT eternal_JJ snow_NN ._.
Here_RB ,_, where_WRB the_DT atmosphere_NN and_CC climate_NN are_VBP the_DT finest_JJS and_CC purest_JJS in_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN heights_NNS where_WRB the_DT germs_NNS and_CC microbes_NNS of_IN disease_NN are_VBP kept_VBN within_IN a_DT narrow_JJ sphere_NN ,_, exists_VBZ a_DT disease_NN which_WDT in_IN its_PRP$ infectious_JJ nature_NN and_CC fatality_NN surpasses_NNS all_DT others_NNS in_IN virulence_NN ,_, and_CC ever_RB threatens_VBZ to_TO break_VB bounds_NNS and_CC spread_NN and_CC be_VB disseminated_VBN far_RB and_CC wide_JJ as_IN in_IN past_JJ times_NNS throughout_IN Christendom_NNP ._.
Cholera_NNP spares_VBZ some_DT of_IN the_DT household_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT plague_NN often_RB reaps_VBZ each_DT one_CD of_IN the_DT many_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT upland_NN home_NN ._.
So_RB dreaded_JJ is_VBZ the_DT disease_NN ,_, that_IN family_NN ties_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ presence_NN are_VBP suddenly_RB broken_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT father_NN and_CC mother_NN flee_NN from_IN their_PRP$ children_NNS and_CC abandon_VB each_DT other_JJ ,_, seeking_VBG the_DT lone_NN mountainside_NN in_IN despair_NN for_IN a_DT time_NN of_IN all_DT human_JJ association_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT earliest_JJS record_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN the_DT hill_NN tracts_VBZ is_VBZ embodied_VBN in_IN a_DT report_NN ,_, dated_VBN 25th_CD April_NNP 1836_CD ,_, by_IN Mr._NNP Gowan_NNP ,_, the_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN Kumaun_NNP ,_, in_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN mahamari_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD thought_VBN APP_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._. ]_NN
Previous_JJ history_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN India_NNP ._.
85_CD communicable_JJ by_IN contact_NN with_IN articles_NNS in_IN use_NN in_IN an_DT infected_JJ tract_NN ,_, first_RB appeared_VBD at_IN Kedarnath_NNP in_IN 1823_CD ._.
It_PRP originated_VBD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD affirmed_VBN ,_, in_IN the_DT person_NN of_IN the_DT Rawal_NNP or_CC the_DT high_JJ priest_NN of_IN the_DT celebrated_JJ temple_NN there_EX who_WP ,_, having_VBG in_IN that_DT year_NN deviated_VBD from_IN the_DT rules_NNS prescribed_VBN in_IN the_DT Shastras_NNP for_IN the_DT performance_NN of_IN the_DT religious_JJ ceremony_NN called_VBD the_DT ``_`` Home_NNP ,_, ''_'' was_VBD smitten_VBN with_IN this_DT new_JJ form_NN of_IN disease_NN and_CC died_VBD together_RB with_IN the_DT Brahmans_NNPS who_WP assisted_VBD at_IN the_DT offering_NN ._.
From_IN Kedarnath_NNP the_DT disease_NN spread_NN to_TO the_DT villages_NNS in_IN religious_JJ assignment_NN to_TO the_DT temple_NN ,_, and_CC afterwards_NNS appeared_VBN in_IN other_JJ parganas_NN of_IN Garbwal_NNP ._.
Others_NNS said_VBD that_IN the_DT disease_NN came_VBD into_IN existence_NN for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN at_IN the_DT Hardwar_NNP Fair_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.
In_IN 1834-35_CD the_DT appearance_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN the_DT parganas_NN of_IN Nagpur_NNP and_CC Badhan_NNP Garhwal_NNP was_VBD preceded_VBN by_IN a_DT great_JJ mortality_NN among_IN the_DT rats_NNS in_IN a_DT village_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD characterised_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN ,_, by_IN fever_NN terminating_VBG fatally_RB in_IN two_CD ,_, three_CD or_CC four_CD days_NNS ,_, and_CC associated_VBN with_IN an_DT eruption_NN of_IN bubos_NN or_CC swellings_NNS ._.
10_CD ._.
During_IN 1837_CD the_DT disease_NN was_VBD alarmingly_RB prevalent_JJ in_IN the_DT par-_JJ gana_NN of_IN Badhan_NNP along_IN the_DT higher_JJR parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Pindar_NNP river_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN 1846-47_JJ it_PRP found_VBD its_PRP$ way_NN to_TO the_DT sources_NNS of_IN the_DT Ramganga_NNP and_CC almost_RB entirely_RB swept_JJ away_RB the_DT population_NN of_IN Sarkot_NNP ,_, situated_VBD at_IN 7,000_CD feet_NNS on_IN a_DT high_JJ easterly_JJ spur_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ mountain_NN Duder_NNP Ka_NNP Toli_NNP in_IN patti_NN Lobha_NNP ,_, and_CC also_RB to_TO a_DT village_NN near_IN the_DT source_NN of_IN the_DT Kosi_NNP in_IN patti_JJ Bora-_NNP rau_NN ,_, Kumaun_NNP proper_NN ._.
In_IN 1847_CD a_DT village_NN ,_, 15_CD miles_NNS west_RB of_IN Almora_NNP ,_, situated_VBD among_IN the_DT pine_JJ forest_NN of_IN Siyahi_NNP Devi_NNP range_NN ,_, was_VBD attacked_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT latter_JJ end_NN of_IN 1848_CD a_DT few_JJ villages_NNS along_IN the_DT fatal_JJ line_NN of_IN the_DT Pindar_NNP river_NN were_VBD threatened_VBN with_IN a_DT return_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT rainy_JJ season_NN of_IN 1849_CD it_PRP broke_VBD out_RP with_IN great_JJ virulence_NN in_IN patti_JJ Chaprakot_NNP ,_, pargana_NN Chadpur_NNP ,_, and_CC proved_VBD very_RB fatal_JJ in_IN the_DT villages_NNS of_IN Marora_NNP and_CC Dadoli_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Senior_NNP Assistant_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Garh-_NNP wal_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Strachey_NNP ,_, now_RB Sir_NNP John_NNP Strachey_NNP ,_, in_IN a_DT report_NN ,_, dated_VBD 22nd_CD December_NNP 1849_CD ,_, gave_VBD particulars_NNS of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Strachey_NNP writes-_JJ ''_'' For_IN about_IN 30_CD years_NNS past_IN there_EX has_VBZ existed_VBN in_IN Kumaun_NNP and_CC Garhwal_NNP a_DT disease_NN known_VBN by_IN the_DT local_JJ name_NN of_IN mahamari_NN ,_, apparently_RB identical_JJ with_IN the_DT plague_NN of_IN Syria_NNP and_CC Egypt_NNP ,_, the_DT characteristic_JJ symptoms_NNS being_VBG violent_JJ fever_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS contagious_JJ nature_NN ,_, always_RB accompanied_VBN with_IN swellings_NNS in_IN the_DT armpit_NN ,_, the_DT disease_NN ordinarily_RB seem-_JJ ing_VBG to_TO reach_VB its_PRP$ crisis_NN on_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN ._. ''_''
11_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Renny_NNP on_IN the_DT 9th_CD May_NNP 1850_CD commenced_VBD a_DT local_JJ inves-_JJ tigation_NN into_IN the_DT disease_NN at_IN Dadoli_NNP village_NN ,_, patti_JJ Chaprakot_NNP ,_, and_CC saw_VBD two_CD cases_NNS on_IN the_DT 10th_CD and_CC two_CD more_JJR cases_NNS on_IN the_DT 13th_CD ._.
He_PRP des-_JJ cribed_VBD the_DT disease_NN as_IN an_DT infectious_JJ fever_NN of_IN a_DT malignant_JJ kind_NN and_CC of_IN a_DT typhus_JJ character_NN ,_, accompanied_VBN by_IN glandular_JJ tumours_NNS and_CC gener-_JJ ally_NN terminating_VBG in_IN death_NN in_IN three_CD or_CC four_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT mortality_NN from_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN 1849-50_CD was_VBD 113_CD in_IN nine_CD villages_NNS ._.

II_NNP ._.
Mahamari_NNP was_VBD again_RB prevalent_JJ in_IN 1851_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN a_DT joint_JJ report_NN on_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, dated_VBD 1st_CD December_NNP 1851_CD ,_, by_IN Dr._NNP Pearson_NNP and_CC Sub-_NNP Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Sri_NNP Nath_NNP Mukerji_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ described_VBN as_IN typhus_JJ fever_NN of_IN contagious_JJ and_CC infectious_JJ type_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT subsequent_JJ report_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, dated_VBD 17th_CD May_NNP 1852_CD ,_, on_IN the_DT continuance_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN into_IN April_NNP and_CC May_NNP ,_, these_DT officers_NNS ,_, after_IN extended_VBN observations_NNS ,_, recorded_VBD the_DT opinion_NN that_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD plague_NN ,_, associated_VBN with_IN characteristic_JJ glandular_JJ swellings_NNS and_CC distinctly_RB contagious_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ nature_NN ._.
It_PRP still_RB existed_VBD in_IN August_NNP of_IN that_DT year_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD an_DT ascertained_JJ total_NN of_IN 633_CD deaths_NNS during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ of_IN 1834-35_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN 1851-52_JJ ,_, 567_CD deaths_NNS were_VBD recorded_VBN in_IN 77_CD villages_NNS ._.
In_IN 1852-53_CD ,_, Drs_NNP ._.
Francis_NNP and_CC Pearson_NNP were_VBD actively_RB engaged_VBN in_IN the_DT investigation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN and_CC recorded_VBD the_DT post-mortem_NN appearances_NNS in_IN four_CD cases_NNS of_IN which_WDT the_DT principal_NN were_VBD congestion_NN of_IN the_DT brain_NN ,_, a_DT diseased_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT blood_NN ,_, and_CC effusion_NN into_IN the_DT serous_JJ cavities_NNS ._.
12_CD ._.
Mahamari_NNP descended_VBD to_TO the_DT plains_NNS as_RB late_RB as_IN 1853_CD ._.
In_IN that_DT year_NN it_PRP appeared_VBD in_IN an_DT epidemic_JJ form_NN in_IN the_DT towns_NNS of_IN Thakurdwara_NNP and_CC Afzalgarh_NNP and_CC in_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Moradabad_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Stiven_NNP ,_, Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, reported_VBN on_IN this_DT outbreak_NN in_IN the_DT plains_NNS ._.
``_`` It_PRP seems_VBZ ,_, ''_'' he_PRP states_VBZ ,_, ``_`` that_DT in_IN December_NNP 1853_CD ,_, Ali_NNP Bakhsh_NNP ,_, a_DT resident_NN of_IN Mehidpur_NNP ,_, a_DT village_NN in_IN the_DT Bijnor_NNP district_NN ,_, between_IN Thakurdwara_NNP and_CC Afzalgarh_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT disease_NN was_VBD prevalent_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, went_VBD to_TO the_DT latter_JJ town_NN to_TO see_VB a_DT nautch_NN ;_: that_IN he_PRP returned_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ home_NN in_IN Mehidpur_NNP ;_: and_CC that_IN three_CD days_NNS afterwards_IN his_PRP$ brother_NN ,_, Muhammad_NNP ,_, became_VBD ill_JJ and_CC died_VBD on_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN of_IN his_PRP$ illness_NN ._.
Ali_NNP Bakhsh_NNP 's_POS cousin_NN also_RB took_VBD ill_NN and_CC died_VBD in_IN three_CD days_NNS ,_, having_VBG had_VBD ,_, as_IN described_VBN to_TO me_PRP ,_, swellings_NNS of_IN the_DT glands_NNS in_IN the_DT groin_NN ._.
Ali_NNP Bakhsh_NNP 's_POS wife_NN and_CC sister_NN living_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ house_NN also_RB died_VBD ._. ''_''
Dr._NNP Stiven_NNP attributed_VBD the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN to_TO contagion_NN brought_VBN by_IN Ali_NNP Bakhsh_NNP in_IN a_DT latent_JJ form_NN from_IN Mehidpur_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Stiven_NNP referred_VBD to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN paharis_NN brought_VBD down_RP goods_NNS for_IN barter_NN to_TO Chilkia_NNP ,_, a_DT very_RB important_JJ mart_NN near_IN Kashi-_NNP pur_NN ,_, and_CC surmised_VBD that_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN by_IN hill_JJ people_NNS in_IN intimate_JJ intercourse_NN with_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT district_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD very_RB prevalent_JJ also_RB in_IN Kashipur_NNP early_RB in_IN 1853_CD ,_, and_CC lingered_VBD in_IN the_DT Moradabad_NNP district_NN till_NN 1854_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Stiven_NNP saw_VBD a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS which_WDT were_VBD characterised_VBN by_IN high_JJ fever_NN and_CC swelling_NN of_IN the_DT glands_NNS of_IN the_DT right_JJ groin_NN or_CC of_IN the_DT armpit_NN ._.
It_PRP also_RB prevailed_VBD in_IN Rampur_NNP at_IN this_DT time_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN about_RB 8,000_CD deaths_NNS occurred_VBD from_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Stiven_NNP 's_POS conclusions_NNS were_VBD :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) that_IN mahamari_NN is_VBZ identical_JJ with_IN the_DT incomplicated_JJ or_CC simple_JJ form_NN of_IN glandular_JJ plague_NN as_IN found_VBN in_IN Egypt_NNP ;_: APP_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._. ]_NN
Previous_JJ history_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN India_NNP ._.
87_CD (_( 2_CD )_) that_IN it_PRP can_MD be_VB conveyed_VBN to_TO any_DT town_NN by_IN contagion_NN ,_, and_CC be_VB propagated_VBN by_IN endemic_JJ causes_NNS ,_, as_IN filth_NN ,_, bad_JJ ventilation_NN ,_, poverty_NN and_CC uncleanliness_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS ._.
13_CD ._.
In_IN September_NNP 1859_CD mahamari_NN again_RB broke_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT north-_JJ ern_JJ parganas_NN of_IN the_DT hill_NN tracts_VBZ ,_, and_CC in_IN 1860_CD it_PRP was_VBD noted_VBN that_IN close_RB upon_IN 1,000_CD persons_NNS had_VBD died_VBN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
An_DT outbreak_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN occurred_VBD at_IN Sarkot_NNP on_IN 20th_CD September_NNP 1870_CD ,_, and_CC continued_VBD till_VB the_DT 9th_CD of_IN November_NNP ._.
14_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Richardson_NNP in_IN a_DT report_NN ,_, dated_VBD 4th_CD October_NNP 1875_CD ,_, on_IN mahamari_NN at_IN Siti_NNP ,_, patti_JJ Danpur-Bichla_NNP ,_, after_IN stating_VBG that_IN the_DT last_JJ of_IN six_CD cases_NNS occurred_VBD on_IN 9th_CD September_NNP ,_, says_VBZ that_IN ``_`` the_DT first_JJ victims_NNS were_VBD a_DT little_JJ girl_NN ,_, aged_VBD 8_CD ,_, and_CC her_PRP$ father_NN ,_, Kusalli_NNP ,_, aged_VBD 30_CD ._.
They_PRP were_VBD attacked_VBN about_IN 1,000_CD feet_NNS above_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Siti_NNP and_CC near_IN the_DT edge_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN forest_NN ._.
Both_DT were_VBD seized_VBN with_IN fever_NN ,_, vomited_VBN once_RB or_CC twice_RB ,_, had_VBD large_JJ swellings_NNS in_IN the_DT groins_NNS ,_, and_CC both_DT died_VBN on_IN the_DT fifth_JJ day_NN after_IN seizure_NN ._.
The_DT bodies_NNS were_VBD thrown_VBN into_IN a_DT stream_NN below_IN ._.

93_CD family_NN ,_, and_CC Punagir_NNP of_IN Mauza_NNP Maghera_NNP was_VBD a_DT caste-brother_NN of_IN Tejgir_NNP ._.

21_CD ._.
In_IN 1894_CD five_CD persons_NNS died_VBD of_IN the_DT disease_NN at_IN Ira_NNP ,_, patti_NN Chaprakot_NNP ,_, Garhwal_NNP ,_, between_IN the_DT 5th_CD and_CC 8th_CD January_NNP ,_, and_CC there_EX were_VBD two_CD more_JJR seizures_NNS ,_, and_CC between_IN the_DT 3rd_CD and_CC 4th_CD May_NNP a_DT girl_NN and_CC a_DT boy_NN were_VBD reported_VBN to_TO have_VB died_VBN of_IN the_DT disease_NN at_IN Gadoli_NNP ,_, patti_NN Daijuli_NNP ,_, pargana_NN Chandpur_NNP ,_, but_CC Dr._NNP Giles_NNP was_VBD of_IN opinion_NN that_IN these_DT deaths_NNS might_MD have_VB been_VBN due_JJ to_TO famine_VB fever_NN ._.

A_DT description_NN of_IN a_DT Kumaon_NNP hamlet_NN and_CC the_DT terrible_JJ effect_NN among_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT calamity_NN which_WDT often_RB befalls_VBZ many_JJ a_DT household_NN on_IN the_DT outbreak_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, may_MD be_VB best_JJS given_VBN in_IN the_DT words_NNS of_IN one_CD who_WP personally_RB observed_VBD the_DT scenes_NNS and_CC recorded_VBD his_PRP$ experiences_NNS of_IN the_DT extended_JJ outbreak_NN in_IN 1876-77._JJ ``_``
Balt_NNP and_CC Bintola_NNP are_VBP two_CD adjoining_VBG hamlets_NNS situated_VBD rather_RB low_JJ down_RP in_IN a_DT valley_NN about_IN four_CD miles_NNS north-east_RB of_IN Almora_NNP ._.
``_`` The_DT houses_NNS are_VBP well_RB built_VBN of_IN stone_NN ,_, with_IN solid_JJ roofs_NN of_IN thick_NN hill_NN slate_NN ._.

II_NNP ._.
``_`` The_DT people_NNS of_IN Balt_NNP and_CC Bintola_NNP were_VBD friends_NNS ;_: they_PRP had_VBD inter-_NN married_VBN ,_, and_CC relatives_NNS of_IN many_JJ families_NNS lived_VBD part_NN in_IN Bintola_NNP and_CC part_NN in_IN Balt_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT two_CD villages_NNS might_MD be_VB considered_VBN one_CD ._. ''_''
Mahamari_NNP first_RB appeared_VBD in_IN Bintola_NNP early_RB in_IN November_NNP 1876_CD ,_, in_IN the_DT person_NN of_IN a_DT child_NN of_IN the_DT padhan_NN or_CC headman_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
The_DT child_NN died_VBD on_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN after_IN it_PRP sickened_VBD ,_, and_CC while_IN it_PRP was_VBD sick_JJ two_CD other_JJ children_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ family_NN were_VBD taken_VBN ill_NN and_CC also_RB died_VBD ._.
In_IN the_DT two_CD houses_NNS which_WDT formed_VBD the_DT homestead_NN of_IN the_DT padhan_NN ,_, before_IN the_DT sickness_NN commenced_VBD ,_, there_EX resided_VBD a_DT family_NN of_IN fourteen_JJ persons_NNS in_IN all_DT ._.
Of_IN these_DT fourteen_JJ persons_NNS ,_, thirteen_JJ died_VBN at_IN intervals_NNS during_IN Novem-_NNP ber_NNP and_CC December_NNP ,_, all_DT with_IN the_DT same_JJ symptoms_NNS of_IN disease_NN ,_, commencing_VBG with_IN shivering_NN ,_, quickly_RB followed_VBN by_IN intense_JJ fever_NN ,_, ending_VBG in_IN delirium_NN ,_, insensibility_NN and_CC death_NN on_IN the_DT third_JJ or_CC fourth_JJ day_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT terrace_NN of_IN three_CD houses_NNS adjoining_VBG the_DT padhan_NN 's_POS home_NN ,_, three_CD families_NNS resided_VBD containing_VBG a_DT total_NN of_IN fourteen_JJ persons_NNS ._.
The_DT women_NNS of_IN these_DT families_NNS helped_VBD to_TO nurse_VB the_DT sick_NN of_IN the_DT padhan_NN 's_POS family_NN ,_, and_CC during_IN November_NNP and_CC December_NNP twelve_NN of_IN these_DT fourteen_JJ persons_NNS died_VBD of_IN the_DT same_JJ form_NN of_IN disease_NN ._.
At_IN first_RB the_DT sick_NN were_VBD nursed_VBN and_CC died_VBN in_IN the_DT houses_NNS ,_, afterwards_IN the_DT sick_JJ were_VBD nursed_VBN and_CC died_VBN in_IN temporary_JJ huts_NNS outside_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT bodies_NNS were_VBD buried_VBN after_IN death_NN ._.
In_IN all_DT ,_, thirty-one_JJ cases_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN occurred_VBD during_IN November_NNP ,_, December_NNP and_CC January_NNP ,_, and_CC 27_CD persons_NNS died_VBD ._.
The_DT four_CD persons_NNS who_WP recovered_VBD presented_VBN themselves_PRP to_TO me_PRP on_IN the_DT 24th_CD January_NNP for_IN examination_NN ._.
All_DT had_VBD the_DT same_JJ appear-_JJ ance_NN of_IN extreme_JJ debility_NN with_IN emaciation_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD had_VBD a_DT small_JJ bubo_NN in_IN the_DT left_NN axilla_NN ,_, which_WDT appeared_VBD on_IN the_DT sixth_JJ day_NN of_IN his_PRP$ illness_JJ seven_CD days_NNS ago_RB ,_, and_CC is_VBZ now_RB soon_RB likely_JJ to_TO suppurate_VB ,_, being_VBG hot_JJ and_CC tender_NN ._.
Bubo_NNP was_VBD noticed_VBN both_DT in_IN the_DT axilla_NN and_CC inguinal_JJ regions_NNS in_IN some_DT other_JJ of_IN the_DT later_JJ cases_NNS ,_, but_CC in_IN none_NN of_IN those_DT who_WP died_VBD quickly_RB at_IN the_DT first_JJ outset_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
And_CC it_PRP was_VBD only_RB after_IN the_DT bubos_NN were_VBD seen_VBN that_IN the_DT people_NNS knew_VBD they_PRP were_VBD suffering_VBG from_IN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN gola_NN ,_, the_DT name_NN given_VBN by_IN the_DT hill_NN people_NNS to_TO the_DT disease_NN ._.
No_DT appear-_JJ ance_NN of_IN bubo_NN occurring_VBG in_IN the_DT first_JJ rapidly_RB fatal_JJ cases_NNS ,_, the_DT people_NNS thought_VBD the_DT disease_NN was_VBD sanjar_VBN ,_, a_DT form_NN of_IN continued_JJ fever_NN common_JJ amongst_IN the_DT hill_NN people_NNS and_CC frequently_RB fatal_JJ ,_, but_CC believed_VBD to_TO be_VB less_RBR contagious_JJ ,_, and_CC therefore_RB less_JJR dreaded_VBD than_IN gola_NN ._.
From_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT people_NNS vacated_VBD the_DT site_NN to_TO live_VB in_IN temporary_JJ huts_NNS or_CC in_IN caves_NNS on_IN the_DT hillside_NN ,_, only_RB one_CD death_NN occurred_VBD ,_, as_IN will_MD be_VB hereafter_JJ described_VBN ._.

95_CD in_IN every_DT house_NN excepting_VBG one_CD ,_, which_WDT was_VBD untenanted_VBN ._.

All_DT remained_VBD well_RB until_IN ,_, a_DT great_JJ fall_NN of_IN snow_JJ occurring_VBG on_IN the_DT 14th_CD of_IN January_NNP ,_, the_DT people_NNS returned_VBD to_TO their_PRP$ homes_NNS ;_: and_CC during_IN the_DT succeeding_VBG five_CD days_NNS ,_, four_CD more_JJR deaths_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT houses_NNS of_IN the_DT terrace_NN previously_RB effected_VBN ._.

The_DT local_JJ conditions_NNS at_IN Bait_NNP and_CC Bintola_NNP were_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ''_'' Both_DT villages_NNS were_VBD uninhabited_JJ ,_, the_DT former_JJ inhabitants_NNS scattered_VBN in_IN families_NNS miserably_RB lodged_VBD in_IN huts_NNS or_CC caves_NNS far_RB off_IN ;_: the_DT village_NN cattle_NNS roaming_VBG and_CC feeding_VBG amidst_RP the_DT young_JJ wheat_NN of_IN the_DT cultivated_JJ terraces_NNS around_IN and_CC below_IN the_DT villages_NNS ._.
The_DT torn_JJ remains_NNS of_IN thirteen_JJ cows_NNS ,_, calves_NNS or_CC bullocks_NNS ,_, and_CC five_CD goats_NNS ,_, scattered_VBN in_IN different_JJ places_NNS ,_, witnessing_VBG to_TO the_DT truth_NN of_IN the_DT local_JJ statement_NN that_IN ,_, from_IN dread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, no_DT one_CD dare_NN venture_NN on_IN to_TO the_DT site_NN to_TO house_NN the_DT cattle_NNS as_IN night_NN approached_VBN ,_, and_CC that_DT consequently_RB leopards_NNS and_CC hyenas_NNS were_VBD devouring_VBG the_DT flocks._NN ``_``
The_DT houses_NNS were_VBD double_JJ storied_VBN ,_, one_CD room_NN below_IN and_CC one_CD above_NN ,_, close_RB ,_, unventilated_JJ tenements_NNS ._.
The_DT lower_JJR room_NN was_VBD used_VBN as_IN a_DT cow-house_NN ,_, the_DT upper_JJ room_NN for_IN family_NN occupation_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT lower_JJR room_NN ,_, about_IN five_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ,_, it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN customary_JJ to_TO lodge_VB from_IN four_CD to_TO eight_CD head_NN of_IN cattle_NNS or_CC goats_NNS at_IN night_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, indeed_RB ,_, in_IN some_DT instances_NNS as_RB many_JJ as_IN the_DT room_NN had_VBD standing_JJ place_NN for_IN ;_: the_DT only_JJ opening_NN being_VBG the_DT small_JJ doorway_NN of_IN entrance_NN ,_, tight_NN closed_VBD and_CC barred_VBD at_IN night_NN ._.
These_DT rooms_NNS were_VBD seen_VBN to_TO be_VB littered_VBN for_IN about_IN a_DT foot_NN in_IN depth_NN with_IN decaying_VBG straw_NN and_CC much_JJ manure_NN ,_, moistened_VBN by_IN the_DT fluid_JJ excretion_NN of_IN cattle_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT entrance_NN way_NN on_IN each_DT side_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT stone_NN platform_NN facing_VBG the_DT lower_JJR storey_NN ,_, were_VBD piled_VBN with_IN heaps_NNS of_IN manure_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN drawn_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT lower_JJR room_NN as_IN necessity_NN required_VBN ,_, and_CC there_RB left_VBD for_IN eventual_JJ removal_NN to_TO the_DT land_NN in_IN the_DT ploughing_NN season_NN ._.
The_DT upper_JJ room_NN was_VBD noticed_VBN to_TO be_VB roughly_RB divided_VBN by_IN wooden_JJ slabs_NN into_IN a_DT front_NN and_CC back_JJ portion_NN ;_: the_DT former_JJ used_VBN as_IN the_DT family_NN sleeping_VBG place_NN ,_, the_DT latter_NN as_IN a_DT granary_NN ._.
The_DT doorway_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT instances_NNS a_DT round_NN hole_NN in_IN the_DT front_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT small_JJ round_NN hole_NN for_IN the_DT exit_NN of_IN smoke_NN through_IN the_DT roof_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, all_DT commonly_RB closed_VBN at_IN night_NN ,_, being_VBG the_DT only_JJ openings_NNS ._.
The_DT floor_NN was_VBD made_VBN of_IN thin_JJ wood_NN ,_, with_IN pretty_RB numerous_JJ cracks_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT warmth_NN generated_VBN by_IN the_DT cattle_NNS below_IN could_MD reach_VB to_TO the_DT sleeping_VBG people_NNS above_IN ,_, afterwards_NNS locally_RB described_VBN as_IN a_DT beneficial_JJ arrangement_NN ._.

Alam_NNP is_VBZ another_DT village_NN of_IN about_IN 12_CD houses_NNS ,_, high_JJ placed_VBN in_IN the_DT precipitous_JJ mountainside_NN above_IN the_DT Gori_NNP river_NN ._.

97_CD ``_`` The_DT man_NN who_WP first_RB died_VBD lay_NN sick_NN ,_, was_VBD visited_VBN several_JJ times_NNS by_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP had_VBD recently_RB come_VBN from_IN Askot_NNP to_TO settle_VB with_IN his_PRP$ family_NN in_IN three_CD attached_JJ houses_NNS ,_, highest_JJS placed_VBN of_IN any_DT in_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
This_DT Askot_NNP man_NN was_VBD taken_VBN ill_RB on_IN the_DT IIth_NNP and_CC died_VBD on_IN the_DT 16th_CD of_IN March_NNP ,_, a_DT swelling_VBG appearing_NN in_IN his_PRP$ armpit_NN before_IN he_PRP died_VBD ._.
He_PRP died_VBD in_IN his_PRP$ house_NN attended_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, who_WP buried_VBD his_PRP$ body_NN just_RB outside_IN the_DT house_NN door_NN ._.

The_DT five_CD remaining_VBG members_NNS of_IN the_DT family_NN ,_, four_CD boys_NNS and_CC one_CD girl_NN ,_, fled_VBD to_TO a_DT neighbouring_JJ hut_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP lived_VBD together_RB for_IN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS ,_, the_DT eldest_JJS ,_, a_DT boy_NN of_IN 14_CD ,_, acting_VBG as_IN head_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN and_CC providing_VBG food_NN for_IN the_DT rest_NN ._.
This_DT boy_NN feeling_VBG himself_PRP ill_JJ ,_, returned_VBD into_IN the_DT house_NN alone_RB and_CC died_VBD ,_, his_PRP$ body_NN also_RB remaining_VBG in_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
Four_CD children_NNS remained_VBD ,_, the_DT eldest_JJS ,_, a_DT girl_NN of_IN nine_CD named_VBN Danuli_NNP ,_, and_CC her_PRP$ three_CD brothers_NNS aged_VBN ,_, respectively_RB ,_, 7_CD ,_, 5_CD and_CC 11/2_CD years_NNS ._.
Danuli_NNP worked_VBD for_IN and_CC fed_VB them_PRP all_DT for_IN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS ,_, and_CC during_IN this_DT period_NN the_DT boy_NN of_IN 7_CD ,_, wishing_VBG to_TO take_VB honey_NN from_IN a_DT hive_NN in_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, entered_VBD it_PRP with_IN burning_VBG straw_NN or_CC wood_NN to_TO drive_VB the_DT bees_NNS away_RB ._.
Either_CC from_IN carelessness_NN ,_, or_CC as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN fright_NN at_IN seeing_VBG the_DT dead_JJ bodies_NNS ,_, he_PRP set_VBD the_DT house_NN on_IN fire_NN ;_: and_CC all_DT three_CD tenements_NNS were_VBD burnt_JJ down_RB ._.
A_DT few_JJ days_NNS after_IN the_DT house_NN was_VBD burnt_JJ down_RB ,_, the_DT boy_NN of_IN seven_CD was_VBD taken_VBN ill_NN and_CC died_VBD in_IN the_DT hut_NN ;_: and_CC his_PRP$ death_NN was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT boy_NN of_IN 11/2_CD ,_, after_IN an_DT inter-_JJ val_NN of_IN some_DT days_NNS ._.
So_RB that_IN Danuli_NNP and_CC one_CD brother_NN only_RB were_VBD left._JJ ``_``
Before_IN reaching_VBG the_DT village_NN on_IN the_DT 12th_CD of_IN May_NNP ,_, I_PRP had_VBD been_VBN in-_JJ formed_VBN that_IN possibly_RB children_NNS might_MD be_VB found_VBN there_RB abandoned_VBN ._.
The_DT village_NN was_VBD found_VBN empty_RB and_CC desolate_VB ,_, and_CC Danuli_NNP and_CC her_PRP$ brother_NN were_VBD found_VBN near_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN temporary_JJ abode_NN outside_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, the_DT former_JJ ,_, a_DT bright-eyed_JJ little_JJ girl_NN dressed_VBN in_IN an_DT old_JJ petticoat_NN ,_, the_DT latter_JJR a_DT little_JJ urchin_JJ wrapped_VBN in_IN a_DT piece_NN of_IN old_JJ blanket_NN ._.
These_DT children_NNS had_VBD lost_VBN their_PRP$ parents_NNS by_IN the_DT 20th_CD of_IN March_NNP ,_, and_CC from_IN that_DT date_NN had_VBD been_VBN thrown_VBN on_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ resources_NNS ,_, except_IN for_IN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS while_IN the_DT elder_NN brother_NN lived_VBD ,_, for_IN no_DT person_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN would_MD approach_VB them_PRP ._.
``_`` The_DT girl_NN Danuli_NNP recounted_VBD ,_, in_IN disjointed_JJ sentences_NNS ,_, her_PRP$ experi-_JJ ences_NNS of_IN the_DT past_JJ eight_CD weeks_NNS ._.

There_EX was_VBD nothing_NN to_TO show_VB that_IN these_DT swellings_NNS were_VBD so_RB connected_VBN with_IN the_DT disease_NN as_IN to_TO lead_VB to_TO the_DT supposition_NN that_IN the_DT cases_NNS were_VBD in_IN the_DT least_JJS analogous_JJ to_TO Mahamari_NNP ,_, as_IN reported._NN ``_``

;_: it_PRP is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN measures_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO cleanse_VB it_PRP and_CC its_PRP$ environs_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN no_DT other_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD heard_VBN of_IN in_IN 1853_CD ._.

``_`` I_PRP now_RB proceed_VBP to_TO the_DT consideration_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN as_IN seen_VBN in_IN 1854_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT first_JJ we_PRP hear_VBP of_IN it_PRP is_VBZ from_IN Colonel_NNP Platt_NNP ,_, Commanding_VBG 23rd_CD Native_JJ Infantry_NNP in_IN Moradabad_NNP ,_, who_WP stated_VBD while_IN out_RP shooting_VBG in_IN the_DT neigh-_JJ bourhood_NN of_IN Afzulgarh_NNP in_IN the_DT Bijnour_NNP district_NN ,_, the_DT natives_NNS reported_VBD to_TO him_PRP that_IN a_DT fatal_JJ sickness_NN ,_, or_CC ``_`` waba_NN ,_, ''_'' was_VBD prevalent_JJ ,_, and_CC carrying_VBG off_RP numbers_NNS of_IN the_DT people._NN ``_``

``_`` I_PRP also_RB attach_VBP a_DT copy_NN of_IN my_PRP$ report_NN then_RB sent_VBD in_IN on_IN the_DT Afzulgarh_NNP sickness_NN ._.
``_`` I_PRP now_RB ,_, in_IN conclusion_NN of_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN my_PRP$ subject_NN ,_, come_VB to_TO discuss_VB the_DT history_NN and_CC causes_NNS of_IN Mahamari_NNP ,_, as_IN seen_VBN by_IN myself_PRP in_IN Thakoor-_NNP dwarah_NN ._.
``_`` I_PRP arrived_VBD there_RB on_IN the_DT 19th_CD March_NNP ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN instructions_NNS received_VBN from_IN Mr._NNP Roberts_NNP ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN this_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC imme-_JJ diately_RB sent_VBN for_IN the_DT Tehsildar_NNP ,_, to_TO ascertain_VB from_IN him_PRP the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB to_TO give_VB orders_NNS to_TO the_DT different_JJ chowkidars_NNS to_TO ascer-_JJ tain_NN where_WRB the_DT sick_JJ lived_VBD ,_, and_CC I_PRP would_MD then_RB accompany_VB them_PRP to_TO the_DT different_JJ dwellings_NNS ._.
``_`` In_IN the_DT afternoon_NN I_PRP proceeded_VBD for_IN this_DT purpose_NN and_CC saw_VBD a_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN ``_`` Mahamari_NNP ,_, ''_'' two_CD or_CC three_CD of_IN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP selected_VBN for_IN detailed_JJ report_NN in_IN the_DT appendix_NN ,_, from_IN notes_NNS taken_VBN at_IN the_DT bedsides_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ._.
``_`` In_IN the_DT evening_NN I_PRP was_VBD able_JJ to_TO gather_VB the_DT following_JJ information_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
``_`` It_PRP seems_VBZ that_IN in_IN December_NNP 1853_CD Ali_NNP Buksh_NNP ,_, a_DT resident_NN of_IN Mehid-_NNP pore_NN ,_, a_DT village_NN in_IN the_DT Bijnour_NNP district_NN ,_, between_IN Thakoordwarah_NNP and_CC Afzulgarh_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT disease_NN was_VBD prevalent_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, went_VBD to_TO the_DT latter_JJ town_NN to_TO see_VB a_DT nautch_NN ,_, that_IN he_PRP came_VBD back_RB to_TO his_PRP$ home_NN in_IN Mehid-_NNP pore_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN three_CD days_NNS afterwards_IN his_PRP$ brother_NN Mahomed_NNP became_VBD ill_JJ and_CC died_VBD on_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN of_IN his_PRP$ illness_NN ._.

Previous_JJ history_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN India_NNP ._.
103_CD ``_`` These_DT three_CD deaths_NNS occurred_VBD within_IN eight_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT time_NN Mahomed_NNP took_VBD ill._NN Boodha_NNP ,_, the_DT brother-in-law_NN of_IN Ali_NNP Buksh_NNP ,_, living_VBG in_IN Thakoordwarah_NNP (_( where_WRB also_RB Ali_NNP Buksh_NNP 's_POS wife_NN resided_VBD )_) ,_, got_VBD alarmed_VBN in_IN case_NN Ali_NNP Buksh_NNP should_MD also_RB get_VB ill_JJ ,_, and_CC went_VBD off_IN to_TO Mehidpore_NNP and_CC brought_VBD him_PRP to_TO Thakoordwarah_NNP ;_: 15_CD days_NNS after_IN his_PRP$ arrival_NN a_DT brother_NN of_IN Boodha_NNP 's_POS took_VBD ill_NN ,_, with_IN all_PDT the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN Mahamari_NNP ,_, accompanied_VBN with_IN swelling_NN of_IN the_DT glands_NNS of_IN the_DT neck_NN ,_, which_WDT proved_VBD fatal_NN in_IN three_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT first_JJ attack_NN ._.

``_`` These_DT were_VBD the_DT first_JJ cases_NNS that_WDT occurred_VBD at_IN Thakoordwarah_NNP itself_PRP ._.

``_`` We_PRP have_VBP found_VBN that_IN Boodha_NNP 's_POS house_NN is_VBZ in_IN Thakoordwarah_NNP ,_, but_CC near_IN to_TO Jumna_NNP Wala_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN Beharee_NNP lives_VBZ near_IN Boodha_NNP ,_, but_CC in_IN Jumna_NNP Wala._NNP ``_``

105_CD ``_`` I_PRP shall_MD make_VB a_DT few_JJ very_RB brief_JJ remarks_NNS on_IN this_DT topic_NN ,_, as_IN much_JJ has_VBZ been_VBN elicited_VBN in_IN regard_NN to_TO its_PRP$ symptoms_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, in_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ division_NN of_IN this_DT subject._NN ``_``

''_''
The_DT external_JJ swellings_NNS suddenly_RB rising_VBG indolent_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB very_RB painful_JJ ,_, are_VBP the_DT most_RBS characteristic_JJ proof_NN of_IN the_DT malady_NN ,_, glandular_JJ swellings_NNS in_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT body_NN ,_, the_DT groin_NN ,_, axilla_NN ,_, neck_NN and_CC even_RB in_IN the_DT legs_NN ,_, are_VBP described_VBN as_IN occurring_NN ._.

``_`` Dr._NNP Pearson_NNP describes_VBZ the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN as_IN follows-_JJ chilliness_NN ,_, giddiness_NN ,_, unusually_RB severe_JJ headache_NN ,_, pain_NN and_CC throbbing_NN of_IN the_DT temples_NNS ;_: trembling_VBG of_IN the_DT limbs_NNS ,_, unable_JJ to_TO remain_VB in_IN the_DT erect_JJ posture_NN ,_, great_JJ prostration_NN of_IN strength_NN ,_, fever_NN continued_VBD ,_, thirst_RB ,_, tongue_NN foul_NN ,_, chalkey_JJ white_JJ ,_, eyes_NNS heavy_VBP ,_, watery_JJ and_CC injected_JJ ,_, breathing_VBG hurried_VBN ,_, pulse_RB small_JJ ,_, frequent_JJ and_CC unequal_JJ ,_, nausea_NN ,_, vomitting_VBG and_CC purging_NN of_IN bilious_JJ matters_NNS ,_, urine_JJ high-coloured_JJ ,_, clammy_JJ perspirations_NNS ,_, heat_NN and_CC burning_NN of_IN prcordia_NN ,_, occasionally_RB yellowness_NN of_IN the_DT skin_NN ,_, and_CC eyes_NNS wandering_VBG ,_, delirium_NN ,_, bubos_NN in_IN the_DT groins_NNS ,_, glandular_JJ swel-_JJ lings_NNS in_IN the_DT axilla_NN ,_, or_CC neck_NN carbuncles_NNS ,_, petechi_JJ expectoration_NN of_IN blood_NN ,_, convulsions_NNS ,_, coma_NN ,_, terminating_VBG in_IN death_NN on_IN the_DT third_JJ or_CC fourth_JJ day_NN ._. Much_JJ of_IN Dr._NNP Stiven_NNP 's_POS report_NN is_VBZ occupied_VBN in_IN discussing_VBG the_DT identi-_JJ ties_NNS of_IN Mahamari_NNP with_IN the_DT plague_NN of_IN the_DT Levant_NNP ._.

Some_DT objection_NN has_VBZ been_VBN raised_VBN to_TO this_DT proposition_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN of_IN Mahamari_NNP being_VBG found_VBN to_TO exist_VB in_IN temperatures_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP said_VBD to_TO destroy_VB it_PRP in_IN Europe_NNP and_CC Africa_NNP ._.
But_CC the_DT thermometric_JJ limits_NNS of_IN the_DT plague_NN are_VBP very_RB undecided_JJ ._.
Sir_NNP Gilbert_NNP Blane_NNP asserts_VBZ them_PRP to_TO be_VB 60_CD and_CC 80_CD ,_, whilst_VBD Dr._NNP Copland_NNP differs_NNS so_RB widely_RB as_IN to_TO name_VB them_PRP 35_CD to_TO 75_CD ._.

south_NN of_IN Egypt_NNP ,_, we_PRP are_VBP not_RB justified_VBN in_IN defining_VBG the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.

REMARKS_NNP ._.
BOMBAY_NNP PRESIDENCY_NNP PROPER_NNP ._.
Bombay_NNP City_NNP 821,764_CD *12,795_VBD 1,557_CD *10,813_JJ 1,316_CD *_IN These_DT figures_NNS are_VBP the_DT sums_NNS of_IN the_DT reported_VBN seizures_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ however_RB known_VBN that_IN especially_RB during_IN the_DT early_JJ period_NN of_IN the_DT of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ the_DT reporting_NN of_IN cases_NNS was_VBD not_RB complete_JJ and_CC that_IN the_DT actual_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS was_VBD much_RB greater_JJR than_IN the_DT number_NN reported_VBN ._.
During_IN the_DT period_NN from_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG the_DT 1st_CD September_NNP 1895_CD to_TO the_DT week_NN ending_VBG the_DT 20th_CD April_NNP 1897_CD (_( inclusive_JJ )_) the_DT excess_NN of_IN the_DT total_JJ mortality_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN over_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT corresponding_JJ period_NN of_IN the_DT previous_JJ five_CD years_NNS was_VBD 20,828_CD ._.
After_IN that_DT period_NN the_DT reporting_NN was_VBD more_RBR accurate_JJ and_CC the_DT general_JJ mortality_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN first_RB sank_VBD below_IN the_DT normal_JJ and_CC then_RB rose_VBD above_IN it_PRP ,_, owing_VBG to_TO an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN cholera_NN and_CC other_JJ causes_NNS ._.
Adding_VBG to_TO the_DT figure_NN 20,828_CD the_DT reported_VBN plague_JJ deaths_NNS from_IN the_DT 21st_CD April_NNP up_RB to_TO the_DT 27th_JJ August_NNP (_( inclusive_JJ )_) we_PRP obtain_VB a_DT total_NN of_IN 21,614_CD and_CC this_DT approximates_VBZ more_JJR nearly_RB to_TO the_DT actual_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN plague_NN ._.
It_PRP gives_VBZ a_DT proportion_NN of_IN above_IN 2,630_CD deaths_NNS per_IN 100,000_CD of_IN the_DT population_NN according_VBG to_TO the_DT last_JJ census_NN ._.
The_DT accuracy_NN of_IN the_DT calculation_NN is_VBZ to_TO some_DT extent_NN vitiated_VBN by_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN during_IN the_DT worst_JJS period_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ the_DT population_NN was_VBD largely_RB diminished_VBN by_IN emigration_NN ._.
The_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP made_VBD a_DT calculation_NN ,_, based_VBN on_IN total_JJ mortality_NN and_CC the_DT estimated_JJ population_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN from_IN month_NN to_TO month_NN which_WDT gives_VBZ a_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN 25,828_CD deaths_NNS from_IN plague_NN up_RB to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN July_NNP ._.

REGULATIONS_NNP UNDER_NNP THE_NNP EPIDEMIC_NNP DISEASES_NNP ACT_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
1_CD ._.
Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP (_( III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD )_) ._.
(_( Received_VBD the_DT assent_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP on_IN the_DT 4th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ._. )_)
An_DT Act_NNP to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_DT better_JJR prevention_NN of_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN Dangerous_NNP Epidemic_NNP Disease_NNP ._.
Whereas_IN it_PRP is_VBZ expedient_JJ to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_DT better_JJR prevention_NN of_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ hereby_RB enacted_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Short_JJ title_NN ,_, extent_NN and_CC commencement_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) This_DT Act_NNP may_MD be_VB called_VBN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1897_CD ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) It_PRP extends_VBZ to_TO the_DT whole_NN of_IN British_JJ India_NNP (_( inclusive_JJ of_IN Upper_NNP Burma_NNP ,_, British_NNP Baluchistan_NNP ,_, the_DT Santal_NNP Parganas_NNP and_CC the_DT Pargana_NNP of_IN Spiti_NNP )_) ;_: and_CC (_( 3_CD )_) It_PRP shall_MD come_VB into_IN force_NN at_IN once_RB ._.
Power_NN to_TO take_VB special_JJ measures_NNS and_CC prescribe_JJ regulations_NNS as_IN to_TO dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) When_WRB at_IN any_DT time_NN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN India_NNP or_CC any_DT part_NN thereof_NN is_VBZ visited_VBN by_IN ,_, or_CC threatened_VBN with_IN ,_, an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN any_DT dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ,_, the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, if_IN he_PRP thinks_VBZ that_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG in_IN force_NN are_VBP insufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, may_MD take_VB or_CC require_VB or_CC empower_VB any_DT person_NN to_TO take_VB such_JJ measures_NNS and_CC by_IN public_JJ notice_NN ,_, prescribe_VB such_JJ temporary_JJ regulations_NNS to_TO be_VB observed_VBN by_IN the_DT public_NN or_CC by_IN any_DT person_NN or_CC class_NN of_IN persons_NNS as_IN he_PRP shall_MD deem_VB necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT outbreak_NN of_IN such_JJ disease_NN or_CC the_DT spread_NN thereof_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD determine_VB in_IN what_WP manner_NN and_CC by_IN whom_WP any_DT expenses_NNS incurred_VBN (_( including_VBG compensation_NN if_IN any_DT )_) shall_MD be_VB defrayed_VBN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) In_IN particular_JJ and_CC without_IN prejudice_NN to_TO the_DT generality_NN of_IN the_DT foregoing_NN provisions_NNS ,_, the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP may_MD take_VB measures_NNS and_CC prescribe_JJ regulations_NNS for-_JJ (_( a_DT )_) the_DT inspection_NN of_IN any_DT ship_NN or_CC vessel_NN leaving_NN ,_, or_CC arriving_VBG at_IN ,_, any_DT port_NN in_IN British_JJ 'India_NNS and_CC such_JJ detention_NN thereof_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN any_DT person_NN intending_VBG to_TO sail_VB therein_NN or_CC arriving_VBG thereby_RB ,_, as_IN may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ ;_: and_CC 618_CD ?_. 138_CD Regulations_NNPS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._.
(_( b_NN )_) the_DT inspection_NN of_IN persons_NNS travelling_VBG by_IN railway_NN or_CC otherwise_RB and_CC the_DT segregation_NN ,_, in_IN hospital_NN ,_, temporary_JJ accommodation_NN or_CC otherwise_RB ,_, of_IN persons_NNS suspected_VBN by_IN the_DT inspecting_VBG officer_NN of_IN being_VBG infected_VBN with_IN any_DT such_JJ disease_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP may_MD ,_, by_IN general_JJ or_CC special_JJ order_NN ,_, direct_VB that_IN all_DT or_CC any_DT of_IN the_DT powers_NNS conferred_VBN by_IN this_DT Act_NNP may_MD also_RB be_VB exercised_VBN by_IN any_DT Local_JJ Government_NN with_IN respect_NN to_TO the_DT territories_NNS administered_VBN by_IN it_PRP ._.
Penalty_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
Any_DT person_NN disobeying_VBG any_DT regulation_NN or_CC order_NN made_VBN under_IN this_DT Act_NNP shall_MD be_VB deemed_VBN to_TO have_VB committed_VBN an_DT offence_NN punishable_JJ under_IN section_NN 188_CD of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ Penal_NNP Code_NNP ._.
Protection_NN to_TO persons_NNS acting_VBG under_IN Act_NNP ,_, 4_CD ._.
No_DT suit_NN or_CC other_JJ legal_JJ proceeding_VBG shall_MD lie_VB against_IN any_DT person_NN for_IN anything_NN done_VBN or_CC in_IN good_JJ faith_NN intended_VBN to_TO be_VB done_VBN under_IN this_DT Act_NNP ._.
Notifications_NNS conferring_VBG Powers_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
Home_NNP Department_NNP General_NNP Notification_NNP conferring_VBG powers_NNS No_DT ._.
2._CD on_IN Local_JJ Governments_NNS ._.

Regulation_NN No_DT ._.
11_CD of_IN 1897_CD ._.
(_( Passed_VBN on_IN the_DT 11th_CD day_NN of_IN February_NNP 1897_CD ._. )_)
A_DT Regulation_NN to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN or_CC spread_NN of_IN dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ._.
Preamble_JJ ._.
Whereas_IN it_PRP is_VBZ expedient_JJ to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN the_DT out-_JJ break_NN or_CC spread_NN of_IN dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN in_IN Mysore_NNP ,_, Her_NNP Highness_NNP the_DT Maharani_NNP Regent_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO enact_VB as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Title_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
(_( i_NN )_) This_DT Regulation_NN may_MD be_VB called_VBN ``_`` The_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Regulation_NNP ,_, 1897_CD ._. ''_''
Extent_NN ._.
(_( ii_NN )_) It_PRP extends_VBZ to_TO the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT Territories_NNP of_IN Mysore_NNP ;_: and_CC (_( iii_NN )_) It_PRP shall_MD come_VB into_IN force_NN at_IN once_RB ._.
Commencement_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
(_( i_NN )_) When_WRB at_IN any_DT time_NN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Mysore_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN Mysore_NNP or_CC any_DT part_NN thereof_NN is_VBZ visited_VBN by_IN ,_, or_CC threatened_VBN with_IN ,_, an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN any_DT dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ,_, the_DT said_VBD Government_NNP ,_, if_IN it_PRP thinks_VBZ that_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG in_IN force_NN are_VBP insufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, may_MD take_VB such_JJ measures_NNS and_CC ,_, by_IN public_JJ notice_NN ,_, prescribe_VB such_JJ temporary_JJ regulations_NNS to_TO be_VB observed_VBN by_IN the_DT public_NN or_CC by_IN any_DT person_NN or_CC class_NN of_IN persons_NNS ,_, as_IN it_PRP shall_MD deem_VB necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT outbreak_NN of_IN such_JJ disease_NN or_CC the_DT spread_NN thereof_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD determine_VB in_IN what_WP manner_NN and_CC by_IN whom_WP any_DT expenses_NNS incurred_VBN (_( including_VBG compensation_NN ,_, if_IN any_DT )_) shall_MD be_VB defrayed_VBN ._.
(_( ii_NN )_) The_DT Government_NNP of_IN Mysore_NNP may_MD require_VB or_CC empower_VB any_DT person_NN to_TO take_VB such_JJ measures_NNS as_IN he_PRP shall_MD deem_VB necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT outbreak_NN of_IN such_JJ disease_NN or_CC the_DT spread_NN thereof_NN ._.
(_( iii_NN )_) In_IN particular_JJ ,_, and_CC without_IN prejudice_NN to_TO the_DT generality_NN of_IN the_DT foregoing_NN provisions_NNS ,_, the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Mysore_NNP may_MD take_VB measures_NNS and_CC prescribe_JJ regulations_NNS for_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN persons_NNS travelling_VBG by_IN railway_NN or_CC otherwise_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT segre-_JJ gation_NN ,_, in_IN hospital_NN ,_, temporary_JJ accommodation_NN or_CC otherwise_RB ,_, of_IN persons_NNS suspected_VBN by_IN the_DT inspecting_VBG officer_NN of_IN being_VBG infected_VBN with_IN any_DT such_JJ disease_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
Any_DT person_NN disobeying_VBG any_DT regulation_NN or_CC order_NN made_VBN under_IN this_DT Regulation_NNP shall_MD be_VB deemed_VBN to_TO have_VB committed_VBN an_DT offence_NN punish-_NN able_JJ under_IN section_NN 188_CD of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ Penal_NNP Code_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
No_DT suit_NN or_CC other_JJ legal_JJ proceeding_VBG shall_MD lie_VB against_IN any_DT person_NN for_IN anything_NN done_VBN ,_, or_CC in_IN good_JJ faith_NN intended_VBN to_TO be_VB done_VBN ,_, under_IN this_DT Regulation_NNP ._.

Regulation_NN I_PRP of_IN 1072_CD ._.
A_DT regulation_NN to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_DT better_JJR prevention_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN or_CC spread_NN of_IN dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN passed_VBN by_IN His_PRP$ Highness_NNP the_DT Maharaja_NNP of_IN Travancore_NNP on_IN the_DT 24th_CD February_NNP ,_, 1857_CD ,_, correspond-_JJ ing_NN with_IN the_DT 14th_CD Kumbhum_NNP 1072_CD ,_, under_IN section_NN 10_CD of_IN Regulation_NNP II_NNP of_IN 1063_CD ._.
Whereas_IN it_PRP is_VBZ expedient_JJ to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_DT better_JJR prevention_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN and_CC spread_NN of_IN dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ;_: It_PRP is_VBZ hereby_RB enacted_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Short_JJ title_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
This_DT Regulation_NN may_MD be_VB called_VBN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Regu-_NNP lation_NN of_IN 1072_CD and_CC shall_MD come_VB into_IN force_NN at_IN once_RB ._.
Power_NN to_TO take_VB special_JJ measures_NNS and_CC prescribe_NN rules_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
Our_PRP$ Government_NN may_MD ,_, on_IN being_VBG satisfied_VBN that_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN Travancore_NNP is_VBZ visited_VBN by_IN ,_, or_CC threatened_VBN with_IN ,_, an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN any_DT dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ,_, or_CC that_IN there_EX is_VBZ risk_NN of_IN any_DT such_JJ disease_NN being_VBG imported_VBN into_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN Travancore_NNP ,_, take_VB such_JJ measures_NNS and_CC ,_, by_IN public_JJ notice_NN ,_, prescribe_VB such_JJ temporary_JJ rules_NNS to_TO be_VB observed_VBN by_IN the_DT public_NN or_CC by_IN any_DT person_NN or_CC class_NN of_IN persons_NNS ,_, as_IN may_MD be_VB deemed_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT outbreak_NN or_CC the_DT spread_NN of_IN such_JJ disease_NN or_CC the_DT importation_NN thereof_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD deter-_VB mine_NN in_IN what_WP manner_NN and_CC by_IN whom_WP any_DT expenses_NNS incur-_JJ red_JJ (_( including_VBG compensation_NN if_IN any_DT )_) shall_MD be_VB defrayed_VBN ._.
Penalty_NN 3_CD ._.
Any_DT person_NN disobeying_VBG any_DT rule_NN or_CC order_NN made_VBN under_IN this_DT Regulation_NNP shall_MD be_VB deemed_VBN to_TO have_VB committed_VBN an_DT offence_NN punishable_JJ under_IN section_NN 188_CD of_IN the_DT Penal_NNP Code_NNP ._.
Protection_NN to_TO persons_NNS acting_VBG under_IN Regula-_NNP tion_NN ._.
4_CD ._.

(_( 1_CD )_) This_DT Regulation_NN may_MD be_VB called_VBN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Disease_NNP Re-_NNP gulation_NN ,_, I_PRP of_IN 1072_CD ,_, ?_. 144_CD Regulations_NNPS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
