IV_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) It_PRP extends_VBZ to_TO the_DT whole_NN of_IN Cochin_NNP State_NNP ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) It_PRP shall_MD come_VB into_IN force_NN at_IN once_RB ._.
Power_NN to_TO take_VB special_JJ measures_NNS and_CC prescribe_JJ Regulations_NNS as_IN to_TO dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) When_WRB at_IN any_DT time_NN the_DT Dewan_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN the_DT Cochin_NNP State_NNP or_CC any_DT part_NN thereof_NN is_VBZ visited_VBN by_IN ,_, or_CC threatened_VBN with_IN ,_, an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN any_DT dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ,_, the_DT Dewan_NNP ,_, if_IN he_PRP thinks_VBZ that_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG in_IN force_NN are_VBP insuffi-_JJ cient_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, may_MD take_VB or_CC require_VB or_CC empower_VB any_DT person_NN to_TO take_VB such_JJ measures_NNS and_CC ,_, by_IN public_JJ notice_NN ,_, prescribe_VB such_JJ temporary_JJ regulations_NNS to_TO be_VB observed_VBN by_IN the_DT public_NN or_CC by_IN any_DT person_NN or_CC class_NN of_IN persons_NNS as_IN he_PRP shall_MD deem_VB necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT outbreak_NN of_IN such_JJ disease_NN or_CC the_DT spread_NN thereof_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD determine_VB in_IN what_WP manner_NN and_CC by_IN whom_WP any_DT expenses_NNS incurred_VBN (_( including_VBG compensation_NN if_IN any_DT )_) shall_MD be_VB defrayed_VBN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) In_IN particular_JJ and_CC without_IN prejudice_NN to_TO the_DT generality_NN of_IN the_DT foregoing_NN provisions_NNS ,_, the_DT Dewan_NNP may_MD take_VB measures_NNS and_CC prescribe_VB re-_JJ gulations_NNS for-_NNS (_( a_DT )_) the_DT inspection_NN of_IN any_DT ship_NN or_CC vessel_NN leaving_NN ,_, or_CC arriving_VBG at_IN ,_, any_DT port_NN in_IN Cochin_NNP and_CC such_JJ detention_NN thereof_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN any_DT person_NN intending_VBG to_TO sail_VB therein_NN ,_, or_CC arriving_VBG thereby_RB ,_, as_IN may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ ;_: and_CC (_( b_NN )_) the_DT inspection_NN of_IN persons_NNS travelling_VBG by_IN railway_NN or_CC otherwise_RB and_CC the_DT segregation_NN ,_, in_IN hospital_NN ,_, temporary_JJ accommoda-_JJ tion_NN or_CC otherwise_RB ,_, of_IN persons_NNS suspected_VBN by_IN the_DT inspecting_VBG officer_NN of_IN being_VBG infected_VBN with_IN any_DT such_JJ disease_NN ._.
Penalty_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
Any_DT person_NN disobeying_VBG any_DT rule_NN or_CC order_NN made_VBN under_IN this_DT Re-_JJ gulation_NN shall_MD be_VB deemed_VBN to_TO have_VB committed_VBN an_DT offence_NN punishable_JJ under_IN section_NN 174_CD of_IN the_DT Cochin_NNP Penal_NNP Code_NNP (_( Regulation_NNP I_PRP of_IN 1059_CD )_) ._.
Protection_NN to_TO persons_NNS acting_VBG under_IN Regula-_NNP tion_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
No_DT suit_NN or_CC other_JJ legal_JJ proceeding_VBG shall_MD lie_VB against_IN any_DT person_NN for_IN anything_NN done_VBN or_CC in_IN good_JJ faith_NN intended_VBN to_TO be_VB done_VBN under_IN this_DT Regulation_NNP ._.
Regulations_NNS issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.

No_DT ._.

Notification_NN No_DT ._.

Preamble_JJ ._.
Whereas_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP is_VBZ visited_VBN by_IN an_DT attack_NN of_IN a_DT dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, and_CC where-_NN as_IN the_DT Governor_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG in_IN force_NN are_VBP insufficient_NN for_IN ?_. APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._. ]_NN
Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
145_CD the_DT purpose_NN of_IN preventing_VBG the_DT spread_NN thereof_NN ;_: pursuant_NN to_TO the_DT pro-_JJ visions_NNS of_IN section_NN 2_CD ,_, sub-section_NN 1_CD ,_, of_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1897_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT powers_NNS in_IN this_DT behalf_NN conferred_VBN by_IN the_DT Governor-General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP under_IN section_NN 2_CD ,_, sub-section_NN 3_CD ,_, of_IN the_DT same_JJ Act_NNP ,_, the_DT Governor_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO empower_VB the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP to_TO take_VB the_DT measures_NNS hereinafter_VBP specified_VBN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ further_RBR pleased_JJ to_TO prescribe_VB the_DT temporary_JJ regulations_NNS hereinafter_NN set_VBN forth_NN to_TO be_VB observed_VBN by_IN the_DT public_NN and_CC all_DT persons_NNS concerned_VBN :_: -_: Abatement_NN of_IN overcrowding_VBG ._.
I.-If_NNP for_IN any_DT reason_NN it_PRP shall_MD appear_VB to_TO the_DT Commissioner_NNP that_IN any_DT building_NN intended_VBN for_IN or_CC used_VBN as_IN a_DT dwelling_NN is_VBZ unfit_JJ for_IN human_JJ habitation_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD ,_, of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ motion_NN ,_, prohibit_NN by_IN a_DT written_VBN order_NN the_DT further_JJR use_NN of_IN such_JJ building_NN as_IN a_DT dwelling_NN ,_, and_CC cause_VB notice_NN of_IN such_JJ prohibition_NN to_TO be_VB affixed_VBN to_TO the_DT door_NN of_IN ,_, or_CC on_IN some_DT con-_JJ spicuous_JJ part_NN of_IN ,_, such_JJ building_NN ._.
As_IN a_DT temporary_JJ regulation_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ hereby_JJ prescribed_NNS that_IN when_WRB any_DT such_JJ prohibition_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN ,_, no_DT owner_NN or_CC occupier_JJR of_IN such_JJ build-_JJ ing_VBG shall_MD use_VB or_CC suffer_VB the_DT same_JJ to_TO be_VB used_VBN for_IN human_JJ habitation_NN until_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP certifies_NNS in_IN writing_VBG that_IN the_DT causes_NNS rendering_VBG it_PRP unfit_JJ for_IN human_JJ habitation_NN have_VBP been_VBN removed_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ satisfaction_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN enforcing_VBG and_CC carrying_VBG into_IN effect_NN the_DT said_VBD regulation_NN ,_, the_DT Commissioner_NNP or_CC any_DT Police_NNP or_CC other_JJ officer_NN acting_VBG in_IN co-operation_NN with_IN or_CC under_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP may_MD ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, forcibly_RB remove_VB any_DT person_NN from_IN such_JJ building_NN and_CC may_MD prevent_VB the_DT re-occupation_NN thereof_NN until_IN such_JJ time_NN as_IN the_DT Commis-_NNP sioner_NN shall_MD have_VB certified_VBN as_IN aforesaid_NN ._.
Insanitary_JJ buildings_NNS ._.
II.-_JJ If_IN it_PRP shall_MD appear_VB to_TO the_DT Commissioner_NNP that_IN any_DT building_NN used_VBN as_IN a_DT dwelling_NN is_VBZ so_RB overcrowded_JJ as_IN to_TO endanger_VB the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS thereof_RB ,_, he_PRP may_MD ,_, of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ motion_NN ,_, by_IN written_VBN order_NN require_VBP the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN ,_, within_IN a_DT time_NN not_RB exceeding_VBG seven_CD days_NNS to_TO be_VB prescribed_VBN in_IN the_DT said_VBD order_NN ,_, to_TO abate_VB the_DT overcrowding_VBG thereof_NN by_IN reducing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN lodgers_NNS ,_, tenants_NNS or_CC other_JJ inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT said_VBD building_NN ._.
As_IN a_DT temporary_JJ regulation_NN it_PRP is_VBZ hereby_JJ prescribed_NNS that_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN sub-sections_NNS (_( 2_CD )_) and_CC (_( 3_CD )_) of_IN section_NN 379_CD of_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP Municipal_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1888_CD ,_, shall_MD (_( mutatis_VB mutandis_NN )_) apply_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN any_DT such_JJ requisition_NN by_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP in_IN the_DT same_JJ manner_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT same_JJ extent_NN in_IN all_DT respects_NNS as_IN if_IN such_JJ requisition_NN had_VBD been_VBN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Presidency_NNP Magistrate_NNP under_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN sub-section_NN (_( 1_CD )_) of_IN the_DT same_JJ section_NN ._.

Meaning_NN of_IN cleansing_VBG and_CC disinfecting_VBG ._.
VI.-The_JJ operation_NN of_IN cleansing_VBG or_CC disinfecting_VBG a_DT building_NN within_IN the_DT meaning_NN of_IN this_DT Notification_NNP shall_MD be_VB deemed_VBN to_TO include_VB not_RB only_RB the_DT cleansing_NN and_CC limewashing_NN of_IN such_JJ building_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB ,_, if_IN deemed_VBN necessary_JJ ,_, the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT earth_NN or_CC soil_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN floor_NN thereof_NN to_TO a_DT depth_NN of_IN four_CD inches_NNS ,_, the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ or_CC any_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT roof_NN thereof_NN ,_, the_DT removal_NN of_IN floors_NNS ,_, the_DT burning_NN of_IN kerosine_JJ oil_NN or_CC any_DT other_JJ substance_NN thereon_NN ,_, or_CC any_DT other_JJ measure_NN whatever_WDT ._.
Incidence_NN of_IN expenditure_NN ._.

Compensation_NN ._.

Charge_NN of_IN property_NN ._.

Cutting_VBG off_IN of_IN water-connec-_JJ tion_NN ._.

other_JJ sufficient_JJ means_NNS for_IN the_DT supply_NN of_IN water_NN to_TO be_VB provided_VBN outside_IN such_JJ building_NN cause_VB the_DT water-connection_NN with_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN such_JJ building_NN to_TO be_VB cut_VBN off_RP ._.
Demolition_NN of_IN buildings_NNS ._.

be_VB adapted_VBN to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ requirements_NNS of_IN a_DT dwelling_NN ,_, or_CC is_VBZ other-_JJ wise_NN permanently_RB unfit_JJ for_IN human_JJ habitation_NN ,_, or_CC if_IN its_PRP$ existence_NN is_VBZ a_DT source_NN of_IN danger_NN ,_, the_DT Commissioner_NNP may_MD demolish_VB the_DT same_JJ or_CC any_DT part_NN thereof_NN ._.
Valuation_NN ._.
Prior_RB to_TO any_DT such_JJ building_NN being_VBG demolished_VBN ,_, the_DT Commissioner_NNP shall_MD cause_VB the_DT same_JJ ,_, or_CC such_JJ part_NN thereof_NN as_IN he_PRP may_MD think_VB necessary_JJ to_TO demolish_VB ,_, to_TO be_VB surveyed_VBN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ value_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN to_TO be_VB assessed_VBN by_IN such_JJ person_NN as_IN Government_NNP may_MD ,_, by_IN name_NN or_CC by_IN virtue_NN of_IN office_NN ,_, appoint_NN for_IN that_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD by_IN written_VBN notice_JJ affixed_VBN on_IN some_DT conspicuous_JJ part_NN of_IN such_JJ building_NN intimate_VBP the_DT date_NN (_( not_RB being_VBG less_RBR than_IN seven_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN such_JJ notice_NN )_) and_CC the_DT hour_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT building_NN will_MD be_VB surveyed_VBN and_CC assessed_VBN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN of_IN demolition_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB commenced_VBN until_IN the_DT building_NN or_CC portion_NN thereof_NN has_VBZ been_VBN surveyed_VBN and_CC the_DT value_NN so_RB assessed_JJ ._.
The_DT valuation_NN of_IN such_JJ building_NN by_IN such_JJ officer_NN shall_MD be_VB final_JJ and_CC conclusive_JJ and_CC the_DT owner_NN shall_MD be_VB entitled_VBN to_TO receive_VB the_DT amount_NN thereof_NN which_WDT shall_MD be_VB provided_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP fund_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP shall_MD not_RB be_VB entitled_VBN to_TO receive_VB any_DT further_JJ or_CC other_JJ sum_NN by_IN way_NN of_IN compensation_NN ._.
Effect_NN on_IN own-_JJ ership_NN of_IN land_NN ._.

Building_NN materials_NNS ._.
The_DT materials_NNS of_IN any_DT building_NN or_CC part_NN of_IN a_DT building_NN demolished_VBN as_IN aforesaid_JJ shall_MD be_VB the_DT property_NN of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP and_CC shall_MD be_VB remov-_JJ ed_NN and_CC disposed_VBN of_IN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, destroyed_VBN by_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP ._.
Rule_NN of_IN assess-_JJ ment_NN ._.
In_IN assessing_VBG the_DT value_NN of_IN any_DT building_NN regard_NN shall_MD be_VB had_VBN only_RB to_TO the_DT then_RB actual_JJ market_NN value_NN of_IN the_DT structure_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT allowance_NN shall_MD be_VB made_VBN ,_, nor_CC shall_MD any_DT compensation_NN be_VB paid_VBN ,_, for_IN compulsory_JJ demolition_NN or_CC otherwise_RB ._.
*_JJ Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.
4691-3120_JJ P._NNP ,_, dated_VBD 3oth_CD August_NNP 1897_CD ._.

Preamble_JJ ._.
Whereas_NNP certain_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP are_VBP visited_VBN by_IN ,_, or_CC threatened_VBN with_IN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN ,_, a_DT dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, and_CC whereas_IN the_DT Governor_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG in_IN force_NN are_VBP insufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN preventing_VBG the_DT spread_NN thereof_NN in_IN parts_NNS other_JJ than_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ;_: pursuant_NN to_TO the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN section_NN 2_CD ,_, sub-sections_NNS (_( 1_CD )_) and_CC (_( 2_CD )_) ,_, of_IN the_DT Epide-_NNP mic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1897_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT powers_NNS in_IN this_DT behalf_NN conferred_VBN by_IN the_DT Governor-General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP under_IN section_NN 2_CD ,_, sub-_JJ section_NN (_( 3_CD )_) ,_, of_IN the_DT same_JJ Act_NNP ,_, the_DT Governor_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO empower_VB the_DT officers_NNS herein_VBP below_IN mentioned_VBN to_TO take_VB the_DT measures_NNS hereinafter_VBP specified_VBN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ further_RBR pleased_JJ to_TO prescribe_VB the_DT temporary_JJ regulations_NNS hereinafter_NN set_VBN forth_NN to_TO be_VB observed_VBN by_IN the_DT public_NN and_CC all_DT persons_NNS concerned_VBN ._.
Appointment_NN of_IN Plague_NNP authori-_JJ ties_NNS ._.
1_CD ._.
In_IN every_DT local_JJ area_NN where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ danger_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT Dis-_NNP trict_NN Magistrate_NNP ,_, subject_JJ to_TO the_DT general_JJ instructions_NNS of_IN the_DT Commis-_NNP sioner_NN ,_, may_MD appoint_VB special_JJ officers_NNS ,_, either_RB by_IN name_NN or_CC by_IN virtue_NN of_IN office_NN ,_, to_TO devise_VB and_CC carry_VB out_RP ,_, under_IN the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP 's_POS general_JJ directions_NNS ,_, all_DT measures_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT special_JJ officers_NNS appointed_VBN for_IN any_DT local_JJ area_NN under_IN these_DT rules_NNS may_MD be_VB known_VBN as_IN Plague_NNP authorities_NNS ._.

3_CD ._.

Subject_JJ to_TO the_DT sanction_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP or_CC of_IN any_DT officer_NN specially_RB empowered_VBN by_IN him_PRP in_IN this_DT behalf_NN ,_, not_RB being_VBG lower_RBR in_IN grade_NN than_IN a_DT First_JJ Class_NN Magistrate_NNP ,_, the_DT award_NN of_IN the_DT Panch_NNP shall_MD be_VB final_JJ and_CC conclusive_JJ ._.
A_DT Plague_NNP authority_NN is_VBZ empowered_VBN to_TO decide_VB whether_IN an_DT article_NN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ proposed_VBN to_TO destroy_VB is_VBZ of_IN sufficient_JJ value_NN for_IN a_DT Panch_NN to_TO be_VB called_VBN to_TO assess_VB its_PRP$ value_NN ._.
If_IN he_PRP decides_VBZ it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB of_IN sufficient_JJ value_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD destroy_VB it_PRP on_IN the_DT spot_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD in_IN his_PRP$ discretion_NN pay_NN compensation_NN to_TO the_DT owner_NN :_: provided_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN no_DT person_NN shall_MD be_VB entitled_VBN as_IN of_IN right_NN to_TO claim_VB any_DT compensation_NN whatsoever_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT desire_NN of_IN Government_NNP that_IN Plague_NNP authorities_NNS should_MD show_VB liberality_NN and_CC promptness_NN in_IN the_DT exercise_NN of_IN their_PRP$ power_NN ?_. 158_CD Regulations_NNPS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.

1_CD ._.

167_CD His_PRP$ Excellency_NN the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO prescribe_VB the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS for_IN the_DT area_NN comprised_VBD within_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT Karachi_NNP Municipality_NNP :_: -_: Abatement_NN of_IN overcrowding_VBG ._.
1_CD ._.
(_( a_DT )_) If_IN it_PRP shall_MD appear_VB to_TO the_DT President_NNP of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP that_IN any_DT building_NN used_VBN as_IN a_DT dwelling_NN is_VBZ so_RB overcrowded_JJ as_IN to_TO endanger_VB the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS thereof_RB ,_, he_PRP may_MD ,_, of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ motion_NN ,_, by_IN written_VBN order_NN ,_, require_VBP the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN ,_, within_IN a_DT time_NN ,_, not_RB exceeding_VBG seven_CD days_NNS ,_, to_TO be_VB prescribed_VBN in_IN the_DT said_VBD order_NN ,_, to_TO abate_VB the_DT overcrowding_VBG thereof_NN by_IN reducing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN lodgers_NNS ,_, tenants_NNS or_CC other_JJ inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT said_VBD building_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) If_IN the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT said_VBD building_NN shall_MD have_VB sub-let_NN the_DT same_JJ ,_, the_DT landlord_NN of_IN the_DT lodgers_NNS ,_, tenants_NNS or_CC other_JJ actual_JJ inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ shall_MD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN this_DT section_NN be_VB deemed_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN ._.
(_( c_NN )_) It_PRP shall_MD be_VB incumbent_JJ on_IN every_DT tenant_NN ,_, lodger_NN or_CC other_JJ inmate_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN to_TO vacate_VB on_IN being_VBG required_VBN by_IN the_DT owner_NN so_RB to_TO do_VB in_IN pursuance_NN of_IN any_DT such_JJ requisition_NN ._.

2_CD ._.
(_( a_DT )_) Save_NNP such_JJ compensation_NN ,_, if_IN any_DT ,_, as_IN the_DT President_NNP or_CC any_DT of_IN the_DT officers_NNS deputed_VBN by_IN him_PRP in_IN this_DT behalf_NN may_MD in_IN his_PRP$ or_CC in_IN their_PRP$ discretion_NN allow_IN ,_, no_DT person_NN shall_MD be_VB entitled_VBN to_TO recover_VB any_DT compensation_NN by_IN way_NN of_IN damages_NNS or_CC other-_JJ wise_NN for_IN the_DT destruction_NN or_CC disinfection_NN of_IN any_DT article_NN removed_VBD or_CC dealt_VB with_IN as_RB provided_VBN in_IN Rules_NNP heretofore_NN sanctioned_VBD or_CC which_WDT may_MD hereafter_VB be_VB sanctioned_VBN by_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.

Rule_NN of_IN assess-_JJ ment_NN ._.

Control_NN of_IN inter-_JJ course_NN ._.
The_DT President_NNP ,_, Karachi_NNP Municipality_NNP ,_, is_VBZ empowered_VBN to_TO order_NN persons_NNS or_CC classes_NNS of_IN persons_NNS to_TO leave_VB a_DT certain_JJ place_NN for_IN another_DT or_CC prohibit_NN leaving_VBG a_DT given_VBN area_NN ,_, prohibit_NN communication_NN between_IN certain_JJ areas_NNS ,_, prohibit_NN entrance_NN of_IN persons_NNS within_IN a_DT prescribed_JJ area_NN ,_, make_VBP regulations_NNS for_IN inspection_NN of_IN travellers_NNS by_IN land_NN or_CC water_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, their_PRP$ detention_NN and_CC segregation_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN suspected_JJ articles_NNS ._.

169_CD Regulations_NNPS regarding_VBG the_DT keeping_VBG of_IN Pigs_NNP ._.
*_JJ No_NNP ._.
24_CD ._.
Notification_NN No_DT ._.
1677-1154_JJ ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 26th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ._.
His_PRP$ Excellency_NN the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT following_JJ rule_NN under_IN Act_NNP III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD for_IN application_NN within_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP of_IN Bandra_NNP :_: -_: Pigs_VB shall_MD be_VB kept_VBN out_IN of_IN buildings_NNS used_VBN for_IN human_JJ habitations_NNS ._.
Pigs_NNP shall_MD not_RB be_VB kept_VBN ,_, excepting_VBG in_IN enclosures_NNS fenced_VBN in_IN or_CC otherwise_RB secured_VBN ,_, so_IN that_IN they_PRP can_MD not_RB escape_VB therefrom_NN ._.
Any_DT swine_JJ straying_NN may_MD be_VB forthwith_JJ destroyed_VBN and_CC the_DT carcass_NN disposed_VBD of_IN as_IN the_DT President_NNP or_CC Secretary_NNP of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP shall_MD direct_VB ,_, and_CC no_DT claim_NN shall_MD lie_VB for_IN compensation_NN for_IN any_DT swine_NN so_RB destroyed_JJ ._.
No_DT person_NN shall_MD feed_VB any_DT animal_NN or_CC suffer_NN or_CC permit_NN any_DT animal_NN to_TO be_VB fed_VBN or_CC to_TO feed_VB with_IN or_CC upon_IN excrementitious_JJ matter_NN ,_, dung_NN ,_, stable_JJ refuse_NN or_CC other_JJ filthy_JJ matter_NN ._.

RESOLUTION.-In_JJ accordance_NN with_IN the_DT Dangerous_NNP Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD ,_, His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS :_: -_: Detention_NN of_IN trains_NNS ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) Every_DT train_NN coming_VBG from_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP to_TO any_DT of_IN the_DT stations_NNS to_TO which_WDT these_DT rules_NNS may_MD be_VB declared_VBN by_IN Government_NNP to_TO be_VB applicable_JJ shall_MD be_VB stopped_VBN at_IN such_JJ station_NN and_CC shall_MD not_RB be_VB taken_VBN further_RB until_IN the_DT inspection_NN provided_VBN by_IN these_DT rules_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN carried_VBN out_IN ,_, and_CC until_IN the_DT guard_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN such_JJ train_NN has_VBZ obtained_VBN a_DT certificate_NN from_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT inspecting_JJ staff_NN to_TO the_DT effect_NN that_IN all_DT persons_NNS proceeding_VBG further_RB by_IN the_DT said_VBD train_NN ,_, whether_IN railway_NN servants_NNS or_CC passengers_NNS are_VBP free_JJ from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.

(_( a_DT )_) persons_NNS ,_, whether_IN passengers_NNS ,_, railway_NN servants_NNS or_CC members_NNS of_IN a_DT boat_NN 's_POS crew_NN ,_, who_WP alight_VBD or_CC disembark_NN at_IN such_JJ place_NN from_IN a_DT train_NN or_CC boat_NN or_CC vessel_NN coming_VBG from_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, whether_IN they_PRP intend_VBP to_TO proceed_VB by_IN such_JJ train_NN boat_NN or_CC vessel_NN or_CC not_RB ,_, and_CC (_( b_NN )_) persons_NNS who_WP intend_VBP to_TO start_VB from_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT said_VBD places_NNS and_CC to_TO travel_VB by_IN such_JJ train_NN ,_, boat_NN or_CC vessel_NN ._.

The_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN shall_MD be_VB conducted_VBN at_IN each_DT railway_NN station_NN in_IN the_DT following_JJ manner_NN :_: -_: Karachi_NNP City_NNP Station_NNP ._.
(_( a_DT )_) Before_IN commencing_VBG the_DT inspection_NN ,_, the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN shall_MD satisfy_VB himself_PRP that_IN no_DT persons_NNS are_VBP concealed_VBN in_IN the_DT train_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT carriages_NNS are_VBP locked_VBN on_IN both_DT sides_NNS ,_, that_IN the_DT platform_NN is_VBZ clear_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT possibility_NN of_IN any_DT access_NN to_TO the_DT train_NN by_IN any_DT non-in-_JJ spected_JJ person_NN ._.
It_PRP shall_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT station_NN master_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT Police_NNP to_TO carry_VB out_RP these_DT provisions_NNS to_TO the_DT satisfaction_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) If_IN found_VBN convenient_NN ,_, intending_VBG passengers_NNS may_MD be_VB arranged_VBN on_IN the_DT platform_NN for_IN inspection_NN and_CC passed_VBD one_CD by_IN one_CD into_IN the_DT carri-_JJ ages_NNS ,_, or_CC may_MD be_VB inspected_VBN one_CD by_IN one_CD as_IN they_PRP pass_VBP to_TO the_DT platform_NN through_IN the_DT gate_NN where_WRB they_PRP are_VBP required_VBN to_TO show_VB their_PRP$ tickets_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT latter_JJ case_NN ,_, they_PRP shall_MD at_IN once_RB take_VBP their_PRP$ seats_NNS in_IN the_DT carriages_NNS ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT inspection_NN is_VBZ finished_VBN ,_, the_DT train_NN ,_, all_DT carriages_NNS being_VBG locked_VBN on_IN both_DT sides_NNS ,_, will_MD proceed_VB to_TO the-Cantonment_JJ Station_NNP accom-_NN panied_VBN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ._.
Karachi_NNP Cantonment_NNP Station_NNP ._.
(_( a_DT )_) Before_IN arrival_NN of_IN the_DT train_NN at_IN the_DT Karachi_NNP Cantonment_NNP Station_NNP ,_, the_DT side_NN away_RB from_IN the_DT platform_NN should_MD be_VB guarded_VBN by_IN Police_NNP to_TO pre-_JJ vent_JJ access_NN to_TO the_DT train_NN on_IN that_DT side_NN ._.
All_DT intending_VBG passengers_NNS should_MD be_VB drawn_VBN up_RP on_IN the_DT platform_NN ,_, arranged_VBN by_IN families_NNS or_CC otherwise_RB as_IN may_MD be_VB most_RBS convenient_JJ for_IN passing_VBG persons_NNS after_IN inspection_NN into_IN the_DT carriages_NNS without_IN possibility_NN of_IN any_DT non-inspected_JJ person_NN eluding_VBG inspection_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT inspection_NN is_VBZ finished_VBN ,_, the_DT doors_NNS may_MD be_VB un-_JJ locked_VBN on_IN both_DT sides_NNS under_IN proper_JJ precautions_NNS ._.
After_IN the_DT doors_NNS have_VBP been_VBN unlocked_VBN ,_, no_DT person_NN shall_MD enter_VB the_DT train_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT train_NN shall_MD at_IN once_RB leave_VBP the_DT station_NN ._.
The_DT doors_NNS shall_MD not_RB be_VB unlocked_JJ till_IN the_DT station_NN master_NN has_VBZ satisfied_VBN himself_PRP that_IN every_DT person_NN intending_VBG to_TO travel_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN his_PRP$ seat_NN (_( except_IN the_DT guards_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT train_NN )_) that_IN the_DT train_NN can_MD start_VB at_IN once_RB ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT police_NN on_IN both_DT sides_NNS of_IN the_DT train_NN have_VBP cleared_VBN away_RP all_DT by-standers_NNS ._.
The_DT medical_JJ officer_NN will_MD see_VB that_IN these_DT regulations_NNS are_VBP strictly_RB observed_VBN ._.

(_( c_NN )_) On_IN arrival_NN of_IN the_DT train_NN ,_, each_DT carriage_NN separately_RB or_CC two_CD at_IN a_DT time_NN will_MD be_VB unlocked_JJ ._.
The_DT occupants_NNS of_IN the_DT carriage_NN shall_MD alight_VB on_IN the_DT platform_NN and_CC be_VB there_RB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ._.
Those_DT who_WP do_VBP not_RB wish_VB to_TO proceed_VB farther_RB will_MD after_IN inspection_NN be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO depart_VB ._.
Those_DT who_WP wish_VBP to_TO proceed_VB will_MD re-enter_VB the_DT carriage_NN ._.
As_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN each_DT carriage_NN is_VBZ completed_VBN ,_, the_DT empty_JJ carriage_NN shall_MD be_VB searched_VBN to_TO ascertain_VB that_IN no_DT person_NN is_VBZ concealed_VBN in_IN it_PRP ,_, the_DT inspect-_JJ ed_NN persons_NNS shall_MD reseat_VB themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT doors_NNS be_VB relocked_VBN ._.

7_CD ._.
No_DT person_NN thus_RB segregated_VBD shall_MD quit_VB the_DT place_NN set_VBN apart_RB with-_JJ out_IN permission_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ._.
It_PRP shall_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN to_TO prevent_VB any_DT person_NN leaving_VBG till_JJ permission_NN is_VBZ given_VBN ._.

8_CD ._.

A_DT permanent_JJ advance_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
100_CD shall_MD be_VB provided_VBN to_TO each_DT officer_NN by_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP ._.
The_DT medical_JJ officer_NN shall_MD keep_VB accounts_NNS and_CC submit_NN bills_NNS and_CC vouchers_NNS in_IN such_JJ way_NN as_IN the_DT Collector_NNP may_MD require_VB ._.
The_DT medical_JJ officer_NN may_MD ,_, after_IN allowing_VBG any_DT person_NN to_TO quit_VB the_DT segre-_JJ gated_JJ area_NN ,_, furnish_VB a_DT ticket_NN to_TO such_JJ person_NN to_TO his_PRP$ house_NN if_IN such_JJ person_NN has_VBZ not_RB the_DT means_NN of_IN buying_VBG a_DT ticket_NN ._.

The_DT following_JJ rules_NNS are_VBP issued_VBN under_IN Act_NNP III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD :_: -_: 1_CD ._.
The_DT Bombay_NNP Plague_NNP Committee_NNP are_VBP hereby_RB empowered_VBN to_TO appoint_VB medical_JJ men_NNS as_IN plague_NN authorities_NNS at_IN railway_NN stations_NNS in_IN the_DT Island_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC the_DT Thana_NNP District_NNP for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN these_DT rules_NNS ._.

2_CD ._.

Preamble_JJ ._.
Whereas_NNP certain_JJ parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP are_VBP visited_VBN by_IN ,_, and_CC the_DT Presidency_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP is_VBZ threatened_VBN with_IN ,_, an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN a_DT dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN known_VBN as_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, and_CC whereas_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ provisions_NNS of_IN law_NN in_IN force_NN in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP are_VBP insufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN preventing_VBG the_DT outbreak_NN or_CC spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP the_DT Governor_NNP of_IN Fort_NNP St._NNP George_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, in_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT powers_NNS delegated_VBD to_TO him_PRP under_IN section_NN 2_CD ,_, sub-section_NN (_( 3_CD )_) ,_, of_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1897_CD ,_, by_IN the_DT Governor-General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP [_NNP Notifica-_NNP tion_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
302_CD (_( Sanitary_NNP )_) ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 4th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ]_NNP ,_, is_VBZ pleased_JJ to_TO prescribe_VB under_IN the_DT said_VBD Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP the_DT following_JJ temporary_JJ regulations_NNS to_TO be_VB observed_VBN in_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP :_: 1_CD ._.
These_DT regulations_NNS shall_MD come_VB into_IN force_NN at_IN once_RB and_CC shall_MD re-_VB main_JJ in_IN operation_NN until_IN such_JJ time_NN as_IN they_PRP shall_MD be_VB withdrawn_VBN by_IN a_DT noti-_JJ fication_NN in_IN the_DT Fort_NNP George_NNP Gazette_NNP ._.
Report_NN of_IN cases_NNS by_IN house-holders_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
Every_DT house-holder_NN who_WP becomes_VBZ cognizant_NN of_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN or_CC of_IN fever_NN with_IN glandular_JJ swellings_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ house_NN or_CC in_IN any_DT other_JJ private_JJ dwelling_NN within_IN the_DT municipal_JJ limits_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP shall_MD be_VB bound_VBN to_TO give_VB information_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC a_DT Sanitary_JJ Inspector_NN of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP with_IN the_DT least_JJS practicable_JJ delay_NN ._.

thereof_NN specially_RB liable_JJ to_TO an_DT attack_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT Presi-_NNP dent_NN or_CC any_DT officer_NN generally_RB or_CC specially_RB authorized_VBN by_IN him_PRP in_IN writing_VBG in_IN this_DT behalf_NN may_MD ,_, by_IN notice_RB posted_VBN on_IN some_DT conspicuous_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN or_CC place_NN ,_, require_VBP the_DT owner_NN or_CC occupier_JJR ,_, if_IN actually_RB residing_VBG in_IN the_DT building_NN or_CC place_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT tenants_NNS or_CC the_DT actual_JJ inmates_NNS thereof_RB ,_, to_TO abate_VB as_IN prescribed_NN in_IN the_DT notice_NN the_DT overcrowding_VBG with-_NN in_IN twenty-four_JJ hours_NNS by_IN reducing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN lodgers_NNS ,_, tenants_NNS or_CC inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT said_VBD building_NN or_CC place_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN default_NN of_IN compliance_NN with_IN the_DT requisition_NN in_IN the_DT said_VBD notice_NN may_MD summarily_VB eject_VB all_DT the_DT in-_JJ mates_NNS or_CC occupants_NNS ,_, or_CC reduce_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN inmates_NNS or_CC occupants_NNS in_IN such_JJ manner_NN and_CC to_TO such_JJ extent_NN as_IN may_MD appear_VB necessary_JJ and_CC the_DT owner_NN or_CC the_DT tenants_NNS or_CC the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN such_JJ building_NN or_CC place_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB entitled_VBN to_TO claim_VB any_DT compensation_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN such_JJ ejec-_JJ tion_NN ._.

5_CD ._.
When_WRB any_DT building_NN or_CC place_NN has_VBZ ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ,_, been_VBN so_RB infected_JJ with_IN the_DT plague_NN as_IN to_TO render_VB its_PRP$ further_JJ occupation_NN a_DT source_NN of_IN danger_NN to_TO the_DT inmates_NNS ,_, tenants_NNS or_CC occupants_NNS thereof_NN ,_, the_DT President_NNP or_CC any_DT officer_NN generally_RB or_CC specially_RB authorized_VBN by_IN him_PRP in_IN writing_VBG in_IN this_DT behalf_NN may_MD summarily_RB cause_VB such_JJ building_NN or_CC place_NN to_TO be_VB vacated_VBN and_CC thoroughly_RB cleansed_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN ;_: and_CC the_DT building_NN or_CC place_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB re-occupied_JJ until_IN in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ safe_JJ to_TO be_VB re-occupied_JJ ;_: and_CC the_DT owner_NN or_CC occupier_JJR or_CC the_DT tenants_NNS or_CC the_DT inmates_NNS thereof_VBP shall_MD not_RB be_VB entitled_VBN to_TO claim_VB any_DT compensation_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN anything_NN done_VBN under_IN this_DT regulation_NN ._.

6_CD ._.
If_IN in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC of_IN a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN deputed_VBN by_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ or_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN any_DT such_JJ officer_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT Surgeon_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, the_DT destruction_NN of_IN any_DT hut_NN or_CC shed_VBN is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, the_DT President_NNP or_CC any_DT officer_NN generally_RB or_CC specially_RB authorized_VBN by_IN him_PRP in_IN writing_VBG in_IN this_DT behalf_NN may_MD summarily_RB take_VB measures_NNS for_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN such_JJ hut_NN or_CC shed_VBN and_CC of_IN the_DT materials_NNS of_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ constructed_VBN ;_: Payment_NNP of_IN compensation_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT President_NNP may_MD ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ discretion_NN ,_, give_VB compensation_NN at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Fund_NNP constituted_VBD under_IN Madras_NNP Act_NNP I_PRP of_IN 1884_CD for_IN any_DT loss_NN or_CC damage_NN caused_VBN by_IN reason_NN of_IN such_JJ destuction_NN ._.

Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
181_CD Establishment_NN and_CC maintenance_NN of_IN plague_JJ hos-_JJ pitals_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT Municipal_JJ Commissioners_NNP shall_MD provide_VB and_CC maintain_VB in_IN such_JJ localities_NNS ,_, whether_IN within_IN or_CC without_IN Municipal_JJ limits_NNS ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP may_MD be_VB proper_JJR for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, suitable_JJ and_CC sufficient_JJ accommodation_NN as_IN approved_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC by_IN a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, deputed_VBN by_IN the_DT Surgeon-_NNP General_NNP or_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN any_DT such_JJ officer_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Surgeon_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT isolation_NN and_CC treatment_NN of_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN or_CC suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT plague_NN and_CC for_IN their_PRP$ detention_NN until_IN they_PRP shall_MD be_VB certified_VBN to_TO be_VB free_JJ from_IN infection_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT places_NNS so_RB provided_VBD the_DT Municipal_JJ Commissioners_NNP shall_MD furnish_VB such_JJ hospital_NN establishments_NNS ,_, equipment_NN and_CC supplies_NNS as_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD require_VB and_CC shall_MD also_RB make_VB arrangements_NNS for_IN feeding_VBG persons_NNS detain-_JJ ed_JJ under_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT regulations_NNS now_RB prescribed_VBP ,_, on_IN payment_NN by_IN them_PRP of_IN the_DT cost_NN ;_: but_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN indigent_NN persons_NNS the_DT Commis-_JJ sioners_NNS shall_MD supply_VB them_PRP with_IN food_NN free_NNS of_IN charge_NN ;_: provided_VBN that_IN any_DT person_NN so_RB detained_JJ may_MD cater_VB for_IN himself_PRP subject_JJ to_TO such_JJ rules_NNS and_CC conditions_NNS as_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD prescribe_VB ._.
The_DT Municipal_JJ Commissioners_NNP shall_MD also_RB in_IN like_JJ manner_NN and_CC subject_JJ to_TO like_IN approval_NN provide_VBP accommodation_NN for_IN persons_NNS who_WP may_MD be_VB required_VBN to_TO vacate_VB any_DT building_NN or_CC ground_NN under_IN the_DT preceding_JJ regulations_NNS Nos_NNP ._.
4_CD and_CC 5_CD and_CC who_WP may_MD be_VB unable_JJ to_TO procure_VB necessary_JJ accommodation_NN for_IN themselves_PRP ._.

9_CD ._.
Any_DT building_NN or_CC place_NN ,_, whether_IN within_IN or_CC without_IN Municipal_JJ limits_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC of_IN a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN deputed_VBN by_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ or_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN any_DT such_JJ officer_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT Surgeon_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN suitable_JJ and_CC required_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN the_DT accommodation_NN to_TO be_VB provided_VBN under_IN regulation_NN 8_CD may_MD be_VB entered_VBN upon_IN and_CC occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipal_JJ Commissioners_NNP (_( if_IN un-_JJ tenanted_VBD without_IN any_DT notice_NN whatsoever_RB and_CC if_IN tenanted_VBN after_IN twenty-_JJ four_CD hours_NNS '_POS notice_NN in_IN writing_VBG conspicuously_RB posted_VBN on_IN such_JJ building_NN or_CC place_NN )_) and_CC used_VBN for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN the_DT accommodation_NN under_IN regula-_JJ tion_NN 8_CD as_IN aforesaid_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT owner_NN or_CC the_DT lessee_NN of_IN such_JJ building_NN or_CC place_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB entitled_VBN to_TO claim_VB from_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioners_NNP anything_NN beyond_IN a_DT reasonable_JJ rent_NN for_IN the_DT period_NN during_IN which_WDT the_DT building_NN or_CC place_NN may_MD remain_VB in_IN their_PRP$ occupation_NN :_: provided_VBN always_RB the_DT Municipal_JJ Commissioners_NNP shall_MD be_VB bound_VBN at_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ cost_NN to_TO cleanse_VB and_CC disinfect_VB the_DT said_VBD building_NN or_CC place_NN and_CC ,_, if_IN a_DT building_NN ,_, to_TO white-_JJ wash_NN it_PRP both_DT internally_RB and_CC externally_RB ,_, before_IN vacating_VBG it_PRP ._.
Conveyance_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS ._.
10_CD ._.

13_CD ._.

Preamble_JJ ._.
Whereas_NNP certain_JJ parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP are_VBP visited_VBN by_IN ,_, and_CC the_DT Presi-_NNP dency_NN of_IN Madras_NNP is_VBZ threatened_VBN with_IN ,_, an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN a_DT dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN known_VBN as_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, and_CC whereas_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN in_IN force_NN in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP are_VBP insufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN preventing_VBG the_DT outbreak_NN or_CC spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP the_DT Governor_NNP of_IN Fort_NNP St._NNP George_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, in_IN exer-_JJ cise_NN of_IN the_DT powers_NNS delegated_VBD to_TO him_PRP under_IN section_NN 2_CD ,_, sub-section_NN (_( 3_CD )_) of_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1897_CD ,_, by_IN the_DT Governor-General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP [_NNP Notification_NNP of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.

Destruction_NN of_IN huts_NNS and_CC sheds_NNS ._.
9_CD ._.
If_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN or_CC an_DT officer_NN generally_RB or_CC specially_RB authorised_VBN by_IN him_PRP in_IN writing_VBG in_IN this_DT behalf_NN is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN any_DT hut_NN or_CC shed_VBN is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP or_CC such_JJ officer_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN may_MD summarily_RB take_VB measures_NNS for_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN such_JJ hut_NN or_CC shed_VBN and_CC the_DT materials_NNS of_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ constructed_VBN ;_: and_CC the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Munici-_NNP pal_JJ Council_NNP or_CC the_DT President_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP Board_NNP ,_, as_IN the_DT case_NN may_MD be_VB ,_, may_MD in_IN his_PRP$ discretion_NN grant_NN compensation_NN for_IN any_DT loss_NN or_CC damage_NN caused_VBN by_IN reason_NN of_IN such_JJ destruction_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Fund_NNP constituted_VBD under_IN Madras_NNP Act_NNP IV_NNP of_IN 1884_CD or_CC the_DT Local_JJ Fund_NNP con-_NN stituted_VBN under_IN Madras_NNP Act_NNP V_NNP of_IN 1884_CD ,_, as_IN the_DT case_NN may_MD be_VB ._.
Plague_NN patients_NNS not_RB to_TO be_VB carried_VBN in_IN public_JJ con-_JJ veyances_NNS ._.
10_CD No_DT owner_NN ,_, driver_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT public_JJ conveyance_NN shall_MD carry_VB any_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT plague_NN ;_: nor_CC shall_MD any_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT disease_NN enter_VB a_DT public_JJ conveyance_NN ._.
Infected_VBN build-_JJ ings_NNS not_RB to_TO be_VB let_VBN without_IN previous_JJ disinfection_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
No_DT person_NN shall_MD let_VB a_DT building_NN or_CC part_NN of_IN a_DT building_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PRP knows_VBZ ,_, or_CC has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO know_VB ,_, that_IN a_DT person_NN has_VBZ been_VBN suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, without_IN having_VBG such_JJ building_NN or_CC part_NN thereof_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT article_NN therein_RB likely_JJ to_TO retain_VB infection_NN ,_, disinfected_VBN to_TO the_DT satisfaction_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Collector_NNP in_IN this_DT behalf_NN ._.
Entry_NN for_IN exe-_JJ cution_NN of_IN work_NN and_CC abatement_NN of_IN nuisances_NNS ._.
12_CD ._.

Rags_NNP and_CC used_VBD gunny-bags_NNS ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT Collector_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN may_MD ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ discretion_NN ,_, order_NN the_DT disinfection_NN or_CC destruction_NN of_IN any_DT collection_NN of_IN rags_NNS in_IN rag-pickers_NNS '_POS houses_NNS and_CC rag-stores_NNS or_CC of_IN second-hand_JJ gunny-bags_NNS imported_VBN from_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN India_NNP infected_VBN by_IN the_DT plague_NN and_CC no_DT person_NN shall_MD be_VB entitled_VBN to_TO claim_VB compensation_NN for_IN any_DT loss_NN or_CC damage_NN sustained_VBN by_IN reason_NN of_IN the_DT disinfection_NN or_CC destruction_NN of_IN such_JJ articles_NNS under_IN the_DT powers_NNS conferred_VBN by_IN this_DT regulation_NN ,_, Examination_NNP of_IN railway_NN traveller_NN and_CC segregation_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ._.
14_CD ._.
At_IN or_CC near_IN any_DT railway_NN station_NN appointed_VBN by_IN notification_NN in_IN the_DT Fort_NNP St._NNP George_NNP Gazette_NNP as_IN an_DT inspection_NN station_NN ,_, any_DT medical_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN in_IN this_DT behalf_NN may_MD detain_VB any_DT train_NN and_CC may_MD require_VB any_DT person_NN travelling_VBG therein_NN to_TO alight_VB and_CC submit_VB himself_PRP to_TO medical_JJ examination_NN as_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN may_MD direct_VB ,_, either_DT on_IN the_DT railway_NN premises_VBZ or_CC in_IN some_DT other_JJ suitable_JJ place_NN which_WDT the_DT Collector_NNP shall_MD ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, provide_VB at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP or_CC Local_NNP Fund_NNP ,_, as_IN the_DT case_NN may_MD be_VB ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT said_VBD person_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN ,_, or_CC suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN ,_, the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN may_MD deal_VB with_IN him_PRP under_IN the_DT preceding_VBG regulation_NN 3_CD ._.

garding_VBG travel-_JJ lers_NNS ._.

A_DT person_NN so_RB interrogated_JJ shall_MD be_VB bound_VBN to_TO answer_VB truly_RB to_TO the_DT best_JJS of_IN his_PRP$ knowledge_NN and_CC belief_NN all_DT such_JJ questions_NNS and_CC enquiries_NNS ._.
If_IN any_DT such_JJ person_NN is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO have_VB ,_, within_IN the_DT preceding_VBG ten_JJ days_NNS ,_, been_VBN within_IN a_DT part_NN of_IN India_NNP believed_VBN by_IN such_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN by_IN the_DT plague_NN and_CC is_VBZ unable_JJ to_TO satisfy_VB such_JJ officer_NN that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ proceeding_VBG to_TO any_DT fixed_JJ place_NN of_IN residence_NN ,_, such_JJ officer_NN may_MD remove-him_VB ,_, or_CC cause_VB him_PRP to_TO be_VB removed_VBN ,_, to_TO a_DT place_NN provided_VBN under_IN regulation_NN 2_CD and_CC may_MD there_RB cause_VB him_PRP to_TO be_VB detained_VBN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ,_, when_WRB ,_, if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ certified_VBN free_JJ from_IN the_DT infection_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO depart_VB therefrom_NN ._.

19_CD ._.

20_CD ._.
When_WRB any_DT through_IN carriage_NN from_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP is_VBZ detached_VBN from_IN a_DT train_NN at_IN any_DT railway_NN station_NN in_IN Madras_NNP Presidency_NNP ,_, it_PRP shall_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN or_CC ventilated_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ manner_NN as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ and_CC before_IN it_PRP is_VBZ again_RB brought_VBN into_IN use_NN :_: -_: Third_NNP and_CC intermediate_JJ class_NN carriages-_NN The_DT interior_JJ wood-work_NN of_IN the_DT carriages_NNS ,_, especially_RB the_DT floors_NNS and_CC seats_NNS ,_, shall_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB washed_VBN with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN (_( 1_CD in_IN 1,000_CD )_) or_CC with_IN a_DT carbolic_JJ acid_NN solution_NN (_( a_DT wine-_NN glassful_NN to_TO a_DT gallon_NN )_) ;_: the_DT doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS shall_MD be_VB opened_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT vehicle_NN exposed_VBD to_TO the_DT air_NN ._.
First_RB and_CC second_JJ class_NN carriages-_NN The_DT floors_NNS and_CC wood-work_NN shall_MD be_VB treated_VBN as_IN above_NN ,_, the_DT cushions_NNS being_VBG also_RB brushed_VBN and_CC thoroughly_RB cleaned_VBN ._.

21_CD ._.
*_IN The_DT clothing_NN ,_, bedding_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN all_DT persons_NNS detained_VBD or_CC segregated_VBN under_IN regulation_NN 3_CD or_CC removed_VBN under_IN regula-_JJ tion_NN 14_CD to_TO a_DT place_NN provided_VBN under_IN regulation_NN 2_CD shall_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN and_CC may_MD ,_, at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN detention_NN or_CC segregation_NN ,_, be_VB destroyed_VBN ._.

Instructions_NNS to_TO the_DT Corporation_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
35_CD ._.
Resolution_NN No_DT ._.
937-T.-M_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 10th_CD October_NNP 1896_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Government_NNP letter*_VBZ No_DT ._.
770-T.-M._CD of_IN the_DT 30th_JJ September_NNP ,_, a_DT copy_NN of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ annexed_VBN to_TO this_DT Resolution_NNP ,_, the_DT Corporation_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP were_VBD addressed_VBN on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT reported_VBN outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD suggested_VBN that_IN the_DT following_JJ measures_NNS should_MD be_VB taken_VBN under_IN sections_NNS 321_CD to_TO 334_CD of_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP Municipal_NNP Act_NNP :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) To_TO declare_VB bubonic_JJ plague_NN or_CC any_DT form_NN of_IN typhus_NN fever_NN with_IN glandular_JJ swellings_NNS to_TO be_VB a_DT dangerous_JJ disease_NN regarding_VBG any_DT case_NN of_IN which_WDT information_NN should_MD at_IN once_RB be_VB communicated_VBN to_TO the_DT Commissioners_NNPS or_CC their_PRP$ Health_NNP Officer_NNP under_IN section_NN 321_CD ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) To_TO select_VB a_DT site_NN for_IN a_DT temporary_JJ plague_NN hospital_NN away_RB from_IN the_DT main_JJ thoroughfares_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO arrange_VB for_IN its_PRP$ prompt_JJ erection_NN should_MD the_DT need_NN arise_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) To_TO provide_VB special_JJ carts_NNS for_IN the_DT conveyance_NN of_IN cases_NNS to_TO hospital_VB ,_, and_CC to_TO arrange_VB for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN both_DT carts_NNS and_CC drivers_NNS ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) To_TO divide_VB the_DT town_NN into_IN sanitary_JJ circles_NNS of_IN manageable_JJ size_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO place_VB in_IN charge_NN of_IN each_DT a_DT medical_JJ inspector_NN with_IN full_JJ powers_NNS to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_DT measures_NNS ordered_VBN by_IN the_DT Commissioners_NNPS or_CC Government_NNP for_IN preventing_VBG the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) To_TO draw_VB up_RP regulations_NNS under_IN section_NN 334_CD of_IN the_DT Act_NNP ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO give_VB effect_NN to_TO such_JJ special_JJ measures_NNS as_IN might_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB ,_, check_VB or_CC mitigate_VB an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT Corporation_NNP were_VBD further_RBR informed_VBN that_IN the_DT Government_NNP would_MD be_VB prepared_VBN to_TO appoint_VB a_DT Medical_NNP Board_NNP to_TO assist_VB the_DT Corporation_NNP in_IN devising_VBG measures_NNS to_TO deal_VB with_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.

2_CD ._.

191_CD to_TO the_DT cleansing_NN and_CC sanitation_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
A_DT copy_NN of_IN the_DT letter_NN was_VBD sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN Burdwan_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD directed_VBN to_TO instruct_VB the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN Howrah_NNP to_TO move_VB the_DT Municipality_NN to_TO take_VB the_DT necessary_JJ action_NN to_TO cleanse_VB and_CC sanitate_VB the_DT town_NN ._.
Suspicious_JJ case_NN at_IN Howrah_NNP ._.
3_CD ._.
A_DT case_NN of_IN mild_NN bubonic_JJ plague_NN is_VBZ now_RB reported_VBN to_TO have_VB occurred_VBN in_IN Howrah_NNP ,_, the_DT patient_NN being_VBG a_DT Eurasian_JJ lad_NN of_IN 17_CD ,_, who_WP arrived_VBD from_IN Bombay_NNP on_IN the_DT 26th_CD September_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ believed_VBN (_( though_IN this_DT is_VBZ not_RB certain_JJ )_) to_TO have_VB brought_VBN the_DT disease_NN with_IN him_PRP ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB hoped_VBN that_IN the_DT case_NN is_VBZ an_DT isolated_JJ one_CD ,_, and_CC that_IN no_DT general_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN will_MD take_VB place_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN even_RB a_DT single_JJ case_NN in_IN a_DT crowded_JJ area_NN where_WRB the_DT sanitary_JJ conditions_NNS are_VBP such_JJ as_IN to_TO favour_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN contagion_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB actually_RB to_TO generate_VB the_DT disease_NN ,_, convinces_VBZ the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ that_IN the_DT time_NN has_VBZ now_RB come_VBN to_TO adopt_VB further_JJ pre-_JJ ventive_JJ measures_NNS ._.

In_IN these_DT regulations-_JJ Definitions_NNS ._.
(_( a_DT )_) ``_`` Inspecting_VBG Officer_NNP ''_'' means_VBZ a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP to_TO inspect_VB travellers_NNS ,_, and_CC empowered_VBD to_TO inspect_VB and_CC order_NN the_DT segregation_NN of_IN persons_NNS suspected_VBN of_IN being_VBG infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) ``_`` Place_NN of_IN Inspection_NNP ''_'' means_VBZ the_DT railway_NN stations_NNS or_CC steamer_NN ghats_NNS at_IN which_WDT the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP has_VBZ ordered_VBN travellers_NNS to_TO be_VB inspected_VBN ,_, and_CC includes_VBZ the_DT area_NN round_NN such_JJ stations_NNS or_CC ghts_NNS ,_, subject_JJ to_TO the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT Railway_NNP Administration_NNP or_CC Steamer_NNP company_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT case_NN may_MD be_VB ._.
(_( c_NN )_) ``_`` Railway_NNP servant_NN ''_'' means_VBZ any_DT person_NN employed_VBN by_IN a_DT Railway_NNP Administration_NNP in_IN connection_NN with_IN service_NN of_IN a_DT railway_NN ._.

?_. 239_CD APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
if_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ undergone_VBN since_IN leaving_VBG Bombay_NNP a_DT quarantine_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ properly_RB proved_VBN ,_, for_IN not_RB less_JJR than_IN eight_CD days_NNS at_IN Colombo_NNP ,_, or_CC some_DT other_JJ British_JJ port_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD grant_VB such_JJ permission_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ not_RB undergone_JJ eight_CD days_NNS '_POS quarantine_NN at_IN Colombo_NNP or_CC some_DT other_JJ British_JJ port_NN since_IN leaving_VBG Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD direct_VB the_DT commander_NN to_TO take_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quarantine_JJ anchor-_JJ age_NN and_CC there_RB to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ._.
In_IN such_JJ case_NN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD also_RB direct_VB the_DT commander_NN to_TO prohibit_VB ,_, during_IN the_DT period_NN for_IN which_WDT the_DT vessel_NN remains_VBZ at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, all_DT communi-_JJ cation_NN ,_, except_VB such_JJ as_IN is_VBZ hereinafter_NN provided_VBN for_IN between_IN such_JJ vessel_NN and_CC the_DT shore_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ._.

Rules_NNS at_IN Madras_NNP against_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
THE_DT following_JJ rules_NNS for_IN quarantine_NN against_IN plague_NN ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Madras_NNP Government_NNP in_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT power_NN con-_NN ferred_VBN by_IN section_NN I_PRP ,_, Act_NNP I_PRP of_IN 1870_CD ,_, with_IN the_DT previous_JJ sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, are_VBP published_VBN for_IN general_JJ information_NN ._.
The_DT rules_NNS have_VBP effect_NN from_IN the_DT 28th_CD October_NNP 1896_CD as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN at_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Madras_NNS :_: -_: I.-The_JJ Commander_NNP of_IN every_DT vessel_NN arriving_VBG from_IN Bombay_NNP shall_MD ,_, before_IN entering_VBG the_DT port_NN ,_, indicate_VB his_PRP$ arrival_NN by_IN signal_NN ._.
II.-Such_JJ Commander_NNP shall_MD not_RB ,_, except_IN as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBN ,_, allow_VB any_DT communication_NN ,_, either_RB with_IN the_DT pilot_NN boat_NN ,_, except_IN orally_RB or_CC with_IN the_DT shore_NN ,_, or_CC with_IN any_DT other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN in_IN the_DT port_NN ._.
III.-Immediately_RB on_IN any_DT such_JJ arrival_NN being_VBG signalled_VBN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP (_( or_CC other_JJ Medical_NNP )_) Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN shall_MD go_VB alongside_IN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC ascertain_NN by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT Commander_NNP whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC has_VBZ during_IN the_DT voyage_NN suffered_VBD ,_, from_IN plague_NN ._.
If_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, pratique_NN may_MD be_VB granted_VBN at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Helth_NNP Officer_NNP whether_IN the_DT vessel_NN carries_VBZ a_DT qualified_JJ Medical_JJ Officer_NNP or_CC not_RB ._.
Pratique_NNP granted_VBD at_IN Colombo_NNP will_MD be_VB recognised_VBN ._.
IV.-If_NNP the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD have_VB reason_NN to_TO believe_VB at_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT vessel_NN arrives_VBZ in_IN the_DT port_NN that_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffer-_JJ ing_NN ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN ,_, from_IN plague_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO take_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quarantine_NN anchorage_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN the_DT port_NN ;_: and_CC shall_MD further_RB direct_VB that_IN ,_, during_IN such_JJ fifteen_JJ days_NNS '_POS intercourse_NN between_IN the_DT said_VBD vessel_NN and_CC the_DT shore_NN or_CC other_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN the_DT harbour_NN shall_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN ._.
240_CD Measures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
V.-If_NNP ;_: during_IN the_DT period_NN a_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN aforesaid_NN ,_, any_DT case_NN or_CC cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN should_MD occur_VB on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT said_VBD vessel_JJ shall_MD remain_VB in_IN quarantine_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN occurring_VBG ,_, and_CC be_VB subject_JJ to_TO all_PDT the_DT prohibitions_NNS provided_VBD for_IN in_IN rule_NN IV_NNP ._.
VI.-When_NNP any_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN in_IN quarantine_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD direct_VB the_DT removal_NN of_IN so_RB many_JJ of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN as_RB may_MD not_RB be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN illness_NN ,_, and_CC whose_WP$ services_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB required_VBN on_IN board_NN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, to_TO such_JJ particular_JJ spots_NNS as_IN may_MD from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN be_VB selected_VBN as_IN places_NNS of_IN quarantine_NN ,_, there_EX to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS ._.
If_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurs_NNS among_IN such_JJ passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN during_IN any_DT such_JJ period_NN ,_, they_PRP shall_MD remain_VB in_IN a_DT place_NN of_IN quarantine_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN of_IN such_JJ illness_NN ._.
VII.-Any_JJ mails_NNS or_CC cargo_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB brought_VBN by_IN any_DT vessel_NNS so_IN arriving_VBG shall_MD be_VB landed_VBN under_IN such_JJ precautions_NNS as_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD deem_VB necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
VIII.-It_NNP will_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO facilitate_VB the_DT convey-_JJ ance_NN to_TO all_DT vessels_NNS in_IN quarantine_NN of_IN such_JJ supplies_NNS of_IN provisions_NNS ,_, stores_NNS or_CC other_JJ articles_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB required_VBN by_IN those_DT on_IN board_NN ._.
Such_JJ supplies_NNS will_MD be_VB placed_VBN on_IN the_DT boats_NNS of_IN the_DT vessels_NNS in_IN quarantine_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB subse-_JJ quently_RB removed_VBN by_IN members_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ crews_NNS ._.

The_DT rules_NNS have_VBP effect_NN from_IN the_DT 6th_CD January_NNP 1897_CD as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN at_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Madras_NNS :_: -_: I.-The_JJ Commander_NNP of_IN every_DT vessel_NN arriving_VBG from_IN Karachi_NNP shall_MD ,_, before_IN entering_VBG the_DT port_NN ,_, indicate_VB his_PRP$ arrival_NN by_IN signal_NN ._.

IV_NNP ._.
GENERAL_NNP REGULATIONS_NNP FOR_NNP MUNICIPAL_NNP TOWNS_NNP OTHER_NNP THAN_NNP CALCUTTA_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
39_CD ._.
Plague_NNP Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.
5_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 10th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Preamble_JJ ._.
In_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT powers_NNS conferred_VBN by_IN sub-section_NN (_( 1_CD )_) of_IN section_NN 2_CD of_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1897_CD ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT Notification_NNP of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP in_IN the_DT Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
302_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 4th_CD instant_NN ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO prescribe_VB the_DT following_JJ regulations_NNS for_IN preventing_VBG the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN in_IN municipal_JJ towns_NNS in_IN Bengal_NNP other_JJ than_IN Calcutta_NNP :_: -_: When_WRB the_DT rules_NNS are_VBP to_TO be_VB enforced_VBN ._.
1_CD ._.
These_DT regulations_NNS shall_MD come_VB into_IN force_NN from_IN the_DT date_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT plague_NN may_MD be_VB declared_VBN by_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Board_NNP to_TO be_VB prevalent_JJ in_IN any_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP shall_MD remain_VB in_IN operation_NN until_IN the_DT Board_NNP declare_VBZ the_DT plague_NN to_TO have_VB ceased_VBN in_IN that_DT town_NN ._.
Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
In_IN these_DT rules_NNS ``_`` Health_NNP Officer_NNP ''_'' means_VBZ the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, and_CC includes_VBZ a_DT Civil_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC an_DT Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP in_IN medical_JJ charge_NN ._.
Report_NN by_IN householders_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
Every_DT male_NN householder_NN who_WP becomes_VBZ cognisant_NN of_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN or_CC of_IN fever_NN with_IN glandular_JJ swellings_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ house_NN shall_MD give_VB information_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP with_IN the_DT least_JJS practicable_JJ delay_NN ._.
Entering_VBG into_IN and_CC cleansing_VBG of_IN houses_NNS ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD at_IN any_DT time_NN ,_, between_IN sunrise_NN and_CC sunset_NN ,_, after_IN giving_VBG such_JJ notice_NN of_IN his_PRP$ intention_NN as_IN shall_MD ,_, under_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS ,_, appear_VBP to_TO him_PRP to_TO be_VB reasonable_JJ ,_, enter_JJ upon_IN any_DT premises_NNS and_CC summarily_RB cleanse_VB the_DT whole_NN or_CC any_DT portion_NN of_IN them_PRP in_IN such_JJ manner_NN as_IN may_MD appear_VB to_TO him_PRP necessary_JJ :_: provided_VBN that_IN when_WRB an_DT apartment_NN is_VBZ occupied_VBN by_IN a_DT female_NN who_WP ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB in_IN public_JJ ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD give_VB at_IN least_JJS one_CD hour_NN 's_POS notice_NN of_IN his_PRP$ intention_NN to_TO enter_VB such_JJ apartment_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD afford_VB her_PRP$ every_DT reasonable_JJ facility_NN for_IN withdrawing_VBG from_IN such_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT apartment_NN as_IN he_PRP may_MD desire_VB to_TO enter_VB ._.
Overcrowded_VBN and_CC insanitary_JJ dwellings_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
When_WRB a_DT dwelling_NN is_VBZ so_RB overcrowded_JJ or_CC in_IN such_JJ an_DT insanitary_JJ state_NN as_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, to_TO make_VB the_DT inmates_NNS thereof_VBP specially_RB liable_JJ to_TO an_DT attack_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP may_MD ,_, by_IN a_DT notice_NN posted_VBN on_IN some_DT conspicu-_JJ ous_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT dwelling_NN ,_, require_VBP the_DT owner_NN or_CC the_DT occupier_JJR ,_, if_IN actually_RB residing_VBG in_IN the_DT dwelling_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT tenants_NNS or_CC the_DT actual_JJ inmates_NNS thereof_RB ,_, to_TO abate_VB the_DT overcrowding_NN within_IN 24_CD hours_NNS by_IN reducing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN lodgers_NNS ,_, tenants_NNS or_CC other_JJ inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT said_VBD dwelling_NN as_IN prescribed_VBN in_IN the_DT notice_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO vacate_VB the_DT dwelling_NN ._.
In_IN default_NN of_IN compliance_NN with_IN the_DT requisition_NN in_IN the_DT said_VBD notice_NN ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP may_MD summarily_VB eject_VB all_PDT the_DT inmates_NNS ,_, or_CC reduce_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN inmates_NNS in_IN such_JJ manner_NN and_CC to_TO such_JJ extent_NN as_IN may_MD appear_VB necessary_JJ ._.
The_DT Magistrate_NNP shall_MD APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._. ]_NN
Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
201_CD provide_VBP the_DT inmates_NNS so_RB ejected_VBN ,_, when_WRB necessary_JJ ,_, with_IN temporary_JJ accommodation_NN ._.
Treatment_NN of_IN houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT plague_NN cases_NNS occur_VBP ._.
6_CD ._.
When_WRB a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurs_NNS in_IN any_DT premises_NNS ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP may_MD ,_, after_IN giving_VBG reasonable_JJ notice_NN ,_, summarily_RB cause_VB such_JJ premises_NNS to_TO be_VB vacated_VBN and_CC thoroughly_RB cleansed_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN ;_: and_CC may_MD cause_VB all_DT articles_NNS which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, can_MD not_RB be_VB properly_RB disinfected_VBN to_TO be_VB destroyed_VBN ._.
He_PRP may_MD also_RB ,_, in_IN consultation_NN with_IN the_DT District_NNP Engineer_NNP ,_, cause_NN to_TO be_VB removed_VBN all_DT partitions_NNS ,_, erections_NNS ,_, or_CC portions_NNS of_IN house_NN walls_NNS which_WDT impede_VBP or_CC obstruct_VBP ventilation_NN ._.
The_DT premises_NNS shall_MD not_RB be_VB re-occupied_JJ with_IN out_RP the_DT written_VBN permission_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
The_DT Magistrate_NNP shall_MD provide_VB the_DT inmates_NNS thereof_VBP ,_, when_WRB necessary_JJ ,_, with_IN temporary_JJ accommodation_NN ._.
Destruction_NN of_IN huts_NNS and_CC sheds_NNS ._.
7_CD ._.
If_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, the_DT destruction_NN of_IN any_DT hut_NN or_CC shed_VBN is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP may_MD ,_, after_IN giving_VBG reasonable_JJ notice_NN ,_, cause_NN such_JJ house_NN ,_, hut_NN or_CC shed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT materials_NNS of_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ constructed_VBN ,_, to_TO be_VB dismantled_VBN and_CC destroyed_VBN by_IN fire_NN or_CC otherwise_RB ._.
Rags_NNP ._.
8_CD ._.
No_DT person_NN ,_, except_IN municipal_JJ servants_NNS ,_, shall_MD pick_VB up_RP rags_NNS or_CC other_JJ refuse_NN in_IN the_DT streets_NNS or_CC elsewhere_RB ;_: nor_CC shall_MD rags_VB or_CC refuse_VB be_VB transported_VBN ,_, except_IN under_IN such_JJ conditions_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
Any_DT person_NN picking_VBG up_RP rags_NNS or_CC other_JJ refuse_NN in_IN the_DT streets_NNS or_CC elsewhere_RB shall_MD be_VB liable_JJ to_TO be_VB arrested_VBN by_IN the_DT police_NN ._.
The_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP may_MD disinfect_VB or_CC ,_, at_IN his_PRP$ discretion_NN ,_, destroy_VB any_DT collection_NN of_IN rags_NNS in_IN rag-pickers_NNS '_POS houses_NNS or_CC rag-stores_NNS ._.
Provision_NN of_IN hospital_JJ ac-_JJ commodation_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
It_PRP shall_MD be_VB lawful_JJ for_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP to_TO select_VB a_DT site_NN and_CC erect_VB a_DT hospital_NN thereon_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO convert_VB any_DT house_NN or_CC other_JJ building_NN into_IN a_DT hospital_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT isolation_NN of_IN patients_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, in_IN any_DT locality_NN which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, may_MD be_VB suitable_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
In_IN such_JJ hospital_NN separate_JJ and_CC suit-_JJ able_JJ accommodation_NN shall_MD be_VB provided_VBN for_IN females_NNS ,_, having_VBG regard_NN to_TO their_PRP$ rank_NN and_CC station_NN in_IN life_NN ._.
Provision_NN of_IN segregation_NN accommodation_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
It_PRP shall_MD be_VB lawful_JJ for_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP to_TO select_VB a_DT site_NN and_CC erect_JJ thereon_NN temporary_JJ accommodation_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO convert_VB any_DT building_NN ,_, not_RB being_VBG a_DT place_NN of_IN worship_NN ,_, into_IN accommodation_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT segregation_NN of_IN persons_NNS suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, or_CC for_IN the_DT residence_NN of_IN persons_NNS compelled_VBN to_TO vacate_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS under_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ._.
The_DT owner_NN or_CC lessee_NN of_IN such_JJ site_NN or_CC building_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB entitled_VBN to_TO claim_VB from_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP anything_NN beyond_IN a_DT reasonable_JJ rent_NN for_IN the_DT period_NN during_IN which_WDT the_DT site_NN or_CC building_NN may_MD remain_VB in_IN his_PRP$ occupa-_JJ tion_NN ._.
Before_IN vacating_VBG the_DT building_NN the_DT Magistrate_NNP shall_MD cause_VB it_PRP to_TO be_VB thoroughly_RB cleansed_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN both_DT internally_RB and_CC externally_RB ._.
Conveyance_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS ._.
11_CD ._.

Segregation_NN of_IN patients_NNS ._.
12_CD ._.
When_WRB in_IN any_DT dwelling_NN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT patient_JJ suffering_NN ,_, or_CC suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG ,_, from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD enter_VB that_IN dwelling_VBG at_IN any_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN or_CC night_NN ,_, after_IN giving_VBG such_JJ notice_NN of_IN his_PRP$ intention_NN as_IN shall_MD ,_, under_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS ,_, appear_VBP to_TO him_PRP to_TO be_VB reasonable_JJ ,_, and_CC may_MD take_VB measures_NNS for_IN segregating_VBG and_CC isolating_VBG the_DT patient_NN within_IN ,_, or_CC in_IN a_DT temporary_JJ structure_NN attached_VBD or_CC adjacent_JJ to_TO ,_, such_JJ dwelling_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ a_DT female_NN who_WP ,_, by_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB in_IN public_JJ ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, depute_VB a_DT female_JJ doctor_NN to_TO examine_VB her_PRP ._.
When_WRB patients_NNS ,_, of_IN whatever_WDT sex_NN or_CC age_NN ,_, can_MD not_RB be_VB properly_RB isolated_VBN at_IN or_CC in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ vicinity_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ houses_NNS ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP may_MD cause_VB them_PRP to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO hospital_NN ._.

1_CD ._.
In_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ``_`` Health_NNP Officer_NNP ''_'' means_VBZ the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC includes_VBZ a_DT Civil_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC an_DT Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP in_IN medical_JJ charge_NN ._.

2_CD ._.
If_IN ,_, on_IN examination_NN of_IN a_DT sick_JJ person_NN in_IN any_DT town_NN or_CC village_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP suspects_VBZ that_IN such_JJ person_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN or_CC infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD cause_VB such_JJ person_NN to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT temporary_JJ hospital_NN or_CC isolation_NN shed_VBN ,_, and_CC may_MD arrange_VB for_IN his_PRP$ detention_NN ,_, dieting_VBG and_CC medical_JJ treatment_NN therein_NN ._.

302_CD ,_, dated_VBD 4th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO prescribe_VB the_DT following_JJ Regulation_NN for_IN preventing_VBG the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, in_IN supersession_NN of_IN the_DT Regulations_NNPS prescribed_VBN by_IN Plague_NNP Notifications_NNP Nos_NNP ._.

6_CD and_CC 7_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 12th_CD March_NNP :_: -_: Part_VB I.-Appointment_NNP of_IN Plague_NNP Commission_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._.
The_DT following_JJ gentlemen_NNS are_VBP appointed_VBN to_TO form_VB a_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN advising_VBG the_DT Government_NNP ,_, the_DT district_NN and_CC railway_NN officials_NNS ,_, heads_NNS of_IN departments_NNS ,_, Municipalities_NNS and_CC Dis-_NNP trict_NN Boards_NNP ,_, as_IN to_TO the_DT measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN in_IN order_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT outbreak_NN and_CC check_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN within_IN the_DT terri-_JJ tories_NNS subject_VBP to_TO the_DT administration_NN of_IN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN discharging_VBG such_JJ further_JJ duties_NNS as_IN may_MD hereafter_VB be_VB assigned_VBN to_TO them_PRP :_: -_: The_DT Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP in_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Department_NNP President_NNP ._.

Cook-room_NN 0_CD 352_CD In_IN drawing_VBG conclusions_NNS from_IN the_DT above_JJ results_NNS it_PRP must_MD be_VB borne_VBN in_IN mind_NN that_IN the_DT action_NN of_IN acidulated_JJ sublimate_NN solution_NN only_RB reaches_VBZ its_PRP$ maximum_JJ after_IN two_CD hours_NNS ,_, as_IN shown_VBN by_IN earlier_JJR experiments_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT specimens_NNS in_IN the_DT above_JJ experiment_NN were_VBD taken_VBN only_RB fifteen_JJ minutes_NNS after_IN the_DT application_NN of_IN the_DT disinfectant_NN ._.
Recent_JJ work_NN has_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN sulphur_JJ fumigation_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB relied_VBN upon_IN to_TO destroy_VB microbes_NNS ._.
Experiments_NNS carried_VBD out_RP by_IN the_DT German_JJ Health_NNP Officer_NNP have_VBP shown_VBN that_IN though_IN gaseous_JJ disinfectants_NNS may_MD destroy_VB the_DT microbe_NN in_IN experiments_NNS on_IN a_DT small_JJ scale_NN ,_, they_PRP will_MD not_RB do_VB so_RB in_IN large_JJ rooms_NNS as_IN the_DT gases_NNS do_VBP not_RB show_VB sufficient_JJ penetra-_JJ tive_JJ power_NN ._.
I_PRP carried_VBD out_RP the_DT two_CD following_VBG experiments_NNS to_TO further_JJ test_NN the_DT matter_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ experiment_NN a_DT small_JJ godown_NN in_IN the_DT Collector_NNP 's_POS bunga-_JJ low_JJ in_IN Hardwar_NNP was_VBD treated_VBN ._.
The_DT room_NN was_VBD closed_VBN up_RP as_RB well_RB as_IN was_VBD practicable_JJ ._.
The_DT men_NNS employed_VBD to_TO fumigate_VB with_IN sulphur_NN in_IN Hardwar_NNP were_VBD called_VBN in_IN and_CC told_VBD to_TO treat_VB the_DT room_NN with_IN sulphur_NN as_IN was_VBD customary_JJ ._.
They_PRP first_RB brought_VBD in_IN an_DT ``_`` ungete_JJ ``_`` containing_VBG a_DT bright_JJ coal_NN fire_NN ._.
On_IN this_DT they_PRP put_VBD a_DT ``_`` degchie_NN ''_'' of_IN water_NN to_TO produce_VB steam_NN ._.
Then_RB another_DT ``_`` ungete_JJ ``_`` with_IN a_DT fire_NN was_VBD brought_VBN in_IN ._.
On_IN this_DT they_PRP threw_VBD a_DT handful_NN of_IN flour_NN of_IN sulphur_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT strength_NN of_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, was_VBD almost_RB immediately_RB consumed_VBN ._.
Then_RB one_CD of_IN them_PRP rushed_VBD into_IN the_DT room_NN and_CC threw_VBD a_DT small_JJ quantity_NN of_IN methy-_NN lated_VBN spirit_NN on_IN to_TO the_DT fire_NN containing_VBG the_DT sulphur_NN ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT presence_NN of_IN two_CD brisk_JJ fires_NNS in_IN the_DT room_NN ,_, the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT con-_NN tained_VBD oxygen_NN is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO have_VB been_VBN changed_VBN into_IN carbonic_JJ monoxide_NN and_CC dioxide_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN only_RB a_DT fraction_NN of_IN the_DT oxygen_NN would_MD have_VB had_VBD a_DT chance_NN of_IN combining_VBG with_IN sulphur_NN had_VBD enough_NN of_IN the_DT latter_JJ substance_NN been_VBN present_JJ ._.
Naturally_RB under_IN such_JJ conditions_NNS no_DT disinfection_NN took_VBD place_NN ._.
Specimens_NNS of_IN dirt_NN taken_VBN before_IN fumigation_NN produced_VBN from_IN 1,800_CD to_TO 3,200_CD colonies_NNS ._.
Specimens_NNS taken_VBN from_IN the_DT same_JJ positions_NNS after_IN fumigation_NN produced_VBD from_IN 2,400_CD to_TO 5,000_CD colonies_NNS ._.

9_CD ._.
Increased_VBN mortality_NN in_IN villages_NNS to_TO be_VB inquired_VBN into.-When-_JJ ever_RB the_DT deaths_NNS reported_VBN from_IN any_DT village_NN are_VBP more_RBR numerous_JJ than_IN usual_JJ ,_, and_CC especially_RB sudden_JJ deaths_NNS due_JJ to_TO fever_VB ,_, the_DT station_NN or_CC out-_JJ post_NN officer_NN shall_MD forthwith_VB make_VB enquiries_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO ascertain_VB whe-_JJ ther_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN existed_VBN ,_, and_CC will_MD ,_, when_WRB forward-_JJ ing_NN ``_`` The_DT weekly_JJ statement_NN of_IN deaths_NNS to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, ''_'' pre-_JJ scribed_VBN by_IN Bengal_NNP Police_NNP Circular_NNP No_NNP ._.

Duties_NNS of_IN Railway_NNP Police.-Assistant_JJ Inspectors-General_NNP of_IN the_DT Railway_NNP Police_NNP are_VBP required_VBN to_TO work_VB in_IN cordial_JJ co-operation_NN with_IN the_DT District_NNP Police_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ their_PRP$ duty_NN to_TO arrange_VB ,_, on_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN trains_NNS ,_, that_IN the_DT railway_NN police_NN prepare_NN lists_VBZ containing_VBG the_DT names_NNS and_CC residences_NNS of_IN travellers_NNS from_IN infected_JJ areas_NNS ;_: these_DT lists_NNS ,_, after_IN being_VBG checked_VBN from_IN the_DT tickets_NNS collected_VBN ,_, will_MD be_VB forwarded_VBN to_TO the_DT station_NN police_NN ._.
When_WRB there_EX is_VBZ reason_NN to_TO suspect_VB that_IN a_DT traveller_NN has_VBZ given_VBN either_CC a_DT wrong_JJ name_NN or_CC wrong_JJ residence_NN ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT chaukidars_NNS referred_VBD to_TO in_IN rule_NN 7_CD will_MD be_VB sent_VBN with_IN him_PRP to_TO verify_VB the_DT information_NN given_VBN ._.
A_DT small_JJ itinerant_JJ staff_NN will_MD be_VB sanctioned_VBN for_IN each_DT Assistant_NNP Inspector-General_JJ to_TO ensure_VB that_IN the_DT rules_NNS prescribed_VBN for_IN observance_NN at_IN railway_NN stations_NNS are_VBP being_VBG strictly_RB carried_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC that_IN travellers_NNS are_VBP not_RB evading_VBG examination_NN and_CC observation_NN by_IN alighting_VBG at_IN inter-_JJ mediate_NN stations_NNS and_CC taking_VBG fresh_JJ tickets_NNS ._.
14_CD ._.
Breaking_VBG railway_NN journey.-_NN In_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN a_DT traveller_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ area_NN alighting_VBG at_IN an_DT intermediate_JJ station_NN with_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN obtaining_VBG a_DT fresh_JJ ticket_NN ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO conceal_VB the_DT fact_NN that_IN he_PRP comes_VBZ from_IN an_DT infected_JJ area_NN ,_, the_DT railway_NN police_NN will_MD take_VB down_RP his_PRP$ name_NN and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN the_DT fresh_JJ ticket_NN issued_VBN ,_, and_CC will_MD send_VB inform-_JJ ation_NN down_IN the_DT line_NN so_RB that_IN he_PRP may_MD ,_, on_IN alighting_NN ,_, be_VB placed_VBN under_IN observation_NN ._.
15_CD ._.
Duties_NNS of_IN plague_JJ authorities.-Immediately_RB on_IN receiving_VBG information_NN under_IN the_DT preceding_NN rules_NNS ,_, or_CC whenever_RB he_PRP thinks_VBZ house_NN visitation_NN necessary_JJ ,_, the_DT plague_NN authority_NN shall_MD go_VB to_TO the_DT place_NN indi-_JJ cated_VBN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT place_NN be_VB a_DT house_NN or_CC dwelling-place_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT occupants_NNS thereof_WDT do_VBP not_RB (_( on_IN his_PRP$ demand_NN )_) allow_VBP him_PRP to_TO enter_VB and_CC give_VB him_PRP reasonable_JJ facilities_NNS for_IN ascertaining_VBG whether_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS are_VBP suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, such_JJ authority_NN is-_NN empowered_VBD to_TO enter_VB into_IN such_JJ house_NN or_CC any_DT part_NN thereof_NN by_IN force_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO detain_VB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN medical_JJ examination_NN ,_, any_DT person_NN found_VBD therein_RB to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG or_CC suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN his_PRP$ opinion_NN likely_RB to_TO have_VB been_VBN infected_VBN ,_, e.g._FW ,_, owing_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ having_VBG lived_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ house_NN with_IN a_DT plague_NN patient_NN ._.
Such_JJ plague_JJ autho-_JJ rity_NN ,_, if_IN he_PRP be_VB not_RB himself_PRP a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, shall_MD without_IN delay_NN send_NN word_NN to_TO the_DT nearest_JJS medical_JJ officer_NN in_IN the_DT service_NN of_IN Government_NNP or_CC b_VB 27_CD 210_CD Regulations_NNPS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.

IV_NNP ._.
of_IN any_DT local_JJ authority_NN ,_, and_CC such_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, whether_IN appointed_VBN a_DT plague_NN authority_NN for_IN the_DT locality_NN or_CC not_RB ,_, shall_MD be_VB bound_VBN to_TO come_VB to_TO the_DT place_NN indicated_VBD and_CC examine_JJ and_CC report_NN on_IN the_DT case_NN ._.

17_CD ._.
Every_DT medical_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN under_IN these_DT rules_NNS as_IN a_DT plague_NN authority_NN is_VBZ empowered_VBN to_TO examine_VB all_DT persons_NNS whom_WP he_PRP discovers_VBZ ,_, or_CC about_IN whom_WP he_PRP receives_VBZ information_NN under_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT preceding_NN rules_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO detain_VB and_CC segregate_VB persons_NNS suffering_VBG or_CC suspected_VBN by_IN him_PRP to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, in_IN such_JJ places_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP or_CC officer_NN specially_RB deputed_VBN by_IN him_PRP in_IN this_DT behalf_NN for_IN the_DT accommodation_NN of_IN such_JJ per-_JJ sons_NNS respectively_RB ._.
