18_CD ._.
If_IN a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN under_IN these_DT rules_NNS as_IN a_DT plague_NN authority_NN has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN any_DT building_NN used_VBN or_CC intended_VBN to_TO be_VB used_VBN as_IN a_DT dwelling_NN is_VBZ or_CC has_VBZ been_VBN occupied_VBN by_IN a_DT sufferer_NN from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, or_CC if_IN it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO him_PRP that_IN any_DT such_JJ building_NN is_VBZ in_IN such_JJ an_DT insanitary_JJ condition_NN as_IN to_TO be_VB unfit_JJ for_IN human_JJ habitation_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD prohibit_VB by_IN a_DT written_VBN order_NN the_DT further_JJR use_NN of_IN such_JJ building_NN as_IN a_DT dwelling-house_NN ._.
When_WRB any_DT such_JJ prohibition_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN ,_, no_DT owner_NN or_CC occupier_JJR of_IN such_JJ building_VBG shall_MD use_VB or_CC suffer_VB the_DT same_JJ to_TO be_VB used_VBN for_IN human_JJ habitation_NN until_IN the_DT said_VBD officer_NN gives_VBZ him_PRP written_VBN permission_NN in_IN this_DT behalf_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN enforcing_VBG this_DT rule_NN the_DT said_VBD officer_NN may_MD ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, forcibly_RB remove_VB or_CC cause_VB to_TO be_VB removed_VBN any_DT person_NN from_IN such_JJ building_NN ._.
19_CD If_IN a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN under_IN these_DT rules_NNS as_IN a_DT plague_NN authority_NN consider_VBP it_PRP necessary_JJ that_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN in_IN which_WDT bubonic_JJ plague_NN is_VBZ prevalent_JJ should_MD be_VB located_VBN in_IN a_DT temporary_JJ settlement_NN at_IN a_DT distance_NN from_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT manner_NN indicated_VBD in_IN rule_NN 50_CD ,_, he_PRP shall_MD make_VB a_DT report_NN to_TO that_DT effect_NN to_TO the_DT Magis-_NNP trate_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT latter_NN may_MD direct_VB the_DT inhabitants_NNS to_TO vacate_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS accordingly_RB ._.
The_DT houses_NNS shall_MD in_IN this_DT case_NN not_RB APP_NNP ._.

Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
211_CD be_VB again_RB occupied_VBN till_IN they_PRP are_VBP certified_VBN by_IN a_DT Medical_JJ officer_NN to_TO have_VB been_VBN thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN ._.
20_CD ._.
Should_MD plague_VB appear_VB in_IN a_DT village_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS of_IN surround_NN ._.

21_CD ._.
Duties_NNS of_IN the_DT Public.-Every_NNP person_NN to_TO whom_WP an_DT order_NN is_VBZ given_VBN by_IN any_DT plague_JJ authority_NN with_IN regard_NN to_TO his_PRP$ segregation_NN ,_, the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN his_PRP$ house_NN or_CC personal_JJ property_NN ,_, or_CC with_IN regard_NN to_TO any_DT other_JJ matter_NN falling_VBG under_IN these_DT rules_NNS ,_, shall_MD duly_VB obey_RP that_DT order_NN ._.
Part_NN III.-Rules_NNP relating_NN to_TO Municipal_NNP Towns_NNP and_CC Can-_NNP tonments_NNS ._.
22_CD ._.
The_DT following_JJ rules_NNS apply_VBP to_TO every_DT Municipality_NN and_CC to_TO every_DT Cantonment_NN ._.
Rules_NNS 23_CD to_TO 42_CD and_CC 55_CD to_TO 57_CD inclusive_JJ shall_MD come_VB into_IN force_NN at_IN once_RB ._.
They_PRP shall_MD forthwith_RB be_VB translated_VBN into_IN the_DT vernacular_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP and_CC deposited_VBN in_IN the_DT office_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP ,_, the_DT Cantonment_NNP authority_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Municipal_NNP Commis-_NNP sioners_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT copy_NN shall_MD be_VB posted_VBN up_RP in_IN a_DT conspicuous_JJ position_NN at_IN such_JJ office_NN and_CC in_IN such_JJ other_JJ public_JJ places_NNS as_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, the_DT Cantonment_NNP authority_NN or_CC ,_, in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, may_MD direct_VB ._.
And_CC a_DT public_JJ proclamation_NN shall_MD be_VB made_VBN throughout_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP or_CC Cantonment_NNP by_IN beat_NN of_IN drum_NN ,_, notifying_VBG that_IN such_JJ copy_NN has_VBZ been_VBN so_RB posted_VBN up_RP ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT original_JJ is_VBZ open_JJ to_TO inspection_NN in_IN the_DT office_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioners_NNPS or_CC Cantonment_NNP authority_NN ._.
The_DT remaining_VBG rules_NNS shall_MD come_VB into_IN force_NN in_IN any_DT Municipality_NNP or_CC Cantonment_NNP as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN or_CC the_DT Cantonment_NNP authority_NN or_CC ,_, in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN in_IN that_DT Municipality_NNP or_CC Cantonment_NNP ,_, or_CC in_IN a_DT place_NN near_IN enough_JJ to_TO cause_VB risk_NN of_IN the_DT infection_NN spreading_NN ._.
In_IN every_DT such_JJ case_NN the_DT rules_NNS shall_MD be_VB published_VBN in_IN the_DT manner_NN prescribed_VBN above_IN ._.
23_CD ._.
Health_NNP Officer_NNP defined.-The_NN words_NNS ``_`` Health_NNP Officer_NNP ``_`` in_IN the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS mean_VBP the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC in-_JJ clude_NN a_DT Civil_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, a_DT Military_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT cantonment_NN ,_, an_DT Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP in_IN medical_JJ charge_NN of_IN a_DT district_NN or_CC subdivision_NN or_CC a_DT municipal_JJ dispensary_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP under_IN rule_NN 24_CD ._.
In_IN Calcutta_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP means_VBZ the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC includes_VBZ an_DT Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
24_CD ._.
Appointment_NNP of_IN Health_NNP Officers.-In_NNP every_DT Municipality_NNP or_CC Cantonment_NNP where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ danger_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP ,_, ?_. Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.

IV_NNP ._.
112_CD subject_JJ to_TO the_DT general_JJ instructions_NNS of_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP ,_, may_MD appoint_VB a_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, either_RB by_IN name_NN or_CC by_IN virtue_NN of_IN office_NN ,_, to_TO devise_VB an_DT carry_NN out_RP ,_, under_IN the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP 's_POS general_JJ directions_NNS ,_, all_DT mea-_JJ sures_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN and_CC may_MD fix_VB his_PRP$ pay_NN ._.
He_PRP may_MD also_RB appoint_VB such_JJ subordinate_JJ staff_NN ,_, to_TO assist_VB the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN carrying_VBG out_RP his_PRP$ duties_NNS ,_, as_IN he_PRP may_MD consider_VB necessary_JJ ,_, and_CC may_MD fix_VB their_PRP$ pay_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN this_DT rule_NN ,_, the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP may_MD group_NN Municipalities_NNPS and_CC Cantonments_NNPS and_CC may_MD ap-_VB point_NN a_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC staff_NN for_IN the_DT combined_JJ area_NN ._.

25_CD ._.
Duties_NNS of_IN Town_NNP Police_NNP at_IN railway_NN stations.-When_NN a_DT rail-_JJ way_NN station_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN within_IN or_CC close_VB to_TO municipal_JJ boundaries_NNS ,_, the_DT railway_NN police_NN ,_, in_IN co-operation_NN with_IN the_DT town_NN police_NN ,_, will_MD arrange_VB to_TO meet_VB trains_NNS on_IN arrival_NN and_CC to_TO prepare_VB lists_NNS containing_VBG the_DT names_NNS and_CC residences_NNS of_IN travellers_NNS from_IN infected_VBN areas_NNS who_WP may_MD alight_VB ._.
These_DT lists_NNS ,_, after_IN being_VBG checked_VBN against_IN the_DT tickets_NNS collected_VBN ,_, will_MD then_RB be_VB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT town_NN police-stations_NNS ._.
When_WRB a_DT traveller_NN is_VBZ suspected_VBN of_IN giving_VBG a_DT wrong_JJ name_NN or_CC wrong_JJ residence_NN ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT town_NN policemen_JJ present_NN will_MD be_VB sent_VBN with_IN him_PRP to_TO verify_VB the_DT information_NN given_VBN ._.
26_CD ._.
Town_NNP Police_NNP to_TO report_VB arrivals_NNS from_IN infected_VBN parts_NNS and_CC to_TO keep_VB them_PRP under_IN observation.-The_JJ town_NN police_NNS are_VBP required_VBN to_TO report_VB at_IN once_RB to_TO the_DT police-station_NN the_DT name_NN of_IN every_DT person_NN arriving_VBG from_IN parts_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN infected_VBD with_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN who_WP take_VBP up_RP their_PRP$ temporary_JJ or_CC permanent_JJ residence_NN within_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ beats_NNS ._.
The_DT names_NNS so_RB obtained_VBN ,_, together_RB with_IN those_DT referred_VBN to_TO in_IN the_DT preceding_NN rule_NN ,_, with_IN dates_NNS of_IN entry_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB entered_VBN in_IN the_DT Special_JJ List_NN to_TO be_VB kept_VBN at_IN town_NN police-stations_NNS ._.
A_DT copy_NN of_IN this_DT Special_JJ List_NN will_MD be_VB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT District_NNP or_CC Cantonment_NNP Magistrate_NNP and_CC to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, all_DT new_JJ names_NNS being_VBG notified_VBN to_TO them_PRP without_IN delay_NN ._.

27_CD ._.

Each_DT Committee_NNP should_MD usually_RB consist_VB of_IN four_CD members_NNS ,_, two_CD Hindus_NNP and_CC two_CD Muhammadans_NNS ,_, for_IN each_DT ward_NN of_IN a_DT municipality_NN or_CC definite_JJ portion_NN of_IN a_DT cantonment_NN ;_: and_CC their_PRP$ most_RBS important_JJ duties_NNS will_MD be_VB to_TO accompany_VB the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP on_IN his_PRP$ rounds_NNS of_IN inspection_NN ,_, to_TO explain_VB the_DT necessity_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ measures_NNS adopted_VBN ,_, to_TO assist_VB in_IN causing_VBG these_DT to_TO be_VB carried_VBN out_IN ,_, and_CC to_TO bring_VB to_TO notice_VB any_DT com-_JJ plaints_NNS that_WDT may_MD be_VB made_VBN or_CC abuses_NNS that_IN they_PRP may_MD discover_VB ._.

of_IN the_DT population_NN consists_VBZ of_IN persons_NNS other_JJ than_IN Hindus_NNP or_CC Muham-_NNP madans_NNS ,_, the_DT Committees_NNP shall_MD ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, comprise_JJ representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT races_NNS and_CC religions_NNS affected_VBN by_IN the_DT rules_NNS in_IN each_DT ward_NN ._.
33_CD ._.
General_NNP sanitary_JJ precautions.-In_NN any_DT municipality_NN or_CC can-_JJ tonment_NN the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN or_CC any_DT Magistrate_NNP authorized_VBN by_IN him_PRP in_IN this_DT behalf_NN or_CC the_DT Cantonment_NNP authority_NN may_MD issue_VB general_JJ orders_NNS that_WDT by_IN a_DT certain_JJ specified_JJ date_NN certain_JJ sanitary_JJ precautions_NNS of_IN a_DT simple_JJ nature_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT lime-washing_NN of_IN houses_NNS ,_, the_DT cleaning_NN of_IN latrines_NNS ,_, the_DT removal_NN of_IN filth_NN and_CC rubbish_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN partitions_NNS which_WDT ob-_JJ struct_NN light_NN and_CC ventilation_NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_IN within_IN any_DT specfied_JJ area_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT persons_NNS residing_VBG within_IN such_JJ area_NN shall_MD be_VB bound_VBN to_TO give_VB effect_NN to_TO these_DT orders_NNS ._.
In_IN Calcutta_NNP these_DT powers_NNS shall_MD be_VB exercised_VBN by_IN the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ._.
If_IN within_IN such_JJ time_NN such_JJ persons_NNS fail_VBP to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_DT operations_NNS specified_VBN in_IN the_DT notice_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD ,_, with_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN or_CC of_IN the_DT Can-_NNP tonment_NN authority_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, enter_NN upon_IN the_DT premises_NNS at_IN any_DT time_NN between_IN sunrise_NN and_CC sunset_NN ,_, after_IN giving_VBG such_JJ notice_NN of_IN his_PRP$ intention_NN as_IN shall_MD under_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS appear_VBP to_TO him_PRP to_TO be_VB reasonable_JJ ,_, and_CC carry_VBP out_RP the_DT measures_NNS speci-_JJ fied_VBN above_IN :_: Provided_VBD that_IN when_WRB an_DT apartment_NN is_VBZ occupied_VBN by_IN a_DT female_NN who_WP ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB in_IN public_JJ the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD give_VB at_IN least_JJS one_CD hour_NN 's_POS notice_NN of_IN his_PRP$ intention_NN to_TO enter_VB such_JJ apartment_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD afford_VB her_PRP$ every_DT reasonable_JJ facility_NN for_IN withdrawing_VBG from_IN such_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT apartment_NN as_IN he_PRP may_MD desire_VB to_TO enter_VB ._.

Insanitary_JJ premises.-When_NN any_DT premises_NNS are_VBP in_IN such_JJ an_DT insanitary_JJ state_NN as_IN in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO make_VB the_DT inmates_NNS thereof_VBP especially_RB liable_JJ to_TO an_DT attack_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD require_VB the_DT owner_NN by_IN notice_NN to_TO have_VB the_DT whole_JJ or_CC any_DT portion_NN of_IN such_JJ premises_NNS cleansed_VBD within_IN a_DT specified_JJ time_NN in_IN such_JJ manner_NN as_IN may_MD appear_VB to_TO him_PRP necessary_JJ ,_, and_CC may_MD in_IN consultation_NN ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, with_IN a_DT competent_NN engineer_NN ,_, direct_VBP the_DT owner_NN to_TO remove_VB all_DT structures_NNS ,_, partitions_NNS ,_, erections_NNS or_CC portions_NNS of_IN house-walls_NNS which_WDT obstruct_VBP light_NN and_CC ventilation_NN ._.

25_CD Overcrowded_VBD dwellings.-When_NN a_DT dwelling_NN is_VBZ so_RB over-_JJ crowded_VBN as_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Heath_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, to_TO make_VB the_DT inmates_NNS thereof_VBP especially_RB liable_JJ to_TO an_DT attack_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN or_CC the_DT cantonment_JJ authority_NN or_CC ,_, in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, may_MD ,_, by_IN a_DT notice_NN posted_VBN on_IN some_DT conspicuous_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT dwelling_NN ,_, require_VBP the_DT owner_NN or_CC the_DT occupier_JJR ,_, if_IN actually_RB residing_VBG in_IN the_DT dwelling_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT tenants_NNS or_CC the_DT actual_JJ inmates_NNS thereof_RB ,_, to_TO abate_VB the_DT overcrowding_NN within_IN 24_CD hours_NNS by_IN reducing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN lodgers_NNS ,_, tenants_NNS or_CC other_JJ inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT said_VBD dwelling_NN as_IN prescribed_VBN in_IN the_DT notice_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO vacate_VB the_DT dwelling_NN ._.
In_IN default_NN of_IN compliance_NN with_IN the_DT requisition_NN in_IN the_DT said_VBD notice_NN ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP or_CC Cantonment_NNP authority_NN or_CC ,_, in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, may_MD summarily_VB eject_VB all_PDT the_DT inmates_NNS ,_, or_CC reduce_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN inmates_NNS in_IN such_JJ manner_NN and_CC to_TO such_JJ extent_NN as_IN may_MD appear_VB necessary_JJ ._.
The_DT Magistrate_NNP or_CC Cantonment_NNP authority_NN or_CC ,_, in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, shall_MD provide_VB the_DT inmates_NNS so_RB ejected_VBN ,_, when_WRB necessary_JJ ,_, with_IN temporary_JJ accommodation_NN ._.
36_CD ._.
Prohibition_NN of_IN rag-picking.-No_JJ person_NN ,_, except_IN municipal_JJ or_CC cantonment_JJ servants_NNS ,_, shall_MD pick_VB up_RP rags_NNS or_CC other_JJ refuse_NN in_IN the_DT streets_NNS or_CC elsewhere_RB ;_: nor_CC shall_MD rags_VB or_CC refuse_VB be_VB transported_VBN ,_, except_IN under_IN such_JJ conditions_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
Any_DT person_NN picking_VBG up_RP rags_NNS or_CC other_JJ refuse_NN in_IN the_DT streets_NNS or_CC elsewhere_RB shall_MD be_VB liable_JJ to_TO be_VB arrested_VBN by_IN the_DT police_NN ._.
The_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT Cantonment_NNP authority_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN Calcutta_NNP the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corpora-_NNP tion_NN ,_, may_MD disinfect_VB or_CC at_IN his_PRP$ discretion_NN destroy_VBZ any_DT collection_NN of_IN rags_NNS in_IN rag-pickers_NNS '_POS houses_NNS or_CC rag_NN stores_NNS ._.
37_CD ._.
Provision_NN of_IN hospitals.-It_JJ shall_MD be_VB lawful_JJ for_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT Cantonment_NNP authority_NN or_CC ,_, in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT Chair-_NNP man_NN of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ._.
to_TO select_VB a_DT site_NN and_CC erect_VB a_DT hospital_NN thereon_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO convert_VB any_DT building_NN ,_, not_RB being_VBG a_DT place_NN of_IN worship_NN ,_, into_IN a_DT hospital_NN for_IN the_DT isolation_NN of_IN patients_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, in_IN any_DT locality_NN 216_CD Regulations_NNPS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.

IV_NNP ._.
which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD be_VB suitable_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
In_IN such_JJ hospital_NN separate_JJ and_CC suitable_JJ accommodation_NN shall_MD be_VB provided_VBN for_IN females_NNS ,_, having_VBG regard_NN to_TO their_PRP$ rank_NN and_CC station_NN in_IN life_NN ._.
The_DT owner_NN or_CC lessee_NN of_IN such_JJ site_NN or_CC building_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB entitled_VBN to_TO claim_VB from_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP ,_, Cantonment_NNP authority_NN or_CC Chairman_NNP any-_JJ thing_NN beyond_IN a_DT reasonable_JJ rent_NN or_CC the_DT period_NN during_IN which_WDT the_DT site_NN or_CC building_NN may_MD remain_VB in_IN his_PRP$ occupation_NN ._.
Before_IN vacating_VBG the_DT building_NN the_DT Magistrate_NNP ,_, Cantonment_NNP authority_NN or_CC Chairman_NNP shall_MD cause_VB it_PRP to_TO be_VB thoroughly_RB cleansed_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN both_DT externally_RB and_CC internally_RB ._.
38_CD ._.
Provision_NN of_IN accommodation.-It_JJ shall_MD be_VB lawful_JJ for_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN or_CC the_DT Cantonment_NNP authority_NN or_CC ,_, in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, to_TO select_VB a_DT site_NN and_CC erect_JJ thereon_NN temporary_JJ accommodation_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO convert_VB any_DT building_NN ,_, not_RB being_VBG a_DT place_NN of_IN worship_NN ,_, into_IN accommodation_NN for_IN the_DT segregation_NN of_IN persons_NNS suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, or_CC for_IN the_DT residence_NN of_IN persons_NNS compelled_VBN to_TO vacate_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS under_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ._.
The_DT owner_NN or_CC lessee_NN of_IN such_JJ site_NN or_CC building_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB entitled_VBN to_TO claim_VB from_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP ,_, Cantonment_NNP authority_NN or_CC Chairman_NNP anything_NN beyond_IN a_DT reasonable_JJ rent_NN for_IN the_DT period_NN during_IN which_WDT the_DT site_NN or_CC building_NN may_MD remain_VB in_IN his_PRP$ occupation_NN ._.

Reports_NNS from_IN factories.-Every_JJ occupier_NN of_IN a_DT factory_NN shall_MD on_IN employing_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ factory_NN any_DT person_NN who_WP has_VBZ come_VBN from_IN any_DT area_NN declared_VBN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN immediately_RB report_NN in_IN writing_VBG to_TO the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN the_DT fact_NN of_IN such_JJ employment_NN and_CC the_DT name_NN and_CC address_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN employed_VBN ._.

The_DT word_NN ``_`` factory_NN ''_'' used_VBN in_IN this_DT rule_NN means_VBZ any_DT premises_NNS wherein_VBP is_VBZ carried_VBN on_IN any_DT process_NN ,_, or_CC incidental_JJ to_TO ,_, making_VBG ,_, altering_VBG ,_, repairing_VBG ,_, ornamenting_VBG ,_, finishing_VBG or_CC otherwise_RB adapting_VBG for_IN use_NN or_CC sale_NN any_DT article_NN or_CC part_NN of_IN an_DT article_NN ,_, and_CC wherein_JJ steam_NN ,_, water_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ mechanical_JJ power_NN is_VBZ used_VBN in_IN aid_NN of_IN any_DT such_JJ process_NN ._.

Disinfection_NN ,_, cleansing_VBG ,_, etc._FW ,_, by_IN house-holder.-The_JJ owner_NN and_CC occupier_JJR of_IN any_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT head_NN of_IN any_DT family_NN resident_NN therein_NN ,_, shall_MD comply_VB with_IN any_DT direction_NN that_WDT may_MD be_VB issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT disinfection_NN and_CC cleansing_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, the_DT disinfection_NN or_CC destruction_NN of_IN bedding_NN ,_, clothing_NN and_CC articles_NNS of_IN a_DT similar_JJ nature_NN ,_, the_DT improvement_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT premises_NNS ,_, the_DT removal_NN ,_, in_IN consultation_NN with_IN a_DT competent_NN engineer_NN ,_, of_IN all_DT partitions_NNS ,_, erections_NNS or_CC portions_NNS of_IN house_NN walls_NNS which_WDT obstruct_VBP light_JJ and_CC ventila-_JJ tion_NN ,_, and_CC other_JJ sanitary_JJ matters_NNS ;_: and_CC shall_MD permit_VB the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP (_( who_WP shall_MD endeavour_VB to_TO procure_VB the_DT attendance_NN of_IN a_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP appointed_VBN under_IN Rule_NNP 32_CD )_) to_TO enter_VB his_PRP$ house_NN or_CC premises_NNS ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN inspection_NN ._.

Segregation.-_NNP (_( 1_CD )_) If_IN on_IN examination_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN under_IN the_DT last_JJ preceding_NN rule_VBD the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP suspects_VBZ that_IN such_JJ person_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN or_CC infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD cause_VB such_JJ person_NN to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD arrange_VB for_IN his_PRP$ detention_NN ,_, dieting_VBG and_CC medical_JJ treatment_NN therein_NN ._.
He_PRP may_MD also_RB cause_VB the_DT other_JJ occupants_NNS of_IN the_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT such_JJ person_NN resides_NNS to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT segregation_NN camp_NN and_CC to_TO be_VB detained_VBN under_IN observation_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) When_WRB private_JJ plague_NN hospital_NN or_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS have_VBP been_VBN provided_VBN and_CC fully_RB equipped_VBN by_IN or_CC for_IN particular_JJ castes_NNS ,_, classes_NNS ,_, joint_JJ families_NNS or_CC associations_NNS of_IN families_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, or_CC ,_, in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, not_RB less_JJR than_IN two_CD members_NNS of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP empowered_VBD thereto_NN by_IN the_DT President_NNP ,_, have_VBP in_IN writing_VBG approved_VBN of_IN the_DT site_NN ,_, plan_NN ,_, furniture_NN and_CC arrangements_NNS for_IN isolation_NN and_CC medical_JJ administration_NN of_IN such_JJ hospitals_NNS and_CC camps_NNS ,_, sick_JJ or_CC suspected_JJ persons_NNS may_MD ,_, if_IN they_PRP so_VBP desire_JJ and_CC if_IN accommodation_NN is_VBZ available_JJ ,_, be_VB removed_VBN to_TO the_DT private_JJ hospital_NN or_CC segregation_NN camp_NN constructed_VBN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT caste_NN ,_, class_NN or_CC family_NN to_TO which_WDT they_PRP belong_VBP ,_, instead_RB of_IN to_TO a_DT public_JJ hospital_NN or_CC camp_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) In_IN both_DT public_JJ and_CC private_JJ camps_NNS and_CC hospitals_NNS separate_JJ and_CC suitable_JJ accommodation_NN shall_MD be_VB provided_VBN for_IN females_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT female_NN who_WP by_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB in_IN public_JJ ,_, her_PRP$ parda_JJ shall_MD be_VB strictly_RB preserved_VBN ,_, both_DT in_IN removal_NN to_TO the_DT camp_NN or_CC hospital_NN and_CC during_IN her_PRP$ stay_NN there_RB ._.

Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
219_CD (_( 4_CD )_) The_DT relatives_NNS ,_, friends_NNS ,_, hakims_NNS ,_, baids_NNS and_CC priests_NNS of_IN sick_JJ persons_NNS shall_MD be_VB allowed_VBN free_JJ access_NN to_TO them_PRP during_IN the_DT day-time_JJ ,_, subject_JJ only_RB to_TO such_JJ precautions_NNS as_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD consider_VB necessary_JJ ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) Members_NNS of_IN the_DT family_NN of_IN a_DT sick_JJ person_NN who_WP are_VBP in_IN attendance_NN on_IN him_PRP may_MD also_RB be_VB admitted_VBN to_TO a_DT hospital_NN ,_, whether_IN public_JJ or_CC private_JJ ,_, provided_VBD that_IN they_PRP shall_MD sleep_VB in_IN the_DT compound_NN in_IN suitable_JJ accommoda-_JJ tion_NN provided_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB in_IN the_DT hospital_NN itself_PRP ._.
Explanation_NNP 1.-It_CD is_VBZ not_RB necessary_JJ that_IN hospitals_NNS provided_VBN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN this_DT rule_NN should_MD be_VB constructed_VBN in_IN remote_NN or_CC incon-_JJ venient_JJ situations_NNS ._.
Explanation_NNP 2.-Persons_NNS desirous_JJ of_IN taking_VBG advantage_NN of_IN clause_NN (_( 2_CD )_) should_MD at_IN once_RB communicate_NN with_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP and_CC satisfy_VB that_DT body_NN of_IN their_PRP$ ability_NN to_TO provide_VB adequate_JJ hospitals_NNS and_CC camps_NNS when_WRB plague_NN breaks_VBZ out_RP ._.
Explanation_NNP 3.-Private_JJ hospitals_NNS and_CC camps_NNS may_MD be_VB closed_VBN by_IN order_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP ,_, if_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP reports_NNS that_IN medical_JJ attendance_NN and_CC segregation_NN are_VBP not_RB maintained_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ satis-_JJ faction_NN ,_, or_CC that_IN the_DT conditions_NNS on_IN which_WDT such_JJ camps_NNS or_CC hospitals_NNS were_VBD sanctioned_VBN are_VBP not_RB complied_VBN with_IN ._.
47_CD ._.
If_IN in_IN any_DT case_NN a_DT person_NN removed_VBN to_TO a_DT public_JJ or_CC private_JJ hospital_NN is_VBZ accompanied_VBN by_IN friends_NNS or_CC attendants_NNS ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD require_VB so_RB many_JJ of_IN them_PRP as_IN are_VBP not_RB in_IN personal_JJ attendance_NN on_IN the_DT patient_NN to_TO live_VB in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ neighbourhood_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN in_IN segregation_NN huts_NNS or_CC tents_NNS provided_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO remain_VB in_IN such_JJ place_NN until_IN they_PRP receive_VBP permission_NN from_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO depart_VB ._.
48_CD ._.

49_CD ._.

Provided_VBD that_IN this_DT rule_NN shall_MD not_RB apply_VB to_TO any_DT medical_JJ practitioner_NN ,_, hakim_NN or_CC baid_NN who_WP may_MD at_IN any_DT time_NN attend_VBP upon_IN a_DT sick_JJ person_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO professional_JJ corpse-bearers_NNS ,_, mourners_NNS and_CC friends_NNS who_WP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN in_IN attendance_NN on_IN the_DT deceased_VBN ._.

50_CD ._.
Evacuation_NN of_IN street_NN or_CC quarter.-If_JJ bubonic_JJ plague_NN has_VBZ become_VBN prevalent_NN in_IN a_DT portion_NN of_IN a_DT municipality_NN or_CC cantonment_NN ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN or_CC the_DT Cantonment_NNP authority_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN Calcutta_NNP the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP may_MD ,_, with_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN ,_, direct_VBP the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN any_DT street_NN ,_, muhalla_NN or_CC other_JJ locality_NN to_TO vacate_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS and_CC to_TO remove_VB to_TO a_DT temporary_JJ settlement_NN at_IN a_DT distance_NN from_IN the_DT infected_JJ quarter_NN ._.
The_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP or_CC the_DT Cantonment_NNP authority_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN Calcutta_NNP the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, may_MD ,_, when_WRB necessary_JJ ,_, provide_VB such_JJ persons_NNS with_IN temporary_JJ accom-_JJ modation_NN ._.
Each_DT householder_NN shall_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO make_VB suit-_JJ able_JJ arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT care_NN of_IN his_PRP$ house_NN and_CC property_NN during_IN his_PRP$ absence_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Municipal_JJ Commissioners_NNP or_CC Cantonment_NNP authority_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT case_NN may_MD be_VB ,_, will_MD arrange_VB for_IN the_DT watch_NN and_CC ward_NN of_IN the_DT empty_JJ houses_NNS ._.
After_IN evacuation_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD arrange_VB for_IN the_DT thorough_JJ disinfection_NN and_CC cleansing_NN of_IN the_DT empty_JJ premises_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT inhabitants_NNS shall_MD not_RB be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO return_VB until_IN the_DT premises_NNS have_VBP been_VBN certified_VBN to_TO be_VB free_JJ from_IN infection_NN ._.
51_CD ._.
Duty_NN of_IN compliance.-A_JJ person_NN dealt_NN with_IN under_IN the_DT fore-_JJ going_VBG rules_NNS ,_, and_CC any_DT person_NN who_WP may_MD be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT hospital_NN by_IN order_NN of_IN the_DT Military_NNP Medical_NNP authorities_NNS or_CC of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, shall_MD comply_VB with_IN any_DT directions_NNS that_WDT may_MD be_VB given_VBN to_TO him_PRP by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP with_IN regard_NN to_TO his_PRP$ removal_NN to_TO ,_, and_CC residence_NN in_IN ,_, an_DT observation_NN shed_VBD ,_, public_JJ or_CC private_JJ hospital_NN or_CC place_NN of_IN segregation_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN respect_NN to_TO disinfecting_VBG or_CC burning_NN of_IN bedding_NN ,_, clothing_NN and_CC articles_NNS of_IN a_DT similar_JJ nature_NN ,_, or_CC with_IN respect_NN to_TO any_DT other_JJ sanitary_JJ matter_NN ._.
He_PRP shall_MD not_RB depart_VB from_IN any_DT such_JJ place_NN without_IN the_DT written_VBN permission_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
52_CD ._.
Disposal_NNP of_IN dead.-The_JJ friends_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ shall_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO dispose_VB of_IN the_DT corpse_NN by_IN cremation_NN or_CC burial_JJ in_IN accord-_JJ ance_NN with_IN their_PRP$ religious_JJ practices_NNS ,_, but_CC they_PRP shall_MD obey_VB the_DT directions_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC other_JJ sanitary_JJ or_CC executive_JJ authority_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT time_NN ,_, route_NN and_CC method_NN of_IN removing_VBG the_DT corpse_NN to_TO the_DT burial_NN or_CC cremation_NN place_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN the_DT failure_NN or_CC refusal_NN of_IN relatives_NNS or_CC friends_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN to_TO dispose_VB of_IN the_DT body_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD dispose_VB of_IN it_PRP in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT religion_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN ._.
The_DT corpses_NNS of_IN Europeans_NNPS or_CC Muhammadans_NNPS who_WP die_VBP of_IN plague_NN shall_MD be_VB buried_VBN ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, at_IN least_JJS six_CD feet_NNS deep_JJ ._.
The_DT place_NN of_IN burial_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB an_DT authorised_JJ cemetery_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB far_RB from_IN habita-_JJ tions_NNS and_CC should_MD be_VB so_RB situated_JJ that_IN there_EX may_MD be_VB no_DT risk_NN of_IN contami-_JJ nating_JJ sources_NNS of_IN water-supply_NN ._.
The_DT coffin_NN and_CC cloth_NN used_VBN to_TO cover_VB APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._. ]_NN
Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
221_CD the_DT corpse_NN ,_, when_WRB not_RB interred_VBN with_IN the_DT corpse_NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN ._.
In_IN cases_NNS where_WRB cremation_NN is_VBZ the_DT custom_NN ,_, the_DT body_NN shall_MD be_VB completely_RB burned_VBN at_IN the_DT usual_JJ burning_NN ghat_WP or_CC other_JJ isolated_JJ locality_NN in_IN accord-_JJ ance_NN with_IN custom_NN ,_, the_DT cloths_NNS brought_VBD in_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT body_NN being_VBG either_CC burnt_JJ according_VBG to_TO custom_NN or_CC disinfected_VBN ._.
53_CD ._.
Ambulances.-The_JJ Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN or_CC the_DT Canton-_JJ ment_NN authority_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN Calcutta_NNP the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, shall_MD provide_VB suitable_JJ conveyances_NNS ,_, painted_VBN in_IN a_DT conspicuous_JJ manner_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT free_JJ carriage_NN of_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG ,_, from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP shall_MD be_VB lawful_JJ to_TO drive_VB or_CC carry_VB such_JJ convey-_JJ ances_NNS through_IN any_DT public_JJ or_CC private_JJ thoroughfare_NN ._.
54_CD ._.
Disinfection_NN of_IN public_JJ conveyances.-Any_JJ conveyance_NN ,_, public_JJ or_CC private_JJ ,_, that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN used_VBN by_IN a_DT person_NN infected_VBN with_IN ,_, or_CC suspected_VBN of_IN being_VBG infected_VBN with_IN ,_, plague_VB shall_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN and_CC exposed_VBN to_TO air_NN and_CC sunlight_NN for_IN not_RB less_JJR than_IN twenty-four_JJ hours_NNS before_IN being_VBG again_RB used_VBN ,_, and_CC all_DT articles_NNS of_IN furniture_NN belonging_VBG to_TO it_PRP ,_, which_WDT in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP can_MD not_RB be_VB properly_RB disinfected_VBN ,_, shall_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN by_IN fire_NN ._.
Part_NNP IV.-Rules_NNP of_IN General_NNP Application_NNP ._.
55_CD ._.
Compensation.-The_JJ Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN or_CC Canton-_NNP ment_JJ authority_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN Calcutta_NNP the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, may_MD in_IN his_PRP$ discretion_NN ,_, pay_VB compensation_NN to_TO any_DT person_NN who_WP has_VBZ sustained_VBN ,_, substantial_JJ loss_NN or_CC damage_NN by_IN reason_NN of_IN anything_NN done_VBN under_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ;_: provided_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN no_DT person_NN shall_MD be_VB entitled_VBN as_IN of_IN right_NN to_TO claim_VB any_DT compensation_NN whatsoever_NN ._.
In_IN deciding_VBG claims_NNS to_TO compensation_NN ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP or_CC the_DT Cantonment_NNP authority_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN Calcutta_NNP the_DT Chairman_NNP ,_, shall_MD consult_VB the_DT Committee_NNP appointed_VBN under_IN rule_NN 32_CD ,_, but_CC shall_MD not_RB be_VB bound_VBN to_TO follow_VB their_PRP$ advice_NN ._.
56_CD ._.

IV_NNP ._. ]_NN
Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
223_CD II.-The_JJ Civil_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD thereupon_VB proceed_VB to_TO exam-_JJ ine_NN the_DT patient_NN in_IN consultation_NN with_IN the_DT Military_JJ Medi-_NNP cal_JJ Officer_NNP ._.

Hospitals_NNS conveying_VBG instructions_NNS with_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT de-_JJ tection_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
Observations_NNS at_IN railway_NN stations_NNS ._.
The_DT measures_NNS hitherto_VBP adopted_VBN ._.
OBSERVATIONS.-The_JJ adoption_NN of_IN measures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT in-_JJ troduction_NN into_IN these_DT Provinces_NNS of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN now_RB prevalent_VBZ in_IN Bombay_NNP has_VBZ occupied_VBN the_DT attention_NN of_IN this_DT Government_NNP ._.
Hither-_NNP to_TO the_DT measures_NNS adopted_VBN have_VBP consisted_VBN in_IN the_DT appointment_NN of_IN sub-_JJ ordinate_JJ medical_JJ officers_NNS to_TO the_DT principal_JJ railway_NN stations_NNS on_IN the_DT fron-_JJ tier_NN and_CC at_IN railway_NN junctions_NNS to_TO observe_VB the_DT condition_NN of_IN passengers_NNS arriving_VBG from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT independent_JJ action_NN by_IN District_NNP Officers_NNP in_IN keeping_VBG under_IN observation_NN persons_NNS known_VBN to_TO have_VB re-_NNS turned_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ homes_NNS in_IN these_DT Provinces_NNS from_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presi-_NNP dency_NN ._.
The_DT observation_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, at_IN railway_NN stations_NNS can_MD not_RB lead_VB to_TO the_DT detection_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT prominent_NN symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN are_VBP not_RB apparent_JJ ,_, much_RB less_JJR to_TO the_DT detection_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT state_NN of_IN incubation_NN and_CC has_VBZ not_RB disclosed_VBN itself_PRP ;_: and_CC the_DT independent_JJ action_NN of_IN District_NNP Officers_NNP needs_VBZ to_TO be_VB extended_VBN and_CC regulated_VBN ._.
Importance_NN of_IN ascertaining_VBG the_DT health_NN of_IN immigrants_NNS from_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC of_IN adopting_VBG sanitary_JJ precautions_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN there_EX is_VBZ considerable_JJ intercourse_NN between_IN cer-_JJ tain_NN districts_NNS of_IN these_DT Provinces_NNS and_CC Bombay_NNP ._.
For_IN instance_NN ,_, many_JJ weavers_NNS are_VBP known_VBN to_TO have_VB sought_VBN employment_NN in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP direc-_JJ tion_NN ._.
With_IN the_DT large_JJ exodus_NN taking_VBG place_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP at_IN present_JJ ,_, there_EX is_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN these_DT and_CC other_JJ persons_NNS are_VBP returning_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ homes_NNS in_IN these_DT Provinces_NNS ;_: a_DT system_NN of_IN general_JJ observation_NN is_VBZ therefore_RB necessary_JJ ,_, and_CC towns_NNS and_CC villages_VBZ the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN which_WDT are_VBP known_VBN to_TO be_VB directly_RB connected_VBN with_IN Bombay_NNP require_VBP above_IN all_DT to_TO be_VB carefully_RB watched_VBN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ become_VBN a_DT matter_NN of_IN urgent_JJ neces-_JJ sity_NN to_TO establish_VB a_DT system_NN of_IN ascertaining_VBG the_DT health_NN of_IN these_DT immi-_JJ grants_NNS and_CC of_IN immigrants_NNS who_WP have_VBP already_RB returned_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ homes_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN taking_VBG all_DT sanitary_JJ precautions_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN should_MD it_PRP break_VB out-precautions_NNS which_WDT recent_JJ legislation_NN has_VBZ placed_VBN it_PRP in_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP to_TO adopt_VB ._.
Agency_NNP in_IN rural_JJ villages_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
Rural_JJ villages.-The_JJ agency_NN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN in_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN a_DT district_NN for_IN ascertaining_VBG the_DT required_JJ informa-_JJ tion_NN is_VBZ at_IN present_JJ four-fold_JJ ._.
First_RB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ the_DT Police_NNP ._.
Second_JJ ,_, the_DT Revenue_NNP Staff_NNP [_NNP patwari_NN ,_, kanungo_NN ,_, etc_FW ._. ]_NN ._.

IV_NNP ._. ]_NN
Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
225_CD villages_NNS having_VBG intercourse_NN with_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
Enquiries_NNS in_IN such_JJ villages_NNS and_CC procedure_NN on_IN occurrence_NN of_IN suspected_JJ cases_NNS ._.
of_IN India_NNP in_IN which_WDT bubonic_JJ plague_NN is_VBZ prevalent_JJ ._.
To_TO such_JJ villages_NNS the_DT rules_NNS relating_VBG to_TO the_DT reporting_NN of_IN deaths_NNS when_WRB cholera_NN is_VBZ epidemic_JJ will_MD be_VB applied_VBN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ to_TO say_VB ,_, daily_JJ reports_NNS will_MD be_VB required_VBN ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, a_DT register_NN will_MD be_VB prepared_VBN in_IN each_DT police_NN station_NN ,_, from_IN reports_NNS furnished_VBN by_IN village_NN policemen_NNS ,_, of_IN all_DT persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP re-_NNS turned_VBN from_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP since_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN January_NNP ,_, or_CC who_WP may_MD return_VB in_IN future_JJ so_RB long_RB as_IN these_DT regulations_NNS are_VBP in_IN force_NN ._.
On_IN receiving_VBG information_NN of_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN whose_WP$ name_NN is_VBZ recorded_VBN on_IN the_DT register_NN or_CC who_WP resided_VBD in_IN any_DT vil-_JJ lage_NN from_IN which_WDT daily_JJ reports_NNS are_VBP submitted_VBN ,_, or_CC on_IN finding_VBG that_IN an_DT unusually_RB large_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS are_VBP returned_VBN from_IN any_DT village_NN in_IN his_PRP$ circle_NN ,_, the_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN station_NN will_MD inquire_VB into_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS which_WDT are_VBP alleged_VBN to_TO have_VB preceded_VBN death_NN ._.
If_IN there_EX is_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN these_DT answer_VB the_DT description_NN of_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN given_VBN in_IN the_DT instructions_NNS issued_VBN for_IN his_PRP$ guidance_NN ,_, the_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN station_NN will_MD go_VB to_TO the_DT village_NN con-_NN cerned_VBD ,_, and_CC pending_VBG the_DT arrival_NN of_IN a_DT superior_JJ officer_NN will_MD ,_, in_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN ascertained_JJ plague_NN ,_, take_VBP certain_JJ precautionary_JJ measures_NNS with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO the_DT prevention_NN of_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
The_DT Tahsildars_NNP ,_, who_WP will_MD also_RB receive_VB information_NN through_IN the_DT patwaris_NN ,_, will_MD supervise_VB the_DT action_NN taken_VBN by_IN the_DT police_NN ,_, and_CC give_VB such_JJ assistance_NN as_IN may_MD be_VB required_VBN by_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS of_IN the_DT case_NN ._.
Evacuation_NN and_CC disinfection_NN of_IN infected_JJ localities_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
From_IN the_DT inquiries_NNS made_VBN in_IN Karachi_NNP and_CC Calcutta_NNP ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ ,_, that_IN the_DT best_JJS practical_JJ means_NNS of_IN checking_VBG the_DT increase_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT abandonment_NN and_CC thorough_JJ disinfection_NN of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS and_CC localities_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS to_TO camps_NNS constructed_VBN in_IN the_DT open_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP and_CC Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP wishes_VBZ this_DT principle_NN to_TO be_VB kept_VBN prominently_RB in_IN view_NN ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN authorities_NNS to_TO take_VB steps_NNS to_TO secure_VB the_DT temporary_JJ abandonment_NN of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN such_JJ a_DT course_NN be_VB necessary_JJ ,_, of_IN infected_JJ villages_NNS or_CC portions_NNS of_IN villages_NNS ._.
The_DT inhabi-_JJ tants_NNS should_MD camp_VB in_IN the_DT open_JJ or_CC under_IN trees_NNS at_IN a_DT suitable_JJ distance_NN from_IN the_DT infected_JJ spot_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD not_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO return_VB until_IN the_DT place_NN has_VBZ been_VBN thoroughly_RB ventilated_VBN ,_, disinfected_VBN and_CC pronounced_JJ fit_NN for_IN occupation_NN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ._.
Sanitary_JJ measures_NNS in_IN municipalities_NNS and_CC small_JJ towns_NNS ._.

6_CD ._.
Municipalities_NNS and_CC small_JJ towns_NNS ._.
-The_NN rules_NNS applying_VBG to_TO vil-_JJ lages_NNS will_MD be_VB applied_VBN ,_, mutatis_FW mutandis_NN ,_, to_TO municipalities_NNS ,_, canton-_JJ ments_NNS and_CC towns_NNS administered_VBN under_IN Act_NNP XX_NNP of_IN 1856_CD ._.
Here_RB also_RB the_DT chief_JJ remedy_NN to_TO be_VB adopted_VBN is_VBZ temporary_JJ evacuation_NN of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS or_CC mahallas_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT occupation_NN of_IN temporary_JJ settlements_NNS well_RB beyond_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, until_IN return_NN is_VBZ permitted_VBN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP and_CC Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP desires_VBZ to_TO impress_VB upon_IN Municipal_NNP b_VBD 29_CD 226_CD Regulations_NNPS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._.

should_MD be_VB defrayed_VBN ._.

Duties_NNS of_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
14_CD ._.
Up_RB to_TO the_DT present_JJ ,_, the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP has_VBZ personally_RB investigated_VBN every_DT case_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN that_WDT has_VBZ occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT Provinces_NNS ._.
His_PRP$ numerous_JJ other_JJ duties_NNS may_MD not_RB allow_VB of_IN his_PRP$ continu-_JJ ing_NN to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, but_CC he_PRP will_MD exercise_VB general_JJ control_NN over_IN all_PDT the_DT preventive_JJ and_CC precautionary_JJ measures_NNS detailed_VBN in_IN the_DT rules_NNS annexed_VBP ._.

15_CD ._.
Special_JJ attention_NN is_VBZ directed_VBN to_TO the_DT regulations_NNS and_CC orders_NNS made_VBN by_IN this_DT Government_NNP under_IN Act_NNP No_NNP ._.
III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD ,_, which_WDT form_VBP an_DT Appendix_NNP to_TO this_DT Resolution_NNP ,_, and_CC which_WDT will_MD remain_VB in_IN force_NN until_IN further_JJ orders_NNS ._.
Copies_NNS of_IN these_DT rules_NNS ,_, and_CC translations_NNS into_IN the_DT ver-_JJ nacular_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB furnished_VBN to_TO district_NN officers_NNS for_IN affixing_VBG to_TO notice-_JJ boards_NNS at_IN railway_NN stations_NNS and_CC in_IN municipal_JJ towns_NNS and_CC cantonments_NNS ,_, and_CC for_IN distribution_NN to_TO the_DT officials_NNS concerned_VBN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP and_CC Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP trusts_VBZ that_IN the_DT period_NN during_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO enforce_VB such_JJ orders_NNS in_IN the_DT interests_NNS of_IN the_DT inhabi-_JJ tants_NNS of_IN these_DT Provinces_NNS will_MD not_RB be_VB long_RB ;_: but_CC His_PRP$ Honour_NNP has_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN that_IN in_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT gravity_NN of_IN the_DT situation_NN the_DT orders_NNS will_MD be_VB cheerfully_RB obeyed_VBN by_IN all_DT classes_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN ._.

Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.

III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD (_( an_DT Act_NNP to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_DT better_JJR prevention_NN of_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN Dangerous_NNP Epidemic_NNP Disease_NNP )_) :_: -_: Regulations_NNS and_CC orders_NNS made_VBN by_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP under_IN Act_NNP No_NNP ._.
III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD for_IN the_DT detection_NN and_CC treatment_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN bubo-_JJ nic_JJ plague_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO the_DT better_JJR prevention_NN of_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN that_DT disease_NN ._.
Part_NN 1.-Rules_NNS relating_VBG to_TO villages_NNS and_CC small_JJ towns_NNS ._.
(_( i_NN )_) Duties_NNS of_IN the_DT Police_NNP ._.
List_NN A_DT of_IN villages_NNS having_VBG communi-_JJ cation_NN with_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presi-_NNP dency_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN every_DT police_NN station_NN shall_MD forthwith_VB bring_NN upon_IN a_DT list_NN (_( A_DT )_) the_DT names_NNS of_IN all_DT villages_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ circle_NN the_DT inhabi-_JJ tants_NNS ,_, or_CC any_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN which_WDT ,_, are_VBP ascertained_VBN to_TO have_VB trade_NN relations_NNS or_CC other_JJ connection_NN with_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP or_CC Kurrachee_NNP ._.
Report_NN of_IN ar-_JJ rivals_NNS from_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presi-_NNP dency_NN (_( List_NNP B_NNP )_) ._.
2_CD ._.
Every_DT village_NN policeman_NN shall_MD enquire_VB and_CC report_VB without_IN delay_VB the_DT name_NN of_IN every_DT person_NN in_IN his_PRP$ village_NN who_WP has_VBZ arrived_VBN from_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP or_CC Kurrachee_NNP since_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN January_NNP 1897_CD :_: he_PRP will_MD also_RB report_VB all_DT fresh_JJ arrivals_NNS as_IN they_PRP occur_VBP ._.
The_DT names_NNS so_RB reported_VBD will_MD be_VB entered_VBN on_IN a_DT list_NN (_( B_NNP )_) ._.
Reports_NNS of_IN deaths_NNS in_IN villages_NNS in_IN List_NNP A_NNP ._.
3_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN every_DT village_NN entered_VBN in_IN list_NN A_NNP ,_, reports_NNS of_IN all_DT deaths_NNS shall_MD be_VB made_VBN daily_RB ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN cholera_NN epidemics_NNS :_: and_CC the_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN station_NN ,_, on_IN receiving_VBG report_NN of_IN a_DT death_NN ._.
shall_MD carefully_RB enquire_VB whether_IN the_DT deceased_JJ person_NN had_VBD symptoms_NNS of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN as_IN described_VBN in_IN Annexure_NNP I_PRP ._.
Reports_NNS of_IN deaths_NNS of_IN persons_NNS in_IN List_NNP B_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
Similar_JJ inquiry_NN shall_MD be_VB made_VBN in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN a_DT report_NN being_VBG received_VBN of_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN whose_WP$ name_NN is_VBZ entered_VBN in_IN list_NN B_NNP or_CC of_IN any_DT person_NN in_IN that_DT household_NN ._.
Reports_NNS of_IN unusual_JJ mortality_NN in_IN any_DT village_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
Whenever_WRB the_DT deaths_NNS reported_VBN from_IN any_DT village_NN (_( whether_IN on_IN list_NN A_NNP or_CC B_NNP or_CC not_RB )_) are_VBP more_RBR frequent_JJ than_IN usual_JJ ,_, and_CC especially_RB sud-_JJ den_JJ deaths_NNS attributed_VBD to_TO fever_VB ,_, the_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN sta-_JJ tion_NN shall_MD make_VB inquiries_NNS from_IN the_DT village_NN policemen_NNS with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO ascertaining_VBG whether_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN existed_VBD ._.
Enquiry_NNP into_IN suspicious_JJ deaths_NNS ._.
6_CD ._.
On_IN ascertaining_VBG from_IN a_DT village_NN policeman_NN or_CC other_JJ source_NN of_IN information_NN that_IN a_DT death_NN in_IN a_DT village_NN was_VBD preceded_VBN by_IN symptoms_NNS such_JJ as_IN those_DT described_VBN in_IN Annexure_NNP I_PRP ,_, the_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN station_NN will_MD either_CC go_VB himself_PRP or_CC depute_VB a_DT competent_NN subordinate_NN to_TO make_VB an_DT inquiry_NN ,_, any_DT action_NN taken_VBN being_VBG recorded_VBN in_IN the_DT station_NN diary_NN ._.
Disposal_NNP of_IN body_NN and_CC disin-_JJ fection_NN of_IN house_NN ,_, clothing_NN ,_, bed-_JJ ding_NN ,_, etc_FW ._.
7_CD ._.
If_IN the_DT officer_NN making_VBG the_DT inquiry_NN is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT death_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, and_CC finds_VBZ that_IN no_DT other_JJ persons_NNS in_IN the_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT death_NN occurred_VBD are_VBP ill_RB ,_, he_PRP shall_MD proceed_VB to_TO dispose_VB of_IN the_DT body_NN and_CC to_TO disinfect_VB the_DT house_NN ,_, clothes_NNS and_CC bedding_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN ,_, 232_CD Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.

as_IN laid_VBN down_RP in_IN Annexure_NNP I_PRP ,_, *_VBD reporting_NN at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN the_DT result_NN of_IN *_NN Printed_VBN after_IN the_DT his_PRP$ inquiry_NN in_IN the_DT manner_NN provided_VBD in_IN Rule_NNP 9._CD later_RB Resolution_NNP 7_CD ,_, of_IN the_DT 26th_CD March_NNP ._.

IV._NNP ``_``
The_DT word_NN '_POS factory_NN '_'' used_VBN in_IN this_DT rule_NN means_VBZ any_DT premises_NNS where-_NN in_IN is_VBZ carried_VBN on_IN any_DT process_NN for_IN ,_, or_CC incidental_JJ to_TO ,_, making_VBG ,_, altering_VBG ,_, repairing_VBG ,_, ornamenting_VBG ,_, finishing_VBG or_CC otherwise_RB adapting_VBG for_IN use_NN or_CC sale_NN any_DT article_NN or_CC part_NN of_IN an_DT article_NN ;_: and_CC wherein_VB steam_NN ,_, water_NN or_CC other_JJ mechanical_JJ power_NN is_VBZ used_VBN in_IN aid_NN of_IN any_DT such_JJ process_NN ._. 22_CD ._.
If_IN in_IN any_DT house_NN a_DT person_NN becomes_VBZ ill_JJ ,_, or_CC dies_NNS of_IN a_DT disease_NN which_WDT is_VBZ known_VBN ,_, or_CC suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB ,_, bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT owner_NN of_IN such_JJ house_NN ,_, or_CC if_IN the_DT owner_NN be_VB non-resident_JJ ,_, the_DT occupier_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT family_NN resident_NN therein_NN ,_, shall_MD forthwith_VB report_NN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN such_JJ illness_NN or_CC death_NN at_IN the_DT nearest_JJS police_NN station_NN ._.

26_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT cases_NNS referred_VBD to_TO in_IN rules_NNS 22_CD ,_, 23_CD and_CC 24_CD a_DT sick_JJ person_NN or_CC dead_JJ body_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB removed_VBN from_IN the_DT house_NN without_IN the_DT written_VBN permission_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP :_: and_CC the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN shall_MD dispose_VB of_IN a_DT dead_JJ body_NN by_IN cremation_NN or_CC burial_NN in_IN such_JJ manner_NN as_IN may_MD be_VB directed_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
Disinfection_NN and_CC cleansing_NN of_IN houses_NNS ,_, disinfection_NN or_CC destruction_NN of_IN clothing_NN ,_, bedding_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, disposal_NN of_IN corpses_NNS ,_, sanitary_JJ improvements_NNS ._.
27_CD ._.
The_DT owner_NN and_CC occupier_JJR of_IN a_DT house_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT head_NN of_IN any_DT family_NN resident_NN therein_NN ,_, shall_MD comply_VB with_IN any_DT direction_NN that_WDT may_MD be_VB issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Sanitation_NNP Department_NNP with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT disinfection_NN and_CC cleansing_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN ,_, the_DT disinfec-_JJ tion_NN or_CC destruction_NN of_IN clothing_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS ,_, the_DT disposal_NN of_IN any_DT corpse_NN ,_, the_DT improvement_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT premises_NNS ,_, and_CC with_IN regard_NN to_TO other_JJ similar_JJ matters_NNS ,_, and_CC shall_MD permit_VB the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC officer_NN of_IN the_DT Sanitation_NNP Depart-_NNP ment_NN to_TO enter_VB his_PRP$ house_NN or_CC premises_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN inspection_NN ._.
Notification_NN No_DT ._.
90/XVI-404-B.-105_CD '_'' dated_VBD the_DT 26th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._. ]_NN
Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
235_CD Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD himself_PRP take_VB measures_NNS for_IN the_DT above_NN ._.
28_CD ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD ,_, if_IN he_PRP considers_VBZ it_PRP necessary_JJ ,_, himself_PRP take_VBP measures_NNS for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN and_CC for_IN the_DT other_JJ matters_NNS referred_VBD to_TO in_IN the_DT preceding_NN rule_NN ._.
Destruction_NN of_IN non-masonry_JJ structures_NNS ._.
Should_MD the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP think_VBP it_PRP necessary_JJ and_CC practicable_JJ to_TO burn_VB or_CC otherwise_VB destroy_JJ any_DT non-masonry_JJ and_CC inflammable_JJ structure_NN ,_, he_PRP will_MD report_VB the_DT case_NN to_TO the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP and_CC act_NN on_IN his_PRP$ orders_NNS ._.
The_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP may_MD order_NN the_DT burning_NN or_CC destruction_NN of_IN any_DT hut_NN or_CC other_JJ temporary_JJ structure_NN ,_, if_IN disinfection_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB satisfactorily_RB effected_VBN ._.
Entry_NN and_CC examination_NN of_IN persons_NNS ._.
Females_NNS ._.
29_CD ._.
The_DT owner_NN and_CC occupier_JJR of_IN any_DT house_NN shall_MD permit_VB the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO enter_VB his_PRP$ premises_NNS and_CC examine_VB any_DT person_NN whom_WP the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT person_NN be_VB a_DT female_NN ,_, the_DT examination_NN shall_MD ,_, if_IN desired_VBN ,_, be_VB made_VBN through_IN a_DT female_JJ doctor_NN ,_, female_JJ Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP or_CC other_JJ female_JJ agency_NN ._.
Removal_NN of_IN patients_NNS to_TO hospital_VB or_CC temporary_JJ accommodation_NN ._.
Segregation_NN of_IN other_JJ occupants_NNS of_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
30_CD ._.
If_IN on_IN examination_NN of_IN a_DT sick_JJ person_NN in_IN a_DT house_NN or_CC other_JJ place_NN within_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN a_DT municipality_NN or_CC cantonment_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP suspects_VBZ (_( I_PRP )_) that_IN such_JJ person_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN with_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, or_CC (_( 2_CD )_) considers_NNS that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ actually_RB suffering_VBG from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD ,_, if_IN he_PRP considers_VBZ it_PRP necessary_JJ ,_, arrange_NN for_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN such_JJ person_NN ,_, (_( I_PRP )_) to_TO an_DT observation_NN shed_VBD ,_, or_CC (_( 2_CD )_) to_TO a_DT temporary_JJ hospital_NN established_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN and_CC for_IN his_PRP$ detention_NN ,_, dieting_VBG and_CC medical_JJ treatment_NN therein_NN ;_: also_RB for_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ occupants_NNS of_IN the_DT house_NN to_TO segregation_NN huts_NNS ,_, tents_NNS ,_, or_CC suitable_JJ structures_NNS con-_JJ structed_VBN at_IN a_DT distance_NN from_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB detained_VBN under_IN observa-_JJ tion_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
Companions_NNS and_CC attendants_NNS of_IN the_DT sick_NN ._.
31_CD ._.
If_IN in_IN any_DT case_NN a_DT person_NN removed_VBN to_TO a_DT temporary_JJ hospital_NN is_VBZ accompanied_VBN by_IN a_DT companion_NN or_CC attendant_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD require_VB the_DT companion_NN or_CC attendant_NN to_TO live_VB in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ neigh-_JJ bourhood_NN of_IN the_DT temporary_JJ hospital_NN in_IN a_DT segregation_NN hut_NN or_CC tent_NN provided_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO remain_VB in_IN such_JJ place_NN until_IN he_PRP receives_VBZ permission_NN from_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO depart_VB ._.
Segregation_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ if_IN attacked_VBN by_IN plague_NN ._.
32_CD ._.
If_IN a_DT person_NN is_VBZ attacked_VBN with_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN while_IN so_RB segre-_JJ gated_VBN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD remove_VB such_JJ person_NN to_TO the_DT temporary_JJ hospital_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD keep_VB under_IN observation_NN in_IN a_DT segregation_NN hut_NN ,_, tent_NN or_CC suitable_JJ structure_NN ,_, for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN such_JJ removal_NN ,_, any_DT companion_NN or_CC attendant_NN who_WP has_VBZ been_VBN with_IN the_DT person_NN attacked_VBD ._.
Segregation_NN for_IN 10_CD days_NNS of_IN persons_NNS in_IN attendance_NN on_IN deceased_VBN ,_, 33_CD ._.
Upon_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT sick_JJ person_NN from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS detain_VBP under_IN observation_NN all_DT persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN attendance_NN upon_IN him_PRP ,_, in_IN segregation_NN huts_NNS ,_, tents_NNS or_CC suitable_JJ structures_NNS established_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN ,_, 236_CD Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._.
Evacuation_NN of_IN infected_JJ locality_NN ._.
34_CD ._.
If_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN has_VBZ become_VBN prevalent_NN in_IN a_DT portion_NN of_IN a_DT municipality_NN or_CC cantonment_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC Sanitary_NNP Commis-_NNP sioner_NN may_MD ,_, with_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, direct_VBP the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN any_DT street_NN ,_, mahalla_NN or_CC other_JJ locality_NN to_TO evacuate_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, to_TO re-_JJ move_NN to_TO a_DT temporary_JJ settlement_NN established_VBN ,_, as_IN a_DT place_NN of_IN segregation_NN ,_, at_IN a_DT distance_NN from_IN the_DT infected_JJ quarter_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO remain_VB in_IN such_JJ settle-_JJ ment_NN for_IN so_RB long_RB as_IN he_PRP may_MD consider_VB necessary_JJ ._.
After_IN evacuation_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD arrange_VB for_IN the_DT thorough_JJ disinfection_NN and_CC cleans-_JJ ing_NN of_IN the_DT empty_JJ premises_NNS ,_, and_CC shall_MD not_RB permit_VB the_DT inhabitants_NNS to_TO return_VB until_IN the_DT premises_NNS are_VBP considered_VBN to_TO be_VB free_JJ from_IN infection_NN ._.
Persons_NNS dealt_VBP with_IN under_IN fore-_JJ going_VBG rules_NNS to_TO obey_VB instruc-_JJ tions_NNS ._.
35_CD ._.
A_DT person_NN dealt_NN with_IN under_IN the_DT foregoing_NN rules_NNS shall_MD comply_VB with_IN any_DT directions_NNS that_WDT may_MD be_VB given_VBN to_TO him_PRP by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, with_IN regard_NN to_TO his_PRP$ removal_NN to_TO ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ detention_NN and_CC treatment_NN in_IN ,_, an_DT observation_NN shed_VBD ,_, temporary_JJ hospital_NN or_CC place_NN of_IN segregation_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN respect_NN to_TO the_DT disinfecting_NN or_CC burning_NN of_IN his_PRP$ clothing_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS ,_, the_DT disposal_NN of_IN any_DT corpse_NN ,_, or_CC with_IN respect_NN to_TO any_DT other_JJ similar_JJ matter_NN ;_: he_PRP shall_MD not_RB depart_VB from_IN any_DT such_JJ place_NN of_IN detention_NN without_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
Disposal_NNP of_IN corpses_NNS ._.
36_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN death_NN occurring_VBG from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD arrange_VB for_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT European_JJ or_CC Muhammadan_NNP ,_, the_DT body_NN shall_MD be_VB buried_VBN at_IN least_JJS six_CD feet_NNS deep_JJ and_CC be_VB covered_VBN with_IN chloride_NN of_IN lime_NN :_: the_DT place_NN of_IN burial_NN if_IN not_RB an_DT authorized_JJ cemetery_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB well_RB away_RB from_IN habitations_NNS and_CC sources_NNS of_IN water-supply_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT Hindu_NNP ,_, the_DT body_NN shall_MD be_VB completely_RB and_CC thoroughly_RB burned_VBN in_IN an_DT isolated_JJ locality_NN in_IN the_DT pres-_JJ ence_NN of_IN a_DT responsible_JJ official_NN ._.
Assistance_NN of_IN Police_NNP ._.

Part_NN III.-Rules_NNP relating_NN to_TO Railway_NNP Stations_NNP ._.

Definition_NN ._.
38_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS the_DT words_NNS ``_`` Medical_JJ officer_NN ``_`` mean_VB the_DT Commissioned_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Military_NNP Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP or_CC officer_NN of_IN the_DT rank_NN of_IN Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP stationed_VBD at_IN Manikpur_NNP ,_, Jhansi_NNP ,_, Saharanpur_NNP and_CC Ghaziabad_NNP ,_, and_CC at_IN any_DT other_JJ place_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB subsequently_RB notified_VBN ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN carrying-_NN out_IN these_DT regula-_JJ tions_NNS ._.
Detention_NN of_IN trains_NNS at_IN Manikpur_NNP ,_, Jhansi_NNP ,_, 39_CD ._.
Every_DT train_NN coming_VBG from_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Manikpur_NNP and_CC Jhansi_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Saharanpur_NNP and_CC Ghaziabad_NNP ,_, shall_MD be_VB detained_VBN at_IN those_DT stations_NNS so_RB APP_NNP ._.

Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
237_CD Saharanpur_NNP and_CC Ghaziabad_NNP ._.
long_RB as_RB may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT medical_JJ examination_NN of_IN the_DT passen-_JJ gers_NNS ._.

Passengers_NNS not_RB to_TO alight_VB without_IN permission_NN ._.
40_CD ._.

Passengers_NNS to_TO alight_VB and_CC proceed_VB to_TO spot_VB indicated_VBN for_IN inspection_NN ._.
41_CD ._.
Every_DT passenger_NN shall_MD ,_, on_IN being_VBG requested_VBN to_TO do_VB so_RB by_IN any_DT railway_NN police_NN or_CC medical_JJ official_NN ,_, alight_RB from_IN the_DT train_NN ,_, and_CC proceed_VB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN medical_JJ inspection_NN to_TO any_DT spot_NN that_WDT may_MD be_VB indi-_JJ cated_VBN by_IN such_JJ official_NN ._.
Passenger_NN to_TO remain_VB until_IN allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB ._.
42_CD ._.
A_DT passenger_NN shall_MD not_RB depart_VB from_IN the_DT spot_NN so_RB indicated_VBD without_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.

44_CD ._.
If_IN on_IN inspection_NN and_CC examination_NN of_IN a_DT passenger_NN ,_, the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP has_VBZ reasonable_JJ ground_NN for_IN suspecting_VBG that_IN he_PRP or_CC she_PRP is_VBZ infected_VBN with_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD remove_VB such_JJ person_NN to_TO the_DT observation_NN shed_VBD erected_VBN in_IN the_DT vicinity_NN of_IN the_DT railway_NN station_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD arrange_VB for_IN the_DT detention_NN ,_, dieting_VBG and_CC medical_JJ treatment_NN of_IN such_JJ person_NN in_IN the_DT observation_NN shed_VBD for_IN so_RB long_RB as_IN he_PRP (_( the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP )_) may_MD consider_VB necessary_JJ ._.
Detention_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS in_IN hospitals_NNS ._.
45_CD ._.
If_IN on_IN inspection_NN and_CC after_IN due_JJ observation_NN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN a_DT passenger_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD immediately_RB remove_VB such_JJ person_NN to_TO the_DT tempo-_JJ rary_JJ hospital_NN established_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD arrange_VB for_IN the_DT detention_NN ,_, dieting_VBG and_CC medical.treatment_NN of_IN such_JJ person_NN therein_NNS for_IN so_RB long_RB as_IN he_PRP (_( the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP )_) may_MD consider_VB necessary_JJ ._.

49_CD ._.

50_CD ._.

In_IN cases_NNS where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ considered_VBN necessary_JJ that_IN the_DT clothes_NNS or_CC bedding_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, of_IN a_DT traveller_NN should_MD be_VB burnt_VBN ,_, the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD ,_, if_IN the_DT person_NN is_VBZ poor_JJ or_CC for_IN other_JJ sufficient_JJ reason_NN ,_, arrange_NN for_IN providing_VBG other_JJ articles_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ place_NN at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN Government_NNP ._.

C.-Disposal_NN of_IN Corpses_NNP ._.
Method_NNP of_IN dis-_JJ posing_NN of_IN corpses_NNS ._.
52_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN a_DT death_NN occurring_VBG in_IN a_DT case_NN where_WRB the_DT exist-_JJ ence_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN was_VBD known_VBN or_CC suspected_VBN ,_, or_CC of_IN a_DT corpse_NN being_VBG found_VBN in_IN a_DT train_NN ,_, the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD arrange_VB for_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT European_JJ or_CC Muhammadan_NNP ,_, the_DT body_NN shall_MD be_VB buried_VBN at_IN least_JJS six_CD feet_NNS deep_JJ and_CC be_VB covered_VBN with_IN chloride_NN of_IN lime_NN :_: the_DT place_NN of_IN burial_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB an_DT authorised_JJ cemetery_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB well_RB away_RB from_IN habitation_NN and_CC sources_NNS of_IN water-supply_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT Hindu_NNP ,_, the_DT body_NN shall_MD be_VB completely_RB and_CC thoroughly_RB burnt_NNS in_IN an_DT isolated_JJ locality_NN in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN a_DT responsible_JJ official_NN ._.
D-Relations_NNS of_IN Medical_NNP ,_, Police_NNP and_CC Railway_NNP Officials_NNP ._.
Medical_JJ Offi-_JJ cer_NN at_IN inspection_NN station_NN and_CC Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP to_TO keep_VB in_IN communica-_JJ tion_NN ._.
53_CD ._.
In_IN carrying_VBG out_RP the_DT foregoing_NN instructions_NNS ,_, the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD keep_VB in_IN communication_NN with_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT latter_JJ shall_MD give_VB the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP assistance_NN in_IN all_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT he_PRP may_MD require_VB it_PRP ._.

54_CD ._.
The_DT railway_NN police_NN and_CC railway_NN authorities_NNS shall_MD assist_VB the_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP in_IN carrying_VBG out_RP these_DT rules_NNS ._.

*Notification_NN No_DT ._.
87/XVI-404-B.-1021_JJ ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 26th_CD Feb-_NNP ruary_JJ 1897_CD ._.
55_CD ._.
A_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN at_IN the_DT railway_NN stations_NNS noted_VBD on_IN the_DT margin_NN ,_, whose_WP$ sole_JJ duty_NN is_VBZ to_TO watch_VB the_DT trains_NNS coming_VBG from_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN places_NNS in_IN ._.
fected_VBN with_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN and_CC to_TO observe_VB the_DT passengers_NNS who_WP alight_VBD or_CC change_NN trains_NNS at_IN the_DT stations_NNS ._.
Railway_NNP author-_JJ ities_NNS to_TO make_VB arrangements_NNS for_IN inspection_NN ._.
56_CD ._.
The_DT railway_NN authorities_NNS shall_MD allow_VB suffi-_JJ cient_NN time_NN for_IN the_DT observation_NN (_( a_DT )_) of_IN passengers_NNS who_WP alight_VBD ,_, and_CC (_( b_NN )_) of_IN passengers_NNS who_WP change_VBP carriages_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN proceeding_NN by_IN other_JJ trains_NNS ,_, and_CC shall_MD make_VB such_JJ arrangements_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
Suspect_JJ cases_NNS to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO segregation_VB shed_VBN and_CC report_NN made_VBD to_TO District_NNP au-_JJ thorities_NNS ._.
57_CD ._.
If_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP suspects_VBZ a_DT passenger_NN to_TO be_VB suffer-_JJ ing_VBG from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD immediately_RB arrange_VB for_IN the_DT re-_JJ moval_NN of_IN such_JJ person_NN to_TO the_DT observation_NN shed_VBN in_IN the_DT vicinity_NN of_IN the_DT railway_NN station_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN his_PRP$ detention_NN and_CC treatment_NN therein_RB pending_VBG the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP shall_MD report_VB his_PRP$ action_NN forthwith_NN to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP and_CC the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN ._.
B.-Segregation_NN of_IN Passengers_NNS ._.
Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP to_TO arrange_VB for_IN treatment_NN and_CC segregation_NN ._.
58_CD ._.
On_IN receiving_VBG a_DT report_NN under_IN the_DT preceding_NN rule_NN ,_, the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP (_( or_CC the_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duties_NNS )_) shall_MD at_IN once_RB proceed_VBN to_TO the_DT observation_NN shed_VBD ,_, and_CC shall_MD arrange_VB ,_, if_IN in_IN his_PRP$ opinion_NN the_DT cir-_JJ cumstances_NNS of_IN the_DT case_NN require_VB it_PRP ,_, for_IN the_DT detention_NN ,_, dieting_VBG and_CC medical_JJ treatment_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN infected_VBN ,_, or_CC suspected_VBN of_IN being_VBG infected_VBN ,_, with_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ;_: and_CC for_IN the_DT removal_NN ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, of_IN such_JJ person_NN from_IN the_DT observation_NN shed_VBD to_TO the_DT temporary_JJ hospital_NN for_IN detention_NN and_CC medical_JJ treatment_NN therein_NN ._.

59_CD ._.

Treatment_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ if_IN at-_JJ tacked_VBN by_IN plague_NN ._.
60_CD ._.

65_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN a_DT death_NN occurring_VBG from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN a_DT corpse_NN being_VBG found_VBN in_IN the_DT train_NN ,_, the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP shall_MD arrange_VB for_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT European_JJ or_CC Muhammadan_NNP ,_, the_DT body_NN shall_MD be_VB buried_VBN at_IN least_JJS six_CD feet_NNS deep_JJ and_CC be_VB covered_VBN with_IN chloride_NN of_IN lime_NN :_: the_DT place_NN of_IN burial_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB an_DT authorized_JJ cemetery_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB well_RB away_RB from_IN habitations_NNS and_CC sources_NNS of_IN water-supply_NN ,_, In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT Hindu_NNP ,_, the_DT body_NN shall_MD be_VB completely_RB and_CC thoroughly_RB burnt_NNS in_IN an_DT isolated_JJ locality_NN in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN a_DT responsible_JJ official_NN ._.

79_CD ._.
At_IN stations_NNS where_WRB a_DT temporary_JJ hospital_NN has_VBZ been_VBN erected_VBN ,_, the_DT body_NN shall_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN :_: at_IN other_JJ places_NNS ,_, it_PRP shall_MD be_VB placed_VBN in_IN an_DT isolated_JJ place_NN at_IN a_DT suitable_JJ distance_NN from_IN the_DT station_NN ._.

Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP to_TO proceed_VB to_TO the_DT spot_NN ._.

Objects_NNS of_IN rules_NNS to_TO secure_VB early_JJ information_NN and_CC to_TO isolate_VB the_DT infected_JJ ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ object_NN of_IN the_DT rules_NNS is_VBZ to_TO secure_VB the_DT submission_NN to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ and_CC executive_JJ authorities_NNS of_IN the_DT earliest_JJS information_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
The_DT next_JJ object_NN is_VBZ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN by_IN isolating_VBG the_DT sick_JJ person_NN and_CC his_PRP$ friends_NNS and_CC attendants_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT infection_NN may_MD not_RB be_VB disseminated_VBN ._.
