3_CD ._.
The_DT rules_NNS as_IN now_RB published_VBN provide_NN ,_, in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT first_JJ object_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT association_NN of_IN the_DT proprietors_NNS of_IN land_NN with_IN the_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN in_IN giving_VBG effect_NN to_TO the_DT rules_NNS in_IN rural_JJ villages_NNS and_CC small_JJ towns_NNS ._.
This_DT indeed_RB was_VBD always_RB the_DT intention_NN ;_: but_CC it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN thought_VBN right_RB to_TO make_VB the_DT intention_NN quite_RB clear_JJ in_IN the_DT rules_NNS ._.
The_DT responsibility_NN of_IN landlords_NNS will_MD in_IN no_DT way_NN lessen_VBZ the_DT responsibility_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN ;_: but_CC police_NNS action_NN under_IN the_DT rules_NNS must_MD be_VB taken_VBN whenever_WRB possible_JJ through_IN the_DT landlords_NNS and_CC village_NN authorities_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ only_RB when_WRB these_DT are_VBP supine_NN or_CC refuse_NN to_TO act_VB that_DT independent_JJ action_NN by_IN the_DT police_NN will_MD be_VB taken_VBN ._.
Duties_NNS of_IN police_NN in_IN municipalities_NNS and_CC cantonments_NNS ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ object_NN noticed_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 2_CD above_IN involves_NNS also_RB the_DT definition_NN of_IN the_DT duties_NNS of_IN the_DT police_NN in_IN municipalities_NNS and_CC canton-_JJ ments_NNS ._.
These_DT duties_NNS primarily_RB consist_VBP in_IN reporting_VBG cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN which_WDT may_MD come_VB to_TO their_PRP$ notice_NN ,_, and_CC carrying_VBG out_RP any_DT specific_JJ orders_NNS which_WDT they_PRP may_MD receive_VB ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN thought_VBN desirable_JJ to_TO give_VB the_DT police_NN any_DT power_NN of_IN making_VBG domiciliary_JJ visits_NNS ,_, or_CC of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ motion_NN removing_VBG the_DT sick_JJ to_TO hospitals_NNS ,_, or_CC interfering_VBG with_IN them_PRP in_IN any_DT way_NN ;_: but_CC when_WRB ,_, on_IN information_NN received_VBN from_IN the_DT police_NN or_CC in_IN the_DT other_JJ ways_NNS provided_VBN for_IN in_IN the_DT rules_NNS ,_, the_DT sanitary_JJ or_CC executive_JJ authorities_NNS in_IN a_DT municipality_NN or_CC cantonment_NN decide_NN on_IN segregation_NN or_CC removal_NN to_TO a_DT public_JJ or_CC private_JJ hospital_NN ,_, then_RB the_DT police_NN may_MD be_VB called_VBN on_IN to_TO assist_VB ._.
APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._. ]_NN
Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
247_CD Isolation_NNP effected_VBD either_RB in_IN the_DT re-_JJ sidence_NN of_IN sick_JJ person_NN or_CC in_IN segregation_JJ hospital_NN or_CC camp_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN represented_VBN to_TO His_PRP$ Honour_NNP that_IN ,_, in_IN isolating_VBG persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN ,_, or_CC within_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN ,_, bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, hardship_NN are_VBP apprehended_VBN unless_IN a_DT detailed_JJ procedure_NN is_VBZ prescribed_VBN ._.
The_DT following_JJ explanations_NNS are_VBP therefore_RB given_VBN ,_, In_IN the_DT revised_JJ rules_NNS published_VBN herewith_VBP it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_DT isolation_NN may_MD be_VB effected_VBN either_DT in_IN the_DT residence_NN of_IN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN or_CC in_IN a_DT segregation_NN hospital_NN or_CC camp_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT matter_NN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ desires_NNS to_TO apply_VB to_TO the_DT native_JJ community_NN the_DT same_JJ rules_NNS which_WDT will_MD apply_VB to_TO the_DT European_NNP community_NN ._.
If_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ authorities_NNS ,_, isolation_NN and_CC segregation_NN can_MD be_VB effectively_RB carried_VBN out_RP at_IN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN 's_POS residence_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO remove_VB such_JJ sick_JJ person_NN to_TO a_DT hospital_NN or_CC segregation_NN camp_NN ;_: but_CC ,_, if_IN isolation_NN and_CC segregation_NN in_IN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN 's_POS residence_NN is_VBZ not_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ authority_NN ,_, practicable_JJ ,_, then_RB it_PRP is_VBZ essential_JJ that_IN such_JJ authority_NN should_MD have_VB the_DT power_NN to_TO direct_VB removal_NN to_TO a_DT segregation_NN camp_NN or_CC hospital_NN established_VBN in_IN a_DT suitable_JJ situation_NN ._.
This_DT segregation_NN camp_NN or_CC hospital_NN may_MD be_VB a_DT suitable_JJ house_NN or_CC hut_NN or_CC collection_NN of_IN huts_NNS licensed_VBN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN a_DT particular_JJ family_NN ;_: or_CC a_DT suitable_JJ house_NN or_CC collection_NN of_IN huts_NNS licensed_VBN for_IN the_DT sole_JJ use_NN of_IN particular_JJ castes_NNS or_CC classes_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ;_: or_CC ,_, lastly_RB ,_, a_DT hospital_NN or_CC collection_NN of_IN huts_NNS established_VBN for_IN the_DT general_JJ use_NN of_IN the_DT public_NN by_IN Government_NNP ._.
The_DT Government_NNP will_MD ,_, whenever_RB necessary_JJ ,_, construct_NN such_JJ huts_NNS or_CC hospitals_NNS ,_, or_CC help_VB private_JJ persons_NNS to_TO construct_VB them_PRP ._.
In_IN designing_VBG these_DT huts_NNS or_CC hospitals_NNS particular_JJ care_NN will_MD be_VB taken_VBN that_IN the_DT customs_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN regarding_VBG the_DT maintenance_NN of_IN parda_NN shall_MD be_VB strictly_RB observed_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN those_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT family_NN who_WP wish_VBZ to_TO accompany_VB the_DT sick_JJ person_NN shall_MD be_VB comfortably_RB accommodated_VBN ,_, submitting_VBG themselves_PRP merely_RB to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ precau-_NN tions_NNS which_WDT are_VBP required_VBN by_IN the_DT rules_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB to_TO be_VB understood_JJ that_IN private_JJ medical_JJ practitioners_NNS of_IN all_DT classes_NNS must_MD be_VB allowed_VBN free_JJ access_NN to_TO the_DT sick_NN who_WP desire_VBP their_PRP$ attendance_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ incumbent_JJ upon_IN no_DT one_NN to_TO submit_VB himself_PRP to_TO European_NNP medical_JJ treatment_NN ._.
Each_DT patient_NN may_MD choose_VB freely_RB his_PRP$ own_JJ medical_JJ attendant_NN ._.
Bodies_NNS dispos-_JJ ed_NN of_IN by_IN friends_NNS in_IN accordance_NN with_IN religious_JJ cus-_JJ toms_NNS subject_JJ to_TO sanitary_JJ precau-_JJ tions_NNS ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT friends_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS of_IN persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP died_VBN of_IN plague_NN will_MD be_VB left_VBN to_TO dispose_VB of_IN their_PRP$ dead_JJ in_IN accordance_NN with_IN their_PRP$ religious_JJ customs_NNS ,_, subject_JJ only_RB to_TO certain_JJ sanitary_JJ precautions_NNS which_WDT do_VBP not_RB conflict_VB with_IN the_DT mortuary_JJ practices_NNS of_IN any_DT religion_NN ;_: but_CC ,_, should_MD un-_JJ fortunately_RB deaths_NNS from_IN plague_JJ become_NN numerous_JJ in_IN any_DT city_NN or_CC town_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO establish_VB burial-grounds_NNS outside_JJ cities_NNS or_CC towns_NNS for_IN the_DT interment_NN of_IN persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP died_VBN of_IN plague_NN and_CC are_VBP not_RB cremated_VBN ._.
These_DT burial-grounds_NNS can_MD be_VB selected_VBN in_IN communication_NN with_IN the_DT heads_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN concerned_VBN and_CC made_VBN over_IN to_TO them_PRP by_IN Government_NNP ._.
248_CD Regulations_NNPS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._.
Use_NNP of_IN quick-_JJ lime_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
Exception_NN has_VBZ been_VBN taken_VBN to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN quicklime_NN in_IN burials_NNS ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP does_VBZ not_RB regard_VB the_DT matter_NN as_IN of_IN essential_JJ importance_NN ._.
In_IN cemeteries_NNS well_RB removed_VBN from_IN the_DT inhabited_JJ portion_NN of_IN a_DT city_NN and_CC well_RB away_RB from_IN the_DT water-supply_NN the_DT precaution_NN will_MD not_RB be_VB required_VBN ._.
In_IN cemeteries_NNS situated_VBN near_IN habitations_NNS the_DT precaution_NN is_VBZ more_RBR necessary_JJ ._.
Objections_NNS to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN quicklime_NN seem_VBP to_TO be_VB met_VBN by_IN a_DT suggestion_NN made_VBN to_TO the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP by_IN a_DT deputa-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT representative_JJ Muhammadan_NNP citizens_NNS of_IN Lucknow_NNP ,_, viz._NN ,_, that_IN if_IN used_VBN ,_, the_DT lime_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO come_VB into_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT coffin_NN (_( takhta_NN )_) or_CC corpse_NN ._.
Assistance_NN by_IN all_DT classes_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP and_CC Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP trusts_VBZ that_IN the_DT necessity_NN for_IN bringing_VBG these_DT rules_NNS into_IN widespread_JJ and_CC general_JJ operation_NN may_MD never_RB arise_VB ;_: but_CC to_TO secure_VB this_DT result_NN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN all_DT classes_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, on_IN the_DT earliest_JJS occurrence_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, is_VBZ essentially_RB necessary_JJ ._.
If_IN the_DT introduction_NN and_CC spread_NN in_IN these_DT provinces_NNS of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB avoided_VBN ,_, all_DT classes_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN must_MD combine_VB to_TO assist_VB the_DT Government_NNP by_IN giving_VBG the_DT earliest_JJS information_NN of_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN bubonic_NN plague_NN which_WDT may_MD come_VB to_TO their_PRP$ knowledge_NN and_CC by_IN helping_VBG the_DT authorities_NNS to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_DT measures_NNS now_RB prescribed_VBP ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN designed_VBN with_IN the_DT sole_JJ object_NN of_IN preventing_VBG the_DT introduction_NN and_CC spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Experience_NN will_MD show_VB whether_IN these_DT rules_NNS meet_VBP all_DT requirements_NNS ,_, or_CC whether_IN they_PRP should_MD be_VB modified_VBN or_CC supplemented_VBN in_IN any_DT other_JJ way_NN ._.

(_( i_NN )_) Duties_NNS of_IN Proprietors_NNS of_IN Land_NNP ._.

I_PRP ._.

Part_NN II.-Rules_NNP relating_NN to_TO Municipalities_NNPS and_CC Cantonments_NNPS ._.

23_CD ._.
The_DT words_NNS ``_`` Health_NNP Officer_NNP ''_'' used_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS include_VBP a_DT duly_NN authorised_JJ Deputy_NNP or_CC Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, a_DT 252_CD Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.

IV_NNP ._.

24_CD ._.
In_IN every_DT municipality_NN and_CC cantonment_NN a_DT committee_NN shall_MD be_VB appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP or_CC cantonment_JJ authority_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN assisting_VBG the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN performing_VBG his_PRP$ duties_NNS under_IN these_DT rules_NNS ._.

Enforcement_NN of_IN simple_JJ sanitary_JJ precautions_NNS ._.
25_CD ._.
In_IN any_DT municipality_NN or_CC cantonment_VB the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP or_CC any_DT Magistrate_NNP authorised_VBN by_IN him_PRP in_IN this_DT behalf_NN may_MD issue_VB general_JJ orders_NNS that_WDT by_IN a_DT certain_JJ specified_JJ date_NN certain_JJ sanitary_JJ precautions_NNS of_IN a_DT simple_JJ nature_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT limewashing_NN of_IN houses_NNS ,_, the_DT cleaning_NN of_IN latrines_NNS ,_, the_DT removal_NN of_IN filth_NN and_CC rubbish_NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_IN ,_, and_CC the_DT persons_NNS to_TO whom_WP the_DT order_NN is_VBZ addressed_VBN shall_MD comply_VB ._.
Notice_NNP to_TO be_VB given_VBN of_IN employment_NN in_IN factories_NNS of_IN persons_NNS from_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
26_CD ._.
Every_DT occupier_NN of_IN a_DT ``_`` factory_NN ''_'' shall_MD ,_, on_IN employing_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ factory_NN any_DT person_NN who_WP has_VBZ come_VBN from_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP or_CC Sind_NNP ,_, immediately_RB give_JJ notice_NN in_IN writing_NN of_IN the_DT fact_NN of_IN such_JJ employ-_JJ ment_NN to_TO the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, and_CC shall_MD report_VB to_TO the_DT Magistrate_NNP the_DT name_NN and_CC address_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN employed_VBN ._.
``_`` The_DT word_NN 'factory_NN '_'' used_VBN in_IN this_DT rule_NN means_VBZ any_DT premises_NNS wherein_VBP is_VBZ carried_VBN on_IN any_DT process_NN for_IN ,_, or_CC incidental_JJ to_TO ,_, making_VBG ,_, altering_VBG ,_, repairing_VBG ,_, ornamenting_VBG ,_, finishing_VBG or_CC otherwise_RB adapting_VBG for_IN use_NN or_CC sale_NN any_DT article_NN or_CC part_NN of_IN an_DT article_NN ,_, and_CC wherein_JJ steam_NN ,_, water_NN or_CC other_JJ mechanical_JJ power_NN is_VBZ used_VBN in_IN aid_NN of_IN any_DT such_JJ process_NN ._. ''_''
Householders_NNS to_TO report_VB plague_NN cases_NNS ._.
27_CD ._.
If_IN in_IN any_DT house_NN a_DT person_NN becomes_VBZ ill_JJ ,_, or_CC dies_NNS of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT owner_NN of_IN such_JJ house_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN the_DT owner_NN be_VB non-resident_JJ ,_, the_DT occupier_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT family_NN resident_NN therein_RB shall_MD forthwith_VB report_NN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN such_JJ illness_NN or_CC death_NN at_IN the_DT nearest_JJS police_NN station_NN ._.

28_CD ._.
If_IN there_EX is_VBZ ,_, or_CC has_VBZ been_VBN ,_, resident_NN in_IN any_DT house_NN a_DT person_NN who_WP has_VBZ come_VBN since_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1897_CD from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, Poona_NNP ,_, Karachi_NNP ,_, or_CC other_JJ place_NN in_IN which_WDT bubonic_JJ plague_NN is_VBZ prevalent_JJ ,_, the_DT owner_NN of_IN such_JJ house_NN or_CC ,_, if_IN the_DT owner_NN be_VB non-resident_JJ ,_, the_DT occupier_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT family_NN resident_NN therein_RB shall_MD report_VB at_IN the_DT nearest_JJS police_NN station_NN (_( 1_CD )_) the_DT illness_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN in_IN such_JJ house_NN ,_, or_CC (_( 2_CD )_) the_DT death_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN in_IN such_JJ house_NN ,_, immediately_RB such_JJ illness_NN is_VBZ apparent_JJ or_CC death_NN occurs_NNS ._.

Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
253_CD Medical_JJ practitioner_NN to_TO report_VB plague_NN cases_NNS ._.
29_CD ._.
Any_DT medical_JJ practitioner_NN who_WP attends_VBZ in_IN any_DT house_NN a_DT case_NN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB to_TO be_VB a_DT case_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN shall_MD forthwith_VB report_NN such_JJ illness_NN to_TO the_DT nearest_JJS police_NN station_NN ._.
Police_NNP officer_NN to_TO report_VB to_TO executive_VB and_CC sanitary_JJ authorities_NNS and_CC to_TO take_VB no_DT further_JJ action_NN without_IN their_PRP$ orders_NNS ._.
30_CD ._.
On_IN receiving_VBG a_DT report_NN of_IN illness_NN or_CC death_NN from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN station_NN shall_MD immediately_RB report_VB the_DT matter_NN to_TO the_DT District_NNP Superintendent_NNP of_IN Police_NNP ,_, the_DT District_NNP or_CC City_NNP Magistrate_NNP and_CC the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC Sanitary_JJ Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT muni-_JJ cipality_NN or_CC cantonment_NN ._.
Should_MD Assistant_NNP Health_NNP or_CC Sanitary_NNP Officers_NNPS be_VB appointed_VBN for_IN any_DT muhalla_NN or_CC section_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, the_DT police_NNS officer_NN may_MD be_VB directed_VBN to_TO report_VB to_TO him_PRP instead_RB of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
Beyond_IN reporting_VBG the_DT fact_NN of_IN illness_NN or_CC death_NN no_DT police_NN officer_NN shall_MD take_VB any_DT action_NN under_IN the_DT rules_NNS in_IN this_DT part_NN ,_, except_IN under_IN a_DT written_VBN order_NN of_IN the_DT executive_NN or_CC sanitary_JJ authority_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP shall_MD be_VB bound_VBN to_TO show_VB ,_, if_IN required_VBN by_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
Plague_NN patients_NNS not_RB to_TO be_VB removed_VBN ,_, except_IN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN to_TO hospital_VB ,_, until_IN the_DT expiry_NN of_IN a_DT six_CD hours_NNS '_POS notice_NN at_IN the_DT police_NN station_NN ._.
31_CD ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) A_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB removed_VBN from_IN the_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PRP is_VBZ at_IN the_DT time_NN lying_VBG unless_IN it_PRP be_VB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN removing_VBG him_PRP to_TO a_DT hospital_NN until_IN after_IN the_DT expiry_NN of_IN six_CD hours_NNS from_IN the_DT time_NN a_DT notice_NN of_IN such_JJ intended_VBN removal_NN shall_MD have_VB been_VBN delivered_VBN at_IN the_DT nearest_JJS police_NN station_NN by_IN ,_, or_CC on_IN behalf_NN of_IN ,_, the_DT friends_NNS of_IN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN or_CC of_IN the_DT owners_NNS or_CC occupiers_NNS of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, unless_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC other_JJ sanitary_JJ or_CC executive_JJ authority_NN has_VBZ permitted_VBN earlier_RBR removal_NN ._.
Similar_JJ rule_NN with_IN regard_NN to_TO bodies_NNS of_IN persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP died_VBN of_IN plague_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT dead_JJ body_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN who_WP has_VBZ died_VBN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB removed_VBN from_IN the_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT death_NN occurred_VBD until_IN after_IN the_DT expiry_NN of_IN six_CD hours_NNS from_IN the_DT time_NN a_DT notice_NN of_IN such_JJ intended_VBN removal_NN shall_MD have_VB been_VBN delivered_VBN at_IN the_DT nearest_JJS police_NN station_NN by_IN ,_, or_CC on_IN behalf_NN of_IN ,_, the_DT friends_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ or_CC of_IN the_DT owners_NNS or_CC occupiers_NNS of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, unless_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC other_JJ sanitary_JJ or_CC executive_JJ authority_NN has_VBZ permitted_VBN earlier_RBR removal_NN ._.
Written_NNP notice_NN may_MD be_VB given_VBN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) It_PRP shall_MD be_VB optional_JJ to_TO the_DT person_NN giving_VBG the_DT notice_NN to_TO deliver_VB a_DT written_VBN notice_NN at_IN the_DT police_NN station_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT station_NN clerk_VBZ shall_MD record_VB on_IN the_DT notice_NN the_DT time_NN of_IN its_PRP$ receipt_NN and_CC shall_MD sign_VB the_DT same_JJ ._.
Friends_NNS of_IN deceased_JJ permitted_VBN to_TO dispose_VB of_IN body_NN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN religious_JJ custom_NN ,_, subject_JJ to_TO sanitary_JJ instructions_NNS ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) The_DT friends_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ shall_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO dispose_VB of_IN the_DT corpse_NN by_IN cremation_NN or_CC burial_NN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN their_PRP$ religious_JJ practices_NNS ,_, but_CC they_PRP shall_MD obey_VB the_DT directions_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC other_JJ sanitary_JJ or_CC executive_JJ authority_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT time_NN ,_, route_NN and_CC method_NN of_IN removing_VBG the_DT corpse_NN to_TO the_DT burial_NN or_CC cremation_NN place_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN the_DT failure_NN or_CC refusal_NN of_IN relatives_NNS or_CC friends_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN to_TO dispose_VB of_IN the_DT body_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD dispose_VB of_IN it_PRP in_IN accord-_JJ ance_NN with_IN the_DT religion_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN ._.
32_CD ._.
The_DT owner_NN and_CC occupier_JJR of_IN a_DT house_NN and_CC the_DT head_NN of_IN any_DT family_NN resident_NN therein_NN ,_, *_NNP and_CC travellers_NNS or_CC others_NNS frequenting_VBG the_DT town_NN or_CC place_NN ,_, *_NNP Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.

IV_NNP ._.

Apartments_NNS occupied_VBN by_IN females_NNS ._.
shall_MD comply_VB with_IN any_DT direction_NN that_WDT may_MD be_VB issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC other_JJ sanitary_JJ or_CC executive_JJ authority_NN with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT disinfection_NN and_CC cleansing_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN ,_, the_DT disinfection_NN or_CC destruction_NN of_IN bedding_NN ,_, clothing_NN and_CC articles_NNS of_IN a_DT similar_JJ nature_NN ,_, the_DT improvement_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT premises_NNS ,_, and_CC with_IN regard_NN to_TO other_JJ sanitary_JJ matters_NNS ;_: and_CC shall_MD permit_VB the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP (_( who_WP should_MD be_VB accompanied_VBN ,_, when-_JJ ever_RB possible_JJ ,_, by_IN a_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT committee_NN appointed_VBN under_IN rule_NN 24_CD )_) to_TO enter_VB his_PRP$ house_NN or_CC premises_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN inspection_NN ._.

In_IN such_JJ inspections_NNS the_DT Health_NNP or_CC Sanitary_JJ Officer_NNP shall_MD always_RB be_VB accompanied_VBN by_IN a_DT male_JJ member_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN ._.

Destruction_NN of_IN non-masonry_JJ structures_NNS ._.
33_CD ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD ,_, if_IN he_PRP considers_VBZ it_PRP necessary_JJ ,_, himself_PRP take_VBP measures_NNS for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN and_CC for_IN the_DT other_JJ matters_NNS referred_VBD to_TO in_IN the_DT preceding_NN rule_NN ._.
Should_MD the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP think_VBP it_PRP necessary_JJ and_CC practicable_JJ to_TO burn_VB or_CC otherwise_VB destroy_JJ any_DT non-_JJ masonry_NN and_CC inflammable_JJ structure_NN ,_, he_PRP will_MD report_VB the_DT case_NN to_TO the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP and_CC act_NN on_IN his_PRP$ orders_NNS ._.
The_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN his_PRP$ absence_NN the_DT Magistrate_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duties_NNS ,_, may_MD order_NN the_DT burning_NN or_CC destruction_NN of_IN any_DT hut_NN or_CC other_JJ temporary_JJ structure_NN ,_, if_IN disinfection_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB satisfactorily_RB effected_VBN otherwise_RB ,_, awarding_VBG compensation_NN to_TO persons_NNS who_WP are_VBP so_RB poor_JJ as_IN to_TO be_VB unable_JJ to_TO replace_VB at_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ expense_NN the_DT structure_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN burnt_VBN or_CC destroyed_VBN ._.

35_CD ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) If_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN a_DT person_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN in_IN any_DT residence_NN and_CC if_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, the_DT residence_NN of_IN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN is_VBZ so_RB situated_JJ and_CC possesses_NNS such_JJ accommodation_NN that_IN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN can_MD be_VB properly_RB isolated_VBN therein_NN or_CC in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ vicinity_NN thereof_NN ,_, such_JJ sick_JJ person_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB removed_VBN from_IN his_PRP$ residence_NN against_IN the_DT will_MD of_IN the_DT family_NN ._.

Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
255_CD such_JJ accommodation_NN that_IN one_CD or_CC more_JJR persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN can_MD be_VB properly_RB isolated_VBN therein_NN or_CC in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ vicinity_NN thereof_NN ._.
Segregation_NN in_IN suitable_JJ private_JJ or_CC caste_NN hospital_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) If_IN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN 's_POS residence_NN does_VBZ not_RB permit_VB of_IN satisfactory_JJ isolation_NN being_VBG effected_VBN in_IN it_PRP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD ,_, if_IN he_PRP thinks_VBZ it_PRP necessary_JJ ,_, require_VB the_DT removal_NN of_IN such_JJ sick_JJ person_NN either_DT to_TO a_DT suitably_RB situated_VBN house_NN or_CC temporary_JJ hut_NN licensed_VBD as_IN a_DT private_JJ hospital_NN for_IN the_DT accommodation_NN of_IN the_DT particular_JJ individual_NN or_CC of_IN his_PRP$ family_NN or_CC to_TO a_DT hospital_NN licensed_VBD for_IN the_DT sole_JJ use_NN of_IN particular_JJ castes_NNS or_CC classes_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN or_CC to_TO a_DT hospital_NN established_VBN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT public_NN ._.
The_DT house_NN or_CC building_NN licensed_VBN as_IN a_DT hospital_NN should_MD be_VB located_VBN as_IN near_IN the_DT residence_NN of_IN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN as_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP considers_NNS safe_JJ ._.

Patients_NNS may_MD employ_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ medical_JJ attendants_NNS and_CC may_MD receive_VB visit_NN from_IN religious_JJ persons_NNS ._.
Accommoda-_JJ tion_NN for_IN females_NNS ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) If_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP decides_VBZ that_IN a_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN shall_MD be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT private_JJ or_CC public_JJ hospital_NN ,_, the_DT friends_NNS and_CC servants_NNS of_IN the_DT person_NN shall_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO accompany_VB him_PRP ,_, subject_JJ to_TO necessary_JJ sanitary_JJ precautions_NNS ._.
The_DT sick_JJ person_NN or_CC his_PRP$ friends_NNS shall_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO employ_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ medical_JJ attend-_JJ ants_NNS and_CC to_TO receive_VB visits_NNS from_IN maulvis_NN ,_, priests_NNS or_CC other_JJ religious_JJ instructors_NNS subject_VBP to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ control_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC shall_MD be_VB under_IN no_DT obligation_NN to_TO submit_VB to_TO European_NNP medical_JJ treat-_JJ ment_NN ._.
Separate_NNP suitable_JJ accommodation_NN shall_MD be_VB provided_VBN for_IN females_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT female_NN who_WP by_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB in_IN public_JJ ,_, parda_VB shall_MD be_VB strictly_RB preserved_VBN both_DT in_IN removal_NN to_TO the_DT private_JJ or_CC public_JJ hospital_NN and_CC during_IN stay_NN there_RB ._.
Segregation_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN of_IN sick_JJ person_NN in_IN own_JJ house_NN ,_, special_JJ accommodation_NN or_CC general_JJ camp_NN ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) Should_MD it_PRP be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO place_VB the_DT family_NN or_CC any_DT of_IN its_PRP$ members_NNS under_IN segregation_NN ,_, this_DT will_MD be_VB effected_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ house_NN if_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP 's_POS opinion_NN ,_, this_DT be_VB possible_JJ ._.
If_IN in_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP 's_POS opinion_NN this_DT be_VB not_RB possible_JJ ,_, then_RB the_DT segregation_NN will_MD be_VB effected_VBN in_IN a_DT suitable_JJ place_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB chosen_VBN by_IN the_DT family_NN and_CC approved_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT general_JJ segre-_JJ gation_NN camp_NN ._.
In_IN any_DT case_NN strict_JJ attention_NN will_MD be_VB paid_VBN to_TO the_DT main-_JJ tenance_NN of_IN the_DT parda_NN and_CC the_DT convenience_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN ._.
Care_NNP of_IN house_NN while_IN under_IN disinfection_NN ._.
A_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT necessary_JJ servants_NNS ,_, or_CC caretakers_NNS ,_, may_MD remain_VB in_IN ,_, or_CC near_IN ,_, the_DT house_NN while_IN under_IN disinfection_NN ._.
Explanation.-Segregation_NN of_IN a_DT whole_JJ family_NN may_MD not_RB always_RB be_VB necessary_JJ ._.
It_PRP may_MD depend_VB on_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN members_NNS in_IN a_DT family_NN or_CC the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN contact_NN with_IN a_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ._.
Thus_RB in_IN a_DT family_NN of_IN three_CD members_NNS ,_, if_IN one_CD were_VBD attacked_VBN by_IN plague_NN ,_, it_PRP might_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO segregate_VB the_DT other_JJ two_CD ._.
If_IN there_EX were_VBD six_CD members_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP two_CD only_RB 256_CD Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._.
had_VBD been_VBN in_IN attendance_NN on_IN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN ,_, the_DT segregation_NN of_IN those_DT two_CD only_RB might_MD suffice_VB ._.
Companions_NNS and_CC attendants_NNS of_IN the_DT sick_NN ._.
36_CD ._.
If_IN in_IN any_DT case_NN a_DT person_NN removed_VBN to_TO a_DT public_JJ or_CC private_JJ hospital_NN is_VBZ accompanied_VBN by_IN friends_NNS or_CC attendants_NNS ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD require_VB so_RB many_JJ of_IN them_PRP as_IN are_VBP not_RB in_IN immediate_JJ attendance_NN on_IN the_DT patient_NN to_TO live_VB in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ neighbourhood_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN in_IN segregation_NN huts_NNS or_CC tents_NNS provided_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN and_CC to_TO remain_VB in_IN such_JJ place_NN until_IN they_PRP receive_VBP permission_NN from_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO depart_VB ._.

37_CD ._.
If_IN a_DT person_NN is_VBZ attacked_VBN with_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN while_IN so_RB segre-_JJ gated_VBN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD remove_VB such_JJ person_NN to_TO a_DT public_JJ or_CC private_JJ hospital_NN and_CC may_MD treat_VB his_PRP$ friends_NNS and_CC attendants_NNS as_IN provided_VBN in_IN the_DT preceding_NN rule_NN ._.

38_CD ._.
Upon_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT sick_JJ person_NN from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS detain_VBP under_IN observation_NN persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN attendance_NN upon_IN him_PRP ,_, in_IN segregation_NN huts_NNS ,_, tents_NNS or_CC suitable_JJ structures_NNS established_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN ,_, if_IN segregation_NN in_IN the_DT house_NN or_CC enclosure_NN be_VB not_RB feasible_JJ ,_, provided_VBD that_IN this_DT rule_NN shall_MD not_RB apply_VB to_TO any_DT medical_JJ practitioner_NN ,_, hakim_NN or_CC baid_NN who_WP may_MD at_IN any_DT time_NN attend_VBP upon_IN a_DT sick_JJ person_NN or_CC to_TO corpse-bearers_NNS ,_, mourners_NNS and_CC friends_NNS who_WP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN in_IN attendance_NN on_IN the_DT deceased_VBN ._.
Evacuation_NN of_IN infected_JJ locality_NN ._.
39_CD ._.
If_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN has_VBZ become_VBN prevalent_NN in_IN a_DT portion_NN of_IN a_DT municipality_NN or_CC cantonment_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC Sanitary_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN may_MD ,_, with_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, direct_VBP the_DT inhabi-_JJ tants_NNS of_IN any_DT street_NN ,_, muhalla_NN or_CC other_JJ locality_NN to_TO evacuate_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, to_TO remove_VB to_TO a_DT temporary_JJ settlement_NN at_IN a_DT distance_NN from_IN the_DT infected_JJ quarter_NN ._.
Each_DT householder_NN shall_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO make_VB suitable_JJ arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT care_NN of_IN his_PRP$ house_NN and_CC property_NN during_IN his_PRP$ absence_NN and_CC the_DT Government_NNP will_MD arrange_VB for_IN the_DT watch_NN and_CC ward_NN of_IN the_DT empty_JJ houses_NNS ._.
After_IN evacuation_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officers_NNP shall_MD arrange_VB for_IN the_DT thorough_JJ disinfection_NN and_CC cleansing_NN of_IN the_DT empty_JJ premises_NNS and_CC shall_MD not_RB permit_VB the_DT inhabitants_NNS to_TO return_VB until_IN the_DT premises_NNS are_VBP considered_VBN to_TO be_VB free_JJ from_IN infection_NN ._.
Persons_NNS dealt_VBP with_IN under_IN fore-_JJ going_VBG rules_NNS to_TO obey_VB instruc-_JJ tions_NNS ._.
40_CD ._.
A_DT person_NN dealt_NN with_IN under_IN the_DT foregoing_NN rules_NNS shall_MD comply_VB with_IN any_DT directions_NNS that_WDT may_MD be_VB given_VBN to_TO him_PRP by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP with_IN regard_NN to_TO his_PRP$ removal_NN to_TO ,_, and_CC resi-_JJ dence_NN in_IN ,_, an_DT observation_NN shed_VBD ,_, public_JJ or_CC private_JJ hospital_NN or_CC place_NN of_IN segregation_NN and_CC with_IN respect_NN to_TO disinfecting_VBG or_CC burning_NN of_IN bedding_NN ,_, clothing_NN and_CC articles_NNS of_IN a_DT similar_JJ nature_NN or_CC with_IN respect_NN to_TO any_DT other_JJ sanitary_JJ matter_NN ._.
He_PRP shall_MD not_RB depart_VB from_IN any_DT such_JJ place_NN without_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
41_CD ._.
If_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN burial_JJ be_VB one_CD set_VBN apart_RB by_IN Government_NNP as_IN suitable_JJ for_IN the_DT interment_NN of_IN corpses_NNS of_IN persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP died_VBN of_IN APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._. ]_NN
Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
257_CD Disposal_NNP of_IN corpses_NNS ._.
plague_NN or_CC an_DT ordinary_JJ burial_JJ place_NN distant_NN from_IN habitations_NNS or_CC sources_NNS of_IN water-supply_NN ,_, it_PRP shall_MD be_VB sufficient_JJ to_TO bury_VB the_DT body_NN six_CD feet_NNS deep_JJ ._.
If_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN burial_JJ be_VB a_DT graveyard_NN in_IN which_WDT by_IN reason_NN of_IN its_PRP$ prox-_JJ imity_NN to_TO habitations_NNS or_CC water-supply_JJ special_JJ precautions_NNS are_VBP necessary_JJ ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD ,_, in_IN addition_NN ,_, require_VBP the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT grave_NN by_IN placing_VBG a_DT layer_NN of_IN chloride_NN of_IN lime_NN in_IN the_DT grave_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT case_NN ,_, 2_CD feet_NNS of_IN earth_NN shall_MD be_VB interposed_VBN between_IN the_DT lime_NN and_CC the_DT corpse_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN lime_NN shall_MD not_RB come_VB in_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT corpse_NN ._.
The_DT coffin_NN and_CC cloth_NN used_VBN to_TO cover_VB the_DT corpse_NN ,_, when_WRB not_RB interred_VBN with_IN the_DT corpse_NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN by_IN the_DT relatives_NNS under_IN directions_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, such_JJ directions_NNS being_VBG in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT religious_JJ observances_NNS and_CC customs_NNS of_IN the_DT family_NN ._.
In_IN cases_NNS where_WRB cremation_NN is_VBZ the_DT custom_NN ,_, the_DT body_NN shall_MD be_VB completely_RB burned_VBN at_IN the_DT usual_JJ burn-_JJ ing_NN ght_NN or_CC other_JJ isolated_JJ locality_NN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN custom_NN ,_, the_DT cloths_NNS brought_VBD in_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT body_NN being_VBG either_CC burnt_JJ according_VBG to_TO custom_NN or_CC disinfected_VBN ._.
42_CD ._.
All_DT police_NN officers_NNS shall_MD give_VB to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officers_NNP such_JJ assistance_NN as_IN he_PRP may_MD consider_VB necessary_JJ in_IN carrying_VBG out_RP these_DT rules_NNS ._.
Memorandum_NN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN Police_NNP Officers_NNP and_CC others_NNS in_IN case_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Villages_NNP and_CC smaller_JJR Towns_NNP ._.
Symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN are_VBP fever_NN of_IN recent_JJ commencement_NN ,_, violent_JJ headache_NN ,_, severe_JJ pain_NN in_IN the_DT back_NN and_CC limbs_NN and_CC lassitude_NN ._.
The_DT glands_NNS in_IN the_DT groin_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT armpit_NN or_CC neck_NN ,_, are_VBP generally_RB swollen_VBN and_CC tender_NN ._.
Cough_NNP and_CC pain_NN in_IN the_DT lungs_NNS are_VBP frequently_RB observed_VBN and_CC delirium_NN often_RB comes_VBZ on_IN early_JJ in_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Death_NNP often_RB occurs_VBZ in_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT great_JJ majority_NN of_IN people_NNS attacked_VBN by_IN plague_NN die_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT main_JJ object_NN therefore_NN should_MD be_VB to_TO keep_VB as_IN far_RB away_RB as_IN possible_JJ from_IN people_NNS infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
If_IN plague_JJ exists_NNS in_IN a_DT village_NN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN all_PDT the_DT surrounding_VBG villages_NNS should_MD abstain_VB from_IN all_DT dealings_NNS with_IN that_DT village_NN till_VBD the_DT plague_NN ceases_NNS ._.
They_PRP should_MD neither_RB go_VB into_IN the_DT infected_JJ village_NN nor_CC allow_VB any_DT person_NN from_IN the_DT infected_JJ village_NN to_TO come_VB into_IN their_PRP$ village_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
In_IN like_JJ manner_NN in_IN an_DT infected_JJ village_NN a_DT family_NN free_JJ from_IN the_DT disease_NN should_MD not_RB go_VB near_IN a_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT disease_NN exists_VBZ ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT best_JJS way_NN of_IN preventing_VBG the_DT plague_NN from_IN spreading_VBG is_VBZ to_TO segregate_VB the_DT sick_JJ person_NN till_IN he_PRP recovers_VBZ or_CC dies_VBZ ;_: and_CC ,_, as_IN the_DT plague_NN takes_VBZ ten_JJ days_NNS to_TO incubate_VB ,_, the_DT attendants_NNS on_IN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN should_MD be_VB kept_VBN apart_RB for_IN at_IN least_JJS ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
b_NN 33_CD ?_. 258_CD Regulations_NNPS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._.
Method_NNP of_IN segregation_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN and_CC of_IN his_PRP$ attendants_NNS ._.
6_CD ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) If_IN the_DT person_NN who_WP is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN is_VBZ living_VBG in_IN a_DT large_JJ roomy_NN house_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PRP can_MD occupy_VB a_DT separate_JJ room_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ attendants_NNS can_MD be_VB kept_VBN separate_JJ from_IN others_NNS in_IN that_DT house_NN ,_, then_RB he_PRP should_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO remain_VB there_RB ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) If_IN the_DT person_NN who_WP is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN be_VB living_VBG in_IN a_DT hut_NN or_CC such_PDT a_DT small_JJ house_NN that_IN he_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB kept_VBN separate_JJ from_IN others_NNS in_IN that_DT house_NN ,_, then_RB he_PRP should_MD be_VB removed_VBN at_IN once_RB to_TO a_DT small_JJ chappar_NN hut_NN to_TO be_VB constructed_VBN of_IN grass_NN screens_NNS and_CC erected_VBN well_RB away_RB from_IN habitations_NNS ._.
The_DT sites_NNS should_MD ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, be_VB shady_JJ ,_, and_CC near_IN a_DT well_NN ._.
This_DT well_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB used_VBN by_IN other_JJ people_NNS ,_, if_IN there_EX are_VBP more_JJR than_IN one_CD well_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
The_DT sick_JJ person_NN 's_POS relatives_NNS and_CC friends_NNS may_MD accompany_VB and_CC remain_VB with_IN him_PRP ,_, provided_VBD that_IN they_PRP remain_VBP apart_RB and_CC abstain_VB from_IN communication_NN with_IN other_JJ people_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
The_DT village_NN authorities_NNS should_MD see_VB that_IN arrangements_NNS are_VBP made_VBN for_IN the_DT supply_NN of_IN food_NN ,_, fuel_NN ,_, etc_FW ._.
Ample_JJ accommodation_NN should_MD be_VB provided_VBN separately_RB for_IN males_NNS ,_, females_NNS and_CC families_NNS when_WRB the_DT house_NN is_VBZ temporarily_RB abandoned_VBN ._.
7_CD ._.
In_IN all_DT cases_NNS ,_, the_DT chief_JJ zamndrs_NN or_CC their_PRP$ agent_NN ,_, the_DT patwri_NN ,_, the_DT village_NN head_NN man_NN and_CC chaukidr_NN should_MD take_VB steps_NNS to_TO see_VB that_IN these_DT orders_NNS are_VBP carried_VBN out_IN without_IN interference_NN with_IN the_DT religious_JJ or_CC social_JJ customs_NNS of_IN the_DT family_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
A_DT ``_`` chappar_NN ``_`` hut_NN ,_, after_IN occupation_NN by_IN a_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB burnt_VBN ,_, and_CC this_DT should_MD also_RB be_VB done_VBN to_TO the_DT chrpi_NN upon_IN which_WDT the_DT person_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN to_TO ,_, or_CC which_WDT he_PRP uses_VBZ in_IN the_DT hut_NN ._.
The_DT well_NN should_MD ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, be_VB completely_RB cleaned_VBN out_RP and_CC disinfected_VBD ._.
Method_NNP of_IN disinfection_NN of_IN houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT a_DT death_NN from_IN plague_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ._.
9_CD ._.
If_IN the_DT house_NN be_VB a_DT small_JJ hut_NN of_IN small_JJ value_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT can_MD be_VB done_VBN safely_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ best_RBS to_TO burn_VB the_DT hut_NN ;_: but_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN better_JJR houses_NNS ,_, the_DT following_JJ measures_NNS should_MD be_VB adopted_VBN :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) The_DT floor_NN of_IN the_DT rooms_NNS used_VBN by_IN the_DT sick_JJ persons_NNS should_MD ,_, if_IN of_IN earth_NN ,_, be_VB dug_VBN out_RP to_TO a_DT depth_NN of_IN two_CD inches_NNS and_CC removed_VBD to_TO a_DT spot_NN well_RB away_RB from_IN habitations_NNS ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Half_PDT a_DT seer_NN of_IN sulphur_NN should_MD be_VB burnt_VBN in_IN the_DT room_NN ,_, the_DT doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS being_VBG closed_VBD during_IN the_DT operation_NN ._.
*_NN Where_NNP possible_JJ ,_, the_DT sulphur_NN employed_VBN for_IN burning_VBG in_IN huts_NNS and_CC rooms_NNS should_MD first_RB be_VB well_RB moistened_VBN with_IN methylated_JJ spirit_NN ._.
A_DT large_JJ wide-mouthed_JJ metal_NN vessel_NN containing_VBG at_IN least_JJS a_DT seer_NN of_IN water_NN should_MD be_VB placed_VBN over_IN a_DT slow_JJ charcoal_NN fire_NN in_IN the_DT room_NN and_CC the_DT water_NN be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO slowly_VB boil_NN away_RB ,_, at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN that_IN the_DT sulphur_NN is_VBZ burning_VBG ._.
The_DT object_NN is_VBZ to_TO keep_VB the_DT air_NN moist_NN ._.
Sulphur_NNP is_VBZ recommended_VBN for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN huts_NNS and_CC houses_NNS ,_, *_NNP Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.
414/XVI-404-B_JJ ._.

259_CD because_IN it_PRP is_VBZ cheap_JJ and_CC generally_RB procurable_JJ ._.
But_CC it_PRP should_MD be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN a_DT very_RB slight_JJ covering_VBG pro-_JJ tects_NNS germs_NNS of_IN disease_NN from_IN its_PRP$ action_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT other_JJ measures_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN ,_, especially_RB the_DT thorough_JJ limewash-_JJ ing_NN of_IN roofs_NN ,_, floors_NNS and_CC walls_NNS ,_, should_MD be_VB very_RB thoroughly_RB and_CC carefully_RB carried_VBD out_RP ._.
(_( c_NN )_) The_DT roof_NN ,_, floor_NN and_CC walls_NNS should_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB limewashed_VBN ._.
(_( d_NN )_) All_PDT the_DT drains_NNS should_MD be_VB washed_VBN down_RP with_IN the_DT best_JJS dis-_JJ infectant_NN available_JJ at_IN the_DT nearest_JJS dispensary_NN or_CC thana_NN ,_, which_WDT will_MD be_VB supplied_VBN without_IN payment_NN ._.
(_( e_NN )_) All_DT doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS should_MD be_VB then_RB thrown_VBN open_JJ and_CC the_DT house_NN vacated_VBD for_IN fourteen_JJ days_NNS ._.
Method_NNP of_IN disinfection_NN of_IN clothes_NNS and_CC bedding_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
Upon_IN the_DT recovery_NN or_CC the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT clothes_NNS and_CC beddings_NNS of_IN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN and_CC his_PRP$ attendants_NNS should_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB boiled_VBN and_CC then_RB spread_VB out_RP in_IN the_DT sun_NN and_CC wind_NN for_IN 48_CD hours_NNS ._.
Clothing_NN and_CC bedding_NN of_IN small_JJ value_NN should_MD be_VB burnt_VBN ._.
Disposal_NNP of_IN bodies_NNS ._.
The_DT corpse_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN known_VBN or_CC suspected_VBN to_TO have_VB died_VBN from_IN plague_NN should_MD be_VB disposed_VBN of_IN by_IN the_DT friends_NNS in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT usual_JJ customs_NNS ._.
In_IN case_NN of_IN cremation_NN the_DT body_NN should_MD be_VB completely_RB burnt_VBN in_IN an_DT isolated_JJ place_NN ._.
In_IN case_NN of_IN burial_NN ,_, the_DT body_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB buried_VBN at_IN least_JJS 6_CD feet_NNS deep_JJ ._.
The_DT place_NN of_IN burial_NN should_MD be_VB well_RB away_RB from_IN habitations_NNS and_CC sources_NNS of_IN water-supply_NN ._.

limits_NNS ._.
1_CD ._.

302_CD ,_, dated_VBD 4th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP Gen-_NNP eral_NN of_IN India_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP of_IN the_DT North-_NNP Western_NNP Provinces_NNP and_CC Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Oudh_NNP is_VBZ pleased_JJ to_TO make_VB the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS under_IN Act_NNP No_NNP ._.
III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD (_( an_DT Act_NNP to_TO pro-_JJ vide_NN for_IN the_DT better_JJR prevention_NN of_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN Dangerous_NNP Epidemic_NNP Disease_NNP )_) :_: -_: Disinfection_NN and_CC destruction_NN of_IN rags_NNS ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN may_MD cause_VB to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN or_CC ,_, with_IN the_DT concurrence_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, des-_JJ troyed_VBD any_DT collection_NN of_IN rags_NNS in_IN rag-pickers_NNS '_POS houses_NNS ,_, rag_NN stores_NNS ,_, paper_NN mills_NNS ,_, or_CC elsewhere_RB ._.

3_CD ._.

302_CD ,_, dated_VBD 4th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Hon'ble_NNP the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP being_VBG satisfied_VBD that_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP is_VBZ threat-_JJ ened_VBN with_IN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN a_DT dangerous_JJ epidemic_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN are_VBP insufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN preventing_VBG such_JJ outbreak_NN ,_, is_VBZ pleased_JJ to_TO prescribe_VB the_DT following_JJ Regulations_NNS for_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN persons_NNS travelling_VBG ?_. Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
261_CD by_IN railway_NN and_CC the_DT segregation_NN of_IN persons_NNS suspected_VBN of_IN being_VBG in-_JJ fected_VBN with_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN other_JJ matters_NNS under_IN sub-section_NN (_( 1_CD )_) and_CC sub-clause_NN (_( b_NN )_) of_IN sub-section_NN (_( 2_CD )_) of_IN section_NN 2_CD of_IN the_DT Epide-_NNP mic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1897_CD :_: -_: I.-In_JJ the_DT following_JJ Regulations_NNS :_: -_: Definitions_NNS ._.
``_`` Place_NN of_IN inspection_NN ''_'' means_VBZ any_DT place_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB notified_VBN by_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP to_TO be_VB a_DT place_NN of_IN inspection_NN ._.
``_`` Inspecting_NNP Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ''_'' means_VBZ a_DT person_NN appointed_VBN by_IN an_DT order_NN in_IN writing_NN by_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP to_TO be_VB an_DT Inspecting_NNP Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ._.
Notification_NN of_IN inspection_NN sta-_JJ tions_NNS ._.
II.-The_NNP Local_JJ Government_NNP may_MD notify_VB any_DT railway_NN station_NN or_CC any_DT place_NN in_IN the_DT vicinity_NN thereof_NN to_TO be_VB a_DT place_NN of_IN inspection_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD by_IN order_NN in_IN writing_VBG appoint_NN one_CD or_CC more_JJR Inspecting_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP for_IN the_DT same_JJ ._.
Deputation_NN of_IN functions_NNS by_IN In-_NNP specting_VBG Officer_NNP ._.

Platform_VB in-_JJ spection_NN ._.

302_CD ,_, dated_VBD 4th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Honour-_NNP able_JJ the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP ,_, being_VBG satisfied_VBD that_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP is_VBZ threatened_VBN with_IN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN a_DT dangerous_JJ epidemic_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN are_VBP insufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN preventing_VBG such_JJ outbreak_NN ,_, is_VBZ pleased_JJ to_TO prescribe_VB the_DT following_JJ Regulations_NNS under_IN sub-section_NN (_( 1_CD )_) and_CC sub-clause_NN (_( b_NN )_) of_IN sub-section_NN (_( 2_CD )_) of_IN section_NN 2_CD of_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP :_: -_: Report_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN municipalities_NNS ._.

Persons_NNS bound_VBP to_TO make_VB reports_NNS ._.
II.-The_JJ following_VBG persons_NNS shall_MD report_VB the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN under_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS set_VBD forth_NN in_IN each_DT sub-_JJ clause_NN respectively_RB within_IN three_CD hours_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ coming_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ notice_NN to_TO an_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT police_NN station_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN cases_NNS where_WRB the_DT disease_NN appears_VBZ at_IN a_DT place_NN more_JJR than_IN three_CD miles_NNS from_IN the_DT nearest_JJS police_NN station_NN ,_, to_TO a_DT village_NN lambardar_NN ,_, namely_RB :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) When_WRB the_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurs_NNS in_IN any_DT house_NN ,_, the_DT eldest_JJS adult_NN residing_VBG in_IN such_JJ house_NN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ not_RB himself_PRP or_CC herself_PRP attacked_VBN by_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.

Symptoms_NNS and_CC treatment_NN ._.
Symptoms_NNS ._.
The_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN are_VBP fever_NN of_IN recent_JJ commencement_NN ,_, severe_JJ headache_NN ,_, great_JJ depression_NN ,_, marked_VBD weakness_NN ,_, severe_JJ backache_NN ,_, also_RB frequently_RB pain_VBP in_IN the_DT chest_NN and_CC cough_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT fever_NN has_VBZ lasted_VBN two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS ,_, there_EX are_VBP sometimes_RB painful_JJ swellings_NNS in_IN the_DT groin_NN or_CC armpits_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ often_RB delerium_JJ and_CC rapid_JJ sinking_NN ,_, the_DT patient_NN dying_VBG in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS on_IN the_DT second_JJ or_CC third_JJ day_NN ._.
Treatment_NN ._.
The_DT treatment_NN consists_VBZ in_IN having_VBG a_DT free_JJ supply_NN of_IN fresh_JJ air_NN ._.
All_DT doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS should_MD be_VB kept_VBN open_JJ ._.
A_DT purgative_NN should_MD be_VB given_VBN unless_IN the_DT patient_NN has_VBZ diarrha_VBN ._.
Cool_JJ drinks_NNS and_CC sherbets_NNS of_IN lime-_JJ juice_NN may_MD be_VB given_VBN ,_, and_CC food_NN in_IN small_JJ quantities_NNS but_CC frequently_RB ._.
Suitable_JJ foods_NNS are_VBP arrowroot_JJ or_CC sago_JJ thinly_RB made_VBD ,_, thin_JJ whey_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN the_DT patient_NN 's_POS caste_NN allows_VBZ it_PRP ,_, soup_NN ._.
Any_DT of_IN these_DT may_MD be_VB given_VBN in_IN quantities_NNS of_IN a_DT chittack_NN every_DT second_JJ hour_NN ._.
Any_DT attempt_NN to_TO give_VB patients_NNS ordinary_JJ large_JJ meals_NNS or_CC solid_JJ food_NN would_MD be_VB injurious_JJ ._.
When_WRB there_EX are_VBP swellings_NNS ,_, hot_JJ fomentations_NNS or_CC hot_JJ poultices_NNS should_MD be_VB applied_VBN to_TO them_PRP ._.
Excretions_NNS ._.
The_DT fcal_JJ or_CC vomited_JJ matter_NN and_CC urine_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN should_MD be_VB buried_VBN at_IN least_JJS two_CD feet_NNS deep_VBP at_IN some_DT distance_NN from_IN the_DT hut_NN Segregation_NNP and_CC Disinfection_NNP ._.
Segregation_NN of_IN patients_NNS ._.
Rela-_JJ tives_NNS to_TO be_VB al-_JJ lowed_VBN to_TO accom-_JJ pany_JJ patient_NN ._.
If_IN a_DT patient_NN is_VBZ living_VBG in_IN a_DT town_NN or_CC village_NN he_PRP or_CC she_PRP should_MD be_VB removed_VBN as_RB quickly_RB as_IN possible_JJ to_TO a_DT grass_NN shed_VBN ._.
All_DT that_DT is_VBZ necessary_JJ is_VBZ a_DT roof_NN to_TO keep_VB the_DT heat_NN off_IN and_CC light_JJ screen_NN walls_NNS ._.
The_DT more_RBR open_JJ b_NN 35_CD 274_CD Regulations_NNPS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._.
the_DT structure_NN the_DT better_JJR ._.
One_CD or_CC two_CD relatives_NNS should_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO accompany_VB the_DT sick_JJ person_NN and_CC to_TO remain_VB in_IN attendance_NN on_IN him_PRP or_CC her_PRP ._.
These_DT attendants_NNS should_MD not_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO enter_VB the_DT village_NN or_CC town_NN so_RB long_RB as_IN they_PRP are_VBP in_IN such_JJ attendance_NN and_CC for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS after_IN the_DT recovery_NN or_CC death_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN ._.
Arrangements_NNS should_MD be_VB made_VBN for_IN food_NN being_VBG carried_VBN to_TO the_DT sick_JJ person_NN and_CC attendants_NNS ,_, but_CC whoever_WDT takes_VBZ the_DT food_NN should_MD not_RB enter_VB the_DT hut_NN where_WRB the_DT sick_JJ person_NN is_VBZ ._.
Segregation_NN of_IN the_DT healthy_JJ living_NN in_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
All_DT people_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN living_VBG in_IN the_DT house_NN or_CC hut_NN where_WRB the_DT sickness_NN took_VBD place_NN should_MD be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT grass_NN hut_NN at_IN some_DT little_JJ distance_NN from_IN the_DT town_NN or_CC village_NN ._.
Separate_NNP huts_NNS for_IN males_NNS and_CC females_NNS may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ ._.
Similar_JJ arrangements_NNS to_TO those_DT just_RB men-_JJ tioned_VBD should_MD be_VB made_VBN for_IN their_PRP$ food_NN and_CC water_NN ._.
They_PRP ought_MD not_RB to_TO be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO draw_VB water_NN from_IN wells_VBZ themselves_PRP ._.
After_IN ten_JJ days_NNS if_IN no_DT disease_NN appears_VBZ amongst_VBP them_PRP they_PRP may_MD return_VB to_TO the_DT village_NN ._.
Disinfection_NN or_CC destruction_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
The_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN should_MD be_VB burnt_JJ if_IN of_IN grass_NN ._.
If_IN masonry_NN or_CC mud_NN ,_, the_DT ceiling_NN and_CC walls_NNS should_MD be_VB whitewashed_VBN and_CC the_DT earthen_JJ floor_NN dug_VBD up_RP for_IN three_CD inches_NNS deep_RB ._.
This_DT earth_NN should_MD then_RB be_VB removed_VBN and_CC burned_VBN outside_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
The_DT doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS should_MD be_VB left_VBN wide_JJ open_JJ for_IN twelve_JJ days_NNS ;_: the_DT house_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB re-occupied_JJ before_IN this_DT time_NN ._.
Disinfection_NN or_CC destruction_NN of_IN infected_JJ cloth-_JJ ing_NN ,_, bedding_NN ,_, etc_FW ._.
Light_NNP and_CC air_NN are_VBP most_RBS useful_JJ purifiers_NNS ._.
The_DT clothing_NN and_CC bed-_JJ ding_NN of_IN a_DT sick_JJ person_NN and_CC his_PRP$ attendants_NNS ,_, if_IN of_IN no_DT value_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB burnt_VBN ._.
If_IN of_IN better_JJR quality_NN ,_, they_PRP ought_MD to_TO be_VB thoroughly_RB boiled_VBN and_CC then_RB dried_VBN in_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.
Charpoys_NNS used_VBN by_IN the_DT plague_NN patients_NNS should_MD invariably_RB be_VB burnt_VBN ._.
Disposal_NNP of_IN corpses_NNS ._.
Dead_JJ bodies_NNS should_MD be_VB buried_VBN six_CD feet_NNS deep_RB ,_, if_IN Muhammadan_NNP ,_, in_IN a_DT place_NN distant_NN from_IN town_NN and_CC from_IN water-supply_NN ._.
If_IN Hindu_NNP ,_, they_PRP should_MD be_VB completely_RB burnt_VBN in_IN an_DT isolated_JJ place_NN ._.
The_DT clothing_NN of_IN people_NNS who_WP carry_VBP dead_JJ bodies_NNS ought_MD to_TO be_VB thoroughly_RB boiled_VBN ._.
RULES_NNP REGARDING_NNP VEHICLES_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
64_CD ._.
Notification_NN No_DT ._.
467_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 22nd_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Preamble_JJ ._.
In_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT powers_NNS conferred_VBN by_IN the_DT Notification_NNP of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
302_CD ,_, dated_VBD 4th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Honour-_NNP able_JJ the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP ,_, being_VBG satisfied_VBD that_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP is_VBZ threatened_VBN with_IN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN a_DT dangerous_JJ epidemic_NN ,_, namely_RB bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN are_VBP insufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN preventing_VBG such_JJ outbreak_NN ,_, is_VBZ pleased_JJ to_TO prescribe_VB the_DT following_JJ regulation_NN under_IN sub-section_NN (_( 1_CD )_) and_CC sub-clause_NN (_( b_NN )_) of_IN sub-_JJ section_NN (_( 2_CD )_) of_IN section_NN 2_CD of_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1897_CD :_: -_: APP_NN ._.
IV_NNP ._. ]_NN
Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
275_CD Public_JJ con-_NN veyances_NNS not_RB to_TO carry_VB plague_JJ patients_NNS ._.

Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
277_CD infected_VBN with_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, or_CC is_VBZ or_CC has_VBZ been_VBN suffering_VBG from_IN that_DT disease_NN ,_, or_CC which_WDT is_VBZ or_CC has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN the_DT possession_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN whom_WP he_PRP considers_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN in_IN dangerous_JJ proximity_NN to_TO any_DT such_JJ person_NN ._.

A.-Instructions_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT treatment_NN of_IN buildings_NNS and_CC sheds_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN occupied_VBN by_IN persons_NNS infected_VBN with_IN Plague_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
Fire_NN is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS effective_JJ means_NNS of_IN destroying_VBG the_DT bacillus_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
All_DT grass_NN huts_NNS and_CC buildings_NNS of_IN small_JJ value_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN occupied_VBN by_IN a_DT plague_JJ patient_NN should_MD therefore_RB be_VB burned_VBN down_RP wherever_RBR this_DT can_MD be_VB done_VBN without_IN excessive_JJ danger_NN to_TO surrounding_VBG property_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Buildings_NNS which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ for_IN any_DT reason_NN not_RB considered_VBN desirable_JJ to_TO burn_VB down_RP should_MD be_VB dealt_VBN with_IN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: I.-Having_NN removed_VBD all_DT furniture_NN ,_, the_DT walls_NNS ,_, floors_NNS and_CC the_DT inner_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT roof_NN or_CC ceiling_NN should_MD be_VB sprayed_VBN or_CC hosed_VBN with_IN water_NN containing_VBG a_DT powerful_JJ disinfectant_NN ._.
The_DT furniture_NN should_MD be_VB similarly_RB treated_VBN (_( though_IN articles_NNS of_IN little_JJ value_NN may_MD with_IN advantage_NN be_VB burned_VBN )_) ._.
II.-The_JJ best_RBS disinfectant_NN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN is_VBZ a_DT solution_NN of_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN otherwise_RB known_VBN as_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN (_( 1_CD part_NN to_TO 1,000_CD parts_NNS of_IN water_NN or_CC 1_CD ounce_NN to_TO 6_CD gallons_NNS ,_, a_DT quantity_NN which_WDT when_WRB sprayed_VBN carefully_RB will_MD disinfect_VB from_IN 2,000_CD to_TO 3,000_CD square_JJ feet_NNS of_IN surface_NN )_) ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ understood_JJ that_IN large_JJ quantities_NNS of_IN this_DT can_MD be_VB obtained_VBN from_IN Messrs._NNP Waldie_NNP &_CC Co._NNP ,_, Calcutta_NNP ,_, Messrs._NNP Smith_NNP ,_, and_CC Stanistreet_NNP ,_, or_CC Messrs._NNP Peake_NNP ,_, Allen_NNP &_CC Co._NNP ,_, Lucknow_NNP ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN from_IN other_JJ nearer_NN sources_NNS ._.
III.-Failing_JJ perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN ,_, biniodide_NN of_IN mercury_NN (_( 1_CD per_IN 5,000_CD solution_NN )_) or_CC carbolic_JJ acid_NN (_( 20_CD per_IN 100_CD solution_NN )_) may_MD be_VB used_VBN in_IN lieu_NN ._.
IV.-It_NNP is_VBZ a_DT wise_JJ precaution_NN to_TO colour_VB the_DT solution_NN of_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN with_IN aniline_JJ blue_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT possibility_NN of_IN poisoning_NN ._.
Persons_NNS engaged_VBN in_IN the_DT work_NN should_MD be_VB ?_. 278_CD Regulations_NNPS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._.
occasionally_RB examined_VBN to_TO see_VB that_IN no_DT signs_NNS of_IN mercurial_JJ poisoning_NN are_VBP present_JJ ._.
V.-The_JJ spraying_NN or_CC hosing_NN may_MD be_VB done_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT wooden_JJ gardener_NN 's_POS syringe_NN with_IN a_DT rose_VBD over_IN the_DT end_NN ._.
Wooden_NNP buckets_NNS should_MD be_VB employed_VBN for_IN holding_VBG the_DT solution_NN ,_, as_IN mercury_NN acts_VBZ upon_JJ metals_NNS ._.
Failing_VBG wooden_JJ buckets_NNS ,_, earthen_VBP gumlahs_NN or_CC glazed_VBN earthenware_NN may_MD be_VB used_VBN and_CC should_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN after_IN use_NN ._.
A_DT mop_NN may_MD be_VB used_VBN to_TO spread_VB the_DT disinfectant_NN if_IN a_DT syringe_NN is_VBZ not_RB procurable_JJ ._.
VI.-One_NN of_IN the_DT objects_NNS of_IN the_DT spraying_NN or_CC hosing_NN is_VBZ to_TO lay_VB dust_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT dangerous_JJ vehicle_NN of_IN disease_NN ._.
All_DT crevices_NNS or_CC places_NNS where_WRB dust_NN lodges_NNS should_MD therefore_RB be_VB thoroughly_RB soaked_VBN with_IN the_DT disinfecting_VBG solution_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT same_JJ reason_NN every_DT effort_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN not_RB to_TO raise_VB dust_NN in_IN a_DT plague-infected_JJ dwelling_NN ._.
VII.-If_NNP in_IN any_DT case_NN disinfectants_NNS are_VBP not_RB immediately_RB avail-_JJ able_JJ ,_, another_DT method_NN of_IN treating_VBG interiors_NNS is_VBZ to_TO light_VB small_JJ fires_NNS all_DT over_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, spreading_VBG out_RP the_DT red_JJ cinders_NNS so_RB as_IN to_TO thoroughly_VB scorch_PDT the_DT entire_JJ floor_NN and_CC raise_VB the_DT temperature_NN of_IN the_DT room_NN or_CC hut_NN to_TO the_DT highest_JJS point_NN possible_JJ above_IN 140_CD Fahrenheit_NNP ,_, as_IN at_IN this_DT tempera-_JJ ture_NN the_DT germ_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO die_VB ._.
VIII.-When_NNP the_DT rooms_NNS have_VBP had_VBN their_PRP$ preliminary_JJ treatment_NN by_IN fire_NN or_CC by_IN spraying_VBG with_IN disinfectants_NNS ,_, the_DT floor_NN ,_, if_IN kacha_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB dug_VBN up_RP to_TO the_DT depth_NN of_IN 3_CD or_CC 4_CD inches_NNS and_CC the_DT loose_JJ earth_NN mixed_JJ with_IN fresh_JJ lime_NN which_WDT will_MD act_VB upon_VB it_PRP as_IN a_DT disinfectant_NN ._.
This_DT earth_NN should_MD then_RB be_VB carried_VBN away_RB ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, in_IN a_DT covered_JJ vessel_NN ,_, and_CC buried_VBD at_IN a_DT distance_NN from_IN all_DT human_JJ habitations_NNS ._.
The_DT walls_NNS of_IN the_DT room_NN or_CC rooms_NNS should_MD then_RB be_VB whitewashed_VBN and_CC the_DT building_NN left_VBD uninhabited_JJ for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN twelve_JJ days_NNS ._.
IX.-It_NNP will_MD always_RB assist_VB the_DT process_NN of_IN disinfection_NN to_TO leave_VB a_DT building_NN or_CC room_NN open_JJ to_TO sun_VB and_CC air_NN by_IN removing_VBG the_DT doors_NNS ,_, windows_NNS and_CC even_RB the_DT roof_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT is_VBZ recom-_JJ mended_VBN as_IN a_DT supplementary_JJ method_NN when_WRB feasible_NN ._.
X.-Persons_NNS with_IN scratches_NNS ,_, cuts_NNS or_CC sores_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ persons_NNS ,_, especially_RB on_IN the_DT hands_NNS ,_, feet_NNS or_CC face_NN ,_, seem_VBP to_TO be_VB espe-_JJ cially_RB liable_JJ to_TO become_VB infected_JJ and_CC therefore_RB ought_MD not_RB to_TO be_VB employed_VBN on_IN plague_NN cleansings_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB observed_VBN that_IN no_DT mention_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN in_IN the_DT foregoing_NN of_IN aerial_JJ disinfection_NN ,_, e.g._NN ,_, by_IN burning_VBG sulphur_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._. ]_NN
Regulations_NNS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
279_CD because_IN there_EX is_VBZ good_JJ reason_NN to_TO distrust_VB the_DT efficacy_NN of_IN such_JJ processes_NNS ._.
The_DT direct_JJ propagation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN the_DT atmosphere_NN is_VBZ limited_VBN and_CC a_DT room_NN must_MD be_VB hermetically_RB closed_VBN to_TO allow_VB of_IN fumiga-_JJ tion_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ best_RB therefore_RB not_RB to_TO attempt_VB aerial_JJ disinfection_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
All_DT rags_NNS and_CC dead_JJ animals_NNS found_VBN in_IN the_DT building_NN should_MD be_VB burned_VBN ._.
Dead_JJ animals_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN rats_NNS ,_, should_MD be_VB soaked_VBN in_IN kerosine_JJ oil_NN previous_JJ to_TO burning_VBG ._.
NOTE.-It_NNP has_VBZ to_TO be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN forms_NNS an_DT inert_JJ com-_JJ pound_NN with_IN albumen_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO obviate_VB this_DT the_DT solution_NN should_MD be_VB acidulated_VBN ._.
The_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP Board_NNP of_IN the_DT United_NNP Kingdom_NNP therefore_RB recommends_VBZ that_IN the_DT soluton_NN be_VB made_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` Dissolve_NNP half_PDT an_DT ounce_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ,_, one_CD fluid_NN ounce_NN of_IN hydrochloric_JJ acid_NN and_CC five_CD grains_NNS of_IN commercial_JJ aniline_NN blue_NN in_IN three_CD gallons_NNS of_IN water_NN ._.
For_IN convenient_NN use_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, asaturated_JJ solution_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ quantities_NNS of_IN 1_CD in_IN 10_CD should_MD be_VB prepared_VBN and_CC kept_VBN in_IN bottles_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN each_DT bottle_NN when_WRB mixed_JJ with_IN a_DT bucketful_NN of_IN water-three_JJ gallons-will_JJ yield_NN a_DT solution_NN of_IN the_DT required_JJ standard_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT rule_NN adopted_VBN at_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ simpler_NN ,_, but_CC possibly_RB less_RBR effective_JJ ,_, is_VBZ to_TO add_VB to_TO the_DT corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN and_CC water_NN a_DT handful_NN of_IN common_JJ salt_NN and_CC a_DT few_JJ grains_NNS of_IN aniline_JJ blue_NN ._.
For_IN a_DT carbolic_JJ acid_NN solution_NN ,_, enough_JJ soft_JJ soap_NN should_MD be_VB added_VBN to_TO ensure_VB the_DT thorough_JJ admixture_NN of_IN the_DT acid_NN with_IN the_DT water_NN ._.
B.-Instructions_NNS regarding_VBG treatment_NN of_IN the_DT excreta_NN of_IN Plague_NNP pa-_JJ tients_NNS and_CC of_IN the_DT drains_NNS in_IN the_DT neighbourhoods_NNS of_IN Plague-infected_JJ buildings_NNS ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT excreta_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS should_MD be_VB mixed_VBN at_IN once_RB in_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN otherwise_RB known_VBN as_IN corrosive_JJ subli-_JJ mate_NN (_( 1_CD to_TO 1,000_CD parts_NNS of_IN water_NN )_) ._.
Where_WRB feasible_JJ a_DT portion_NN of_IN this_DT solution_NN should_MD be_VB placed_VBN in_IN the_DT pan_NN before_IN use_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT small_JJ quantity_NN of_IN it_PRP should_MD be_VB left_VBN in_IN the_DT pan_NN after_IN each_DT cleaning_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT best_JJS method_NN of_IN disposing_VBG of_IN excreta_NN is_VBZ by_IN incineration_NN and_CC where_WRB quantities_NNS are_VBP small_JJ ,_, this_DT may_MD be_VB feasible_JJ if_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ quantity_NN of_IN saw_NN dust_NN is_VBZ added_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
But_CC ordinarily_RB the_DT most_RBS easily_RB practicable_JJ method_NN of_IN disposing_VBG of_IN the_DT excreta_NN is_VBZ to_TO bury_VB them_PRP with_IN at_IN least_JJS two_CD feet_NNS of_IN earth_NN above_IN them_PRP ,_, at_IN distance_NN from_IN habitations_NNS ._.
Every_DT precaution_NN should_MD be_VB taken_VBN while_IN removing_VBG them_PRP ._.
4_CD ._.
All_DT drains_NNS in_IN the_DT locality_NN of_IN the_DT plague-infected_JJ dwelling_NN should_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB washed_VBN down_RP with_IN a_DT liquid_NN disinfectant_NN ._.
The_DT best_JJS disinfectant_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN is_VBZ corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN (_( 1_CD to_TO 1,000_CD parts_NNS of_IN water_NN )_) ;_: or_CC failing_VBG this_DT ,_, carbolic_JJ acid_NN (_( 1_CD to_TO 10_CD parts_NNS of_IN water_NN )_) ,_, or_CC phenyle_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
Latrines_NNS should_MD daily_RB be_VB treated_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN ,_, and_CC after_IN the_DT application_NN of_IN the_DT liquid_NN disinfectant_NN it_PRP is_VBZ advantageous_JJ also_RB to_TO sprinkle_VB Macdougal_NNP 's_POS powder_NN over_IN every_DT part_NN ._.
?_. 280_CD Regulations_NNPS under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
IV_NNP ._.
C.-Instructions_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT clothes_NNS and_CC bedding_NN of_IN Plague_NNP patients_NNS ,_, of_IN persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN attendance_NN or_CC in_IN close_JJ proximity_NN to_TO them_PRP ,_, and_CC of_IN persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP carried_VBN or_CC disposed_VBN of_IN Plague_NNP corpses_NNS ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT clothes_NNS and_CC bedding_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS should_MD be_VB burned_VBN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT clothes_NNS of_IN persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN proximity_NN to_TO plague_VB patients_NNS or_CC plague_JJ corpses_NNS should_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB boiled_VBN ._.
Bedding_VBG which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN close_JJ proximity_NN to_TO plague_VB patients_NNS should_MD be_VB similarly_RB treated_VBN ._.
But_CC razais_NN of_IN quilted_JJ cotton_NN ,_, which_WDT can_MD not_RB be_VB boiled_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB burned_VBN ._.
D.-Instructions_NNS regarding_VBG disposal_NN of_IN Plague_NNP corpses_NNS ._.
1_CD ._.
Violation_NN of_IN religious_JJ and_CC caste_NN customs_NNS should_MD be_VB avoided_VBN ;_: and_CC quicklime_VB should_MD not_RB be_VB used_VBN with_IN bodies_NNS which_WDT are_VBP buried_VBN if_IN objections_NNS are_VBP raised_VBN to_TO this_DT by_IN any_DT person_NN interested_JJ ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB certain_JJ that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ efficacious_JJ ._.
2_CD ._.
Bodies_NNS which_WDT would_MD in_IN ordinary_JJ course_NN be_VB buried_VBN should_MD be_VB buried_VBN at_IN least_JJS six_CD feet_NNS deep_JJ ._.
3_CD ._.
Bodies_NNS which_WDT would_MD in_IN ordinary_JJ course_NN be_VB burned_VBN should_MD be_VB reduced_VBN as_RB completely_RB as_IN possible_JJ to_TO ashes_NNS ._.
E.-Precautions_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN by_IN nurses_NNS and_CC attendants_NNS upon_IN Plague_NNP patients_NNS ._.
1_CD ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT ordinary_JJ precautions_NNS taken_VBN in_IN nursing_VBG an_DT in-_JJ fectious_JJ case_NN nurses_NNS and_CC attendants_NNS should_MD be_VB warned_VBN that_IN the_DT poison_NN is_VBZ usually_RB taken_VBN in_IN through_IN an_DT abrasion_NN ,_, often_RB most_JJS minute_JJ ._.
The_DT hands_NNS should_MD constantly_RB be_VB cleansed_VBN in_IN some_DT antiseptic_JJ ._.
Abrasions_NNS about_IN the_DT mouth_NN and_CC lips_NNS should_MD be_VB attended_VBN to_TO ._.
Male_JJ attendants_NNS should_MD wear_VB beards_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT risk_NN of_IN abrasion_NN from_IN shaving_VBG ._.
2_CD ._.
Before_IN stooping_VBG over_RP a_DT patient_NN to_TO apply_VB dressings_NNS or_CC for_IN other_JJ purposes_NNS the_DT bedding_NN should_MD be_VB thrown_VBN down_RP for_IN a_DT few_JJ minutes_NNS to_TO allow_VB of_IN the_DT effluvia_NN from_IN the_DT patient_NN 's_POS body_NN becoming_VBG diluted_VBN with_IN the_DT surrounding_VBG air_NN ._.

Surgeon-Captain_JJ Childe_NNP ._.
Professor_NNP Haffkine_NNP ._.
,_, ,_, Hankin_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Surveyor_NNP ._.
The_DT points_NNS for_IN investigation_NN will_MD embrace_VB everything_NN on_IN which_WDT reliable_JJ information_NN may_MD be_VB obtainable_JJ as_IN to_TO the_DT mode_NN of_IN origin_NN and_CC nature_NN of_IN disease_NN ,_, its_PRP$ communicability_NN from_IN one_CD human_NN being_VBG to_TO another_DT by_IN infection_NN ,_, contagion_NN ,_, inoculation_NN or_CC otherwise_RB ;_: whether_IN communicable_NN from_IN man_NN to_TO animals_NNS or_CC animals_NNS to_TO man_NN ;_: whether_IN there_EX is_VBZ any_DT connection_NN between_IN the_DT disease_NN and_CC grain_NN used_VBN as_IN food_NN ;_: whether_IN the_DT grain_NN is_VBZ sound_JJ or_CC otherwise_RB ;_: its_PRP$ period_NN of_IN incubation_NN 284_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
V._NNP (_( a_DT )_) by_IN direct_JJ inoculation_NN or_CC (_( b_NN )_) when_WRB received_VBN by_IN ordinary_JJ exposure_NN to_TO infection_NN or_CC contagion_NN from_IN a_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT disease_NN or_CC articles_NNS of_IN clothing_NN ,_, bedding_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, used_VBN by_IN the_DT sick_NN ;_: the_DT period_NN during_IN which_WDT patients_NNS apparently_RB recovered_VBD may_MD retain_VB the_DT power_NN of_IN infecting_VBG the_DT healthy_JJ ,_, etc_FW ._.
The_DT suggestion_NN of_IN any_DT special_JJ preventive_NN or_CC curative_JJ measures_NNS ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_VB deduced_VBN as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN these_DT enquiries_NNS ,_, and_CC any_DT other_JJ matters_NNS of_IN practical_JJ or_CC professional_JJ interest_NN which_WDT may_MD occur_VB to_TO any_DT of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP ._.

I_PRP am_VBP directed_VBN to_TO forward_VB ,_, for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, a_DT copy_NN of_IN a_DT memorandum_NN signed_VBN by_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT principal_JJ European_JJ and_CC Native_NNP Medical_NNP Practitioners_NNP of_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC Members_NNP of_IN the_DT Special_NNP Research_NNP Committee_NNP regard-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN in_IN that_DT city_NN and_CC measures_NNS for_IN arresting_VBG its_PRP$ progress_NN ._.
This_DT memorandum_NN has_VBZ been_VBN presented_VBN to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP by_IN Surgeon-Major-General_NNP Cleghorn_NNP ,_, Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP with_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, on_IN return_NN from_IN his_PRP$ visit_NN to_TO Bombay_NNP which_WDT formed_VBD the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT telegraphic_JJ correspondence_NN with_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP cited_VBD in_IN the_DT margin_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Cleghorn_NNP shares_NNS in_IN full_JJ the_DT views_NNS recorded_VBN in_IN the_DT memorandum_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP will_MD observe_VB that_IN the_DT view_NN is_VBZ expressed_VBN that_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN now_RB prevailing_VBG in_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP is_VBZ under_IN certain_JJ conditions_NNS only_RB slightly_RB contagious_JJ or_CC infectious_JJ ;_: that_IN its_PRP$ incidence_NN is_VBZ largely_RB due_JJ to_TO local_JJ causes_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT only_JJ effective_JJ way_NN of_IN dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT outbreak_NN and_CC of_IN arresting_VBG the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ to_TO insist_VB on_IN the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN have_VBP occurred_VBN ._.
The_DT gentlemen_NNS who_WP have_VBP signed_VBN the_DT memo-_JJ randum_NN consider_NN that_IN there_EX will_MD be_VB no_DT difficulty_NN in_IN providing_VBG sufficient_JJ and_CC suitable_JJ accommodation_NN for_IN people_NNS removed_VBN from_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS ,_, APP_NNP ._.
V._NNP ]_NNP Measures_NNP in_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
285_CD and_CC that_IN it_PRP only_RB requires_VBZ the_DT concurrence_NN and_CC sympathy_NN of_IN the_DT leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT different_JJ sections_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN to_TO render_VB the_DT plan_NN proposed_VBN by_IN them_PRP a_DT success_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP regard_NN this_DT influential_JJ medical_JJ opinion_NN that_IN the_DT plague_NN is_VBZ not_RB at_IN present_JJ either_CC generally_RB epidemic_JJ or_CC conta-_JJ gious_JJ as_IN of_IN very_RB great_JJ importance_NN ._.
The_DT history_NN of_IN previous_JJ outbreaks_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN shows_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ a_DT strong_JJ tendency_NN to_TO epi-_JJ demicity_NN ._.
There_EX has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN very_RB grave_JJ loss_NN of_IN life_NN in_IN the_DT population_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT consequences_NNS to_TO the_DT trade_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, already_RB very_RB serious_JJ ,_, promise_VB to_TO be_VB disastrous_JJ unless_IN the_DT plague_NN can_MD be_VB speedily_RB reduced_VBN ._.
Should_MD it_PRP assume_VB a_DT more_RBR severe_JJ epidemic_JJ form_NN ,_, the_DT whole_NN of_IN India_NNP may_MD be_VB affected_VBN ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP are_VBP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, of_IN opinion_NN that_IN there_EX should_MD be_VB no_DT hesitation_NN in_IN taking_VBG the_DT strongest_JJS measures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB its_PRP$ spreading_NN ,_, even_RB though_IN they_PRP may_MD be_VB once_RB distasteful_JJ to_TO the_DT people_NNS affected_VBD ._.
The_DT particular_JJ measures_NNS advocated_VBN in_IN the_DT memorandum_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, the_DT removal_NN of_IN all_DT persons_NNS from_IN infected_VBN houses_NNS and_CC the_DT thorough_JJ disinfection_NN of_IN those_DT houses_NNS ,_, appear_VBP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP to_TO be_VB well_RB calculated_VBN to_TO check_VB the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT vigorous_JJ action_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN taken_VBN to_TO clean_VB and_CC disinfect_VB the_DT infected_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN having_VBG failed_VBN to_TO arrest_VB its_PRP$ progress_NN ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP to_TO be_VB neces-_JJ sary_JJ that_IN they_PRP should_MD be_VB adopted_VBN ._.
Dr._NNP Cleghorn_NNP has_VBZ also_RB reported_VBN to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP that_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT buildings_NNS in_IN which_WDT a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP dwell_NN ,_, make_VB it_PRP specially_RB important_JJ to_TO remove_VB all_DT persons_NNS from_IN infected_VBN houses_NNS and_CC to_TO allow_VB the_DT officers_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP to_TO thoroughly_VB cleanse_NN and_CC dis-_JJ infect_NN such_JJ houses_NNS ._.
He_PRP points_VBZ out_RP that_IN in_IN the_DT large_JJ and_CC ill-lighted_JJ and_CC ill-ventilated_JJ houses_NNS or_CC chawls_VB occupied_VBN by_IN so_RB many_JJ as_IN 500_CD to_TO 1,000_CD individuals_NNS means_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN and_CC cleansing_NN can_MD only_RB be_VB effectually_RB carried_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT complete_JJ evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT tenement_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ._.
4_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP to_TO say_VB that_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP commends_VBZ the_DT suggestions_NNS contained_VBN in_IN the_DT memorandum_NN to_TO the_DT earnest_JJS attention_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC trusts_NNS that_IN the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP may_MD find_VB it_PRP possible_JJ to_TO act_VB upon_IN them_PRP ._.

[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
V._NNP removed_VBD should_MD be_VB got_VBN ready_JJ before_RB measures_NNS for_IN evacuation_NN are_VBP taken_VBN ._.

Snow_NNP ,_, Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Brigade-Surgeon-_NNP Lieutenant-Colonel_NNP Weir_NNP ,_, Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP James_NNP ,_, Executive_NNP Engineer_NNP ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ subordinates_NNS ,_, are_VBP appreciated_VBN by_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP as_IN they_PRP are_VBP no_DT doubt_NN also_RB by_IN the_DT Gov-_NNP ernment_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
