4_CD ._.
Note_NN by_IN Surgeon-Major-General_NNP Cleghorn_NNP ,_, dated_VBD 16th_CD January_NNP 1897_CD ._.
I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO submit_VB copy_NN of_IN a_DT note_NN signed_VBN by_IN those_DT medical_JJ practi-_JJ tioners_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP who_WP have_VBP had_VBD the_DT greatest_JJS opportunities_NNS of_IN becom-_JJ ing_VBG practically_RB acquainted_VBN with_IN the_DT present_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ fever_NN ,_, and_CC along_IN with_IN it_PRP ,_, to_TO prevent_VB any_DT future_JJ misrepresentation_NN ,_, a_DT memoran-_JJ dum_NN of_IN the_DT remarks_NNS I_PRP made_VBD to_TO those_DT gentlemen_NNS before_IN I_PRP submitted_VBD the_DT note_NN for_IN their_PRP$ approval_NN and_CC signature_NN ._.
The_DT proposal_NN now_RB submitted_VBN is_VBZ quite_RB a_DT practicable_JJ one_CD ,_, more_JJR espe-_JJ cially_RB if_IN the_DT leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT different_JJ communities_NNS would_MD interest_NN them-_JJ selves_NNS in_IN the_DT matter_NN and_CC explain_NN to_TO those_DT communities_NNS the_DT necessity_NN for_IN the_DT adoption_NN of_IN the_DT recommendations_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ feared_VBN that_IN if_IN compul-_JJ sory_JJ evacuation_NN of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS is_VBZ carried_VBN out_IN ,_, more_RBR especially_RB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Muhammadans_NNP ,_, that_IN there_EX will_MD be_VB an_DT outbreak_NN ;_: this_DT is_VBZ the_DT APP_NNP ._.
V._NNP ]_NNP Measures_NNP in_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
287_CD prevailing_VBG feeling_NN among_IN the_DT natives_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD suggested_VBN to_TO me_PRP that_IN if_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NN the_DT Governor_NNP could_MD admit_VB several_JJ of_IN the_DT chief_JJ mullahs_NN to_TO a_DT private_JJ interview_NN ,_, the_DT matter_NN could_MD be_VB easily_RB arranged_VBN ._.
The_DT Corporation_NNP have_VBP practically_RB conferred_VBN full_JJ powers_NNS on_IN Mr_NNP ._.
Snow_NNP ,_, the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ executives_NNS ,_, represented_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Weir_NNP ,_, Head_NNP of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN Mr._NNP James_NNP ,_, the_DT Executive_NNP Engineer_NNP ,_, have_VBP carried_VBN out_RP their_PRP$ different_JJ duties_NNS vigorously_RB and_CC systematically_RB ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN have_VBP exhibited_VBN great_JJ tact_NN in_IN doing_VBG so_RB ._.
The_DT feeling_NN of_IN the_DT native_JJ population_NN has_VBZ been_VBN decidedly_RB against_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ measures_NNS enforced_VBN until_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN ago_RB ,_, when_WRB it_PRP has_VBZ veered_VBN round_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS are_VBP now_RB willing_JJ to_TO allow_VB that_DT benefit_NN has_VBZ resulted_VBN from_IN those_DT measures_NNS ._.
It_PRP would_MD greatly_RB strengthen_VB the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP if_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NN the_DT Viceroy_NNP stated_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD pleased_JJ with_IN the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP and_CC specially_RB thanked_JJ Mr_NNP ._.
Snow_NNP ,_, Brigade-Surgeon_NNP Lieutenant-Colonel_NNP Weir_NNP and_CC Mr._NNP James_NNP for_IN the_DT exertions_NNS they_PRP have_VBP hitherto_VBN made_VBN ._.
The_DT whole_JJ city_NN is_VBZ now_RB under_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP ._.
All_DT latrines_NNS ,_, drains_NNS and_CC gullies_NNS are_VBP being_VBG flushed_VBN ;_: houses_NNS ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, are_VBP being_VBG cleaned_VBN ,_, disin-_JJ fected_VBN and_CC white_JJ washed_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN those_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN not_RB drained_VBN ,_, surface_NN drains_NNS of_IN excellent_JJ construction_NN are_VBP being_VBG made_VBN in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT house_NN pipes_VBZ ._.
The_DT continuance_NN and_CC extension_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN should_MD be_VB insisted_VBN upon_IN as_IN being_VBG of_IN the_DT greatest_JJS importance_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP should_MD be_VB clearly_RB understood_JJ that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT salvation_NN outside_IN the_DT adoption_NN of_IN sanitary_JJ measures_NNS ._.
The_DT efforts_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP are_VBP to_TO a_DT certain_JJ extent_NN frustrated_VBN by_IN the_DT difficulty_NN they_PRP find_VBP in_IN cleans-_JJ ing_NN and_CC disinfecting_NN inhabited_JJ houses_NNS ,_, as_IN this_DT can_MD only_RB be_VB effectually_RB carried_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN rooms_NNS in_IN which_WDT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN have_VBP occur-_JJ red_JJ ,_, or_CC in_IN those_DT which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN vacated_VBN by_IN the_DT tenants_NNS ._.
The_DT pro-_JJ posal_NN now_RB submitted_VBN of_IN evacuating_VBG all_DT houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT a_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN has_VBZ appeared_VBN will_MD enable_VB the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP to_TO apply_VB its_PRP$ measures_NNS to_TO the_DT house_NN as_IN a_DT whole_NN ._.
The_DT importance_NN of_IN this_DT will_MD be_VB understood_VBN from_IN a_DT description_NN of_IN the_DT houses_NNS ._.
The_DT chawls_NN or_CC tene-_JJ ments_NNS may_MD run_VB up_RP to_TO seven_CD stories_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT unit_NN of_IN construction_NN is_VBZ a_DT long_JJ corridor_NN with_IN rooms_NNS opening_VBG on_IN either_DT side_NN ._.
in_IN the_DT corridor_NN ,_, either_CC at_IN one_CD end_NN or_CC in_IN the_DT centre_NN ,_, is_VBZ situated_VBN a_DT water-tap_JJ with_IN bathing_VBG platform_NN ,_, and_CC alongside_VB it_PRP a_DT latrine_JJ with_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD seats_NNS ._.
The_DT whole_JJ tenement_NN is_VBZ built_VBN up_IN of_IN a_DT congeries_NNS of_IN these_DT corridors_NNS and_CC rooms_NNS ,_, and_CC contains_NNS from_IN 500_CD to_TO 1,000_CD individuals_NNS ._.
The_DT only_JJ space_NN between_IN each_DT tenement_NN is_VBZ a_DT gully_RB sufficiently_RB wide_JJ to_TO admit_VB a_DT sweeper_NN ._.

[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
V._NNP In_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT corridors_NNS and_CC rooms_NNS ,_, either_RB from_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN open-_JJ ings_NNS or_CC from_IN the_DT obstruction_NN of_IN the_DT existing_VBG ones_NNS ,_, there_EX is_VBZ absolutely_RB no_DT light_NN admitted_VBN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB no_DT ventilation_NN ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP informed_VBD me_PRP that_IN he_PRP estimated_VBD that_IN 70_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT popu-_JJ lation_NN live_VBP in_IN such_JJ houses_NNS ._.
The_DT corridors_NNS ,_, before_IN being_VBG taken_VBN in_IN hand_NN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP ,_, were_VBD the_DT repositories_NNS of_IN filth_NN of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ surprising_JJ that_IN the_DT mortality_NN under_IN such_JJ conditions_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN so_RB small_JJ ._.
It_PRP shows_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, that_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT common_JJ accepta-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT terms_NNS ,_, is_VBZ only_RB slightly_RB contagious_JJ or_CC infectious_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN its_PRP$ incidence_NN is_VBZ chiefly_JJ due_JJ to_TO local_JJ conditions_NNS ._.
The_DT importance_NN of_IN removal_NN from_IN the_DT infected_JJ locality_NN thus_RB becomes_RB apparent_JJ ._.
Dr._NNP Weir_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, is_VBZ now_RB gradually_RB trying_VBG to_TO induce_VB the_DT inhabitants_NNS to_TO vacate_VB infected_JJ houses_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN generally_RB carried_VBN out_RP ,_, he_PRP will_MD require_VB more_JJR assistance_NN than_IN at_IN present_JJ ._.
Under_IN any_DT circumstances_NNS ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB consider_VB that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ a_DT sufficient_JJ number_NN of_IN officers_NNS for_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN operations_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP would_MD recommend_VB that_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP should_MD place_VB at_IN his_PRP$ disposal_NN ,_, free_JJ of_IN cost_NN to_TO the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, two_CD of_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commissioners_NNPS serving_VBG under_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN it_PRP should_MD be_VB suggested_VBN that_IN the_DT Sanitary-_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN and_CC one_CD Deputy_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP should_MD proceed_VB to_TO Karachi_NNP and_CC take_VB over_RP the_DT arrangements_NNS connected_VBN with_IN that_DT city_NN ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ a_DT native_JJ ,_, and_CC is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP am_VBP afraid_JJ ,_, wanting_VBG in_IN the_DT necessary_JJ force_NN of_IN character_NN and_CC initiative_NN ._.

Memorandum_NNP on-_CD the_DT Plague_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP by_IN Medical_NNP Practitioners_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
We_PRP ,_, the_DT undersigned_JJ Medical_NNP Officers_NNP and_CC Members_NNP of_IN the_DT Special_NNP Research_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN now_RB prevailing_VBG in_IN the_DT City_NNP is_VBZ ,_, under_IN certain_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, only_RB silghtly_RB contagious_JJ or_CC infectious_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT facts_NNS observed_VBN in_IN connection_NN with_IN individual_JJ cases_NNS and_CC those_DT associated_VBN with_IN the_DT general_JJ progress_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, warrant_VBP us_PRP in_IN concluding_VBG that_IN its_PRP$ incidence_NN ._.
is_VBZ greatly_RB due_JJ to_TO local_JJ conditions_NNS ._.
?_. APP_NNP ._.
V._NNP ]_NNP Measures_NNP in_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
289_CD We_PRP are_VBP emphatically_RB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT only_JJ practical_JJ method_NN of_IN dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT outbreak_NN and_CC of_IN arresting_VBG the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ by_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS from_IN those_DT houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT a_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN occurs_VBZ ._.
We_PRP quite_RB appreciate_VBP the_DT practical_JJ difficulties_NNS attending_VBG the_DT adoption_NN of_IN this_DT proposal_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN such_JJ an_DT emergency_NN as_IN the_DT present_JJ ,_, these_DT difficulties_NNS can_MD and_CC must_MD be_VB overcome_VBN ._.
The_DT Municipal_NNP Corporation_NNP will_MD no_RB doubt_VB provide_VB suitable_JJ huts_NNS ,_, free_JJ of_IN rent_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT accommodation_NN of_IN the_DT different_JJ classes_NNS ,_, and_CC we_PRP understand_VBP that_DT Mill_NNP Companies_NNPS and_CC other_JJ employers_NNS of_IN labour_NN are_VBP prepared_VBN to_TO erect_VB huts_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ different_JJ employs_NNS ._.
The_DT experience_NN gained_VBN in_IN the_DT melas_NN at_IN Allahabad_NNP and_CC Hardwar_NNP will_MD be_VB available_JJ ,_, as_IN to_TO the_DT con-_JJ struction_NN and_CC arrangement_NN of_IN the_DT huts_NNS ._.
There_EX will_MD thus_RB be_VB no_DT difficulty_NN experienced_VBD in_IN providing_VBG suffi-_JJ cient_NN and_CC suitable_JJ accommodation_NN for_IN the_DT evicted_VBN ,_, and_CC it_PRP requires_VBZ only_RB the_DT concurrence_NN and_CC sympathy_NN of_IN the_DT leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT different_JJ sections_NNS of_IN the_DT native_JJ community_NN to_TO render_VB the_DT scheme_NN a_DT success_NN ._.
If_IN houses_NNS in_IN healthy_JJ localities_NNS are_VBP available_JJ for_IN occupation_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN why_WRB they_PRP should_MD not_RB be_VB utilized_VBN ._.
The_DT steps_NNS leading_VBG up_RP to_TO removal_VB would_MD be_VB the_DT report_NN to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN a_DT case_NN by_IN a_DT duly_NN qualified_JJ Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP would_MD then_RB notify_VB the_DT occurrence_NN to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP authorities_NNS ,_, and_CC would_MD at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN submit_VB his_PRP$ recommendations_NNS for_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS in_IN the_DT particular_JJ home_NN and_CC ,_, if_IN he_PRP considered_VBD it_PRP necessary_JJ of_IN those_DT also_RB in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ neigh-_JJ bourhood_NN ._.
The_DT Municipal_NNP authorities_NNS would_MD then_RB take_VB the_DT necessary_JJ action_NN and_CC indicate_VB the_DT huts_NNS available_JJ ._.
Carts_NNS ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, should_MD be_VB provided_VBN free_JJ of_IN cost_NN for_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT goods_NNS and_CC chattels_NNS of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS ._.
The_DT person_NN attacked_VBD would_MD either_RB be_VB removed_VBN to_TO hospital_VB or_CC remain_VB in_IN the_DT house_NN with_IN his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ relatives_NNS until_IN recovery_NN or_CC death_NN took_VBD place_NN ._.
The_DT house_NN would_MD then_RB be_VB completely_RB vacated_VBN and_CC taken_VBN possession_NN of_IN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP for_IN purposes_NNS of_IN cleaning_NN and_CC disinfection_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP should_MD be_VB invested_VBN with_IN full_JJ powers_NNS ,_, in_IN consult-_JJ ation_NN with_IN the_DT Executive_NNP Engineer_NNP ,_, for_IN removing_VBG all_DT partitions_NNS ,_, erections_NNS or_CC portions_NNS of_IN house_NN walls_NNS which_WDT impede_VBP or_CC obstruct_VBP ventilation_NN ._.
After_IN an_DT interval_NN to_TO be_VB determined_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, the_DT house_NN would_MD be_VB re-occupied_JJ ._.
There_EX can_MD be_VB no_DT question_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT necessity_NN for_IN the_DT adoption_NN of_IN the_DT measure_NN we_PRP now_RB advocate_VBP ,_, and_CC we_PRP trust_VBP that_DT ,_, in_IN the_DT interests_NNS not_RB only_RB of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, but_CC also_RB in_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN India_NNP ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB at_IN once_RB accepted_VBN and_CC acted_VBN upon_IN ,_, more_RBR especially_RB as_IN the_DT untiring_NN b_VBD 37_CD 290_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.

From-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ._.
Your_PRP$ telegram_NN 227_CD ,_, dated_VBD 12th_CD ._.
Government_NN of_IN India_NNP have_VBP learnt_VBN with_IN regret_JJ view_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP Government_NNP on_IN evacuation_NN of_IN all_DT infected_VBN houses_NNS and_CC removal_NN of_IN people_NNS to_TO temporary_JJ dwellings_NNS ._.
Situation_NN is_VBZ so_RB grave_JJ and_CC importance_NN of_IN vigorous_JJ action_NN so_RB manifest_JJS that_IN they_PRP would_MD desire_VB Bombay_NNP Government_NNP to_TO reconsider_VB decision_NN that_IN evacu-_JJ ation_NN of_IN houses_NNS and_CC removal_NN to_TO temporary_JJ dwellings_NNS on_IN a_DT large_JJ scale_NN is_VBZ impracticable_JJ ._.
Experience_NN now_RB shows_VBZ that_IN outbreak_NN will_MD not_RB be_VB got_VBN under_IN unless_IN strongest_JJS measures_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN ,_, and_CC every_DT day_NN 's_POS postpone-_JJ ment_NN renders_NNS success_NN less_JJR easy_JJ ._.
The_DT other_JJ measures_NNS which_WDT Bombay_NNP Government_NNP are_VBP taking_VBG will_MD be_VB of_IN much_JJ use_NN ,_, but_CC are_VBP not_RB calculated_VBN to_TO take_VB the_DT place_NN of_IN removal_NN from_IN infected_VBN houses_NNS to_TO healthy_JJ locality_NN ._.
This_DT course_NN appears_VBZ to_TO Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP to_TO be_VB only_RB course_NN left_VBD which_WDT gives_VBZ prospect_NN of_IN getting_VBG plague_NN under_IN subjection_NN ._.
Bengal_JJ Government_NNP have_VBP published_VBN following_JJ rule_NN for_IN compulsory_NN evacuation_NN 292_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
V._NNP infected_VBD premises_NNS under_IN Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP :_: -Begins_NNS ._.
When_WRB a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurs_NNS in_IN any_DT premises_NNS ,_, the_DT Chairman_NNP may_MD ,_, after_IN giving_VBG reasonable_JJ notice_NN ,_, summarily_RB cause_VB such_JJ premises_NNS to_TO be_VB vacated_VBN and_CC thoroughly_RB cleansed_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN in_IN such_JJ manner_NN as_IN may_MD appear_VB to_TO him_PRP necessary_JJ ,_, and_CC may_MD cause_VB all_DT articles_NNS which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, can_MD not_RB be_VB properly_RB disinfected_VBN ,_, to_TO be_VB destroyed_VBN ._.
He_PRP may_MD also_RB in_IN consultation_NN with_IN the_DT Engineer_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, cause_NN to_TO be_VB removed_VBN all_DT partitions_NNS ,_, erections_NNS or_CC portions_NNS of_IN house-walls_NNS which_WDT impede_VBP or_CC obstruct_VBP ventilation_NN ._.
The_DT premises_NNS shall_MD not_RB be_VB re-_JJ occupied_VBN without_IN the_DT written_VBN permission_NN of_IN the_DT Chairman_NNP ._.
The_DT Chairman_NNP shall_MD provide_VB the_DT inmates_NNS thereof_VBP ,_, when_WRB necessary_JJ ,_, with_IN temporary_JJ accommodation.-Ends_NNS ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO carry_VB out_RP scheme_NN first_JJ necessity_NN is_VBZ provision_NN of_IN sufficient_JJ temporary_JJ accommodation_NN in_IN healthy_JJ locality_NN ,_, and_CC Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP would_MD be_VB glad_JJ to_TO learn_VB what_WP steps_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN to_TO provide_VB this_DT accommodation_NN ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO them_PRP that_IN experience_NN at_IN Karachi_NNP tends_VBZ ,_, to_TO show_VB that_IN if_IN well_RB regulated_VBN temporary_JJ accommodation_NN is_VBZ provided_VBN and_CC executive_JJ and_CC municipal_JJ authorities_NNS endeavour_VBP strenuously_RB to_TO carry_VB out_RP scheme_NN on_IN large_JJ scale_NN ,_, population_NN will_MD not_RB be_VB very_RB difficult_JJ of_IN persuasion_NN ._.

V._NNP ]_NNP Measures_NNP in_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
293_CD on_IN the_DT distinct_JJ understanding_NN that_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS from_IN those_DT houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN occur_NN was_VBD not_RB to_TO be_VB effected_VBN by_IN any_DT measures_NNS of_IN compulsion_NN ._.
3_CD ._.

His_PRP$ Excellency_NN is_VBZ advised_VBN that_IN ,_, to_TO give_VB full_JJ effect_NN to_TO such_VB a_DT proposal_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT lowest_JJS computation_NN ,_, 30,000_CD persons_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO different_JJ races_NNS ,_, castes_NNS and_CC creeds_NNS would_MD need_VB to_TO be_VB provided_VBN with_IN temporary_JJ dwellings_NNS There_EX is_VBZ no_DT site_NN within_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Municipality_NNP which_WDT would_MD accommodate_VB a_DT tenth_NN of_IN this_DT number_NN ._.
Great_NNP difficulty_NN has_VBZ attended_VBN all_DT attempts_NNS at_IN the_DT segrega-_JJ tion_NN of_IN healthy_JJ inmates_NNS of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS hitherto_NN made_VBN ,_, and_CC very_RB limited_JJ success_NN has_VBZ been_VBN achieved_VBN ._.
From_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT out-_JJ break_NN of_IN this_DT disease_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN that_IN the_DT native_JJ inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN are_VBP very_RB reluctant_JJ to_TO leave_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS or_CC to_TO allow_VB any_DT member_NN of_IN their_PRP$ family_NN afflicted_VBN with_IN the_DT disease_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN away_RB ._.
Indeed_RB their_PRP$ dread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN itself_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB hardly_RB so_RB power-_JJ ful_NN as_IN their_PRP$ horror_NN of_IN being_VBG removed_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ._.
Ignorance_NN and_CC superstition_NN prevent_VBP them_PRP from_IN discerning_VBG either_CC that_IN removal_NN to_TO a_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ good_JJ for_IN the_DT sick_NN or_CC removal_NN to_TO uninfected_JJ dwellings_NNS good_JJ for_IN the_DT healthy_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP are_VBP far_RB more_RBR easily_RB moved_VBN by_IN fear_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP and_CC Police_NNP authorities_NNS than_IN by_IN any_DT realization_NN of_IN the_DT benefits_NNS that_WDT will_MD accrue_VB from_IN a_DT sensible_JJ course_NN of_IN action_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ estimated_VBN that_IN not_RB less_JJR than_IN 300,000_CD persons_NNS have_VBP already_RB fled_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, moved_VBD so_RB to_TO do_VB not_RB only_RB by_IN fear_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN but_CC quite_RB as_RB much_JJ ,_, if_IN not_RB more_RBR ,_, by_IN an_DT unfounded_JJ and_CC unreasonable_JJ fear_NN of_IN what_WP might_MD happen_VB to_TO them_PRP at_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT Police_NNP and_CC Municipal_NNP authorities_NNS were_VBD they_PRP to_TO remain_VB ._.
4_CD ._.

[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
V._NNP materials_NNS and_CC labourers_NNS are_VBP scarce_JJ ;_: the_DT latter_NN so_RB scarce_JJ that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ with_IN great_JJ difficulty_NN that_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ number_NN can_MD be_VB obtained_VBN for_IN the_DT cleans-_JJ ing_NN and_CC disinfecting_VBG operations_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN and_CC are_VBP still_RB being_VBG carried_VBN on_IN in_IN the_DT city_NN ._.

6_CD ._.
Again_RB this_DT Government_NN are_VBP advised_VBN that_IN nothing_NN short_JJ of_IN com-_JJ pulsion_NN would_MD induce_VB the_DT people_NNS to_TO leave_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, and_CC even_RB if_IN driven_VBN out_IN of_IN them_PRP ,_, they_PRP probably_RB could_MD not_RB be_VB induced_VBN to_TO resort_VB to_TO the_DT health_NN camps_NNS ._.

Every_DT addition_NN to_TO the_DT number_NN of_IN refugees_NNS adds_VBZ to_TO the_DT possibility_NN of_IN spreading_VBG the_DT disease_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN dealing_VBG with_IN it_PRP should_MD it_PRP break_VB out_RP ._.
3_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP to_TO assure_VB the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP that_WDT every_DT precaution_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN short_JJ of_IN measures_NNS that_WDT would_MD ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ feared_VBN ,_, lead_VB to_TO the_DT panic_NN and_CC the_DT evils_NNS I_PRP have_VBP described_VBN ._.

From-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ._.
Government_NN of_IN India_NNP having_VBG carefully_RB considered_VBN your_PRP$ telegram_JJ 292-P._JJ ,_, dated_VBD 13th_CD ,_, and_CC letter_NN 263-P._JJ ,_, dated_VBD 12th_CD ,_, regarding_VBG evacu-_JJ ation_NN of_IN plague-infected_JJ houses_NNS ,_, regret_NN that_IN ,_, while_IN giving_VBG full_JJ weight_NN to_TO the_DT opinions_NNS of_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT disposition_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, they_PRP are_VBP unable_JJ to_TO accept_VB view_NN that_IN considerations_NNS adduced_VBD in_IN your_PRP$ letter_NN show_NN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ impracticable_JJ to_TO induce_VB people_NNS to_TO move_VB from_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS to_TO healthy_JJ locality_NN ._.
This_DT course_NN has_VBZ been_VBN strongly_RB recommended_VBN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ adviser_NN of_IN the_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN of_IN India_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ only_RB measure_NN attacking_VBG root_NN of_IN evil_NN which_WDT appears_VBZ practicable_JJ ,_, and_CC experience_NN in_IN Karachi_NNP seems_VBZ to_TO show_VB that_IN it_PRP can_MD be_VB so_RB introduced_JJ as_IN not_RB to_TO offend_VB the_DT prejudices_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS and_CC is_VBZ effectual_JJ in_IN holding_VBG disease_NN in_IN check_NN ._.
In_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, on_IN contrary_JJ ,_, returns_VBZ show_NN disease_NN getting_VBG worse_JJR and_CC worse_JJR notwithstanding_VBG large_JJ emigration_NN ,_, and_CC continuance_NN of_IN epidemic_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ present_JJ intensity_NN is_VBZ a_DT standing_VBG menace_NN to_TO health_NN of_IN whole_JJ continent_NN of_IN India_NNP ._.

[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
V._NNP quickly_RB prepared_VBD ,_, and_CC fact_NN that_RB ,_, as_IN reported_VBN in_IN your_PRP$ demi-official_JJ of_IN 16th_CD ,_, plague_NN is_VBZ now_RB most_RBS prevalent_JJ in_IN villages_NNS in_IN north_JJ part_NN of_IN island_NN ,_, should_MD facilitate_VB this_DT being_VBG done_VBN ._.

No_DT 12_CD ._.
From-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ._.
As_IN an_DT ad_NN interim_NN reply_NN to_TO your_PRP$ wire_NN 664_CD of_IN the_DT 21st_CD ,_, I_PRP communicate_VBP following_VBG substance_NN of_IN a_DT report_NN by_IN Snow_NNP on_IN your_PRP$ similar_JJ telegram_NN 459_CD of_IN the_DT 12th_CD ._.
On_IN occurrence_NN of_IN plague_NN and_CC even_RB previously_RB gangs_NNS have_VBP lime-washed_JJ places_NNS ,_, cut_VBD off_RP water-supply_NN ,_, taken_VBN off_RP roofs_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, hence_RB hundreds_NNS of_IN houses_NNS vacated_VBN ._.
These_DT regularly_RB treated_VBN and_CC kept_VBN vacant_NN ._.
Simultaneously_RB huts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN and_CC are_VBP being_VBG erected_VBN and_CC every_DT effort_NN made_VBD to_TO get_VB people_NNS into_IN them_PRP ._.
Huts_NNP will_MD continue_VB to_TO be_VB erected_VBN ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN your_PRP$ object_NN of_IN removing_VBG occupants_NNS from_IN and_CC disin-_JJ fecting_NN houses_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN studiously_RB prosecuted_VBN ._.

Bombay_NNP ,_, with_IN its_PRP$ subsidiary_NN buildings_NNS and_CC compound_NN ,_, was_VBD placed_VBN by_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NN the_DT Governor_NNP at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, for_IN any_DT use_NN he_PRP might_MD think_VB fit_JJ to_TO put_VB it_PRP to_TO in_IN con-_JJ nection_NN with_IN operations_NNS against_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
Before_IN the_DT house_NN was_VBD appropriated_VBN for_IN any_DT other_JJ purpose_NN ,_, Brigadier-General_JJ Gatacre_NNP ,_, who_WP commands_VBZ the_DT Bombay_NNP District_NNP ,_, undertook_NN ,_, if_IN funds_NNS were_VBD found_VBN ,_, to_TO organize_VB and_CC establish_VB a_DT hospital_NN for_IN plague_NN patients_NNS therein_VBP ._.
With_IN the_DT concurrence_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP this_DT offer_NN was_VBD accepted_VBN by_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Government_NNP ._.
Within_IN a_DT very_RB short_JJ time_NN General_NNP Gatacre_NNP has_VBZ succeeded_VBN in_IN organizing_VBG and_CC establishing_VBG the_DT hospital_NN and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ now_RB in_IN working_VBG order_NN ._.
Ward_NNP order-_JJ lies_NNS and_CC attendants_NNS are_VBP supplied_VBN by_IN volunteers_NNS from_IN native_JJ regiments_NNS ,_, nursing_VBG sisters_NNS from_IN the_DT St._NNP Joseph_NNP 's_POS Convent_NN at_IN Bandora_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Medical_JJ Staff_NNP as_IN named_VBN in_IN the_DT margin_NN has_VBZ been_VBN lent_VBN to_TO the_DT Bombay_NNP Government_NNP by_IN the_DT Military_NNP authorities_NNS ._.
I_PRP am_VBP to_TO express_VB the_DT grateful_JJ acknowledgments_NNS of_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP to_TO His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP Lieutenant-General_NNP Nairne_NNP for_IN his_PRP$ assistance_NN in_IN lending_VBG the_DT staff_NN noted_VBN above_IN ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP to_TO request_VB that_IN the_DT arrangement_NN may_MD be_VB confirmed_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN will_MD be_VB of_IN the_DT very_RB greatest_JJS use_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ already_RB supplied_VBN with_IN 150_CD cots_NNS ,_, and_CC this_DT number_NN may_MD be_VB added_VBN to_TO later_RBR ._.
To_TO General_NNP Gatacre_NNP the_DT thanks_NNS of_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP are_VBP in_IN a_DT special_JJ degree_NN due_JJ both_DT for_IN the_DT offer_NN of_IN assistance_NN and_CC for_IN the_DT energy_NN he_PRP has_VBZ thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT undertaking_NN ._.
He_PRP spared_VBD himself_PRP no_DT trouble_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT result_NN will_MD be_VB an_DT unquestionable_JJ benefit_NN to_TO the_DT city_NN ._.
4_CD ._.

5_CD ._.

*Report_NN on_IN Poona_NNP by_IN the_DT late_JJ Mr._NNP W._NNP C._NNP Rand_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
1_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO submit_VB ,_, for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, a_DT report_NN on_IN the_DT measures_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN to_TO suppress_VB and_CC prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN within_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP and_CC Suburban_NNP Municipalities_NNP of_IN Poona_NNP and_CC the_DT Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP ._.
The_DT operations_NNS against_IN the_DT plague_NN are_VBP not_RB concluded_VBN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN writing_VBG this_DT report_NN ,_, which_WDT deals_VBZ with_IN the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN up_RP to_TO May_NNP 20th_CD ,_, 1897_CD ._.
My_PRP$ report_NN is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN 16_CD sections_NNS ,_, the_DT contents_NNS of_IN which_WDT are_VBP specified_VBN below_IN :_: -_: I.-_JJ Introductory_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._.
-_: The_DT plan_NN of_IN campaign_NN ._.
III.-_JJ Work_NN of_IN the_DT military_JJ search_NN ,_, disinfection_NN and_CC segrega-_JJ tion_NN parties_NNS in_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP ._.
IV.-_NNP Plague_NNP work_NN performed_VBN by_IN Municipal_NNP agency_NN in_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP ._.
V.-_JJ Conservancy_NNP in_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP ._.
VI.-_JJ Work_NN in_IN Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP ._.
VII.-_JJ Work_NN in_IN Poona_NNP suburban_JJ limits_NNS ._.
VIII.-Work_NN in_IN villages_NNS round_VBP Poona_NNP ._.
IX.-_JJ Hospital_NNP ._.
X.-_JJ Segregation_NNP camps_NNS ._.
XI.-_JJ Plague_NNP and_CC mortality_NN statistics_NNS and_CC death_NN registration_NN arrangements_NNS ._.
XII.-_JJ Inspection_NNP of_IN in-comers_NNS and_CC out-goers_NNS ._.
XIII.-Inoculation_NN ._.
XIV.-The_JJ troops_NNS employed_VBN ._.
XV.-_JJ Financial_NNP ._.
XVI.-_JJ Conclusion_NNP ._.
*_IN The_DT Appendices_NNPS to_TO this_DT Report_NNP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN printed_VBN ._.
302_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
1.-INTRODUCTORY_JJ ._.
The_DT outbreak_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN with_IN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP to_TO deal_VB in_IN this_DT report_NN is_VBZ the_DT first_JJ that_WDT has_VBZ occurred_VBN in_IN Poona_NNP within_IN the_DT memory_NN of_IN living_NN man_NN ,_, while_IN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN there_RB of_IN a_DT similar_JJ epidemic_NN in_IN former_JJ times_NNS I_PRP am_VBP not_RB aware_JJ of_IN any_DT authentic_JJ record_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ outbreak_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD quite_RB unknown_JJ to_TO the_DT inhab-_JJ itants_NNS of_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN India_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ little_JJ doubt_NN that_IN the_DT primary_JJ cause_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN epidemic_NN from_IN which_WDT Poona_NNP has_VBZ suffered_VBN was_VBD the_DT introduction_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP into_IN Poona_NNP of_IN plague-infected_JJ passengers_NNS and_CC property_NN ._.
The_DT causes_NNS which_WDT enabled_VBD the_DT disease_NN after_IN its_PRP$ introduction_NN to_TO take_VB a_DT firm_JJ root_NN in_IN Poona_NNP were-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) the_DT existence_NN of_IN insanitary_JJ condition_NN which_WDT enabled_VBD the_DT disease_NN to_TO find_VB a_DT home_NN ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) the_DT omission_NN to_TO take_VB in_IN due_JJ time_NN the_DT measures_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO stay_VB its_PRP$ progress_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
I_PRP possess_VBP no_DT reliable_JJ information_NN of_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ coming_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN to_TO Pocna_NNP ._.
The_DT first_JJ cases_NNS reported_VBN were_VBD those_DT of_IN two_CD passengers_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP who_WP were_VBD found_VBN at_IN Poona_NNP railway_NN station_NN suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN on_IN October_NNP 2nd_CD ,_, 1896_CD ._.
Though_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN may_MD have_VB and_CC probably_RB did_VBD come_VB to_TO Poona_NNP before_IN that_DT date_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO suppose_VB that_IN they_PRP came_VBD in_IN considerable_JJ numbers_NNS ,_, and_CC for_IN practical_JJ purposes_NNS the_DT disease_NN may_MD be_VB deemed_VBN to_TO have_VB first_RB appeared_VBN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN October_NNP 1896_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ indigenous_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN which_WDT are_VBP known_VBN to_TO have_VB occurred_VBN were_VBD reported_VBN in_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP on_IN 30th_CD December_NNP 1896_CD ._.
The_DT disease_NN spread_NN rapidly_RB over_IN Poona_NNP in_IN January_NNP 1897_CD ,_, by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN which_WDT month_NN it_PRP had_VBD taken_VBN a_DT firm_JJ hold_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ measure_NN adopted_VBN for_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN Poona_NNP from_IN the_DT plague_NN was_VBD the_DT appointment_NN of_IN a_DT medical_JJ man_NN on_IN September_NNP 30th_CD ,_, 1896_CD ,_, to_TO watch_VB passengers_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP at_IN the_DT Poona_NNP railway_NN station_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN sheds_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN near_IN the_DT Sassoon_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN the_DT reception_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD at_IN that_DT time_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, no_DT legal_JJ means_NNS of_IN compelling_VBG sufferers_NNS to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT sheds_NNS against_IN their_PRP$ will_MD ._.
From_IN October_NNP special_JJ attention_NN was_VBD paid_VBN to_TO the_DT general_JJ conservancy_NN of_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP ,_, but_CC till_RB January_NNP 1897_CD no_DT applica-_JJ tion_NN was_VBD made_VBN by_IN the_DT City_NNP Municipality_NNP for_IN special_JJ powers_NNS to_TO deal_VB with_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
At_IN a_DT meeting_NN held_VBN on_IN January_NNP 13th_CD ,_, 1897_CD ,_, the_DT City_NNP Municipality_NNP took_VBD ,_, into_IN consideration_NN the_DT question_NN of_IN obtaining_VBG special_JJ powers_NNS under_IN section_NN 73_CD of_IN Bombay_NNP Act_NNP ,_, VI_NNP of_IN 1873_CD ,_, for_IN the_DT suppres-_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
303_CD sion_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, and_CC regulations_NNS under_IN that_DT section_NN were_VBD finally_RB sanctioned_VBN by_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP ,_, Central_NNP Division_NNP ,_, for_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP on_IN January_NNP 29th_CD ._.
An_DT Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP had_VBD in_IN the_DT mean-_NN while_IN been_VBN told_VBD off_RP for_IN plague_NN duty_NN on_IN the_DT 25th_CD of_IN that_DT month_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN February_NNP the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP directed_VBD Surgeon-Captain_NNP Lloyd_NNP Jones_NNP to_TO proceed_VB to_TO Poona_NNP and_CC take_VB charge_NN of_IN the_DT office_NN of_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Central_NNP Registration_NNP District_NNP ,_, as_IN he_PRP considered_VBD that_IN an_DT officer_NN of_IN some_DT standing_NN was_VBD required_VBN to_TO assist_VB and_CC guide_VB the_DT Poona_NNP City_NNP Municipality_NNP in_IN their_PRP$ efforts_NNS to_TO put_VB an_DT end_NN to_TO the_DT outbreak_NN ._.
His_PRP$ proceedings_NNS were_VBD approved_VBN in_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
689_CD of_IN 9th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ,_, Surgeon-Captain_NNP Lloyd_NNP Jones_NNP having_VBG in_IN the_DT meanwhile_NN arrived_VBD at_IN Poona_NNP on_IN February_NNP 8th_CD ._.
From_IN that_DT day_NN till_VB my_PRP$ arrival_NN he_PRP exercised_VBD a_DT general_JJ control_NN over_IN such_JJ operations_NNS as_IN were_VBD in_IN progress_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
By_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
1134_CD of_IN 10th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, Revenue_NNP Department_NNP ,_, I_PRP was_VBD appointed_VBN to_TO be_VB Assistant_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, Poona_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO have_VB charge_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS against_IN plague_NN in_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP ,_, I_PRP assumed_VBD charge_NN of_IN my_PRP$ appointment_NN on_IN February_NNP 19th_CD ._.
My_PRP$ first_JJ duty_NN was_VBD to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT disease_NN had_VBD already_RB spread_VBN ._.
On_IN examining_VBG the_DT current_JJ death_NN register_NN of_IN the_DT Poona_NNP Municipality_NNP and_CC the_DT mortality_NN returns_NNS for_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ,_, I_PRP discovered_VBD that_IN the_DT mortality_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN had_VBD been_VBN growing_VBG at_IN an_DT alarming_VBG rate_NN since_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN January_NNP ._.
I_PRP learnt_VBP that_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT abnormal_JJ sickness_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN other_JJ than_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP came_VBD to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD far_RB more_RBR widely_RB spread_VBN than_IN the_DT municipal_JJ returns_NNS of_IN plague_NN attacks_NNS and_CC plague_JJ deaths_NNS indicated_VBD ._.
In_IN my_PRP$ letter_NN No_NNP ._.
3_CD of_IN 20th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, to_TO the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Poona_NNP ,_, I_PRP suggested_VBD that_IN Collectors_NNPS and_CC Political_JJ Agents_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP should_MD be_VB informed_VBN that_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN was_VBD firmly_RB established_VBN in_IN Poona_NNP with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO their_PRP$ dissuading_NN persons_NNS residing_VBG in_IN their_PRP$ charges_NNS from_IN visiting_VBG that_DT city_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN in_IN my_PRP$ letter_NN No_NNP ._.
6_CD to_TO the_DT Collector_NNP I_PRP pointed_VBD out_RP that_IN Poona_NNP had_VBD become_VBN a_DT very_RB dangerous_JJ plague_NN centre_NN and_CC suggested_VBD the_DT making_NN of_IN additional_JJ arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT examination_NN of_IN passengers_NNS proceeding_VBG by_IN rail_NN from_IN Poona_NNP to_TO unaffected_JJ parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP ._.
Orders_NNS for_IN the_DT examination_NN of_IN passengers_NNS by_IN rail_NN at_IN Dhond_NNP and_CC Rajewadi_NNP were_VBD finally_RB issued_VBN by_IN Government_NNP in_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
1235/728-P._CD of_IN 6th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ._.
6_CD ._.
After_IN bringing_VBG the_DT dimensions_NNS of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ to_TO the_DT notice_NN of_IN higher_JJR authority_NN ,_, I_PRP engaged_VBD in_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN a_DT scheme_NN for_IN eradicating_VBG the_DT plague_NN from_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP ,_, in_IN which_WDT task_NN I_PRP was_VBD assisted_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Captain_NNP W._NNP W._NNP O._NNP Beveridge_NNP ,_, A.M.S._NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD posted_VBN to_TO 304_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
Poona_NNP as_IN my_PRP$ special_JJ assistant_NN for_IN plague_NN purposes_NNS by_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
1009/480-P._CD of_IN 24th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, and_CC joined_VBD his_PRP$ appoint-_JJ ment_NN on_IN 23rd_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Up_RB to_TO the_DT time_NN of_IN Surgeon-Captain_NNP Beveridge_NNP 's_POS arrival_NN ,_, the_DT use_NN of_IN anything_NN but_CC civil_JJ agency_NN for_IN dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT epidemic_NN had_VBD not_RB been_VBN considered_VBN ._.
That_DT officer_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, who_WP had_VBD had_VBN considerable_JJ experience_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN in_IN Hong-kong_NNP and_CC the_DT methods_NNS adopted_VBD there_EX for_IN stamping_VBG it_PRP out_RP ,_, formed_VBD a_DT decided_JJ opinion_NN that_IN the_DT help_NN of_IN soldiers_NNS would_MD be_VB desirable_JJ in_IN Poona_NNP ,_, espe-_JJ cially_RB for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN searching_VBG for_IN sufferers_NNS from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, their_PRP$ removal_NN to_TO suitable_JJ hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN plague-infected_JJ houses_NNS ._.
His_PRP$ views_NNS were_VBD embodied_VBN in_IN a_DT report_NN dated_VBD 25th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, which_WDT I_PRP forwarded_VBD to_TO Government_NNP with_IN my_PRP$ No_NN ._.
54_CD of_IN 27th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN I_PRP submitted_VBD to_TO Government_VB a_DT draft_NN set_NN of_IN rules_NNS under_IN Act_NNP III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD ,_, which_WDT I_PRP considered_VBD would_MD be_VB needed_VBN if_IN the_DT plague_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB effectually_RB dealt_JJ with_IN in_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP ._.
The_DT advisability_NN of_IN employing_VBG British_JJ soldiers_NNS to_TO make_VB house-to-house_JJ inspection_NN in_IN the_DT cantonment_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN the_DT city_NN was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO the_DT notice_NN of_IN Government_NNP in_IN the_DT Collector_NNP 's_POS No_NNP ._.
2465_CD of_IN 28th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
In_IN that_DT letter_NN Mr._NNP Lamb_NNP expressed_VBD the_DT following_JJ opinion_NN :_: -_: The_DT aid_NN of_IN the_DT soldiers_NNS is_VBZ needed_VBN because_IN the_DT men_NNS are_VBP available_JJ ,_, they_PRP are_VBP disciplined_VBN ,_, they_PRP can_MD be_VB relied_VBN on_IN to_TO be_VB thorough_JJ and_CC honest_JJS in_IN their_PRP$ inspection_NN ,_, while_IN no_DT native_JJ agency_NN is_VBZ available_JJ ,_, or_CC could_MD be_VB relied_VBN on_IN if_IN it_PRP were_VBD ._.
7_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD finally_RB decided_VBD that_IN volunteers_NNS should_MD be_VB called_VBN for_IN from_IN the_DT British_JJ and_CC Native_JJ armies_NNS to_TO assist_VB in_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN stamping_VBG out_RP the_DT plague_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT committee_NN was_VBD appointed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
1272/765-P._CD of_IN 9th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN carrying_VBG out_RP under_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN Government_NNP the_DT measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN to_TO suppress_VB and_CC prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN within_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP and_CC Suburban_NNP Municipalities_NNP of_IN Poona_NNP and_CC the_DT Poona_NNP Can-_NNP tonment_NN ._.
Powers_NNS to_TO enable_VB the_DT Committee_NNP to_TO perform_VB the_DT duties_NNS entrusted_VBD to_TO it_PRP were_VBD conferred_VBN by_IN the_DT same_JJ rules_NNS ._.
Additions_NNS to_TO and_CC modifications_NNS in_IN these_DT rules_NNS have_VBP been_VBN subsequently_RB made_VBN by_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN Resolutions_NNP Nos_NNP ._.
1810/1264-P._CD of_IN 2nd_CD April_NNP ,_, 2190/1269-P._CD of_IN 24th_CD April_NNP ,_, 2396/1861-P._CD of_IN 3rd_CD May_NNP ,_, and_CC 2501-A./1388-A.P_JJ ._.
of_IN 12th_CD May_NNP 1897_CD ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP as_IN con-_JJ stituted_VBN on_IN March_NNP 9th_CD consisted_VBD of_IN myself_PRP as_IN Chairman_NNP ,_, and_CC Lieuten-_NNP ant-Colonel_JJ C._NNP R._NNP Phillipps_NNP ,_, I.S.C._NNP ,_, and_CC Surgeon-Captain_NNP W._NNP W._NNP O._NNP Beveridge_NNP ,_, A.M.S._NNP ,_, as_IN members_NNS ._.

Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
8_CD ._.
Prior_RB to_TO the_DT appointment_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, a_DT General_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP had_VBD been_VBN erected_VBN at_IN the_DT Sangam_NNP to_TO which_WDT the_DT plague_NN patients_NNS at_IN the_DT Sassoon_NNP Hospital_NNP had_VBD been_VBN removed_VBN ._.
Considerable_JJ progress_NN had_VBD been_VBN made_VBN in_IN the_DT construction_NN of_IN a_DT general_JJ segregation_NN camp_NN on_IN the_DT Shankarshet_NNP Road_NNP and_CC sanction_NN had_VBD been_VBN accorded_VBN to_TO the_DT construction_NN of_IN plague_NN hospitals_NNS by_IN members_NNS of_IN the_DT Hindu_NNP and_CC Musalman_NNP communities_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT latter_JJ community_NN of_IN a_DT segregation_NN camp_NN as_RB well_RB ._.
Surgeon-Major_JJ J._NNP P._NNP Barry_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN appointed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.

9_CD ._.
As_IN already_RB stated_VBN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP was_VBD invested_VBN with_IN authority_NN over_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP ,_, Poona_NNP Suburban_NNP Municipal_NNP district_NN and_CC Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP ._.

REMARKS_NNP ._.

Poona_NNP Suburban_NNP limits_VBZ 3.75_CD 7,506_CD Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP 4.25_CD 35,094_CD TOTAL_NN 12.9_CD 161,390_CD In_IN the_DT accompanying_VBG map_NN (_( Appendix_NNP I_PRP )_) the_DT boundaries_NNS of_IN these_DT three_CD districts_NNS are_VBP shown_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT situations_NNS of_IN the_DT principal_JJ places_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT operations_NNS are_VBP indicated_VBN ._.
II.-THE_JJ PLAN_NN OF_NNP CAMPAIGN_NNP ._.
Before_IN describing_VBG the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP to_TO perform_VB its_PRP$ appointed_VBN task_NN ,_, measures_NNS which_WDT were_VBD perhaps_RB the_DT most_RBS drastic_JJ that_WDT had_VBD ever_RB been_VBN taken_VBN in_IN British_JJ India_NNP to_TO stamp_VB out_RP an_DT epi-_JJ demic_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ advisable_JJ to_TO give_VB some_DT account_NN of_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS which_WDT in_IN the_DT Committee_NNP 's_POS opinion_NN rendered_VBD them_PRP necessary_JJ ._.
2_CD ._.
By_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN February_NNP 1897_CD the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN had_VBD got_VBN a_DT firm_NN hold_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Poona_NNP ._.
Spreading_VBG from_IN Bombay_NNP where_WRB it_PRP had_VBD originated_VBN in_IN September_NNP 1896_CD or_CC earlier_JJR ,_, it_PRP had_VBD established_VBN itself_PRP in_IN Karachi_NNP ,_, Bandra_NNP and_CC other_JJ places_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN Poona_NNP ._.
The_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN to_TO dislodge_VB it_PRP from_IN places_NNS where_WRB it_PRP had_VBD once_RB obtained_VBN a_DT footing_NN had_VBD been_VBN everywhere_RB unavailing_VBG ._.
In_IN none_NN of_IN these_DT places_NNS had_VBD the_DT b_NN 39_CD 306_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
compulsory_JJ segregation_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN ,_, much_RB less_JJR of_IN the_DT apparently_RB healthy_JJ ,_, inmates_NNS of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS been_VBN systematically_RB enforced_VBN ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT large_JJ cities_NNS of_IN Surat_NNP and_CC Ahmedabad_NNP had_VBD been_VBN kept_VBN almost_RB entirely_RB free_JJ from_IN plague_NN ,_, though_IN they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN flooded_VBN with_IN refugees_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP just_RB as_IN Poona_NNP had_VBD been_VBN ._.
In_IN Surat_NNP and_CC Ahmed-_NNP abad_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT segregation_NN of_IN the_DT plague-stricken_JJ had_VBD been_VBN enforced_VBN as_IN far_RB back_RB as_IN October_NNP 1896_CD ._.
There_EX was_VBD ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ ,_, no_DT Indian_JJ example_NN of_IN the_DT suppression_NN by_IN strong_JJ measures_NNS of_IN an_DT epidemic_NN of_IN plague_NN which_WDT had_VBD established_VBN itself_PRP in_IN a_DT large_JJ town_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT possibility_NN of_IN so_RB suppressing_VBG the_DT disease_NN had_VBD been_VBN demonstrated_VBN at_IN Hong-kong_NNP in_IN 1894_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD certain_JJ that_IN if_IN the_DT plague_NN was_VBD not_RB to_TO be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO run_VB its_PRP$ course_NN but_CC was_VBD to_TO be_VB stamped_VBN out_IN of_IN Poona_NNP ,_, stringent_JJ measures_NNS would_MD have_VB to_TO be_VB taken_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD moreover_RB palpable_JJ to_TO every_DT one_NN that_IN the_DT measures_NNS so_RB far_RB taken_VBN in_IN Poona_NNP had_VBD been_VBN utterly_RB unavailing_VBG to_TO stay_VB the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN ._.
The_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN was_VBD one_CD of_IN panic_NN ._.
A_DT large_JJ propor-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT leading_VBG men_NNS of_IN the_DT place_NN had_VBD already_RB left_VBN or_CC were_VBD preparing_VBG to_TO leave_VB Poona_NNP on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ._.
Several_JJ of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioners_NNP and_CC Honorary_NNP Magistrates_NNP were_VBD among_IN the_DT deserters_NNS ._.
The_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT Gujrathi_NNP and_CC Marwadi_NNP traders_NNS were_VBD closing_VBG their_PRP$ shops_NNS and_CC returning_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ native_JJ countries_NNS ._.
The_DT mass_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS were_VBD as_IN a_DT natural_JJ consequence_NN of_IN their_PRP$ ignorance_NN opposed_VBN to_TO segregation_VB either_DT of_IN the_DT sick_JJ or_CC of_IN apparently_RB healthy_JJ persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN exposed_VBN to_TO infection_NN ._.
Most_JJS of_IN the_DT influential_JJ men_NNS left_VBN in_IN the_DT town_NN declared_VBD themselves_PRP in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT principle_NN of_IN segregation_NN ,_, but_CC their_PRP$ ideas_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN were_VBD generally_RB crude_JJ and_CC few_JJ if_IN any_DT of_IN them_PRP were_VBD reconciled_VBN to_TO the_DT application_NN of_IN it_PRP to_TO persons_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ position_NN in_IN life_NN ._.
Another_DT fact_NN to_TO be_VB reckoned_VBN with_IN was_VBD that_IN a_DT section_NN of_IN the_DT Brahmin_NNP community_NN ,_, including_VBG some_DT of_IN the_DT most_RBS influential_JJ men_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, were_VBD disinclined_VBN to_TO support_VB any_DT measures_NNS that_IN eman-_JJ ated_VBN from_IN an_DT official_JJ source_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD more_RBR likely_JJ than_IN not_RB to_TO work_VB against_IN any_DT operations_NNS that_WDT might_MD be_VB set_VBN on_IN foot_NN by_IN Government_NNP to_TO deal_VB with_IN the_DT emergency_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
An_DT important_JJ factor_NN too_RB in_IN the_DT situation_NN was_VBD the_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT labour_JJ market_NN ._.
Many_JJ labourers_NNS were_VBD leaving_VBG the_DT town_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT panic_NN that_WDT prevailed_VBD ,_, those_DT who_WP remained_VBD could_MD not_RB be_VB relied_VBN on_IN to_TO work_VB regularly_RB especially_RB if_IN there_EX was_VBD an_DT element_NN of_IN danger_NN in_IN the_DT work_NN to_TO be_VB done_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD therefore_RB difficult_JJ to_TO carry_VB on_IN limewashing_NN and_CC other_JJ measures_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN on_IN a_DT large_JJ scale_NN with_IN private_JJ labour_NN ._.
Under_IN these_DT circumstances_NNS it_PRP would_MD have_VB been_VBN unsafe_JJ to_TO attempt_VB to_TO carry_VB out_RP any_DT extensive_JJ opera-_JJ tions_NNS against_IN the_DT plague_NN without_IN a_DT disciplined_JJ and_CC reliable_JJ agency_NN ._.
It_PRP APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
307_CD was_VBD of_IN the_DT utmost_JJ importance_NN to_TO crush_VB the_DT epidemic_JJ with_IN the_DT least_JJS possible_JJ delay_NN ,_, both_DT to_TO stay_VB the_DT great_JJ mortality_NN that_WDT was_VBD taking_VBG place_NN in_IN Poona_NNP and_CC to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ towns_NNS of_IN the_DT Deccan_NNP ,_, in_IN none_NN of_IN which_WDT had_VBD it_PRP so_RB far_RB attained_JJ epidemic_JJ dimen-_JJ sions_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD finally_RB decided_VBN by_IN Government_NNP ,_, after_IN consultation_NN with_IN the_DT military_JJ authorities_NNS ,_, that_IN volunteers_NNS for_IN plague_NN duty_NN should_MD be_VB called_VBN for_IN from_IN among_IN the_DT troops_NNS ,_, British_JJ and_CC Native_NNP ,_, stationed_VBD in_IN Poona_NNP and_CC Kirkee_NNP ._.
The_DT call_NN was_VBD readily_RB responded_VBD to_TO ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN many_JJ more_JJR volunteers_NNS than_IN were_VBD likely_JJ to_TO be_VB required_VBN were_VBD willing_JJ to_TO come_VB forward_RB ._.
A_DT plague_NN duty_NN camp_NN was_VBD accordingly_RB formed_VBN at_IN Parvati_NNP on_IN the_DT Sinhgad_NNP road_NN ,_, and_CC 893_CD officers_NNS and_CC men_NNS ,_, British_JJ and_CC Native_NNP ,_, under_IN the_DT command_NN of_IN Major_NNP Paget_NNP of_IN the_DT Durham_NNP Light_NNP Infantry_NNP ,_, were_VBD placed_VBN on_IN plague_NN duty_NN on_IN 12th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Of_IN these_DT ,_, 122_CD officers_NNS and_CC men_NNS were_VBD posted_VBN as_IN guards_NNS at_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS and_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS and_CC the_DT remainder_NN went_VBD into_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Duty_NNP Camp_NNP at_IN Farvati_NNP ._.
It_PRP had_VBD been_VBN contemplated_VBN to_TO place_VB a_DT cordon_NN of_IN native_JJ troops_NNS round_VBP Poona_NNP to_TO prevent_VB the_DT egress_NN of_IN the_DT public_NN during_IN the_DT operations_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT proposal_NN was_VBD abandoned_VBN ._.
6_CD ._.
I_PRP will_MD now_RB describe_VB the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP 's_POS plan_NN of_IN operations_NNS ._.
The_DT measures_NNS which_WDT were_VBD chiefly_NNS relied_VBN on_IN for_IN stamping_VBG out_RP the_DT plague_NN were_VBD three_CD in_IN number-_JJ (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT plague-stricken_JJ to_TO plague_VB hospitals_NNS ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT removal_NN of_IN persons_NNS who_WP were_VBD apparently_RB healthy_JJ ,_, but_CC had_VBD been_VBN exposed_VBN to_TO plague_VB infection_NN ,_, to_TO segregation_NN camps_NNS ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT disinfection_NN of_IN houses_NNS and_CC moveable_JJ property_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN exposed_VBN to_TO infection_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
For_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN these_DT measures_NNS the_DT requisites_NNS were_VBD properly_RB equipped_VBN plague_NN hospitals_NNS and_CC a_DT reliable_JJ agency_NN for_IN finding_VBG and_CC remov-_JJ ing_NN plague_NN patients_NNS ._.
The_DT plague_NN hospitals_NNS in_IN use_NN during_IN the_DT operations_NNS were_VBD five_CD in_IN number-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT General_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP at_IN the_DT Sangam_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT Mahomedan_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP on_IN the_DT Shankarshet_NNP road_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT Hindu_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP near_IN the_DT Lakdi_NNP Pul_NNP ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) The_DT Sassoon_NNP Hospital_NNP (_( for_IN Europeans_NNPS and_CC observation_NN cases_NNS only_RB )_) ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) The_DT Parsi_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP near_IN the_DT Rifle_NNP Range_NNP ._.
308_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
Of_IN these_DT the_DT first_JJ and_CC the_DT fourth_JJ were_VBD under_IN official_JJ management_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT second_JJ ,_, third_JJ and_CC fifth_JJ were_VBD managed_VBN by_IN private_JJ individuals_NNS ,_, subject_JJ to_TO the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ._.
The_DT removal_NN of_IN all_DT persons_NNS known_VBN or_CC suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN to_TO one_CD or_CC other_JJ of_IN these_DT hospitals_NNS was_VBD insisted_VBN on_IN ._.
For_IN finding_VBG and_CC removing_VBG plague_NN patients_NNS to_TO hospital_NN ,_, both_DT military_JJ and_CC civil_JJ agency_NN was_VBD used_VBN ._.
The_DT military_JJ agency_NN used_VBN consisted_VBN of_IN search_NN parties_NNS composed_VBN of_IN soldiers_NNS working_VBG under_IN the_DT command_NN of_IN British_JJ officers_NNS ,_, and_CC attended_VBN by_IN native_JJ gentlemen_NNS ,_, lady_JJ searchers_NNS and_CC medical_JJ officers_NNS ._.
The_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT search_NN parties_NNS was_VBD to_TO search_VB periodically_RB all_DT houses_NNS and_CC other_JJ places_NNS where_WRB sick_JJ persons_NNS were_VBD likely_JJ to_TO be_VB within_IN the_DT area_NN subject_NN to_TO the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP in_IN order_NN to_TO discover_VB plague_NN cases_NNS and_CC unburied_JJ corpses_NNS ._.
All_DT sick_JJ persons_NNS found_VBN in_IN the_DT search_NN were_VBD examined_VBN by_IN a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP found_VBD or_CC had_VBD reason_NN to_TO suspect_VB that_IN they_PRP were_VBD suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD forwarded_VBN to_TO a_DT plague_JJ hospital_NN ._.
Arrangements_NNS were_VBD made_VBN for_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN unburied_JJ corpses_NNS either_CC by_IN the_DT friends_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN or_CC by_IN men_NNS told_VBD off_RP for_IN that_DT duty_NN ._.
The_DT civil_JJ agency_NN used_VBN for_IN the_DT detection_NN and_CC removal_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS consisted_VBD of_IN medical_JJ subordinates_NNS who_WP were_VBD assisted_VBN by_IN Municipal_NNP Inspectors_NNP and_CC worked_VBD under_IN European_JJ supervision_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ duty_NN was_VBD to_TO obtain_VB information_NN by_IN all_DT means_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ power_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS within_IN the_DT local_JJ areas_NNS assigned_VBN to_TO them_PRP ,_, and_CC to_TO remove_VB the_DT sufferers_NNS to_TO hospital_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
For_IN the_DT reception_NN of_IN apparently_RB healthy_JJ persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN exposed_VBN to_TO plague_VB infection_NN there_EX were_VBD four_CD segregation_NN camps-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT General_NNP Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP on_IN the_DT Shankarshetroad_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT Mahomedan_NNP Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP on_IN the_DT Shankarshet_NNP road_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT Cantonment_NNP Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP near_IN the_DT Rifle_NNP Range_NNP ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) The_DT Parsi_NNP Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP near_IN the_DT Rifle_NNP Range_NNP ._.
The_DT persons_NNS liable_JJ to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT segregation_NN camp_NN were_VBD the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN buildings_NNS which_WDT were_VBD believed_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN occupied_VBN by_IN sufferers_NNS from_IN plague_NN and_CC also_RB the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN buildings_NNS where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD believed_VBN that_IN any_DT death_NN that_WDT had_VBD occurred_VBN which_WDT had_VBD not_RB been_VBN certified_VBN by_IN a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN holding_VBG Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS commission_NN or_CC some_DT other_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN empowered_VBN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP to_TO certify_VB in_IN that_DT behalf_NN to_TO be_VB due_JJ to_TO some_DT cause_NN other_JJ than_IN plague_NN ._.
Persons_NNS found_VBN in_IN the_DT company_NN of_IN a_DT sufferer_NN from_IN the_DT plague_NN were_VBD also_RB liable_JJ to_TO be_VB segregated_VBN ._.
The_DT period_NN of_IN detention_NN in_IN the_DT segregation_NN camps_NNS was_VBD ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
Persons_NNS found_VBD at_IN any_DT time_NN during_IN that_DT period_NN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN were_VBD removed_VBN to_TO a_DT plague_JJ hospital_NN ._.
Segregation_NN parties_NNS 309_CD APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
composed_VBN of_IN native_JJ infantry_NN were_VBD appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT removal_NN to_TO the_DT camps_NNS of_IN the_DT persons_NNS liable_JJ to_TO segregation_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN disinfecting_VBG infected_VBN houses_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ contents_NNS was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP chiefly_NN by_IN military_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN part_NN by_IN civil_JJ ,_, agency_NN in_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP ._.
In_IN Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP and_CC in_IN suburban_JJ limits_NNS it_PRP was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP entirely_RB by_IN civil_JJ agency_NN ._.
The_DT troops_NNS employed_VBN on_IN disinfec-_JJ tion_NN work_NN were_VBD divided_VBN into_IN fumigators_NNS and_CC limewashers_NNS ,_, all_DT of_IN whom_WP worked_VBD under_IN the_DT command_NN of_IN British_JJ officers_NNS ._.
Disinfection_NN with_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN and_CC other_JJ chemicals_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN fumigation_NN was_VBD performed_VBN by_IN the_DT fumigators_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT limewashers_NNS broke_VBD up_RP floors_NNS and_CC destroyed_JJ rubbish_NN in_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS in_IN addition_NN to_TO doing_VBG the_DT work_NN which_WDT gives_VBZ them_PRP their_PRP$ name_NN ._.
In_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP disinfection_NN was_VBD only_RB carried_VBN out_RP by_IN civil_JJ agency_NN in_IN houses_NNS where_WRB plague_NN cases_NNS had_VBD been_VBN discovered_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP establishment_NN ._.
Little_JJ limewashing_NN was_VBD done_VBN by_IN civil_JJ agency_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN after_IN the_DT operations_NNS of_IN the_DT military_JJ commenced_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
A_DT warehouse_NN was_VBD opened_VBN at_IN a_DT central_JJ situation_NN in_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP for_IN the_DT storage_NN of_IN the_DT contents_NNS of_IN houses_NNS from_IN which_WDT the_DT occupants_NNS had_VBD been_VBN removed_VBN to_TO hospitals_NNS or_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS ._.
11_CD ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT operations_NNS against_IN the_DT plague_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN sketched_VBN above_IN ,_, efforts_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO keep_VB the_DT general_JJ sanitation_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ area_NN under_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP up_RP to_TO an_DT exceptionally_RB high_JJ standard_NN ,_, and_CC special_JJ conservancy_NN establishments_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN for_IN that_DT purpose_NN ._.
12_CD ._.
To_TO minimise_VB the_DT chance_NN of_IN disturbances_NNS when_WRB troops_NNS were_VBD engaged_VBN on_IN plague_NN duty_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN and_CC cantonment_NN ,_, the_DT streets_NNS were_VBD patrolled_VBN by_IN native_JJ cavalry_NN ,_, and_CC during_IN a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS a_DT main_JJ picquet_NN of_IN native_JJ infantry_NN was_VBD stationed_VBN at_IN a_DT central_JJ point_NN ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP attached_VBD great_JJ importance_NN to_TO the_DT punctual_JJ registration_NN of_IN all_DT deaths_NNS that_WDT occurred_VBD ,_, and_CC employed_VBD special_JJ establish-_JJ ments_NNS both_DT to_TO register_VB deaths_NNS and_CC to_TO prevent_VB the_DT secret_JJ disposal_NN of_IN corpses_NNS of_IN persons_NNS whose_WP$ deaths_NNS had_VBD not_RB been_VBN registered_VBN ._.
14_CD ._.
As_IN it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN plague-stricken_JJ people_NNS were_VBD constantly_RB removed_VBN from_IN Poona_NNP by_IN night_NN ,_, picquets_NNS and_CC patrols_NNS of_IN cavalry_NN and_CC infan-_JJ try_NN were_VBD placed_VBN on_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT principal_JJ roads_NNS to_TO prevent_VB their_PRP$ egress_NN 15_CD ._.
Towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS the_DT villages_NNS round_VBP Poona_NNP were_VBD searched_VBN in_IN order_NN to_TO ascertain_VB whether_IN they_PRP were_VBD infected_VBN by_IN plague_NN ._.
16_CD ._.
Arrangements_NNS were_VBD made_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Major_NNP Street_NNP in_IN consulta-_JJ tion_NN with_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP for_IN the_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN of_IN all_DT passengers_NNS arriving_VBG at_IN or_CC departing_VBG from_IN Poona_NNP by_IN rail_NN ._.
310_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.

17_CD ._.

18_CD ._.
Plague_NNP operations_NNS in_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP were_VBD retained_VBN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP under_IN their_PRP$ immediate_JJ control_NN ._.
Colonel_NNP Newnham-Smith_NNP ,_, Cantonment_NNP Magistrate_NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP A._NNP H._NNP Plunkett_NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, were_VBD empowered_VBN to_TO exercise_VB within_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP and_CC Poona_NNP Suburban_NNP Municipality_NNP all_PDT the_DT powers_NNS of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP under_IN Nos_NNP ._.
4_CD ,_, 5_CD ,_, 6_CD ,_, 7_CD ,_, 8_CD ,_, 9_CD ,_, and_CC 14_CD of_IN the_DT rules_NNS published_VBN in_IN Government_NNP Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.
1272-765-P._CD of_IN 9th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ._.
The_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP exercised_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, a_DT general_JJ control_NN over_IN operations_NNS within_IN those_DT areas_NNS ._.
19_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP personally_RB may_MD be_VB noticed_VBN at_IN this_DT point_NN ._.
The_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Commit-_NNP tee_NN met_VBD almost_RB daily_JJ (_( Sundays_NNP generally_RB excepted_VBD )_) in_IN March_NNP and_CC April_NNP to_TO confer_VB on_IN questions_NNS of_IN importance_NN connected_VBN with_IN the_DT opera-_JJ tions_NNS ._.
After_IN April_NNP less_CC frequent_JJ meetings_NNS were_VBD found_VBN to_TO suffice_VB ._.
20_CD ._.
I_PRP conducted_VBD the_DT general_JJ correspondence_NN ,_, and_CC managed_VBD the_DT financial_JJ affairs_NNS of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP besides_IN drafting_VBG the_DT Committee_NNP 's_POS rules_NNS and_CC standing_VBG orders_NNS ._.
I_PRP daily_RB superintended_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN and_CC moreover_NN exercised_VBN ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP could_MD ,_, a_DT general_JJ supervision_NN over_IN all_DT branches_NNS of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP 's_POS administration_NN ._.
Lieutenant-Colonel_NNP Phillipps_NNP ,_, as_RB long_RB as_IN his_PRP$ health_NN permitted_VBD him_PRP ,_, car-_JJ ried_VBN on_IN the_DT Committee_NNP 's_POS correspondence_NN with_IN the_DT militaryauthorities_NNS ._.
He_PRP daily_RB superintended_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT military_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN and_CC attended_VBD to_TO all_DT matters_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT discipline_NN and_CC welfare_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS ,_, besides_IN assisting_VBG his_PRP$ colleagues_NNS in_IN the_DT general_JJ supervision_NN of_IN hospitals_NNS and_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS ._.
Surgeon-Captain_JJ Beveridge_NNP held_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT General_NNP Segre-_NNP gation_NN Camp_NNP ,_, and_CC for_IN part_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS superintended_VBD the_DT Mahome-_NNP dan_NN Hospital_NNP and_CC Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP ._.

III.-WORKS_NN OF_IN THE_NNP MILITARY_NNP SEARCH_NNP ,_, DISINFECTION_NNP AND_NNP SEGRE-_NNP GATION_NNP PARTIES_NNP IN_NNP POONA_NNP CITY_NNP ,_, The_DT Search_NNP Parties_NNPS ._.
A_DT house-to-house_JJ inspection_NN by_IN military_JJ search_NN parties_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN one_CD of_IN the_DT leading_VBG features_NNS in_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP 's_POS plan_NN of_IN operations_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO nothing_NN in_IN the_DT campaign_NN did_VBD they_PRP attach_VBP greater_JJR importance_NN ._.
Before_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP was_VBD constitued_VBN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN 311_CD APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
demonstrated_VBN by_IN experience_NN that_IN there_EX was_VBD intense_JJ aversion_NN among_IN all_DT classes_NNS of_IN the_DT townsfolk_NN to_TO the_DT removal_NN of_IN their_PRP$ plague-stricken_JJ relatives_NNS to_TO hospital_NN ._.
Incredible_JJ shifts_NNS were_VBD resorted_VBN to_TO to_TO prevent_VB the_DT authorities_NNS from_IN becoming_VBG aware_NN of_IN occurrence_NN of_IN cases_NNS ._.
Plague_NN patients_NNS were_VBD hidden_VBN in_IN soft_JJ cupboards_NNS and_CC gardens-anywhere_JJ in_IN fact_NN where_WRB their_PRP$ presence_NN was_VBD least_RBR likely_JJ to_TO be_VB suspected_VBN ._.
Medical_JJ attendance_NN of_IN any_DT description_NN was_VBD rarely_RB obtained_VBN ,_, as_IN it_PRP was_VBD feared_VBN that_IN the_DT calling_VBG in_IN of_IN a_DT medical_JJ practitioner_NN might_MD lead_VB to_TO the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN ._.
As_IN a_DT rule_NN the_DT authorities_NNS only_RB heard_RB of_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN after_IN the_DT patient_NN 's_POS death_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD hopeless_JJ to_TO attempt_VB to_TO stay_VB the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NNS so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT isolation_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS was_VBD not_RB effectually_RB carried_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC this_DT ,_, in_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT antipathy_NN to_TO the_DT segregation_NN of_IN the_DT infected_JJ which_WDT existed_VBD in_IN Poona_NNP ,_, could_MD only_RB be_VB done_VBN by_IN compulsory_NN methods_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT main_JJ difficulty_NN ,_, apart_RB from_IN the_DT question_NN of_IN agency_NN in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN the_DT organisation_NN of_IN a_DT house-to-house_JJ inspection_NN ,_, lay_NN in_IN the_DT religious_JJ and_CC social_JJ customs_NNS of_IN the_DT Hindus_NNP and_CC Mahomedans_NNPS ,_, who_WP between_IN them_PRP make_VBP up_RP nearly_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Poona_NNP ._.
The_DT religious_JJ customs_NNS of_IN the_DT Hindus_NNP forbade_JJ people_NNS of_IN other_JJ races_NNS to_TO enter_VB their_PRP$ god-rooms_NNS and_CC cook-rooms_NNS ._.
The_DT females_NNS of_IN the_DT better_JJR class_NN of_IN Mahomedan_NNP families_NNS were_VBD all_DT purdah_JJ women_NNS ._.
Among_IN all_DT classes_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN ,_, except_IN perhaps_RB the_DT very_RB lowest_JJS ,_, there_EX existed_VBD an_DT aversion_NN to_TO the_DT invasion_NN of_IN their_PRP$ privacy_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ unknown_JJ in_IN Western_JJ Europe_NNP ._.
Again_VB a_DT systematic_JJ search_NN of_IN houses_NNS by_IN military_JJ agency_NN was_VBD a_DT novelty_NN in_IN Poona_NNP ,_, and_CC was_VBD on_IN that_DT account_NN likely_RB to_TO be_VB regarded_VBN with_IN distrust_NN and_CC alarm_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN necessary_JJ that_IN the_DT burden_NN of_IN the_DT search_NN should_MD be_VB borne_VBN by_IN British_JJ soldiers_NNS as_IN they_PRP were_VBD the_DT most_RBS disciplined_JJ and_CC trustworthy_JJ agency_NN that_WDT could_MD be_VB obtained_VBN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN recognised_VBD that_IN owing_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ ignorance_NN of_IN the_DT language_NN and_CC customs_NNS of_IN the_DT natives_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT existence_NN of_IN customs_NNS and_CC feelings_NNS among_IN the_DT latter_NN which_WDT we_PRP were_VBD bound_VBN to_TO respect_VB ,_, they_PRP could_MD not_RB be_VB the_DT only_JJ agency_NN employed_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD accordingly_RB decided_VBD that_IN native_JJ gentlemen_NNS should_MD be_VB attached_VBN to_TO the_DT search_NN parties_NNS to_TO explain_VB to_TO the_DT public_NN the_DT objects_NNS of_IN the_DT search_NN ,_, to_TO act_VB as_IN interpreters_NNS between_IN the_DT soldiers_NNS and_CC the_DT public_NN and_CC to_TO point_VB out_RP to_TO the_DT soldiers_NNS the_DT portions_NNS of_IN houses_NNS which_WDT custom_VBP forbade_VB them_PRP to_TO enter_VB ._.
It_PRP was_VBD also_RB resolved_VBN that_IN the_DT search_NN parties_NNS should_MD be_VB accompanied_VBN by_IN ladies_NNS to_TO search_VB rooms_NNS occupied_VBN by_IN purdah_JJ women_NNS ._.
As_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ladies_NNS pos-_VBP sessing_VBG some_DT knowledge_NN of_IN disease_NN were_VBD selected_VBN for_IN this_DT work_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
To_TO get_VB volunteers_NNS from_IN among_IN the_DT native_JJ gentry_NN to_TO accompany_VB the_DT search_NN parties_NNS ,_, I_PRP called_VBD a_DT meeting_NN at_IN the_DT Jubilee_NNP Technical_NNP Insti-_NNP 312_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
tute_NN on_IN the_DT 11th_CD March_NNP ,_, when_WRB 51_CD volunteers_NNS were_VBD enrolled_VBN ._.
The_DT ser-_JJ vices_NNS of_IN additional_JJ native_JJ gentlemen_NNS to_TO accompany_VB the_DT search_NN parties_NNS were_VBD advertised_VBN for_IN on_IN 12th_CD March_NNP and_CC again_RB on_IN 16th_CD March_NNP ._.
The_DT ladies_NNS who_WP accompanied_VBD the_DT search_NN parties_NNS were_VBD ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN three_CD mission_NN ladies_NNS who_WP volunteered_VBD their_PRP$ services_NNS ,_, paid_VBD employs_NN of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT search_NN was_VBD actually_RB conducted_VBN will_MD be_VB learnt_VBN from_IN the_DT accompanying_VBG printed_JJ directions_NNS for_IN searchers_NNS (_( Ap-_NNP pendix_RB 2_CD )_) ._.
They_PRP were_VBD approved_VBN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP on_IN March_NNP 24th_CD ,_, and_CC thereafter_RB to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS the_DT search_NN was_VBD carried_VBN on_IN in_IN substantial_JJ accordance_NN with_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT directions_NNS in_IN force_NN when_WRB the_DT operations_NNS commenced_VBD were_VBD on_IN the_DT same_JJ lines_NNS ,_, but_CC less_JJR detailed_JJ ,_, and_CC were_VBD found_VBN after_IN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS '_POS experience_NN to_TO require_VB amplification_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
For_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN searches_NNS and_CC other_JJ plague_NN operations_NNS the_DT city_NN was_VBD divided_VBN in_IN five_CD sections_NNS ,_, numbered_VBD I_PRP to_TO V._NNP Each_DT section_NN was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN six_CD divisions_NNS ,_, distinguished_VBN by_IN the_DT letters_NNS A_VBP to_TO F._NNP The_DT accompanying_VBG map_NN (_( Appendix_NNP 3_CD )_) shows_VBZ the_DT sections_NNS and_CC divisions_NNS into_IN which_WDT the_DT city_NN was_VBD divided_VBN ._.
7_CD ._.

8_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT search_NN parties_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN commenced_VBN on_IN March_NNP 13th_CD and_CC ended_VBD on_IN 19th_CD May_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ instance_NN ,_, only_RB to_TO search_VB divisions_NNS ,_, each_DT consisting_VBG of_IN ten_JJ parties_NNS of_IN three_CD British_JJ soldiers_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN ._.
Each_DT division_NN was_VBD under_IN the_DT command_NN of_IN an_DT officer_NN and_CC had_VBD a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN attached_VBN to_TO it_PRP besides_IN lady_JJ searchers_NNS ._.
Each_DT party_NN was_VBD accompanied_VBN by_IN a_DT native_JJ gentleman_NN ._.
The_DT officers_NNS com-_JJ manding_VBG the_DT search_NN divisions_NNS were_VBD provided_VBN with_IN maps_NNS on_IN which_WDT the_DT areas_NNS their_PRP$ men_NNS had_VBD to_TO search_VB were_VBD shown_VBN ._.
In_IN order_NN that_IN plague_NN patients_NNS might_MD not_RB be_VB removed_VBN before_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS ,_, no_DT inti-_JJ mation_NN as_IN to_TO what_WP area_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB searched_VBN was_VBD given_VBN to_TO the_DT public_NN ._.
The_DT streets_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT search_NN took_VBD place_NN were_VBD patrolled_VBN by_IN cavalry_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ important_JJ complaint_NN about_IN the_DT first_JJ day_NN 's_POS work_NN was_VBD that_IN doors_NNS forced_VBD open_JJ by_IN the_DT troops_NNS were_VBD not_RB reclosed_VBN ._.
This_DT difficulty_NN was_VBD got_VBN over_IN on_IN subsequent_JJ occasions_NNS by_IN attaching_VBG to_TO each_DT search_NN division_NN a_DT few_JJ native_JJ troops_NNS with_IN hammers_NNS and_CC staples_NNS to_TO fasten_VB up_RP doors_NNS after_IN the_DT searches_NNS ._.
Search_NNP work_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP by_IN two_CD divisions_NNS daily_RB till_IN March_NNP 22nd_CD ,_, from_IN which_WDT date_NN up_IN to_TO May_NNP 19th_CD six_CD search_NN divisions_NNS worked_VBN in_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
From_IN March_NNP 22nd_CD onwards_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT five_CD sec-_JJ tions_NNS into_IN which_WDT the_DT city_NN had_VBD been_VBN divided_VBN was_VBD searched_VBN daily_RB ._.
The_DT six_CD search_NN divisions_NNS were_VBD distinguished_VBN by_IN the_DT letters_NNS A_VBP to_TO F._NNP They_PRP always_RB worked_VBD in_IN the_DT local_JJ divisions_NNS of_IN the_DT sections_NNS that_WDT bore_VBD 313_CD APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
corresponding_VBG letters_NNS on_IN the_DT plague_NN map_NN ._.
It_PRP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, happened_VBD that_IN after_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN had_VBD been_VBN once_RB worked_VBN through_IN ,_, the_DT search_NN divisions_NNS did_VBD not_RB have_VB to_TO go_VB over_RP ground_NN with_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD unfamiliar_JJ ._.
When_WRB the_DT operations_NNS commenced_VBD ,_, it_PRP took_VBD a_DT search_NN division_NN about_IN 41/2_CD hours_NNS to_TO search_VB the_DT area_NN assigned_VBD to_TO it_PRP ,_, but_CC the_DT work_NN was_VBD done_VBN much_RB more_RBR expeditiously_RB towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS when_WRB the_DT cases_NNS discovered_VBN were_VBD few_JJ in_IN number_NN and_CC the_DT men_NNS were_VBD familiar_JJ with_IN their_PRP$ duties_NNS ._.
9_CD ._.
Up_RB to_TO March_NNP 22nd_CD it_PRP was_VBD usually_RB found_VBN possible_JJ to_TO attach_VB a_DT native_JJ gentleman_NN to_TO each_DT search_NN party_NN ._.
When_WRB ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN search_NN parties_NNS was_VBD increased_VBN to_TO 60_CD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD impossible_JJ to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN gentlemen_NNS who_WP came_VBD forward_RB for_IN this_DT duty_NN seldom_RB exceeded_VBD 20_CD on_IN any_DT day_NN ._.
Thereafter_RB two_CD or_CC three_CD native_JJ gentlemen_NNS usually_RB accompanied_VBN each_DT search_NN division_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT six_CD search_NN divisions_NNS three_CD were_VBD at_IN first_JJ accompanied_VBN by_IN European_NNP medical_JJ officers_NNS and_CC the_DT remainder_NN by_IN men_NNS of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP class_NN ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT latter_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, not_RB being_VBG found_VBN to_TO be_VB very_RB satisfactory_JJ ,_, they_PRP were_VBD relieved_VBN of_IN their_PRP$ duties_NNS and_CC the_DT Euro-_JJ pean_JJ medical_JJ officers_NNS were_VBD placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN two_CD divisions_NNS each_DT ._.
The_DT officers_NNS employed_VBN on_IN this_DT duty_NN were_VBD Surgeon-Captain_NNP Beveridge_NNP ,_, Surgeon-Captain_NNP Lloyd_NNP Jones_NNP and_CC Surgeon-Lieutenant_NNP Kiddle_NNP ._.
These_DT officers_NNS were_VBD supplied_VBN with_IN cash_NN advances_NNS and_CC had_VBD instructions_NNS to_TO pay_VB compensation_NN for_IN any_DT articles_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO plague_VB patients_NNS that_WDT might_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN ._.
11_CD ._.
On_IN May_NNP 4th_CD the_DT constitution_NN of_IN the_DT search_NN parties_NNS was_VBD altered_VBN from_IN three_CD British_JJ to_TO two_CD British_JJ and_CC one_CD native_JJ soldier_NN ._.
On_IN May_NNP 13th_CD the_DT strength_NN of_IN each_DT search_NN division_NN was_VBD reduced_VBN from_IN 10_CD to_TO 7_CD parties_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN even_RB with_IN these_DT reduced_VBN numbers_NNS a_DT search_NN division_NN could_MD get_VB through_IN its_PRP$ morning_NN 's_POS work_NN more_RBR quickly_RB than_IN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN able_JJ to_TO do_VB in_IN the_DT early_JJ days_NNS of_IN the_DT operations_NNS ._.
12_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT search_NN parties_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN of_IN the_DT fumigation_NN and_CC limewashing_VBG parties_NNS was_VBD carried_VBN on_IN every_DT morning_NN of_IN the_DT week_NN except_IN on_IN Sunday_NNP ._.
The_DT troops_NNS usually_RB had_VBD a_DT march_NN of_IN from_IN two_CD to_TO three_CD miles_NNS from_IN camp_NN before_IN they_PRP commenced_VBD work_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD started_VBN in_IN the_DT city_NN at_IN about_IN 6-30_JJ A.M._NNP On_IN one_CD occasion_NN an_DT afternoon_NN search_NN was_VBD made_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD found_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN search_NN work_NN twice_RB a_DT day_NN was_VBD too_RB much_JJ for_IN the_DT men_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT experiment_NN was_VBD not_RB repeated_VBN ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT house-to-house_JJ inspection_NN was_VBD rendered_VBN difficult_JJ by_IN the_DT way_NN in_IN which_WDT buildings_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN were_VBD entangled_VBN together_RB ,_, often_RB forming_VBG veritable_JJ mazes_NNS ,_, and_CC affording_VBG facilities_NNS to_TO persons_NNS who_WP knew_VBD the_DT ground_NN to_TO avoid_VB search_NN parties_NNS ._.
The_DT darkness_NN of_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT rooms_NNS in_IN native_JJ houses_NNS made_VBD it_PRP necessary_JJ to_TO search_VB them_PRP by_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN a_DT lantern_NN ._.
b_NN 40_CD 314_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
14_CD ._.
In_IN order_NN that_IN they_PRP might_MD exercise_VB proper_JJ control_NN over_IN their_PRP$ men_NNS ,_, officers_NNS commanding_VBG search_NN divisions_NNS were_VBD required_VBN to_TO keep_VB their_PRP$ search_NN parties_NNS together_RB under_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ eyes_NNS as_RB much_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, the_DT object_NN in_IN view_NN being_VBG to_TO prevent_VB the_DT men_NNS from_IN loitering_VBG or_CC getting_VBG into_IN mischief_NN ._.
15_CD ._.
The_DT attitude_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN towards_IN the_DT search_NN parties_NNS was_VBD ,_, on_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, friendly_RB ,_, though_IN people_NNS who_WP had_VBD sick_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS usually_RB tried_VBD to_TO conceal_VB them_PRP ._.
The_DT Brahmin_NNP community_NN was_VBD the_DT only_JJ one_CD whose_WP$ behaviour_NN towards_IN the_DT troops_NNS employed_VBN was_VBD generally_RB unfriendly_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT Brahmin_NNP quarters_VBZ the_DT troops_NNS met_VBD with_IN a_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN obstruction_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, however_RB ,_, always_RB stopped_VBD short_JJ of_IN forcible_JJ resistance_NN ._.
16_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT native_JJ gentlemen_NNS who_WP volunteered_VBD to_TO accompany_VB the_DT search_NN parties_NNS the_DT majority_NN did_VBD not_RB attend_VB regularly_RB ,_, and_CC some_DT did_VBD not_RB attend_VB at_IN all_DT ._.

Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
