Miss_NNP McIntosh_NNP who_WP had_VBD had_VBN considerable_JJ experience_NN of_IN plague-nurs-_JJ ing_NN in_IN Hong-kong_NNP ,_, was_VBD an_DT invaluable_JJ assistant_NN to_TO the_DT search_NN parties_NNS till_VBP April_NNP 18th_CD ,_, when_WRB she_PRP was_VBD transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT General_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP on_IN nursing_VBG duty_NN ._.
Miss_NNP Dias_NNP and_CC Mrs._NNP Goodall_NNP ,_, the_DT former_JJ of_IN whom_WP is_VBZ a_DT local_JJ medical_JJ practitioner_NN and_CC the_DT latter_JJR a_DT monthly_JJ nurse_NN ,_, proved_VBD themselves_PRP reliable_JJ and_CC energetic_JJ as_IN lady_JJ searchers_NNS ._.
18_CD ._.
The_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT search_NN work_NN on_IN each_DT day_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS is_VBZ given_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP 5_CD ._.
From_IN March_NNP 13th_CD to_TO May_NNP 19th_CD 218,124_CD houses_NNS were_VBD searched_VBN ,_, and_CC 338_CD plague_NN cases_NNS and_CC 64_CD corpses_NNS were_VBD found_VBN ._.
The_DT houses_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN were_VBD searched_VBN on_IN an_DT average_JJ 11_CD times_NNS each_DT ._.
The_DT sufferers_NNS from_IN the_DT plague_NN were_VBD removed_VBN to_TO hospital_VB ,_, and_CC arrangements_NNS were_VBD made_VBN for_IN the_DT prompt_NN disposal_NN of_IN the_DT corpses_NNS ._.
The_DT full_JJ value_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN the_DT search_NN parties_NNS can_MD not_RB be_VB gauged_VBN by_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS they_PRP discovered_VBD ._.
The_DT institution_NN of_IN the_DT search_NN by_IN the_DT military_NN had_VBD the_DT effect_NN of_IN causing_VBG the_DT public_NN to_TO give_VB information_NN to_TO the_DT municipal_JJ authorities_NNS of_IN a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS that_WDT occurred_VBD ,_, and_CC in_IN many_JJ instances_NNS even_RB to_TO take_VB patients_NNS to_TO hospital_VB without_IN official_JJ pressure_NN having_VBG been_VBN exercised_VBN ._.
The_DT Fumigation_NNP Parties_NNPS ._.
19_CD ._.
The_DT disinfection_NN by_IN fumigation_NN or_CC otherwise_NN of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ contents_NNS was_VBD an_DT essential_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP 's_POS scheme_NN ._.
Particulars_NNS of_IN the_DT constitution_NN of_IN the_DT military_JJ fumigation_NN parties_NNS and_CC of_IN the_DT duties_NNS assigned_VBN to_TO them_PRP will_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT printed_JJ ``_`` Directions_NNS for_IN Fumigators_NNS ''_'' (_( Appendix_NNP 6_CD )_) ._.
These_DT directions_NNS were_VBD framed_VBN by_IN the_DT committee_NN and_CC published_VBN for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN the_DT public_NN ._.
20_CD ._.
When_WRB the_DT operations_NNS of_IN the_DT military_JJ commenced_NN on_IN March_NNP 13th_CD there_EX were_VBD two_CD fumigation_NN divisions_NNS ,_, each_DT consisting_VBG of_IN 10_CD parties_NNS and_CC under_IN the_DT command_NN of_IN a_DT British_JJ officer_NN ._.
From_IN March_NNP 22nd_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT number_NN of_IN search_NN divisions_NNS was_VBD increased_VBN to_TO 6_CD ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN fumigation_NN divisions_NNS was_VBD increased_VBN to_TO 3_CD ._.
On_IN April_NNP 1st_CD the_DT number_NN of_IN fumigation_NN divisions_NNS was_VBD reduced_VBN from_IN 3_CD to_TO 2_CD ,_, and_CC on_IN April_NNP 9th_CD from_IN 2_CD to_TO 1_CD ,_, the_DT number_NN and_CC constitution_NN of_IN the_DT parties_NNS in_IN a_DT division_NN remaining_VBG unaltered_JJ ._.

21_CD ._.
Before_IN the_DT operations_NNS of_IN the_DT military_NN commenced_VBD ,_, a_DT list_NN was_VBD prepared_VBN of_IN all_PDT the_DT houses_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN in_IN which_WDT plague_NN cases_NNS or_CC deaths_NNS from_IN any_DT cause_NN had_VBD occurred_VBN since_IN March_NNP 1st_CD and_CC which_WDT had_VBD not_RB already_RB been_VBN disinfected_VBN ._.

Thereafter_RB they_PRP were_VBD supplied_VBN daily_RB with_IN a_DT list_NN of_IN houses_NNS from_IN which_WDT fresh_JJ plague_NN cases_NNS or_CC deaths_NNS from_IN any_DT cause_NN had_VBD been_VBN reported_VBN to_TO the_DT municipal_JJ authorities_NNS ._.

22_CD ._.
The_DT preparation_NN of_IN correct_JJ lists_NNS of_IN houses_NNS for_IN fumigation_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT matter_NN of_IN considerable_JJ practical_JJ difficulty_NN ._.
Persons_NNS who_WP reported_VBD deaths_NNS at_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Office_NNP constantly_RB gave_VBD the_DT address_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN incorrectly_RB ,_, thereby_RB exposing_VBG an_DT uninfected_JJ house_NN to_TO disinfection_NN and_CC its_PRP$ inmates_NNS to_TO the_DT inconveniences_NNS of_IN segre-_JJ gation_NN ._.
To_TO get_VB over_IN this_DT difficulty_NN Municipal_NNP Conservancy_NNP Inspec-_NNP tors_NNS were_VBD entrusted_VBN with_IN the_DT duty_NN of_IN verifying_VBG the_DT addresses_NNS at_IN which_WDT plague_NN attacks_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS had_VBD occurred_VBN ._.
The_DT work_NN was_VBD indifferently_RB performed_VBN by_IN them_PRP and_CC was_VBD accordingly_RB made_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT Assistant_NNP Masters_NNP from_IN the_DT Poona_NNP High_NNP School_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ services_NNS were_VBD lent_VBN by_IN the_DT Director_NNP of_IN Public_NNP Instruction_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD finally_RB transferred_VBN to_TO non-commissioned_JJ officers_NNS of_IN the_DT native_JJ infantry_NN ._.
23_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT greater_JJR portion_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS the_DT fumigation_NN divisions_NNS worked_VBD daily_RB over_IN the_DT same_JJ local_JJ area_NN as_IN the_DT search_NN divi-_JJ sions_NNS ._.
One_CD or_CC more_JJR fumigation_NN parties_NNS accompanied_VBN each_DT search_NN division_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN disinfecting_VBG any_DT houses_NNS where_WRB cases_NNS might_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT morning_NN 's_POS search_NN ._.
The_DT remaining_VBG parties_NNS of_IN the_DT fumigation_NN divisions_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN on_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN houses_NNS entered_VBN on_IN the_DT fumigation_NN lists_NNS ,_, and_CC situated_VBD within_IN the_DT section_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN to_TO be_VB searched_VBN on_IN the_DT particular_JJ day_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT opera-_JJ tions_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT number_NN of_IN houses_NNS for_IN disinfection_NN was_VBD small_JJ ,_, this_DT arrangement_NN was_VBD not_RB strictly_RB adhered_VBN to_TO ,_, and_CC the_DT fumigation_NN parties_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN in_IN whatever_WDT part_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN there_RB was_VBD work_NN for_IN them_PRP to_TO do_VB ._.
24_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN in_IN the_DT ``_`` Directions_NNP for_IN Fumigators_NNP ``_`` that_IN two_CD alternative_JJ processes_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN were_VBD prescribed_VBN ._.
In_IN practice_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN most_JJS houses_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB made_VBN sufficiently_RB airtight_JJ to_TO admit_VB of_IN the_DT fumigation_NN process_NN ,_, and_CC flushing_VBG with_IN per-_JJ chloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN was_VBD the_DT method_NN of_IN disinfection_NN commonly_RB adopted_VBD ._.

The_DT number_NN of_IN houses_NNS for_IN disinfection_NN naturally_RB fell_VBD off_RP as_IN the_DT epidemic_NN decreased_VBD ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD therefore_RB possible_JJ to_TO make_VB frequent_JJ reductions_NNS in_IN the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN the_DT fumigation_NN parties_NNS ._.
The_DT Limewashing_NNP Parties_NNPS ._.
26_CD ._.

27_CD ._.
For_IN the_DT first_JJ few_JJ days_NNS of_IN the_DT operations_NNS by_IN the_DT military_NN a_DT limewashing_VBG party_NN consisted_VBD of_IN three_CD European_JJ and_CC one_CD native_NN soldier_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD cart_NN containing_VBG limewash_NN and_CC implements_NNS was_VBD assigned_VBN for_IN two_CD parties_NNS ._.
The_DT constitution_NN of_IN the_DT parties_NNS was_VBD as_IN stated_VBN in_IN the_DT directions_NNS from_IN March_NNP 22nd_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ instance_NN two_CD limewashing_VBG divisions_NNS of_IN ten_JJ parties_NNS each_DT were_VBD employed_VBN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN divi-_JJ sions_NNS was_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, raised_VBD to_TO three_CD with_IN effect_NN from_IN March_NNP 22nd_CD ._.
On_IN April_NNP 1st_CD three_CD parties_NNS were_VBD added_VBN to_TO each_DT division_NN ._.
On_IN April_NNP 8th_CD the_DT strength_NN of_IN the_DT limewashers_NNS was_VBD reduced_VBN from_IN three_CD divisions_NNS of_IN 13_CD parties_NNS each_DT to_TO one_CD division_NN consisting_NN of_IN 15_CD parties_NNS ._.

The_DT total_JJ number_NN limewashed_VBN from_IN March_NNP 15th_CD to_TO May_NNP 19th_CD was_VBD 3,068_CD ._.
29_CD ._.
The_DT limewashing_JJ divisions_NNS usually_RB worked_VBN in_IN the_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT search_NN and_CC fumigation_NN divisions_NNS had_VBD worked_VBN on_IN the_DT previous_JJ day_NN ._.
Officers_NNS commanding_VBG limewashing_VBG divisions_NNS were_VBD fur-_JJ nished_JJ daily_JJ with_IN lists_NNS of_IN houses_NNS for_IN limewashing_NN ._.
All_DT houses_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN disinfected_VBN ,_, either_RB by_IN the_DT military_JJ fumigation_NN divisions_NNS or_CC by_IN the_DT municipal_JJ staff_NN ,_, were_VBD included_VBN in_IN these_DT lists_NNS ._.
Houses_NNS ,_, which_WDT though_IN not_RB infected_VBN were_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB in_IN a_DT filthy_JJ state_NN ,_, were_VBD also_RB included_VBN ._.
30_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD found_VBN ,_, at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS ,_, that_IN rather_RB too_RB many_JJ articles_NNS were_VBD at_IN times_NNS destroyed_VBN as_IN rubbish_NN ._.
Orders_NNS were_VBD accordingly_RB issued_VBN on_IN March_NNP 26th_CD to_TO officers_NNS commanding_VBG limewash-_JJ ing_NN divisions_NNS to_TO visit_VB ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, all_DT houses_NNS to_TO be_VB limewashed_VBN and_CC to_TO decide_VB what_WP should_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN in_IN each_DT ._.
It_PRP was_VBD also_RB laid_VBN down_RP that_DT when_WRB property_NN of_IN any_DT value_NN to_TO the_DT owners_NNS was_VBD destroyed_VBN by_IN limewash-_JJ ing_VBG party_NN ,_, the_DT officer_NN commanding_VBG the_DT division_NN should_MD note_VB the_DT 318_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
approximate_JJ cost_NN of_IN replacing_VBG what_WDT had_VBD been_VBN destroyed_VBN in_IN order_NN that_DT compensation_NN might_MD afterwards_NNS be_VB paid_VBN ._.
In_IN practice_NN nothing_NN was_VBD des-_JJ troyed_NN after_IN the_DT first_JJ fortnight_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS except_IN in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN an_DT officer_NN ._.
31_CD ._.
When_WRB a_DT house_NN was_VBD limewashed_VBN ,_, any_DT property_NN of_IN value_NN which_WDT it_PRP contained_VBD was_VBD usually_RB handed_VBN over_RP to_TO the_DT neighbours_NNS for_IN safe_JJ custody_NN ._.
When_WRB this_DT could_MD not_RB be_VB arranged_VBN ,_, which_WDT seldom_RB happened_VBD ,_, all_DT valu-_JJ ables_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP 's_POS warehouse_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD kept_VBN till_RB claimed_VBN by_IN the_DT owners_NNS ._.
The_DT Segregators_NNPS ._.
32_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN removing_VBG to_TO the_DT segregation_NN camps_VBZ the_DT apparently_RB healthy_JJ inmates_NNS of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS was_VBD performed_VBN by_IN native_JJ infantry_NN under_IN the_DT command_NN of_IN a_DT British_JJ officer_NN ._.
A_DT segregation_NN party_NN was_VBD present_JJ daily_RB in_IN the_DT section_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN where_WRB the_DT search_NN divisions_NNS were_VBD working_VBG ._.
The_DT segregation_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN houses_NNS where_WRB cases_NNS were_VBD found_VBN by_IN the_DT searchers_NNS was_VBD made_VBN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT instruc-_JJ tions_NNS contained_VBN in_IN the_DT ``_`` Directions_NNP for_IN Searchers_NNP ``_`` (_( Appendix_NNP 2_CD )_) ._.
A_DT more_RBR laborious_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT segregators_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD the_DT segregation_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN houses_NNS where_WRB plague_NN cases_NNS had_VBD occurred_VBN which_WDT had_VBD come_VBN to_TO light_JJ otherwise_RB than_IN through_IN the_DT agency_NN of_IN the_DT search_NN parties_NNS ,_, or_CC where_WRB deaths_NNS had_VBD taken_VBN place_NN which_WDT had_VBD not_RB been_VBN certified_VBN by_IN a_DT commissioned_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN to_TO be_VB due_JJ to_TO some_DT cause_NN other_JJ than_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT Segregation_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Lieutenant_NNP Owen_NNP Lewis_NNP of_IN the_DT 14th_CD Bombay_NNP Infantry_NNP ,_, was_VBD furnished_VBN daily_RB with_IN a_DT list_NN of_IN such_JJ houses_NNS ._.
33_CD ._.
At_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS segregation_NN ceased_VBN to_TO be_VB carried_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT morning_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT search_NN was_VBD going_VBG on_IN in_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD found_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN to_TO avoid_VB segregation_NN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS commonly_RB absented_VBD themselves_PRP from_IN home_NN during_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ working_NN hours_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD therefore_RB found_JJ necessary_JJ in_IN the_DT later_JJ stages_NNS of_IN the_DT operations_NNS to_TO vary_VB the_DT hours_NNS of_IN work_NN for_IN the_DT segregators_NNS from_IN day_NN to_TO day_NN ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT Segregation_NNP Officer_NNP was_VBD by_IN no_DT means_NNS easy_VBP ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD often_RB a_DT matter_NN of_IN much_JJ practical_JJ difficulty_NN to_TO determine_VB who_WP should_MD and_CC who_WP should_MD not_RB be_VB segregated_VBN ._.
Mistakes_NNS were_VBD made_VBN at_IN times_NNS ,_, but_CC I_PRP am_VBP satisfied_JJ that_IN segregation_NN was_VBD on_IN the_DT whole_JJ conducted_VBN with_IN discretion_NN and_CC tact_NN ._.
IV.-PLAGUE_JJ WORK_NNP PERFORMED_NNP BY_NNP MUNICIPAL_NNP AGENCY_NNP IN_NNP POONA_NNP CITY_NNP ._.
The_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN first_RB came_VBD before_IN the_DT general_JJ body_NN of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP at_IN a_DT meeting_NN held_VBN on_IN 30th_CD September_NNP 1896_CD when_WRB a_DT dis-_JJ cussion_NN took_VBD place_NN on_IN a_DT question_NN asked_VBN by_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT members_NNS ._.
No_DT 319_CD APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
resolution_NN was_VBD passed_VBN on_IN that_DT occasion_NN and_CC no_DT other_JJ business_NN connected_VBN with_IN the_DT plague_NN was_VBD brought_VBN before_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP till_NN January_NNP 13th_CD ,_, 1897_CD ._.
Some_DT action_NN was_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Exe-_NNP cutive_NN in_IN the_DT meanwhile_NN ._.
On_IN 30th_CD September_NNP 1896_CD a_DT medical_JJ man_NN was_VBD employed_VBN at_IN the_DT Poona_NNP railway_NN station_NN conjointly_RB by_IN the_DT Poona_NNP Suburban_NNP and_CC City_NNP Municipalities_NNP to_TO watch_VB in-coming_JJ passengers_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
On_IN 6th_CD October_NNP 1896_CD the_DT Managing_NNP Committee_NNP ordered_VBD that_IN drains_NNS and_CC gutters_NNS should_MD be_VB cleansed_VBN and_CC flushed_VBN as_IN a_DT precautionary_JJ measure_NN ._.
These_DT orders_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN October_NNP ._.
On_IN January_NNP 13th_CD ,_, 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Municipality_NNP considered_VBD letters_NNS received_VBN from_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP and_CC other_JJ officials_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, and_CC resolved_VBD that_IN the_DT Managing_NNP Committee_NNP should_MD ,_, in_IN consultation_NN with_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, make_VBP proposals_NNS for_IN the_DT approval_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ body_NN regarding_VBG the_DT measures_NNS to_TO be_VB adopted_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP in_IN the_DT matter_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN under_IN section_NN 73_CD of_IN Bombay_NNP Act_NNP VI_NNP of_IN 1873_CD ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ meeting_NN an_DT Assistant_NN to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP was_VBD appointed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT Municipality_NNP agreed_VBD to_TO bear_VB one-third_NN of_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN sheds_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN erected_VBN at_IN the_DT Sassoon_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
On_IN January_NNP 18th_CD Municipality_NNP agreed_VBD to_TO bear_VB one-_JJ third_NN of_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN establishment_NN and_CC medicines_NNS for_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Hos-_NNP pital_NN ._.
The_DT construction_NN of_IN a_DT segregation_NN camp_NN on_IN the_DT Shankarshet_NNP road_NN was_VBD commenced_VBN on_IN 1st_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
3_CD ._.
Regulations_NNS under_IN section_NN 73_CD of_IN Bombay_NNP Act_NNP VI_NNP of_IN 1873_CD were_VBD finally_RB sanctioned_VBN for_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Poona_NNP by_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP ,_, C.D._NNP ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ memorandum_NN No_NNP ._.
252-P._JJ ,_, dated_VBD 29th_CD January_NNP 1897_CD ._.
A_DT copy_NN of_IN these_DT regulations_NNS is_VBZ attached_VBN (_( Appendix_NNP 10_CD )_) ._.
On_IN January_NNP 25th_CD Doctor_NNP Dhamdhere_NNP ,_, the_DT Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, was_VBD put_VBN on_IN pure_NN plague_NN work_NN ,_, and_CC detailed_JJ instructions_NNS were_VBD given_VBN to_TO him_PRP for_IN dealing_VBG with_IN plague_JJ cases_NNS and_CC affected_JJ dwellings_NNS ._.
Practically_RB no_DT attempt_NN was_VBD made_VBN by_IN him_PRP to_TO remove_VB the_DT sick_NN for_IN the_DT reason_NN that_IN all_DT cases_NNS were_VBD systemati-_JJ cally_RB concealed_VBN and_CC information_NN of_IN a_DT plague_NN case_NN was_VBD only_RB received_VBN after_IN death_NN ._.
When_WRB such_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD found_VBN the_DT infected_JJ houses_NNS were_VBD fumigated_VBN ,_, cleared_VBN of_IN dirt_NN and_CC rubbish_NN and_CC then_RB whitewashed_VBD ._.
Disin-_JJ fectants_NNS were_VBD used_VBN over_IN the_DT dirty_JJ parts_NNS of_IN houses_NNS ,_, and_CC wells_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT houses_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN with_IN permanganate_NN of_IN potash_NN ._.
The_DT clothes_NNS of_IN the_DT sick_JJ were_VBD burnt_NNS ._.
All_DT public_JJ wells_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN were_VBD treated_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipal_JJ staff_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN as_IN those_DT belonging_VBG to_TO infected_VBN houses_NNS ._.
About_IN 1,600_CD houses_NNS were_VBD whitewashed_VBN under_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP between_IN 2nd_CD February_NNP and_CC 25th_CD March_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
Surgeon-Captain_JJ Lloyd_NNP Jones_NNP arrived_VBD in_IN Poona_NNP on_IN February_NNP 8th_CD and_CC undertook_VB the_DT supervision_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS against_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, 320_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.

When_WRB he_PRP arrived_VBD the_DT death-rate_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN was_VBD more_JJR than_IN twice_RB the_DT normal_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD daily_JJ increasing_VBG and_CC becoming_VBG more_RBR virulent_JJ ._.
There_EX was_VBD intense_JJ opposition_NN to_TO anti-plague_JJ measures_NNS and_CC no_DT cases_NNS were_VBD voluntarily_RB disclosed_VBN ._.
Whenever_WRB a_DT case_NN was_VBD heard_NN of_IN ,_, the_DT house_NN was_VBD visited_VBN and_CC the_DT sick_JJ person_NN removed_VBN (_( generally_RB by_IN force_NN )_) to_TO hospi-_JJ tal_NN ._.

5_CD ._.
Shortly_RB after_IN his_PRP$ arrival_JJ Surgeon-Captain_NNP Lloyd_NNP Jones_NNP com-_NN menced_VBD a_DT house-to-house_JJ visitation_NN with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO the_DT improvement_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN dwelling-houses_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT houses_NNS visited_VBD ventilation_NN openings_NNS were_VBD made_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT drains_NNS were_VBD attended_VBN to_TO according_VBG to_TO the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN each_DT case_NN ._.
Where_WRB necessary_JJ ,_, the_DT houses_NNS themselves_PRP were_VBD limewashed_VBN ._.
Over_IN 1,000_CD houses_NNS were_VBD examined_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Captain_NNP Lloyd_NNP Jones_NNP personally_RB in_IN Raviwar_NNP Peth_NNP ._.
He_PRP found_VBD in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN his_PRP$ inspections_NNS that_IN the_DT Municipal_JJ staff_NN was_VBD very_RB inadequate_JJ ;_: cesspools_NNS were_VBD not_RB emptied_VBN for_IN days_NNS in_IN some_DT cases_NNS ,_, drains_NNS were_VBD clogged_VBN and_CC almost_RB all_DT side-lanes_NNS formed_VBD a_DT com-_JJ bined_JJ dust-bin_NN and_CC public_JJ latrine_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD little_JJ supervision_NN over_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP subordinates_NNS ._.
6_CD ._.
During_IN January_NNP and_CC February_NNP the_DT health_NN establishment_NN was_VBD considerably_RB increased_VBN ._.
On_IN February_NNP 16th_CD Doctor_NNP Benjamin_NNP Solomon_NNP was_VBD engaged_VBN as_IN an_DT additional_JJ Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, while_IN shortly_RB afterwards_NNS Doctor_NNP Bhau_NNP Vithoji_NNP was_VBD engaged_VBN in_IN a_DT similar_JJ capacity_NN ._.
Four_CD European_JJ Inspectors_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN on_IN ,_, while_IN the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN Native_JJ Inspectors_NNS ,_, mukadams_NNS and_CC sweepers_NNS were_VBD largely_RB increased_VBN ._.
7_CD ._.
On_IN February_NNP 25th_CD the_DT city_NN was_VBD under_IN my_PRP$ orders_NNS divided_VBN into_IN two_CD sections_NNS for_IN purposes_NNS of_IN plague_NN work_NN ,_, one_CD section_NN being_VBG placed_VBN under_IN Surgeon-Captain_NNP Lloyd_NNP Jones_NNP and_CC the_DT other_JJ under_IN Surgeon-_NNP Captain_NNP Beveridge_NNP ._.
This_DT arrangement_NN continued_VBD till_JJ March_NNP 11th_CD ,_, when_WRB other_JJ duties_NNS being_VBG assigned_VBN to_TO Surgeon-Captain_NNP Beveridge_NNP ,_, Surgeon-Captain_NNP Lloyd_NNP Jones_NNP resumed_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT municipal_JJ plague_NN operations_NNS throughout_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN searching_VBG for_IN plague_NN cases_NNS was_VBD then_RB divided_VBN between_IN the_DT three_CD Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officers_NNP ,_, each_DT of_IN whom_WP had_VBD certain_JJ peths_NNS assigned_VBN to_TO him_PRP ._.
To_TO the_DT European_JJ 321_CD APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ]_NNP Measures_NNP in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
Inspectors_NNS were_VBD assigned_VBN the_DT duties_NNS of_IN fumigating_NN and_CC disinfecting_NN houses_NNS ,_, where_WRB cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN were_VBD discovered_VBN by_IN municipal_JJ establish-_JJ ments_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN opening_VBG up_RP houses_NNS that_WDT were_VBD badly_RB lighted_VBN or_CC ventilated_VBN ._.
All_DT houses_NNS in_IN the_DT following_JJ peths-Somwar_JJ ,_, Mangalwar_NNP ,_, Rastia_NNP ,_, Kasba_NNP ,_, Ganesh_NNP ,_, Bhawani_NNP ,_, Ganj_NNP ,_, Vetal_NNP ,_, Sukrawar_NNP ,_, and_CC Budhwar-have_NNP been_VBN examined_VBN by_IN the_DT Inspectors_NNS and_CC opened_VBD up_RP where_WRB necessary_JJ ._.

8_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB gathered_VBN from_IN Appendix_NNP 11_CD that_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officers_NNP were_VBD far_RB more_RBR successful_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ search_NN for_IN plague_NN cases_NNS from_IN 13th_CD March_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT military_JJ house-to-house_NN inspection_NN commenced_VBD ,_, than_IN they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN previously_RB ._.
The_DT reason_NN of_IN this_DT is_VBZ that_IN when_WRB search_NN by_IN the_DT military_NN commenced_VBD ,_, many_JJ persons_NNS voluntarily_RB gave_VBD information_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS to_TO the_DT municipal_JJ authorities_NNS ._.
Surgeon-_JJ Captain_NNP Lloyd_NNP Jones_NNP reports_NNS that_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officers_NNP and_CC Inspectors_NNS have_VBP worked_VBN excellently_RB and_CC specially_RB mentioned_VBD Doctors_NNP Solomon_NNP and_CC Dhamdhere_NNP ,_, Inspectors_NNP Curtis_NNP and_CC Ryan_NNP and_CC Mukadam_NNP Kalu_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT work_NN carried_VBD out_RP under_IN Surgeon-Cap-_NNP tain_NN Lloyd_NNP Jones_NNP '_POS supervision_NN had_VBD been_VBN very_RB satisfactorily_RB performed_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN this_DT result_NN is_VBZ chiefly_JJ due_JJ to_TO the_DT zeal_NN and_CC conscientiousness_NN he_PRP has_VBZ himself_PRP shown_VBN in_IN the_DT discharge_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duties_NNS ._.
The_DT value_NN of_IN such_JJ work_NN as_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN 608_CD cases_NNS to_TO the_DT plague_NN hospitals_NNS is_VBZ obvious_JJ ,_, while_IN the_DT improvement_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN effected_VBN in_IN the_DT ventilation_NN of_IN dwelling-houses_NNS should_MD have_VB a_DT lasting_JJ effect_NN upon_IN the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioners_NNPS the_DT majority_NN have_VBP rendered_VBN little_JJ service_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT plague_NN operations_NNS ._.
On_IN February_NNP 16th_CD ,_, 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Municipality_NNP resolved_VBD that_IN the_DT wards_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN should_MD be_VB distributed_VBN among_IN the_DT members_NNS who_WP should_MD form_VB committees_NNS to_TO induce_VB the_DT public_NN to_TO send_VB patients_NNS to_TO hospital_VB ._.
This_DT resolution_NN had_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, no_DT practical_JJ result_NN ._.
On_IN March_NNP 16th_CD ,_, 1897_CD I_PRP ,_, as_IN Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, wrote_VBD to_TO the_DT President_NNP of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP asking_VBG him_PRP to_TO request_VB the_DT members_NNS to_TO enrol_VB ward_JJ visitors_NNS in_IN the_DT wards_NNS to_TO which_WDT they_PRP belonged_VBD ._.
The_DT duties_NNS proposed_VBN for_IN the_DT ward_JJ visitors_NNS were-_JJ (_( a_DT )_) to_TO obtain_VB information_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ wards_NNS ;_: (_( b_NN )_) to_TO induce_VB the_DT friends_NNS of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS to_TO remove_VB them_PRP voluntarily_RB to_TO hospital_NN ;_: and_CC (_( c_NN )_) to_TO accompany_VB military_JJ search_NN patients_NNS on_IN days_NNS when_WRB the_DT parties_NNS worked_VBN in_IN the_DT wards_NNS to_TO which_WDT the_DT visitors_NNS belonged_VBD ._.
Unfortunately_RB nothing_NN came_VBD of_IN this_DT suggestion_NN ._.

VI_NNP ._.
The_DT names_NNS of_IN those_DT gentlemen_NNS who_WP rendered_VBD assistance_NN to_TO the_DT military_JJ search_NN parties_NNS are_VBP mentioned_VBN elsewhere_RB ._.
I_PRP may_MD note_VB here_RB that_IN Sardar_NNP Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP Dorabji_NNP Padamji_NNP ,_, President_NNP of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ,_, has_VBZ rendered_VBN good_JJ service_NN to_TO the_DT public_NN by_IN administering_VBG a_DT fund_NN for_IN the_DT relief_NN of_IN sufferers_NNS from_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
V.-CONSERVANCY_NNP IN_NNP POONA_NNP CITY_NNP ._.
The_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP have_VBP attached_VBN great_JJ importance_NN to_TO bringing_VBG the_DT general_JJ sanitation_NN of_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP up_RB to_TO as_RB high_JJ a_DT level_NN as_IN circum-_JJ stances_NNS permitted_VBD ._.
The_DT charge_NN of_IN the_DT conservancy_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN was_VBD entrusted_VBN to_TO Surgeon-Major_JJ Barry_NNP on_IN February_NNP 27th_CD ,_, and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ remained_VBN with_IN him_PRP ever_RB since_IN ._.
2_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP not_RB able_JJ to_TO write_VB from_IN personal_JJ experience_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN before_IN the_DT epidemic_NN commenced_VBD ._.
At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN February_NNP ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT entertainment_NN of_IN special_JJ establishments_NNS for_IN sanitary_JJ work_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD probably_RB somewhat_RB better_JJR than_IN usual_JJ ._.
The_DT streets_NNS and_CC some_DT of_IN the_DT lanes_NNS and_CC open_JJ spaces_NNS left_VBD little_JJ to_TO be_VB desired_VBN in_IN point_NN of_IN cleanliness_NN ._.
In_IN other_JJ respects_NNS ,_, the_DT conservancy_NN of_IN Poona_NNP was_VBD about_RB up_RB to_TO the_DT average_JJ standard_NN of_IN mofussil_JJ towns_NNS in_IN Western_JJ India_NNP ,_, and_CC consequently_RB far_RB below_IN what_WP is_VBZ required_VBN by_IN public_JJ opinion_NN in_IN Western_NNP Europe_NNP ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN necessarily_RB was_VBD and_CC is_VBZ largely_RB dependent_JJ on_IN the_DT arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN sewage_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT western_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN a_DT system_NN of_IN sewers_NNS was_VBD constructed_VBN in_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT Peshwas_NNP ._.
These_DT sewers_NNS have_VBP not_RB been_VBN superseded_VBN by_IN any_DT later_JJ improvements_NNS and_CC are_VBP still_RB in_IN use_NN ._.
No_DT plan_NN of_IN the_DT sewerage_NN system_NN is_VBZ in_IN existence_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT course_NN of_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT sewers_NNS is_VBZ unknown_JJ ._.
A_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT branch_NN sewers_NNS have_VBP been_VBN wholly_RB or_CC partially_RB blocked_VBN for_IN years_NNS ._.
The_DT eastern_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN is_VBZ unsewered_JJ ,_, and_CC there_RB a_DT system_NN of_IN cesspools_NNS prevails_NNS ._.
Surface-water_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN off_RP by_IN gutters_NNS which_WDT are_VBP usually_RB covered_VBN with_IN stone_NN slabs_NN ._.
In_IN parts_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN where_WRB there_EX are_VBP no_DT sewers_NNS nightsoil_VBP is_VBZ removed_VBN from_IN the_DT privies_NNS by_IN Bhangis_NNP who_WP convey_VBP it_PRP in_IN baskets_NNS to_TO iron_VB barrel_NN carts_NNS which_WDT are_VBP kept_VBN as_IN fixed_JJ stations_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ carried_VBN in_IN the_DT carts_NNS to_TO the_DT nightsoil_NN dept_IN outside_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB propose_VB to_TO deal_VB at_IN length_NN with_IN the_DT shortcomings_NNS of_IN the_DT Poona_NNP Municipality_NNP in_IN the_DT matter_NN of_IN conservancy_NN which_WDT were_VBD brought_VBN to_TO light_NN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN our_PRP$ operations_NNS ,_, but_CC I_PRP will_MD enumerate_VB the_DT principal_JJ ones_NNS :_: -_: The_DT post_NN of_IN Health_NNP Officer_NNP was_VBD held_VBN by_IN a_DT young_JJ Brahmin_NNP ,_, L._NNP M._NNP &_CC S._NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD quite_RB unfit_JJ for_IN the_DT place_NN ._.
The_DT night-_JJ soil_NN carts_NNS were_VBD for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN in_IN imperfect_JJ repair_NN ._.
The_DT stands_NNS where_WRB the_DT nightsoil_NN carts_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN were_VBD in_IN an_DT APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
323_CD offensive_JJ state_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN carts_NNS employed_VBN for_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN sullage_NN water_NN was_VBD insufficient_JJ ._.
Dust-bins_NNS were_VBD not_RB emptied_VBN regularly_RB ,_, and_CC rubbish_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO accumulate_VB in_IN open_JJ spaces_NNS ._.
The_DT channels_NNS or_CC moris_VB leading_VBG from_IN the_DT privies_NNS to_TO the_DT sewers_NNS were_VBD usually_RB more_RBR or_CC less_JJR blocked_VBN ._.
The_DT sewers_NNS into_IN which_WDT the_DT moris_NN led_VBD were_VBD many_JJ of_IN them_PRP blocked_VBD ._.
The_DT Bhangis_NNP as_IN a_DT class_NN were_VBD out_IN of_IN hand_NN ,_, and_CC neglected_VBD their_PRP$ duties_NNS owing_VBG to_TO want_VB of_IN proper_JJ supervision_NN ._.
The_DT low-_JJ caste_NN quarters_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN were_VBD neglected_VBN ._.
There_EX was_VBD insufficient_JJ supervision_NN over_IN the_DT conservancy_NN arrange-_JJ ments_NNS generally_RB ._.
5_CD ._.
To_TO improve_VB the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN the_DT first_JJ essential_NN was_VBD to_TO provide_VB an_DT efficient_JJ supervising_NN establishment_NN ._.
Accordingly_RB 18_CD British_JJ privates_NNS with_IN two_CD non-commissioned_JJ officers_NNS were_VBD appointed_VBN Conservancy_NNP Inspectors_NNP ._.
A_DT respectable_JJ English-knowing_JJ native_NN was_VBD attached_VBN to_TO each_DT of_IN them_PRP as_IN Sub-Inspector_NNP ._.
During_IN a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS a_DT British_JJ officer_NN was_VBD detailed_VBN to_TO supervise_VB them_PRP ,_, subject_JJ to_TO the_DT orders_NNS of_IN Surgeon-Major_JJ Barry_NNP ._.
The_DT incompetent_JJ Health_NNP Officer_NNP was_VBD discharged_VBN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP and_CC Mr._NNP George_NNP Guider_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ since_IN done_VBN good_JJ work_NN ,_, was_VBD appointed_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ place_NN ._.
As_IN it_PRP was_VBD essential_JJ that_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN should_MD be_VB improved_VBN without_IN delay_NN ,_, considerable_JJ additions_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO all_DT branches_NNS of_IN the_DT subordinate_NN conservancy_NN establishment_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
Special_JJ attention_NN was_VBD paid_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Major_JJ Barry_NNP to_TO the_DT systematic_JJ flushing_NN of_IN privies_NNS ,_, moris_NN and_CC main_JJ drains_NNS ._.
The_DT disinfect-_JJ ants_NNS used_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN were_VBD creosotive_JJ ,_, and_CC subsequently_RB corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT Bhangis_NNP was_VBD carefully_RB supervised_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT regular_JJ removal_NN of_IN nightsoil_NN from_IN privies_NNS was_VBD enforced_VBN ._.
Nightsoil_NN carts_NNS were_VBD repaired_VBN as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ and_CC efforts_NNS made_VBN to_TO obtain_VB new_JJ ones_NNS ._.
None_NN ready-made_NN could_MD however_RB be_VB obtained_VBN on_IN this_DT side_NN of_IN India_NNP ._.
Open_JJ spaces_NNS and_CC lanes_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT main_JJ streets_NNS were_VBD systematically_RB cleared_VBN of_IN rubbish_NN ._.
Steps_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN by_IN the_DT issue_NN of_IN notices_NNS under_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Act_NNP and_CC otherwise_RB to_TO get_VB insanitary_JJ privies_NNS put_VBD into_IN a_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT city_NN having_VBG been_VBN brought_VBN into_IN a_DT fair_JJ state_NN of_IN cleanliness_NN the_DT special_JJ subordinate_JJ conservancy_NN establishments_NNS were_VBD ordered_VBN to_TO be_VB discharged_VBN from_IN May_NNP 16th_CD ._.
Twelve_DT British_JJ non-commissioned_JJ officers_NNS and_CC privates_NNS with_IN an_DT equal_JJ number_NN of_IN English-knowing_NNP special_JJ sub-_JJ inspectors_NNS were_VBD however_RB retained_VBN ,_, 324_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
8_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN had_VBD the_DT effect_NN of_IN mate-_NN rially_RB improving_VBG the_DT sanitary_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Poona_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN great_JJ credit_NN for_IN the_DT results_NNS obtained_VBN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO Surgeon-Major_JJ Barry_NNP ._.
There_EX can_MD be_VB little_JJ doubt_NN that_IN the_DT city_NN is_VBZ now_RB cleaner_JJR than_IN it_PRP ever_RB has_VBZ been_VBN within_IN the_DT memory_NN of_IN living_NN man_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT is_VBZ probably_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT causes_NNS that_WDT has_VBZ kept_VBN down_RP the_DT general_JJ mortality_NN ._.
9_CD ._.

VI.-WORK_NNP IN_NNP POONA_NNP CANTONMENT_NNP ._.
The_DT importance_NN of_IN taking_VBG stringent_JJ measures_NNS to_TO check_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN was_VBD recognised_VBN by_IN the_DT Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP authorities_NNS long_RB before_RB indigenous_JJ cases_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN had_VBD appeared_VBN in_IN the_DT canton-_JJ ment_NN ._.
The_DT matter_NN was_VBD referred_VBN to_TO higher_JJR authority_NN and_CC finally_RB the_DT General_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Command_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, prescribed_VBD for_IN Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP the_DT temporary_JJ regulations_NNS contained_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP 14_CD ._.
These_DT regulations_NNS were_VBD pub-_JJ lished_VBN by_IN the_DT Cantonment_NNP Magistrate_NNP on_IN 20th_CD January_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Prior_RB to_TO this_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, special_JJ attention_NN was_VBD paid_VBN to_TO the_DT whitewashing_NN of_IN houses_NNS and_CC the_DT cleansing_NN and_CC disinfection_NN of_IN sewers_NNS and_CC drains_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
Towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN January_NNP the_DT General_NNP Officer_NNP Commanding_NNP at_IN the_DT request_NN of_IN the_DT Cantonment_NNP Magistrate_NNP placed_VBD Surgeon-Major_JJ Donnet_NNP on_IN special_JJ duty_NN in_IN the_DT cantonment_NN to_TO make_VB a_DT house-to-house_JJ visitation_NN and_CC to_TO supervise_VB sanitary_JJ arrangements_NNS ._.
This_DT officer_NN was_VBD attacked_VBN with_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT performance_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duties_NNS and_CC going_VBG on_IN leave_NN was_VBD succeeded_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Captain_NNP Thacker_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ since_IN been_VBN in_IN medical_JJ charge_NN of_IN plague_JJ operations_NNS in_IN the_DT canton-_JJ ment_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
When_WRB the_DT operations_NNS in_IN Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP were_VBD placed_VBN under_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP 's_POS control_NN that_WDT committee_NN ,_, as_IN already_RB stated_VBN in_IN section_NN II_NNP of_IN this_DT report_NN ,_, delegated_VBD certain_JJ of_IN its_PRP$ powers_NNS to_TO Colonel_NNP Newnham-Smith_NNP ,_, Cantonment_NNP Magistrate_NNP ._.
Thereafter_RB all_DT plague_JJ measures_NNS of_IN a_DT routine_JJ nature_NN were_VBD carried_VBN out_RP under_IN his_PRP$ orders_NNS ,_, sub-_JJ ject_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO the_DT Committee_NNP 's_POS general_JJ control_NN ._.
The_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT plague-stricken_JJ to_TO hospital_NN and_CC the_DT segregation_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS was_VBD systematically_RB enforced_VBN ._.
4_CD ._.
Military_JJ search_NN parties_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN in_IN the_DT cantonment_NN from_IN March_NNP 18th_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ instance_NN two_CD parties_NNS of_IN three_CD British_JJ soldiers_NNS ,_, each_DT under_IN a_DT non-commissioned_JJ officer_NN ,_, were_VBD sent_VBN there_RB ._.
On_IN March_NNP 22nd_CD the_DT number_NN of_IN search_NN parties_NNS was_VBD increased_VBN to_TO six_CD ._.
On_IN April_NNP 9th_CD ,_, as_IN the_DT disease_NN appeared_VBD to_TO be_VB increasing_VBG in_IN the_DT cantonment_NN ,_, two_CD divisions_NNS of_IN 10_CD parties_NNS each_DT were_VBD sent_VBN there_RB ._.
Each_DT party_NN con-_JJ sisted_VBN of_IN one_CD British_JJ and_CC two_CD native_JJ soldiers_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT search_NN divisions_NNS APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
325_CD were_VBD commanded_VBN by_IN British_JJ officers_NNS as_IN in_IN the_DT city_NN ._.

The_DT military_JJ search_NN was_VBD conducted_VBN in_IN the_DT can-_JJ tonment_NN on_IN substantially_RB the_DT same_JJ lines_NNS as_IN in_IN the_DT city_NN except_IN that_DT in_IN addition_NN to_TO searching_VBG for_IN plague_NN cases_NNS the_DT troops_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN on_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN rubbish_JJ found_VBN in_IN the_DT houses_NNS searched_VBD ._.
Only_RB some_DT 20_CD cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN were_VBD actually_RB discovered_VBN by_IN the_DT search_NN parties_NNS ,_, but_CC search_NN had_VBD the_DT effect_NN of_IN causing_VBG prompt_JJ intimation_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN cases_NNS to_TO be_VB given_VBN to_TO the_DT authorities_NNS ._.
When_WRB two_CD divisions_NNS were_VBD working_VBG in_IN the_DT cantonment_NN it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN possible_JJ to_TO search_VB daily_RB all_PDT the_DT bazaars_NNS and_CC a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT bungalow_JJ compounds_NNS ._.

VII.-WORK_NNP IN_NNP POONA_NNP SUBURBAN_NNP DISTRICTS_NNP ._.

2_CD ._.

Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
327_CD plague_NN ,_, where_WRB caste_NN customs_NNS permitted_VBD such_JJ disposal_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._.

For_IN the_DT villages_NNS of_IN Yerrowda_NNP ,_, New_NNP Kirkee_NNP and_CC Sangamwadi_NNP ,_, which_WDT are_VBP within_IN suburban_JJ limits_NNS ,_, a_DT shed_VBN was_VBD erected_VBN about_IN half_PDT a_DT mile_NN to_TO the_DT east_NN of_IN Yerrowda_NNP for_IN segregating_VBG the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN houses_NNS where_WRB plague_NN cases_NNS occurred_VBD ._.
3_CD ._.
On_IN an_DT increase_NN occurring_VBG in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN imported_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT Municipality_NNP engaged_VBD extra_JJ conservancy_NN establishments_NNS to_TO enforce_VB and_CC maintain_VB cleanliness_NN within_IN the_DT munici-_JJ pal_JJ district_NN ._.
All_DT houseowners_NNS were_VBD required_VBN by_IN notice_NN to_TO limewash_VB their_PRP$ bungalows_NNS and_CC out-houses_NNS ._.
The_DT servants_NNS '_POS rooms_NNS and_CC out-houses_NNS thus_RB limewashed_VBD numbered_JJ 3,867_CD ._.
Printed_VBN notices_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN to_TO house-_JJ owners_NNS and_CC lodging_NN and_CC eating_VBG house-keepers_NNS not_RB to_TO take_VB in_IN persons_NNS arriving_VBG from_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC other_JJ infected_JJ areas_NNS ._.
Printed_JJ notices_NNS of_IN precautions_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN against_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN and_CC measures_NNS to_TO be_VB adopted_VBN on_IN a_DT case_NN occurring_VBG were_VBD freely_RB published_VBN and_CC circulated_VBN ._.
On_IN March_NNP 21st_CD the_DT services_NNS of_IN a_DT native_JJ medical_JJ man_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD previously_RB been_VBN employed_VBN on_IN passenger_NN inspection_NN duty_NN at_IN the_DT station_NN ,_, were_VBD retained_VBN for_IN general_JJ work_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN enquiries_NNS into_IN causes_NNS of_IN death_NN and_CC for_IN taking_VBG part_NN in_IN house-to-house_JJ visitation_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
As_IN already_RB stated_VBN in_IN section_NN II_NNP of_IN this_DT report_NN the_DT Plague_NNP Com-_NNP mittee_NN delegated_VBD certain_JJ of_IN its_PRP$ powers_NNS to_TO Mr._NNP A._NNP H._NNP Plunkett_NNP ,_, C_NNP I.E._NNP ,_, Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Managing_NNP Committee_NNP of_IN the_DT Poona_NNP Suburban_NNP Munici-_NNP pality_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, with_IN the_DT Committee_NNP 's_POS concurrence_NN ,_, practically_RB had_VBD the_DT entire_JJ management_NN of_IN plague_NN arrangements_NNS within_IN suburban_JJ limits_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT smallness_NN of_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS that_WDT occurred_VBD within_IN suburban_JJ limits_NNS ,_, other_JJ than_IN those_DT found_VBN in_IN the_DT railway_NN station_NN and_CC on_IN the_DT roads_NNS ,_, the_DT amount_NN of_IN disinfection_NN that_WDT had_VBD to_TO be_VB carried_VBN out_RP was_VBD not_RB large_JJ ._.
The_DT roofs_NN of_IN 26_CD houses_NNS and_CC rooms_NNS ,_, in_IN or_CC near_IN which_WDT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN had_VBD occurred_VBN ,_, were_VBD opened_VBN and_CC their_PRP$ floors_NNS dug_VBD up_RP ._.
Forty-six_JJ houses_NNS and_CC rooms_NNS were_VBD vacated_VBN and_CC 31_CD were_VBD condemned_VBN as_IN unfit_NN for_IN human_JJ habitation_NN pending_VBG certain_JJ alterations_NNS ._.
Thirty_NN windows_NNS were_VBD made_VBN in_IN 11_CD houses_NNS to_TO admit_VB of_IN more_JJR light_NN and_CC air_NN ._.
Only_RB 24_CD persons_NNS were_VBD removed_VBN to_TO segregation_VB camps_NNS ._.
6_CD ._.
House-to-house_NNP inspection_NN with_IN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN British_JJ troops_NNS was_VBD commenced_VBN on_IN the_DT 22nd_CD March_NNP and_CC continued_VBD till_VB the_DT 19th_CD May_NNP ._.
During_IN that_DT period_NN the_DT search_NN was_VBD carried_VBN on_IN for_IN three_CD days_NNS in_IN each_DT week_NN ._.
One_CD non-commissioned_JJ officer_NN and_CC nine_CD privates_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN on_IN the_DT search_NN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD divided_VBN into_IN four_CD parties_NNS ,_, each_DT of_IN which_WDT was_VBD accompanied_VBN by_IN one_CD or_CC more_JJR Municipal_JJ Commissioners_NNP ._.
The_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP area_NN was_VBD searched_VBN weekly_RB ,_, the_DT work_NN being_VBG carried_VBN on_IN under_IN the_DT personal_JJ supervision_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Plunkett_NNP ._.
The_DT instructions_NNS 328_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
issued_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP Plunkett_NNP for_IN the_DT guidance_NN of_IN the_DT search_NN parties_NNS are_VBP given_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP 15_CD ._.
One_CD medical_JJ man_NN ,_, one_CD lady_NN doctor_NN and_CC two_CD Muham-_JJ madan_NNS women_NNS accompanied_VBD the_DT search_NN parties_NNS ._.
No_DT plague_NN cases_NNS were_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT search_NN by_IN the_DT military_JJ ,_, but_CC it_PRP doubtless_RB operated_VBD to_TO pre-_JJ vent_NN the_DT concealment_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP Plunkett_NNP has_VBZ brought_VBN to_TO notice_VB the_DT excellent_JJ behaviour_NN of_IN the_DT British_JJ troops_NNS employed_VBN in_IN the_DT search_NN ._.

VIII.-WORK_NNP IN_NNP VILLAGES_NNP ROUND_NNP POONA_NNP ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN many_JJ sick_JJ persons_NNS were_VBD known_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN removed_VBN from_IN Poona_NNP to_TO places_NNS outside_IN during_IN the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ in_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN advisable_JJ that_IN before_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN house-to-house_JJ inspection_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN was_VBD stopped_VBN the_DT surrounding_VBG villages_NNS should_MD be_VB searched_VBN in_IN order_NN to_TO ascertain_VB how_WRB far_RB they_PRP were_VBD affected_VBN ._.
To_TO enable_VB this_DT to_TO be_VB done_VBN Government_NNP were_VBD pleased_JJ to_TO empower_VB the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, by_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No.2190\1629-P._NNP of_IN 24th_CD April_NNP 1897_CD ,_, to_TO exercise_VB the_DT powers_NNS conferred_VBN on_IN them_PRP by_IN Nos_NNP ._.
5_CD ,_, 6_CD and_CC 9_CD of_IN the_DT rules_NNS prescribed_VBN in_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No.1272\765-P._NNP of_IN 9th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, throughout_IN the_DT Haveli_NNP Taluka_NNP of_IN the_DT Poona_NNP Dis-_NNP trict_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Two_CD search_NN divisions_NNS ,_, each_DT consisting_VBG of_IN ten_JJ parties_NNS composed_VBN of_IN one_CD British_JJ and_CC two_CD native_JJ soldiers_NNS ,_, were_VBD formed_VBN for_IN this_DT search_NN ._.
The_DT divisions_NNS were_VBD commanded_VBN by_IN British_JJ Officers_NNS and_CC were_VBD accom-_JJ panied_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Lieutenant_JJ Dove_NNP ._.
The_DT search_NN commenced_VBD on_IN APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
329_CD April_NNP 28th_CD and_CC continued_VBD till_NN May_NNP 4th_CD ,_, during_IN which_WDT period_NN 31_CD villages_NNS and_CC hamlets_NNS were_VBD visited_VBN ._.
No_DT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN were_VBD discovered_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT search_NN was_VBD accordingly_RB discontinued_VBN after_IN the_DT latter_JJ date_NN ._.
The_DT villages_NNS searched_VBN were_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB remarkably_RB clean_JJ and_CC the_DT attitude_NN of_IN the_DT villagers_NNS was_VBD invariably_RB friendly_JJ ._.
IX.-HOSPITALS_NNP ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN hospitals_NNS at_IN which_WDT plague_NN patients_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN was_VBD five_CD ._.
The_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS with_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN admission_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ plague_NN case_NN to_TO each_DT are_VBP given_VBN below_IN :_: -_: Name_NN of_IN hospital_NN ._.

Sassoon_NNP General_NNP Hospital_NNP 8th_CD October_NNP 1896_CD ._.
General_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP 5th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Muhammadan_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP 8th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Hindu_NNP ,_, ,_, ,_, ,_, 15th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ._.

Of_IN the_DT first_JJ ,_, the_DT first_JJ two_CD are_VBP under_IN official_JJ management_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT remainder_NN are_VBP privately_RB managed_VBN ,_, subject_JJ ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO the_DT super-_JJ vision_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ._.
SASSOON_NNP GENERAL_NNP HOSPITAL_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
This_DT is_VBZ the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN Poona_NNP and_CC is_VBZ under_IN the_DT management_NN of_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD the_DT only_JJ hospital_NN to_TO which_WDT persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN could_MD be_VB sent_VBN when_WRB the_DT disease_NN first_RB appeared_VBD in_IN Poona_NNP ._.
The_DT first_JJ case_NN was_VBD admitted_VBN on_IN 8th_CD October_NNP 1886_CD and_CC was_VBD treated_VBN in_IN the_DT Contagious_NNP Ward_NNP ._.
3_CD ._.
As_IN other_JJ cases_NNS began_VBD to_TO come_VB in_IN ,_, a_DT letter_NN was_VBD sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Exe-_NNP cutive_JJ Engineer_NNP on_IN October_NNP 22nd_CD ,_, asking_VBG for_IN the_DT erection_NN of_IN a_DT special_JJ shed_NN for_IN six_CD patients_NNS in_IN the_DT hospital_NN compound_NN ._.
A_DT grass_NN shed_VBN was_VBD accordingly_RB put_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT hospital_NN compound_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD in_IN use_NN from_IN 29th_CD October_NNP to_TO the_DT beginning_NN of_IN December_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT accommodation_NN so_RB provided_VBD proved_VBN to_TO be_VB insufficient_JJ and_CC therefore_RB a_DT committee_NN ,_, composed_VBN of_IN the_DT City_NNP Magistrate_NNP ,_, the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP and_CC the_DT Executive_NNP Engineer_NNP ,_, met_VBD on_IN December_NNP 8th_CD to_TO select_VB a_DT new_JJ site_NN for_IN plague_NN sheds_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT hospital_NN compound_NN was_VBD being_VBG overcrowded_VBN ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP selected_VBD a_DT site_NN on_IN the_DT north_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN on_IN land_NN belonging_VBG tot_NN he_PRP Great_NNP Indian_JJ Peninsula_NNP Railway_NNP Com-_NNP pany_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN they_PRP recommended_VBD that_IN sheds_NNS to_TO hold_VB 20_CD beds_NNS should_MD be_VB erected_VBN at_IN once_RB and_CC a_DT special_JJ extra_JJ establishment_NN of_IN one_CD Assist-_NNP ant_NN Surgeon_NNP and_CC one_CD Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP besides_IN menials_NNS engaged_VBN ._.
New_NNP sheds_NNS for_IN plague_NN patients_NNS were_VBD accordingly_RB erected_VBN on_IN the_DT site_NN selected_VBD b_JJ 42_CD 330_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
along_IN with_IN a_DT shed_VBN for_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP 's_POS quarters_NNS ,_, a_DT dead-_JJ house_NN and_CC a_DT privy_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT shed_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN in_IN use_NN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN compound_NN was_VBD transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT new_JJ site_NN ._.
5_CD ._.

6_CD ._.
After_IN the_DT opening_NN of_IN the_DT General_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP at_IN the_DT San-_NNP gam_NN all_DT cases_NNS received_VBN at_IN the_DT Sassoon_NNP Hospital_NNP which_WDT showed_VBD definite_JJ symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN were_VBD transferred_VBN there_RB at_IN once_RB ,_, but_CC doubtful_JJ cases_NNS which_WDT were_VBD received_VBN from_IN the_DT railway_NN station_NN and_CC the_DT cantonment_NN were_VBD kept_VBN for_IN observation_NN ._.

7_CD ._.

VI_NNP ._.
striking_VBG contrast_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS before_IN and_CC after_IN that_DT date_NN ,_, though_IN there_EX is_VBZ every_DT reason_NN to_TO think_VB that_IN there_EX was_VBD more_JJR plague_NN in_IN Poona_NNP at_IN the_DT beginning_NN than_IN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN March_NNP ._.

Mahomedan_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
17_CD ._.
This_DT hospital_NN was_VBD erected_VBN with_IN my_PRP$ sanction_NN by_IN the_DT Muhamma-_NNP dans_NNS of_IN Poona_NNP ,_, the_DT funds_NNS for_IN constructing_VBG and_CC maintaining_VBG it_PRP being_VBG raised_VBN by_IN voluntary_JJ subscription_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD managed_VBN by_IN a_DT committee_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT the_DT leading_VBG spirit_NN was_VBD Mr._NNP Jaffer_NNP Jussuff_NNP ,_, the_DT well-known_JJ Com-_NNP mission_NN Agent_NNP ._.
The_DT management_NN was_VBD subject_JJ to_TO the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ._.
The_DT committee_NN of_IN management_NN admitted_VBN all_DT Muhammadans_NNPS to_TO the_DT hospital_JJ free_JJ of_IN charge_NN and_CC provided_VBD them_PRP with_IN free_JJ board_NN and_CC lodging_VBG while_IN they_PRP remained_VBD inmates_NNS ._.
18_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN on_IN the_DT north_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT Shankarshett_NNP road_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD composed_VBN during_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN of_IN chapper_NN huts_NNS divided_VBD into_IN compartments_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD intended_VBN to_TO hold_VB one_CD patient_JJ each_DT ._.
When_WRB the_DT hospital_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD increased_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ,_, reached_VBD its_PRP$ greatest_JJS dimensions_NNS ,_, there_EX was_VBD accommodation_NN for_IN about_RB 50_CD patients_NNS ,_, a_DT number_NN which_WDT was_VBD exceeded_VBN for_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN April_NNP ._.
At_IN this_DT time_NN two_CD patients_NNS often_RB occupied_VBD one_CD compartment_NN ._.
The_DT compartments_NNS were_VBD covered_VBN matting_NN and_CC mattresses_NNS were_VBD sup-_JJ plied_VBN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ._.
Cots_NNS were_VBD purchased_VBN for_IN the_DT patients_NNS who_WP ,_, however_RB ,_, did_VBD not_RB take_VB kindly_RB to_TO them_PRP ._.
There_EX was_VBD a_DT plentiful_JJ water-supply_NN ._.
19_CD ._.
Surgeon-Captain_JJ Beveridge_NNP was_VBD in_IN supervisional_JJ medical_JJ charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN up_RB to_TO March_NNP 30th_CD ,_, when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD succeeded_VBN by_IN Surgeon-_NNP Lieutenant_NNP Kiddle_NNP ._.
The_DT administrative_JJ medical_JJ charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD held_VBN by_IN a_DT hakim_NN named_VBN Ainudin_NNP and_CC S._NNP A._NNP Rayman_NNP ,_, a_DT pensioned_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
333_CD hospital_NN assistant_NN ._.
The_DT treatment_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS was_VBD entirely_RB in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT hakim_NN who_WP used_VBD native_JJ remedies_NNS only_RB ._.
The_DT patients_NNS had_VBD the_DT option_NN of_IN being_VBG treated_VBN by_IN the_DT hospital_NN assistant_NN ,_, but_CC none_NN availed_VBD themselves_PRP of_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT hospital_NN assistant_NN was_VBD responsible_JJ to_TO the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP for_IN keeping_VBG the_DT hospital_NN in_IN a_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN ._.
The_DT supervisional_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN did_VBD not_RB interfere_VB with_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN patients_NNS ,_, but_CC no_DT case_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB discharged_VBN till_IN he_PRP was_VBD satisfied_VBN that_IN a_DT cure_NN had_VBD been_VBN effected_VBN ._.
A_DT sufficient_JJ staff_NN of_IN subordinates_NNS was_VBD maintained_VBN ._.
20_CD ._.
Plague_NN patients_NNS were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO have_VB one_CD relative_NN with_IN them_PRP in_IN hospital_NN ,_, but_CC there_EX was_VBD no_DT regular_JJ nursing_NN ._.
A_DT guard_NN of_IN native_JJ infantry_NN was_VBD kept_VBN over_IN the_DT hospital_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT entry_NN of_IN unauthorised_JJ per-_JJ sons_NNS ._.
21_CD ._.
At_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN April_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT Muhammadan_NNP Hospital_NNP was_VBD full_JJ ,_, it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO direct_VB that_DT cases_NNS among_IN Muhammadans_NNPS found_VBN in_IN the_DT search_NN by_IN the_DT military_NN should_MD be_VB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT General_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
This_DT order_NN was_VBD withdrawn_VBN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN when_WRB the_DT numbers_NNS in_IN the_DT Muhammadan_NNP Hospital_NNP had_VBD fallen_VBN ._.
22_CD ._.
Appendix_$ 27_CD gives_VBZ particulars_NNS of_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS in_IN hos-_JJ pital_NN on_IN each_DT day_NN ,_, while_IN Appendix_NNP 28_CD shows_VBZ the_DT general_JJ results_NNS of_IN the_DT treatment_NN up_RB to_TO May_NNP 20th_CD ._.
From_IN the_DT latter_JJ statement_NN it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN out_IN of_IN 309_CD patients_NNS found_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_JJ 122_CD were_VBD dis-_JJ charged_VBN cured_VBN ,_, 179_CD died_VBD and_CC 8_CD remained_VBN under_IN treatment_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT persons_NNS shown_VBN as_IN cured_JJ 48_CD were_VBD discharged_VBN within_IN ten_JJ days_NNS of_IN admis-_JJ sion_NN ,_, and_CC Surgeon-Lieutenant_JJ Kiddle_NNP considers_NNS that_WDT for_IN that_DT reason_NN they_PRP could_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN true_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
If_IN he_PRP is_VBZ correct_JJ in_IN his_PRP$ surmise_NN ,_, the_DT treatment_NN was_VBD less_RBR successful_JJ than_IN the_DT figures_NNS in_IN Appendix_NNP 28_CD indicate_NN ._.
23_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT points_NNS of_IN cleanliness_NN and_CC smartness_VB the_DT Muhammadan_NNP Hos-_NNP pital_NN has_VBZ compared_VBN unfavourably_RB both_DT with_IN the_DT General_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC the_DT Hindu_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, been_VBN of_IN immense_JJ value_NN owing_VBG to_TO the_DT confidence_NN it_PRP has_VBZ enjoyed_VBN with_IN practically_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT Muhammadan_NNP community_NN ._.
The_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS admitted_VBD belonged_VBN to_TO the_DT poorer_NN classes_NNS of_IN Muhammadans_NNPS ._.
No_DT one_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN surprised_VBN if_IN this_DT class_NN of_IN people_NNS had_VBD obstinately_RB opposed_VBN the_DT removal_NN of_IN their_PRP$ sick_NN to_TO hospital_NN ._.
So_RB far_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD this_DT from_IN being_VBG the_DT case_NN that_IN a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS were_VBD brought_VBN in_IN by_IN their_PRP$ relations_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ accord_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD in_IN danger_NN of_IN being_VBG closed_VBN for_IN want_NN of_IN funds_NNS ,_, the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP felt_VBD them-_JJ selves_NNS justified_VBN in_IN making_VBG a_DT grant-in-aid_JJ towards_NNS its_PRP$ maintenance_NN ._.
The_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN has_VBZ been_VBN chiefly_NNS due_JJ to_TO the_DT efforts_NNS of_IN Mr._NNP Jaffar_NNP Jussuff_NNP who_WP ,_, besides_IN collecting_VBG the_DT funds_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO finance_VB it_PRP ,_, has_VBZ 334_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.

VI_NNP ._.
paid_VBN constant_JJ attention_NN to_TO the_DT details_NNS of_IN the_DT management_NN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ adopted_VBN ,_, to_TO the_DT best_JJS of_IN his_PRP$ ability_NN ,_, all_DT suggestions_NNS made_VBN to_TO him_PRP by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ._.

24_CD ._.
The_DT Hindu_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP was_VBD erected_VBN from_IN the_DT voluntary_JJ contributions_NNS with_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ._.

The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD managed_VBN by_IN a_DT committee_NN of_IN Brahmins_NNP ,_, subject_JJ to_TO the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ._.
25_CD ._.

1_CD per_IN diem_NN for_IN maintenance_NN charges_NNS ._.

X.-SEGREGATION_JJ CAMPS_NNP ._.
The_DT segregation_NN camps_NNS were_VBD designed_VBN for_IN the_DT reception_NN of_IN appar-_JJ ently_RB uninfected_JJ persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN exposed_VBN to_TO plague_VB infection_NN ._.

6_CD of_IN the_DT rules_NNS published_VBN with_IN Government_NNP Notifica-_NNP tion_NN No_NNP ._.
1272-765-P._CD of_IN 9th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ._.
The_DT powers_NNS of_IN the_DT commit-_JJ tee_NN under_IN that_DT rule_NN were_VBD subsequently_RB extended_VBN by_IN Government_NNP Reso-_NNP lution_NN No_NNP ._.
1810-1264-P._CD of_IN the_DT 2nd_CD April_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Segregated_VBN persons_NNS were_VBD liable_JJ to_TO detention_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN not_RB exceeding_VBG ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT object_NN of_IN segregating_VBG the_DT apparently_RB healthy_JJ inmates_NNS of_IN plague-_NN infected_JJ buildings_NNS was_VBD twofold_VBN ._.
First_RB and_CC principally_RB ,_, to_TO prevent_VB those_DT of_IN them_PRP in_IN whom_WP plague_NN was_VBD in_IN a_DT state_NN of_IN incubation_NN from_IN developing_VBG the_DT disease_NN in_IN private_JJ houses_NNS and_CC becoming_VBG fresh_JJ plague_NN centres_NNS secondly_RB ,_, to_TO insure_VB the_DT non-occupation_NN of_IN plague_NN infected_VBN buildings_NNS till_IN the_DT buildings_NNS had_VBD been_VBN thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN ._.
Ten_CD days_NNS was_VBD fixed_VBN as_IN the_DT maximum_JJ period_NN of_IN detention_NN ,_, as_IN that_DT was_VBD believed_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT longest_JJS term_NN for_IN which_WDT the_DT malady_NN commonly_RB remained_VBD in_IN a_DT state_NN of_IN incubation_NN in_IN a_DT human_JJ being_VBG ._.

The_DT General_NNP Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT construction_NN of_IN this_DT camp_NN was_VBD commenced_VBN by_IN the_DT Poona_NNP City_NNP Municipality_NNP on_IN February_NNP 1st_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ instance_NN eight_CD blocks_NNS of_IN huts_NNS containing_VBG 32_CD rooms_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN ._.
On_IN my_PRP$ arrival_NN here_RB I_PRP issued_VBD instructions_NNS for_IN largely_RB increasing_VBG the_DT size_NN of_IN the_DT camp_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD constantly_RB growing_VBG till_NN finally_RB in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN April_NNP it_PRP contained_VBD 122_CD rooms_NNS ._.
The_DT camp_NN consisted_VBD of_IN substantial_JJ chappar_NN huts_NNS with_IN mud_JJ floors_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT commencement_NN blocks_NNS containing_VBG four_CD rooms_NNS were_VBD constructed_VBN ._.
Later_RB on_IN ,_, however_RB ,_, blocks_NNS were_VBD built_VBN with_IN only_RB two_CD rooms_NNS each_DT ,_, the_DT object_NN of_IN the_DT change_NN being_VBG to_TO diminish_VB both_DT the_DT loss_NN that_WDT would_MD be_VB caused_VBN in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN fire_NN in_IN any_DT block_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT house_NN space_NN to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT size_NN of_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT rooms_NNS was_VBD 12_CD by_IN 10_CD feet_NNS ._.
A_DT plan_NN of_IN the_DT General_NNP Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP accompanies_NNS (_( Appendix_NNP 32_CD )_) ._.
5_CD ._.
Fifteen_JJ cook-rooms_NNS of_IN corrugated_JJ iron_NN were_VBD provided_VBN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT camp_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD 20_CD latrines_NNS ,_, 12_CD for_IN men_NNS and_CC 8_CD for_IN women_NNS ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT camp_NN was_VBD abundantly_RB supplied_VBN with_IN water_NN from_IN a_DT neigh-_JJ bouring_NN draw_NN well_RB ._.
A_DT pump_NN was_VBD fixed_VBN up_RP at_IN the_DT well_NN and_CC an_DT adjoin-_JJ ing_NN cistern_NN was_VBD kept_VBN full_JJ of_IN water_NN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS ._.
Bathing_NNP and_CC washing_VBG platforms_NNS to_TO which_WDT water_NN was_VBD brought_VBN from_IN the_DT well_NN by_IN pipes_NNS were_VBD constructed_VBN within_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT camp_NN ._.
Rows_NNS of_IN kerosine-oil_NN tins_NNS filled_VBN with_IN water_NN were_VBD placed_VBN alongside_IN all_PDT the_DT huts_NNS for_IN use_NN in_IN case_NN of_IN fire_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT municipal_JJ fire-engine_NN was_VBD kept_VBN on_IN the_DT premises_NNS ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT camp_NN was_VBD lighted_VBN by_IN standard_NN lamps_NNS which_WDT stood_VBD in_IN rows_NNS between_IN the_DT lines_NNS of_IN huts_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
When_WRB I_PRP arrived_VBD at_IN Poona_NNP so_RB much_RB of_IN the_DT camp_NN as_IN was_VBD then_RB in_IN existence_NN was_VBD open_JJ to_TO any_DT of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS that_WDT chose_VBD to_TO come_VB there_RB ._.
There_EX was_VBD then_RB no_DT agency_NN to_TO compel_VB people_NNS to_TO come_VB to_TO the_DT camp_NN ,_, and_CC hardly_RB any_DT came_VBD there_EX of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ accord_NN ._.
After_IN my_PRP$ arrival_NN and_CC before_IN the_DT employment_NN of_IN the_DT military_NN on_IN plague_NN duty_NN ,_, I_PRP endeavoured_VBD to_TO attract_VB the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN plague_NN houses_NNS to_TO the_DT camp_NN by_IN offering_VBG one_CD free_JJ meal_NN a_DT day_NN to_TO every_DT one_CD in_IN camp_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN allowing_VBG the_DT inmates_NNS to_TO return_VB to_TO the_DT city_NN in_IN the_DT day-_JJ time_NN to_TO follow_VB their_PRP$ ordinary_JJ avocations_NNS ._.
Even_RB this_DT inducement_NN failed_VBD to_TO bring_VB any_DT considerable_JJ number_NN of_IN people_NNS to_TO the_DT camp_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO realise_VB that_IN a_DT non-compulsory_JJ system_NN of_IN segregation_NN was_VBD impracticable_JJ in_IN Poona_NNP ._.

The_DT Muhammadan_NNP Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP ._.
15_CD ._.

The_DT camp_NN was_VBD under_IN the_DT supervision_NN at_IN first_JJ of_IN Surgeon-Captain_NNP Beveridge_NNP and_CC subsequently_RB of_IN Surgeon-Lieutenant_JJ Kiddle_NNP ._.
16_CD ._.
Appendix_$ 35_CD is_VBZ a_DT daily_JJ statement_NN showing_VBG how_WRB the_DT persons_NNS admitted_VBD to_TO the_DT Muhammadan_NNP Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP were_VBD disposed_VBN of_IN ._.
Admissions_NNS took_VBD place_NN from_IN March_NNP 15th_CD to_TO April_NNP 16th_CD and_CC the_DT camp_NN was_VBD finally_RB closed_VBN on_IN April_NNP 22nd_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN inmates_NNS admitted_VBN was_VBD 302_CD ,_, of_IN whom_WP 255_CD were_VBD found_VBN free_RB from_IN plague_NN and_CC dis-_NN charged_VBN ,_, 2_CD were_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC 45_CD were_VBD otherwise_RB disposed_VBN of_IN ._.
No_DT deaths_NNS took_VBD place_NN at_IN this_DT camp_NN ._.

One_CD was_VBD admitted_VBN to_TO the_DT camp_NN on_IN March_NNP 20th_CD and_CC was_VBD attacked_VBN on_IN March_NNP 22nd_CD ;_: the_DT other_JJ was_VBD admitted_VBN on_IN April_NNP 6th_CD and_CC was_VBD attacked_VBN on_IN April_NNP 9th_CD ._.
18_CD ._.

24_CD ._.

of_IN rice_NN or_CC flour_NN ,_, 3_CD ozs_NN ._.

25_CD ._.
On_IN arrival_NN in_IN camp_NN each_DT person_NN had_VBD a_DT good_JJ bath_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD pro-_NN vided_VBN with_IN fresh_JJ clothes_NNS and_CC bedding_NN ._.

27_CD ._.
When_WRB a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD the_DT tent_NN which_WDT the_DT patient_NN had_VBD inhabited_VBN was_VBD struck_VBN and_CC placed_VBN in_IN the_DT sun_NN for_IN three_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT ground_NN was_VBD well_RB soaked_VBN with_IN carbolic_JJ solution_NN and_CC chloride_NN of_IN lime_NN in_IN solution_NN was_VBD sprinkled_VBN about_RB ._.

XI.-PLAGUE_NN AND_NNP MORTALITY_NNP STATISTICS_NNP ._.
Poona_NNP City_NNP ._.
The_DT population_NN of_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT census_NN of_IN 1891_CD ,_, is_VBZ 118,790_CD ._.
The_DT area_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN is_VBZ 4.9_CD square_JJ miles_NNS and_CC 24,242_CD persons_NNS per_IN square_NN mile_NN represents_VBZ the_DT density_NN of_IN population_NN ._.
For_IN statistical_JJ purposes_NNS the_DT population_NN ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT census_NN of_IN 1891_CD ,_, is_VBZ throughout_IN this_DT report_NN taken_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT population_NN of_IN Poona_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
As_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN fact_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT population_NN of_IN Poona_NNP has_VBZ fluc-_NN tuated_VBN considerably_RB between_IN September_NNP 1896_CD and_CC May_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT establishment_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP people_NNS from_IN that_DT city_NN began_VBD to_TO flock_VB into_IN Poona_NNP so_RB far_RB back_RB as_IN September_NNP 1896_CD ,_, and_CC con-_JJ tinued_NN to_TO do_VB so_RB till_VB February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, an_DT exodus_NN from_IN Poona_NNP set_NN in_IN towards_NNS the_DT end_NN of_IN January_NNP when_WRB the_DT plague_NN had_VBD taken_VBN root_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
It_PRP continued_VBD throughout_IN February_NNP and_CC the_DT early_JJ days_NNS of_IN March_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT second_JJ week_NN of_IN March_NNP ,_, when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD known_VBN in_IN the_DT city_NN that_IN the_DT military_JJ were_VBD to_TO be_VB employed_VBN to_TO suppress_VB the_DT plague_NN ,_, large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN people_NNS left_VBN Poona_NNP ._.
From_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN March_NNP to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN April_NNP the_DT exodus_NN continued_VBD on_IN a_DT diminished_JJ scale_NN ._.
To-_JJ wards_NNS the_DT end_NN of_IN April_NNP the_DT tide_NN turned_VBD ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT first-half_NN of_IN May_NNP there_EX was_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ influx_NN of_IN population_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT mili-_JJ tary_JJ operations_NNS ceased_VBN on_IN May_NNP 19th_CD the_DT population_NN of_IN Poona_NNP was_VBD prob-_JJ ably_RB about_IN what_WP it_PRP was_VBD when_WRB they_PRP commenced_VBD on_IN March_NNP 30th_CD ._.
3_CD ._.
Estimates_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN at_IN various_JJ stages_NNS of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ are_VBP necessarily_RB a_DT matter_NN of_IN guesswork_NN ,_, a_DT very_RB large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT egress_NN having_VBG been_VBN by_IN road_NN ,_, statistics_NNS of_IN which_WDT are_VBP not_RB available_JJ ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT maximum_JJ population_NN was_VBD attained_VBN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN January_NNP when_WRB there_EX were_VBD probably_RB not_RB less_JJR than_IN 150,000_CD people_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN April_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT population_NN had_VBD reached_VBN its_PRP$ lowest_JJS point_NN ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN inhabitants_NNS probably_RB did_VBD not_RB exceed_VB 80,000_CD ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ registered_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP ,_, an_DT imported_JJ one_CD ,_, occurred_VBD on_IN 19th_CD December_NNP 1896_CD ._.
Having_VBG regard_NN to_TO the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS found_VBN at_IN Poona_NNP railway_NN station_NN during_IN the_DT previous_JJ 21/2_CD months_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN cases_NNS occurred_VBD earlier_RBR ,_, but_CC if_IN they_PRP did_VBD ,_, they_PRP were_VBD not_RB reported_VBN to_TO the_DT municipality_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
A_DT statement_NN of_IN the_DT daily_JJ plague_NN attacks_NNS ,_, plague_JJ deaths_NNS ,_, and_CC total_JJ mortality_NN from_IN December_NNP 1st_CD ,_, 1896_CD ,_, will_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP 38_CD ._.

[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.

From_IN Appendix_NNP 39_CD it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN the_DT registered_JJ mortality_NN was_VBD abnormally_RB low_JJ in_IN October_NNP and_CC November_NNP 1896_CD ._.

In_IN May_NNP it_PRP was_VBD again_RB below_IN the_DT average_NN ._.

VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
343_CD 7_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ little_JJ reason_NN to_TO doubt_VB that_IN owing_VBG to_TO the_DT exceptional_JJ dryness_NN of_IN the_DT weather_NN consequent_NN on_IN the_DT early_JJ stoppage_NN of_IN the_DT mon-_JJ soon_RB of_IN 1896_CD ,_, the_DT general_JJ health_NN of_IN Poona_NNP from_IN October_NNP 1896_CD to_TO May_NNP 1897_CD was_VBD ,_, apart_RB from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, exceptionally_RB good_JJ ._.
This_DT fact_NN being_VBG accepted_VBN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB evident_JJ from_IN a_DT perusal_NN of_IN Appendices_NNS 38_CD and_CC 39_CD that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN reported_VBN plague_JJ deaths_NNS does_VBZ not_RB wholly_RB account_VBP for_IN the_DT largeness_NN of_IN the_DT total_JJ mortality_NN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN January_NNP ,_, February_NNP ,_, March_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT portion_NN of_IN April_NNP ._.
The_DT fact_NN is_VBZ that_IN a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN deaths_NNS that_WDT have_VBP occurred_VBN in_IN private_JJ houses_NNS have_VBP been_VBN falsely_RB reported_VBN as_IN due_JJ to_TO other_JJ causes_NNS and_CC registered_VBD accordingly_RB by_IN the_DT municipal_JJ authorities_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN plague_JJ deaths_NNS registered_VBD up_RP to_TO May_NNP 20th_CD has_VBZ been_VBN 1,481_CD ._.
A_DT more_RBR correct_JJ idea_NN can_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB obtained_VBN of_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN plague_JJ deaths_NNS by_IN deducting_VBG the_DT average_JJ mortality_NN from_IN the_DT actual_JJ mortality_NN for_IN each_DT month_NN and_CC treating_VBG the_DT balance_NN as_IN due_JJ to_TO plague_VB ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN plague_JJ deaths_NNS reported_VBN after_IN 20th_CD April_NNP may_MD be_VB accepted_VBN as_IN approximately_RB correct_JJ ._.
The_DT following_JJ statement_NN shows_VBZ the_DT plague_JJ mortality_NN of_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP as_IN arrived_VBN at_IN by_IN this_DT method_NN :_: --_: Month_NNP ._.

in_IN plague_JJ year_NN ._.
columns_NN 2_CD and_CC 3_CD ._.
1_CD 2_CD 3_CD 4_CD December_NNP 261_CD 270_CD 9_CD January_NNP 261_CD 497_CD 236_CD February_NNP 225_CD 1,009_CD 784_CD March_NNP 244_CD 1,656_CD 1,412_CD April_NNP 1st_CD to_TO 20th_CD .._NNS 178_CD 534_CD 356_CD Add_NNP -_: Reported_VBD plague_JJ deaths_NNS from_IN April_NNP 21st_CD to_TO May_NNP 20th_CD ..._: 104_CD Total_NNP estimated_VBD plague_JJ mortality_NN ..._: 2,901_CD 9_CD ._.
The_DT estimate_NN of_IN the_DT total_JJ plague_NN mortality_NN thus_RB arrived_VBN at_IN is_VBZ probably_RB too_RB low_JJ rather_RB than_IN too_RB high_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN it_PRP has_VBZ to_TO be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN the_DT general_JJ health_NN ,_, apart_RB from_IN plague_NN ,_, was_VBD good_JJ throughout_IN the_DT epidemic_NN ._.
Another_DT cause_NN that_WDT operated_VBD to_TO keep_VB down_RP mortality_NN during_IN the_DT period_NN the_DT military_JJ search_NN parties_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN 344_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
was_VBD the_DT removal_NN of_IN sick_JJ persons_NNS from_IN the_DT city_NN into_IN the_DT surrounding_NN villages_NNS ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN this_DT practice_NN did_VBD much_RB to_TO lower_VB the_DT general_JJ mortality_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP certainly_RB accounts_VBZ to_TO a_DT great_JJ extent_NN for_IN the_DT exceptional_JJ lowness_NN of_IN the_DT mortality_NN from_IN causes_VBZ other_JJ than_IN plague_NN during_IN the_DT period_NN from_IN 21st_CD April_NNP to_TO 20th_CD May_NNP ._.
Accepting_VBG 2,901_CD as_IN the_DT total_JJ plague_NN mortality_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, -and_VBP I_PRP think_VBP the_DT figure_NN is_VBZ well_RB within_IN the_DT mark_NN ,_, -we_JJ find_VBP that_IN the_DT plague_NN claimed_VBD 24_CD per_IN mille_NN of_IN the_DT registered_JJ population_NN as_IN victims_NNS ._.
10_CD ._.
In_IN tracing_VBG the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ it_PRP has_VBZ to_TO be_VB firmly_RB borne_VBN in_IN mind_NN that_WDT till_VBZ the_DT latter_JJ part_NN of_IN April_NNP our_PRP$ record_NN of_IN plague_NN attacks_NNS and_CC plague_JJ deaths_NNS was_VBD very_RB incomplete_JJ ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN its_PRP$ rise_NN and_CC fall_NN must_MD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, be_VB looked_VBN for_IN in_IN the_DT variations_NNS in_IN the_DT total_JJ mortality_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN this_DT connection_NN we_PRP ask_VBP attention_NN to_TO the_DT abstract_NN of_IN Appendix_NNP 38_CD ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN given_VBN ._.
From_IN the_DT last_JJ column_NN of_IN that_DT abstract_NN it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN the_DT recorded_JJ mortality_NN rose_VBD steadily_RB from_IN the_DT first_JJ period_NN of_IN December_NNP to_TO the_DT first_JJ period_NN of_IN March_NNP with_IN only_RB one_CD interruption_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN there_EX was_VBD a_DT continuous_JJ decline_NN in_IN all_DT subsequent_JJ periods_NNS ._.
In_IN connection_NN with_IN this_DT it_PRP must_MD be_VB explained_VBN that_IN before_IN the_DT plague_NN operations_NNS came_VBD under_IN European_JJ control_NN the_DT death_NN registration_NN was_VBD carried_VBN on_IN very_RB irregularly_RB by_IN the_DT municipal_JJ staff_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN each_DT month_NN a_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS were_VBD brought_VBN on_IN to_TO the_DT register_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN reported_VBN by_IN the_DT municipal_JJ subordi-_JJ nates_NNS and_CC policemen_NNS ,_, some_DT of_IN which_WDT had_VBD occurred_VBN weeks_NNS before_IN ._.
Further_RB ,_, deaths_NNS were_VBD not_RB registered_VBN at_IN all_DT on_IN days_NNS when_WRB the_DT Municipal_NNP Office_NNP was_VBD closed_VBN ,_, deaths_NNS which_WDT should_MD have_VB been_VBN registered_VBN on_IN such_JJ days_NNS being_VBG brought_VBN to_TO account_VB subsequently_RB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ owing_VBG to_TO these_DT two_CD causes_NNS combined_VBD that_IN the_DT registered_JJ mortality_NN was_VBD lower_JJR in_IN the_DT first_JJ period_NN of_IN January_NNP than_IN in_IN the_DT last_JJ period_NN of_IN December_NNP ._.
I_PRP see_VBP no_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN there_EX was_VBD any_DT real_JJ interruption_NN in_IN the_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT mortality_NN between_IN the_DT first_JJ period_NN of_IN December_NNP and_CC the_DT first_JJ period_NN of_IN March_NNP ._.
Up_RB to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN January_NNP that_IN increase_NN was_VBD assisted_VBN by_IN a_DT continuous_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT population_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
From_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN Feb-_NNP ruary_NN it_PRP went_VBD on_IN concurrently_NN with_IN a_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT population_NN ._.
The_DT mortality_NN from_IN all_DT causes_NNS reached_VBD its_PRP$ highest_JJS point_NN on_IN 10th_CD March_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT fall_NN set_VBN in_IN ._.
11_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT abstract_NN that_IN the_DT total_JJ mortality_NN in_IN the_DT second_JJ period_NN of_IN March_NNP was_VBD smaller_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT first_JJ period_NN of_IN that_DT month_NN by_IN 98_CD ._.
This_DT decrease_NN is_VBZ chiefly_JJ due_JJ to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN it_PRP got_VBD known_VBN in_IN the_DT city_NN that_IN house-to-house_JJ inspection_NN by_IN the_DT military_NN would_MD commence_VB on_IN 13th_CD March_NNP ._.
During_IN the_DT few_JJ days_NNS before_IN that_DT date_NN ,_, thousands_NNS of_IN people_NNS including_VBG many_JJ sick_JJ left_VBD Poona_NNP ,_, which_WDT naturally_RB had_VBD its_PRP$ effect_NN on_IN the_DT mortality_NN within_IN city_NN limits_NNS ._.

The_DT small_JJ decrease_NN in_IN the_DT mortality_NN that_WDT occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT third_JJ period_NN of_IN March_NNP is_VBZ ,_, in_IN our_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, due_JJ to_TO the_DT plan_NN of_IN campaign_NN beginning_VBG to_TO take_VB effect_NN on_IN the_DT epidemic_NN ._.

By_IN 19th_CD May_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT house-to-house_NN inspection_NN was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO a_DT close_NN ,_, the_DT disease_NN may_MD be_VB said_VBD to_TO have_VB become_VBN sporadic_JJ ._.

12_CD ._.
The_DT population_NN within_IN Poona_NNP Suburban_NNP Municipal_NNP limits_NNS ,_, accord-_JJ ing_NN to_TO the_DT census_NN of_IN 1891_CD ,_, is_VBZ 6,706_CD ,_, exclusive_JJ of_IN passengers_NNS enumerat-_JJ ed_NN at_IN the_DT railway_NN station_NN ._.
The_DT area_NN is_VBZ 375_CD square_JJ miles_NNS ,_, and_CC 1,788_CD persons_NNS per_IN square_NN mile_NN ,_, represents_VBZ the_DT density_NN of_IN population_NN ._.
A_DT statement_NN of_IN the_DT daily_JJ plague_NN attacks_NNS ,_, plague_JJ deaths_NNS and_CC total_JJ mortal-_JJ ity_NN from_IN 2nd_CD October_NNP 1896_CD to_TO 20th_CD May_NNP 1897_CD will_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN Appen-_NNP dix_NN 41_CD ._.

This_DT is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT Sassoon_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT general_JJ hospital_NN for_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN Poona_NNP ,_, is_VBZ situated_VBN within_IN suburban_JJ limits_NNS ._.

In_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT cases_NNS shown_VBN above_IN one_CD imported_VBN plague_NN case_NN occurred_VBD on_IN November_NNP 12th_CD and_CC proved_VBD fatal_JJ ._.
