No_DT local_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ known_VBN to_TO have_VB occurred_VBN before_IN 9th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD only_RB in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN March_NNP and_CC April_NNP ,_, after_IN the_DT adjoining_NN parts_NNS of_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP had_VBD become_VBN badly_RB affected_JJ ,_, that_IN the_DT can-_JJ tonment_NN suffered_VBD at_IN all_DT severely_RB from_IN the_DT epidemic_NN ._.
The_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP is_VBZ occupied_VBN by_IN military_JJ lines_NNS and_CC bungalows_NNS ,_, where_WRB a_DT filth_NN disease_NN like_IN plague_NN would_MD not_RB be_VB expected_VBN to_TO gain_VB a_DT footing_NN ._.
The_DT bazar_JJ portions_NNS of_IN the_DT cantonment_NN are_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, thickly_RB populated_VBN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ there_RB that_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT indigenous_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD ._.
Death_NNP Registration_NNP arrangements_NNS ._.
17_CD ._.
The_DT registration_NN of_IN all_DT deaths_NNS that_IN occurred_VBD was_VBD a_DT point_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP attached_VBD the_DT utmost_JJ importance_NN ._.
The_DT subject_NN was_VBD one_CD which_WDT had_VBD not_RB received_VBN the_DT attention_NN it_PRP deserved_VBD in_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP up_RB to_TO the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT appointment_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT bye-law_NN relating_NN to_TO the_DT giving_VBG of_IN information_NN of_IN deaths_NNS by_IN the_DT people_NNS had_VBD not_RB been_VBN enforced_VBN by_IN the_DT Poona_NNP City_NNP Municipality_NNP ._.
In_IN practice_NN information_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN deaths_NNS used_VBN to_TO be_VB collected_VBN by_IN the_DT road-sweepers_NNS who_WP were_VBD paid_VBN a_DT quarter_NN of_IN an_DT anna_NN for_IN every_DT death_NN reported_VBN at_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Office_NNP ._.
The_DT ward_NN mukadams_NN and_CC inspectors_NNS had_VBD orders_NNS to_TO check_VB the_DT information_NN so_RB obtained_VBN ,_, and_CC police_NNS con-_JJ stables_NNS on_IN duty_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN had_VBD orders_NNS to_TO collect_VB information_NN about_IN domestic_JJ occurrences_NNS to_TO serve_VB as_IN a_DT check_NN on_IN that_DT collected_VBN by_IN municipal_JJ agency_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT five_CD years_NNS 1891-92_JJ to_TO 1895-96_CD the_DT registered_JJ mortal-_JJ ity_NN had_VBD been_VBN at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN 27_CD per_IN mille_NN on_IN the_DT census_NN population_NN of_IN 1891_CD ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ likely_JJ that_IN about_IN one_CD quarter_NN of_IN the_DT deaths_NNS occurred_VBD used_VBN to_TO escape_VB registration_NN ._.
18_CD ._.
Nos_NNP ._.
17_CD ,_, 18_CD and_CC 19_CD of_IN the_DT rules_NNS published_VBN in_IN Government_NNP Notification_NNP No_NNP 1272/765-P_NN of_IN 9th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD gave_VBD the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP power_NN to_TO enforce_VB more_JJR accurate_JJ registration_NN of_IN deaths_NNS than_IN had_VBD hitherto_VBN taken_VBN place_NN ._.
From_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT military_JJ operations_NNS commenced_VBD ,_, registration_NN clerks_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN on_IN duty_NN from_IN 6_CD A.M._NNP to_TO 10_CD P.M._NNP daily_RB within_IN city_NN suburban_NN and_CC cantonment_NN limits_NNS to_TO register_VB deaths_NNS of_IN which_WDT information_NN was_VBD given_VBN under_IN rule_NN 17_CD and_CC to_TO grant_VB certificates_NNS of_IN registry_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN mukadams_NNS were_VBD posted_VBN at_IN the_DT principal_NN burning_NN and_CC burial_JJ grounds_NNS with_IN orders_NNS to_TO collect_VB death_NN registry_NN certificates_NNS from_IN funeral_JJ parties_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO hand_NN over_RP a_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT funeral_JJ party_NN to_TO the_DT police_NN if_IN no_DT certificate_NN was_VBD forthcoming_VBG ._.
Instructions_NNS were_VBD given_VBN to_TO all_DT policemen_NNS on_IN duty_NN to_TO examine_VB the_DT certificates_NNS of_IN all_DT funeral_JJ parties_NNS which_WDT passed_VBD them_PRP and_CC to_TO detain_VB a_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT party_NN when_WRB no_DT certi-_JJ ficate_NN was_VBD forthcoming_VBG in_IN order_NN that_IN inquiries_NNS might_MD be_VB made_VBN as_IN to_TO 348_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.

VI_NNP ._.
where_WRB the_DT death_NN had_VBD taken_VBN place_NN ._.
The_DT arrangements_NNS made_VBN were_VBD duly_RB notified_VBN to_TO the_DT public_NN ._.
19_CD ._.
The_DT startling_NN decrease_NN which_WDT took_VBD place_NN in_IN the_DT mortality_NN of_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP during_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN April_NNP led_VBD the_DT Committee_NNP to_TO entertain_VB a_DT doubt_NN whether_IN deaths_NNS were_VBD not_RB escaping_VBG registration_NN ._.
Accordingly_RB ,_, with_IN a_DT view_NN of_IN increasing_VBG the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT death_NN registration_NN arrangements_NNS ,_, a_DT British_JJ officer_NN was_VBD placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN them_PRP from_IN April_NNP 26th_CD ._.
The_DT actual_JJ work_NN of_IN death_NN registration_NN was_VBD entrusted_VBN to_TO native_JJ officers_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT mukadams_NNS stationed_VBD at_IN the_DT burial_NN and_CC burning_VBG grounds_NNS were_VBD replaced_VBN by_IN men_NNS from_IN the_DT native_JJ infantry_NN ._.
Sowars_NNS were_VBD told_VBN off_RP to_TO inspect_VB daily_RB the_DT smaller_JJR burial-grounds_NNS where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD not_RB worth_JJ while_IN maintaining_VBG permanent_JJ posts_NNS ._.
I_PRP am_VBP confident_JJ that_IN since_IN these_DT changes_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN very_RB few_JJ deaths_NNS have_VBP escaped_VBN registration_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT number_NN that_WDT went_VBD unregistered_JJ before_IN April_NNP 26th_CD was_VBD probably_RB inconsiderable_JJ ._.
The_DT arrangements_NNS made_VBN for_IN veri-_JJ fying_VBG the_DT addresses_NNS at_IN which_WDT deaths_NNS occurred_VBD have_VBP been_VBN noticed_VBN in_IN describing_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT fumigation_NN parties_NNS ._.
20_CD ._.
In_IN suburban_JJ and_CC cantonment_JJ limits_NNS ,_, where_WRB the_DT death-rate_JJ never_RB reached_VBD the_DT height_NN it_PRP did_VBD in_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT medical_JJ examination_NN of_IN corpses_NNS of_IN persons_NNS who_WP died_VBD in_IN places_NNS other_JJ than_IN hospital_NN were_VBD made_VBN at_IN an_DT early_JJ stage_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS ._.
This_DT had_VBD the_DT effect_NN of_IN keeping_VBG down_RP the_DT number_NN of_IN houses_NNS which_WDT had_VBD to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN and_CC their_PRP$ inmates_NNS segregated_VBN ,_, since_IN when_WRB the_DT examina-_JJ tion_NN showed_VBD that_IN death_NN was_VBD not_RB due_JJ to_TO plague_VB disinfection_NN and_CC segre-_JJ gations_NNS were_VBD inapplicable_JJ ._.
21_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT calls_NNS upon_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ officers_NNS employed_VBN ,_, a_DT system_NN of_IN medical_JJ examination_NN of_IN corpses_NNS was_VBD not_RB introduced_VBN till_NN May_NNP 19th_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT search_NN parties_NNS stopped_VBD ._.
Since_IN that_DT date_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN performed_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Captain_NNP Beveridge_NNP ,_, and_CC has_VBZ had_VBN the_DT effect_NN of_IN saving_VBG the_DT public_NN from_IN much_JJ inconvenience_NN ._.
A_DT copy_NN of_IN the_DT notification_NN which_WDT was_VBD issued_VBN regard-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN of_IN corpses_NNS is_VBZ given_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP 47_CD ._.
22_CD ._.
By_IN this_DT system_NN of_IN inspection_NN of_IN dead_JJ bodies_NNS by_IN a_DT medical_JJ man_NN ,_, combined_VBN with_IN efficient_JJ death_NN registration_NN arrangements_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ improbable_JJ that_IN any_DT considerable_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN plague_NN can_MD escape_VB the_DT notice_NN of_IN the_DT authorities_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT enforcement_NN of_IN disinfection_NN and_CC segre-_JJ gation_NN in_IN all_DT doubtful_JJ cases_NNS which_WDT it_PRP renders_VBZ possible_JJ should_MD go_VB far_RB to_TO prevent_VB a_DT recrudescence_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN ._.
XII.-INSPECTION_NN OF_IN IN-COMERS_NNP AND_NNP OUT-GOERS_NNP ,_, This_DT subject_NN may_MD conveniently_RB be_VB dealt_VBN with_IN under_IN two_CD heads-_JJ inspection_NN at_IN railway_NN stations_NNS and_CC inspection_NN on_IN roads_NNS ._.
APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
349_CD Inspection_NN at_IN Railway_NNP Stations_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
In_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT appearance_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT Managing_NNP Committee_NNP of_IN the_DT Poona_NNP Suburban_NNP Municipality_NNP resolved_VBD ,_, on_IN the_DT 29th_CD September_NNP 1896_CD ,_, to_TO post_VB a_DT medical_JJ man_NN at_IN the_DT Poona_NNP railway_NN station_NN to_TO watch_VB passengers_NNS arriving_VBG from_IN Bombay_NNP by_IN railway_NN and_CC to_TO send_VB any_DT found_NN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN to_TO the_DT shed_VBN provided_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN in_IN the_DT Sassoon_NNP Hospital_NNP compound_NN ._.
A_DT medical_JJ man_NN was_VBD accordingly_RB posted_VBN at_IN Poona_NNP station_NN from_IN 30th_CD September_NNP 1896_CD with_IN two_CD peons_NNS to_TO work_VB under_IN him_PRP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD instructed_VBN by_IN the_DT then_RB Deputy_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP Surgeon-Major_NNP Street_NNP as_IN to_TO how_WRB he_PRP should_MD examine_VB persons_NNS suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC directed_VBD to_TO advise_VB them_PRP to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT Sassoon_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN their_PRP$ refusing_NN to_TO do_VB so_RB to_TO ascertain_VB their_PRP$ destination_NN and_CC communicate_VB it_PRP to_TO the_DT authorities_NNS concerned_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
On_IN 28th_CD December_NNP the_DT inspecting_JJ staff_NN was_VBD increased_VBN to_TO two_CD medical_JJ men_NNS and_CC four_CD peons_NNS ,_, who_WP met_VBD all_PDT the_DT passenger_NN trains_NNS arriving_VBG from_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
On_IN January_NNP 31st_CD the_DT inspecting_JJ staff_NN was_VBD authorised_VBN to_TO compel_VB sufferers_NNS from_IN the_DT plague_NN to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
From_IN February_NNP 20th_CD the_DT inspecting_JJ staff_NN was_VBD required_VBN to_TO watch_VB persons_NNS leaving_VBG by_IN rail_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN those_DT arriving_VBG ._.
From_IN January_NNP 16th_CD a_DT cart_NN was_VBD specially_RB engaged_VBN for_IN the_DT conveyance_NN of_IN sick_JJ persons_NNS from_IN the_DT station_NN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC stretchers_NNS were_VBD provided_VBN to_TO carry_VB patients_NNS from_IN the_DT platform_NN to_TO the_DT cart_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
On_IN March_NNP 15th_CD a_DT European_JJ Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP was_VBD deputed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP for_IN passenger_NN inspection_NN duty_NN at_IN Poona_NNP station_NN ._.
On_IN March_NNP 21st_CD the_DT two_CD municipal_JJ medical_JJ men_NNS were_VBD withdrawn_VBN and_CC their_PRP$ duties_NNS taken_VBN up_RP by_IN four_CD hospital_NN assistants_NNS appointed_VBN by_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN ._.
On_IN April_NNP 5th_CD a_DT second_JJ European_JJ Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP and_CC three_CD additional_JJ hospital_NN assistants_NNS were_VBD detailed_VBN for_IN duty_NN ._.
Thus_RB the_DT pre-_JJ sent_JJ strength_NN of_IN the_DT inspecting_JJ staff_NN at_IN the_DT Poona_NNP station_NN is_VBZ two_CD Assist-_JJ ant_JJ Surgeons_NNS and_CC seven_CD hospital_NN assistants_NNS appointed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP and_CC four_CD peons_NNS supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Poona_NNP Suburban_NNP Municipality_NNP ._.
5_CD ._.
At_IN first_RB the_DT inspection_NN chiefly_NN consisted_VBN in_IN watching_VBG third_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS as_IN they_PRP passed_VBD the_DT ticket-collectors_NNS at_IN the_DT exits_NNS ._.
Later_RB on_IN it_PRP was_VBD arranged_VBN with_IN the_DT railway_NN authorities_NNS to_TO require_VB all_DT third_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS to_TO pass_VB into_IN a_DT compartment_NN specially_RB allotted_VBN in_IN the_DT third_JJ class_NN waiting-room_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD inspected_VBN by_IN medical_JJ officers_NNS ,_, while_IN one_CD medical_JJ man_NN watched_VBD the_DT exit_NN for_IN first_JJ and_CC second_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS ._.
6_CD ._.
Subsequently_RB the_DT work_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Half_PDT an_DT hour_NN before_IN the_DT departure_NN of_IN a_DT train_NN outgoing_VBG third_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS were_VBD collected_VBN in_IN the_DT third_JJ class_NN waiting-room_NN and_CC made_VBD to_TO pass_VB through_IN in_IN single_JJ file_NN after_IN being_VBG examined_VBN ._.

VI_NNP ._.
All_DT persons_NNS suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN fever_NN were_VBD detained_VBN ,_, their_PRP$ temperatures_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD finally_RB examined_VBN for_IN plague_NN in_IN a_DT small_JJ partitioned_JJ room_NN ._.
First_RB and_CC second_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS were_VBD examined_VBN after_IN they_PRP had_VBD taken_VBN their_PRP$ seats_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ carriages_NNS ._.
For_IN the_DT examination_NN of_IN arriving_VBG passengers_NNS two_CD hospital_JJ assistants_NNS were_VBD placed_VBN at_IN the_DT exit_NN door_NN for_IN third-_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS ,_, and_CC an_DT Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP at_IN the_DT exit_NN for_IN first_JJ and_CC second_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS ._.
Each_DT passenger_NN was_VBD examined_VBN as_IN he_PRP passed_VBD through_IN ._.

The_DT Southern_NNP Maratha_NNP Railway_NNP Company_NNP posted_VBD one_CD medical_JJ man_NN at_IN Poona_NNP station_NN on_IN 29th_CD October_NNP 1896_CD ,_, and_CC another_DT on_IN 22nd_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, to_TO examine_VB outgoing_VBG passengers_NNS by_IN their_PRP$ line_NN ._.
These_DT two_CD medical_JJ men_NNS made_VBN their_PRP$ inspection_NN on_IN the_DT overbridge_NN leading_VBG to_TO the_DT Southern_NNP Maratha_NNP Railway_NNP platform_NN ._.

This_DT applies_VBZ particularly_RB to_TO the_DT cases_NNS found_VBN by_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Maratha_NNP Railway_NNP medical_JJ men_NNS ._.
10_CD ._.

351_CD 12_CD ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN that_IN by_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
1-B_JJ ._.
of_IN 4th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, Government_NNP suspended_VBD the_DT booking_NN of_IN third_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS from_IN Poona_NNP and_CC neighbouring_JJ stations_NNS except_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD obtained_VBN written_VBN permits_NNS from_IN the_DT District_NNP Magis-_NNP trate_NN of_IN Poona_NNP or_CC myself_PRP ._.

Inspection_NN on_IN Roads_NNP ._.
13_CD ._.
On_IN 28th_CD January_NNP a_DT medical_JJ man_NN was_VBD posted_VBN by_IN the_DT Collector_NNP at_IN the_DT Harris_NNP Bridge_NNP near_IN Dapuri_NNP to_TO inspect_VB persons_NNS arriving_VBG by_IN road_NN and_CC prevent_NN any_DT found_VBD to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN from_IN entering_VBG Poona_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD transferred_VBN to_TO Poona_NNP City_NNP for_IN other_JJ duty_NN on_IN March_NNP 13th_CD ._.
Three_CD suspected_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN were_VBD discovered_VBN at_IN this_DT post_NN ._.
14_CD ._.
After_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN commenced_VBD it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN sufferers_NNS from_IN the_DT plague_NN were_VBD removed_VBN from_IN Poona_NNP by_IN night_NN in_IN considerable_JJ numbers_NNS ._.
Accordingly_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT night_NN of_IN the_DT 29th_CD March_NNP ,_, cavalry_NN picquets_NNS were_VBD placed_VBN on_IN all_PDT the_DT principal_JJ roads_NNS leading_VBG from_IN the_DT city_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT surreptitious_JJ removal_NN of_IN sick_JJ persons_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT 7th_CD April_NNP native_JJ infantry_NN picquets_NNS were_VBD stationed_VBN at_IN Sowar_NNP 's_POS Gate_NNP and_CC Lukdi_NNP Pul_NNP for_IN the_DT same_JJ purpose_NN ._.
These_DT cavalry_NN and_CC infantry_NN picquets_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN on_IN till_NN search_VBN operations_NNS by_IN the_DT military_JJ ceased_VBD ._.
The_DT picquets_NNS had_VBD orders_NNS to_TO detain_VB all_DT sick_JJ persons_NNS found_VBN by_IN them_PRP and_CC to_TO send_VB them_PRP to_TO the_DT General_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN examination_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN a_DT corpse_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN being_VBG removed_VBN without_IN a_DT certificate_NN of_IN the_DT registry_NN of_IN his_PRP$ death_NN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD required_VBN to_TO detain_VB one_CD of_IN the_DT bearers_NNS in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT necessary_JJ inquiries_NNS might_MD be_VB made_VBN ._.
15_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN plague_JJ cases_NNS and_CC corpses_NNS found_VBN by_IN the_DT picquets_NNS in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS amounted_VBD to_TO 103_CD and_CC 23_CD respectively_RB ._.
Particulars_NNS of_IN the_DT numbers_NNS found_VBN on_IN each_DT day_NN are_VBP given_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP 51_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT picquets_NNS was_VBD of_IN value_NN both_CC as_IN checking_VBG the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN from_IN Poona_NNP and_CC as_IN leading_VBG to_TO the_DT detection_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ,_, XIII.-INOCULATION_NN ._.
At_IN an_DT early_JJ stage_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN desirable_JJ that_IN the_DT efficacy_NN of_IN inoculations_NNS against_IN plague_NN with_IN Professor_NNP Haffkine_NNP 's_POS prophylactic_JJ lymph_NN should_MD be_VB tested_VBN at_IN Poona_NNP ._.
A_DT supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN was_VBD accordingly_RB obtained_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN none_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ officers_NNS employed_VBN on_IN plague_NN duty_NN had_VBD leisure_NN to_TO attend_VB to_TO the_DT inoculations_NNS ._.
The_DT assistance_NN of_IN Surgeon-Colonel_NNP Edge_NNP ,_, Princi-_NNP pal_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Poona_NNP District_NNP ,_, was_VBD solicited_VBN in_IN the_DT matter_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT result_NN that_IN Surgeon-Lieutenant_NNP Dove_NNP ,_, A_NNP M.S._NNP ,_, was_VBD sent_VBN to_TO be_VB trained_VBN in_IN Professor_NNP Haffkine_NNP 's_POS laboratory_NN and_CC was_VBD subsequently_RB sent_VBN down_RP to_TO Poona_VB to_TO carry_VB on_IN inoculation_NN ._.

VI_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN was_VBD commenced_VBN on_IN March_NNP 25th_CD under_IN the_DT personal_JJ direction_NN of_IN Professor_NNP Haffkine_NNP ._.
From_IN March_NNP 27th_CD it_PRP was_VBD continued_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Lieutenant_JJ Dove_NNP ._.
Inoculations_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN on_IN within_IN Poona_NNP suburban_JJ limits_NNS at_IN His_PRP$ Highness_NNP Aga_NNP Khan_NNP 's_POS Bungalow_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD kindly_RB lent_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT Dinsha_NNP Maneckji_NNP Petit_NNP Dispensary_NNP in_IN Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD not_RB thought_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO arrange_VB for_IN inoculations_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN as_IN my_PRP$ inquiries_NNS led_VBD me_PRP to_TO believe_VB that_IN few_JJ of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS would_MD volunteer_VB to_TO be_VB inoculated_VBN ._.
Surgeon-Lieutenant_JJ Dove_NNP continued_VBD the_DT inoculation_NN work_NN till_NN May_NNP 13th_CD ,_, when_WRB ,_, as_IN a_DT few_JJ people_NNS were_VBD coming_VBG forward_RB to_TO be_VB inoculated_VBN ,_, his_PRP$ services_NNS were_VBD replaced_VBN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Army_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP and_CC the_DT work_NN was_VBD made_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ._.
3_CD ._.
Appendix_$ 52_CD shows_VBZ the_DT numbers_NNS and_CC nationalities_NNS of_IN the_DT persons_NNS who_WP were_VBD inoculated_VBN each_DT week_NN ._.
In_IN all_DT ,_, up_RB to_TO May_NNP 20th_CD ,_, 1,361_CD inoculations_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN out_RP ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT officers_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT various_JJ plague_NN hospitals_NNS were_VBD instructed_VBN to_TO note_VB whether_IN any_DT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD among_IN persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN inoculated_VBN ._.
No_DT such_JJ cases_NNS have_VBP been_VBN reported_VBN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ evidence_NN in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT efficacy_NN of_IN Professor_NNP Haffkine_NNP 's_POS lymph_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ to_TO be_VB remembered_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT inoculations_NNS were_VBD not_RB commenced_VBN till_NN after_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ had_VBD passed_VBN its_PRP$ highest_JJS point_NN ,_, that_IN a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT persons_NNS inoculated_VBD did_VBD not_RB live_VB in_IN a_DT highly_RB infected_JJ locality_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN most_JJS of_IN them_PRP did_VBD not_RB belong_VB to_TO the_DT classes_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN the_DT chief_JJ sufferers_NNS from_IN the_DT plague_NN in_IN Poona_NNP ._.
XIV.-THE_JJ TROOPS_NNP EMPLOYED_NNP ._.
The_DT troops_NNS employed_VBN on_IN the_DT operations_NNS against_IN the_DT plague_NN were_VBD drawn_VBN from_IN the_DT following_VBG corps_NN :_: -_: Royal_JJ Artillery_NNP ._.
Bombay_NNP Sappers_NNP and_CC Miners_NNP ._.
Royal_NNP Horse_NNP Artillery_NNP ._.
2nd_CD Bombay_NNP Grenadiers_NNP ._.
Durham_NNP Light_NNP Infantry_NNP ._.
14th_CD Bombay_NNP Infantry_NNP ._.
Royal_NNP Irish_NNP Rifles_NNP ._.
19th_CD Bombay_NNP Infantry_NNP ._.
2nd_CD Bombay_NNP Lancers_NNP ._.
28th_CD Bombay_NNP Pioneers_NNPS ._.
Men_NN were_VBD also_RB taken_VBN from_IN the_DT Commissariat_NNP and_CC Transport_NNP Departments_NNP and_CC the_DT Army_NNP Medical_NNP Staff_NNP ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN troops_NNS employed_VBN at_IN different_JJ periods_NNS of_IN the_DT operations_NNS is_VBZ shown_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP 53_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN the_DT greatest_JJS number_NN of_IN troops_NNS was_VBD employed_VBN from_IN March_NNP 2oth_CD to_TO May_NNP 5th_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN British_JJ and_CC native_JJ troops_NNS on_IN plague_NN duty_NN was_VBD 1,112_CD ._.
After_IN May_NNP 5th_CD ,_, as_IN the_DT operations_NNS were_VBD contracted_VBN ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN troops_NNS employed_VBN was_VBD gradually_RB reduced_VBN till_NN on_IN June_NNP 1st_CD it_PRP stood_VBD at_IN 124_CD ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT troops_NNS on_IN plague_NN duty_NN were_VBD up_RB to_TO May_NNP 19th_CD encamped_VBD at_IN Parvati_NNP near_IN the_DT Sinhgad_NNP road_NN with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN those_DT who_WP were_VBD APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
353_CD stationed_VBD as_IN guards_NNS at_IN the_DT hospital_NN and_CC segregations_NNS camps_NNS and_CC (_( from_IN April_NNP 26th_CD )_) those_DT who_WP did_VBD duty_NN as_IN watchmen_NNS at_IN the_DT burial_JJ and_CC burn-_JJ ing_NN grounds_NNS ._.
When_WRB the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT military_JJ search_NN ,_, fumigation_NN and_CC lime_JJ washing_VBG parties_NNS ceased_VBN ,_, the_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS employed_VBD returned_VBN to_TO military_JJ duty_NN and_CC the_DT camp_NN at_IN Parvati_NNP was_VBD broken_VBN up_RP ._.
The_DT native_JJ infantry_NN who_WP were_VBD retained_VBN for_IN segregation_NN and_CC death_NN registration_NN work_NN were_VBD moved_VBN to_TO the_DT General_NNP Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, while_IN the_DT few_JJ men_NNS of_IN the_DT cavalry_NN and_CC the_DT British_JJ regiments_NNS who_WP remained_VBD on_IN plague_NN duty_NN were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO live_VB in_IN their_PRP$ regimental_JJ lines_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
Appendix_$ 54_CD shows_VBZ the_DT chief_JJ alterations_NNS made_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN in_IN the_DT constitution_NN and_CC strength_NN of_IN the_DT search_NN ,_, fumigation_NN and_CC limewashing_NN divisions_NNS ,_, and_CC gives_VBZ other_JJ particulars_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT employment_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS ._.
Appendices_NNS 55_CD ,_, 56_CD and_CC 57_CD are_VBP tabular_JJ statements_NNS relating_VBG to_TO guards_NNS on_IN hospitals_NNS and_CC camps_NNS ,_, night_NN picquets_NNS ,_, and_CC transport_NN and_CC ambulance_NN respectively_RB ._.
4_CD ._.
Disciplinary_JJ powers_NNS over_IN the_DT troops_NNS employed_VBN on_IN the_DT operations_NNS were_VBD vested_VBN in_IN Major_NNP Paget_NNP ,_, Commandant_NNP of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Duty_NNP Camp_NNP ._.
That_DT officer_NN 's_POS report_NN ,_, dated_VBD 2oth_CD May_NNP 1897_CD ,_, on_IN the_DT conduct_NN and_CC health_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS is_VBZ annexed_JJ (_( Appendix_NNP 58_CD )_) ._.
The_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP concur_NN with_IN Major_NNP Paget_NNP in_IN the_DT high_JJ opinion_NN he_PRP has_VBZ express-_JJ ed_NN on_IN the_DT conduct_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS ,_, both_DT Native_NNP and_CC British_NNP ._.
The_DT discip-_JJ line_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS when_WRB at_IN work_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN was_VBD excellent_JJ and_CC the_DT utmost_JJ consideration_NN was_VBD shown_VBN both_DT by_IN officers_NNS and_CC men_NNS for_IN the_DT reli-_JJ gious_JJ and_CC social_JJ customs_NNS of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS ._.
I_PRP may_MD mention_VB that_DT reports_NNS on_IN the_DT conduct_NN of_IN the_DT men_NNS who_WP worked_VBD under_IN them_PRP were_VBD called_VBN for_IN from_IN the_DT officers_NNS commanding_VBG the_DT various_JJ working_VBG parties_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT reports_NNS received_VBD were_VBD without_IN exception_NN favourable_JJ as_IN regards_NNS both_DT British_JJ and_CC Native_JJ troops_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
That_IN the_DT conduct_NN of_IN the_DT men_NNS when_WRB engaged_VBN on_IN plague_NN work_NN was_VBD so_RB good_JJ is_VBZ doubtless_JJ chiefly_NN due_JJ to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN they_PRP were_VBD under_IN the_DT immediate_JJ command_NN of_IN British_JJ officers_NNS who_WP were_VBD responsible_JJ for_IN their_PRP$ discipline_NN and_CC good_JJ conduct_NN just_RB as_IN they_PRP would_MD have_VB been_VBN if_IN they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN employed_VBN on_IN military_JJ duty_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT search_NN divi-_JJ sions_NNS ,_, the_DT supervision_NN was_VBD particularly_RB close_RB ._.
It_PRP was_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT prin-_JJ ciples_NNS of_IN the_DT search_NN that_IN the_DT parties_NNS of_IN a_DT division_NN should_MD be_VB kept_VBN together_RB as_RB much_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT officer_NN commanding_VBG the_DT division_NN was_VBD therefore_RB seldom_RB far_RB away_RB from_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT parties_NNS under_IN him_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT fumigation_NN and_CC limewashing_VBG divisions_NNS the_DT supervision_NN was_VBD not_RB so_RB close_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT exigencies_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ work_NN often_RB compelled_VBD the_DT parties_NNS of_IN a_DT division_NN to_TO work_VB at_IN a_DT distance_NN from_IN each_DT other_JJ ._.
The_DT limewashing_NN and_CC fumigation_NN parties_NNS were_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, visited_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN their_PRP$ morning_NN 's_POS work_NN by_IN b_NN 45_CD 354_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
the_DT officer_NN commanding_VBG them_PRP ._.
A_DT statement_NN of_IN the_DT orders_NNS issued_VBN to_TO the_DT troops_NNS from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN regarding_VBG their_PRP$ work_NN and_CC conduct_NN will_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP 59_CD ._.
6_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT first_JJ few_JJ days_NNS of_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN many_JJ applications_NNS ,_, written_VBN and_CC verbal_JJ ,_, relative_JJ to_TO the_DT operations_NNS ,_, were_VBD ,_, as_IN might_MD be_VB expected_VBN ,_, made_VBN to_TO myself_VB and_CC the_DT other_JJ members_NNS of_IN Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ._.
Most_JJS of_IN these_DT related_VBN to_TO inconveniences_NNS or_CC losses_NNS alleged_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN caused_VBN to_TO individuals_NNS by_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS ._.
Some_DT of_IN the_DT inconveniences_NNS pointed_VBD out_RP were_VBD inseparable_JJ from_IN the_DT operations_NNS which_WDT we_PRP were_VBD conducting_VBG ,_, while_IN others_NNS we_PRP were_VBD able_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT recurrence_NN of_IN by_IN the_DT issue_NN of_IN standing_VBG orders_NNS ._.
When_WRB complaints_NNS of_IN theft_NN were_VBD made_VBN and_CC the_DT information_NN necessary_JJ to_TO trace_VB the_DT culprits_NNS was_VBD not_RB given_VBN ,_, the_DT applicants_NNS were_VBD referred_VBN to_TO the_DT police_NN ._.
As_IN our_PRP$ rules_NNS got_VBD to_TO be_VB understood_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN Poona_NNP and_CC our_PRP$ organization_NN got_VBD more_RBR perfect_JJ ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN applications_NNS diminished_VBN ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT latter_JJ stages_NNS of_IN the_DT operations_NNS comparatively_RB few_JJ complaints_NNS were_VBD received_VBN by_IN us_PRP regarding_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO check_VB the_DT making_NN of_IN false_JJ and_CC frivolous_JJ complaints_NNS and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN to_TO facilitate_VB inquiries_NNS into_IN complaints_NNS that_WDT might_MD be_VB well_RB founded_VBN ,_, we_PRP published_VBD a_DT notification_NN on_IN March_NNP 26th_CD (_( vide_JJ Appendix_NNP 4_CD )_) to_TO the_DT effect_NN that_IN all_DT complaints_NNS relating_VBG to_TO the_DT behaviour_NN of_IN the_DT men_NNS employed_VBN on_IN searching_NN ,_, fumigating_VBG and_CC limewashing_VBG should_MD be_VB made_VBN on_IN the_DT spot_NN to_TO the_DT officers_NNS commanding_VBG the_DT divisions_NNS to_TO which_WDT the_DT men_NNS complained_VBD against_IN belonged_VBN ._.
The_DT officers_NNS have_VBP been_VBN alive_JJ to_TO the_DT necessity_NN of_IN maintaining_VBG a_DT high_JJ standard_NN of_IN conduct_NN among_IN their_PRP$ \ill\_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ never_RB \ill\_VBN alleged_VBN to_TO the_DT Committee_NNP that_IN an_DT officers_NNS \ill\as_WDT failed_VBD to_TO inquire_VB in\ill\_NN reasonable_JJ complaint_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN made_VBN to_TO him_PRP ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT offences_NNS brought_VBD home_NN to_TO the_DT troops_NNS engaged_VBN on_IN plague_NN duty_NN are_VBP specified_VBN in_IN Major_JJ Pages_NNS :_: 3_CD report_NN ._.
The_DT complaints_NNS made_VBN to_TO the_DT officers_NNS commanding_VBG search_NN divisions_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB false_JJ ,_, included_VBD three_CD of_IN theft_NN ._.
Besides_IN these_DT a_DT few_JJ minor_JJ complaints_NNS of_IN such_JJ matters_NNS as_IN entering_VBG god-rooms_JJ and_CC cook-rooms_NNS unnecessarily_RB were_VBD made_VBN to_TO the_DT officers_NNS ,_, but_CC where_WRB the_DT men_NNS had_VBD offended_VBN the_DT prejudices_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN this_DT way_NN they_PRP appeared_VBD to_TO have_VB done_VBN so_RB through_IN ignorance_NN ._.
One_CD unproved_JJ complaint_NN of_IN theft_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO the_DT officer_NN commanding_VBG a_DT fumigation_NN division_NN and_CC another_DT to_TO the_DT officer_NN commanding_VBG the_DT main_JJ picquet_NN ._.
Some_DT complaints_NNS of_IN the_DT needless_JJ destruction_NN of_IN property_NN ,_, as_IN rubbish_JJ ,_, were_VBD made_VBN against_IN the_DT limewashers_NNS to_TO the_DT officer_NN commanding_VBG the_DT division_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP were_VBD generally_RB found_VBN by_IN him_PRP to_TO be_VB untenable_JJ ._.
The_DT orders_NNS passed_VBD to_TO prevent_VB needless_JJ destruction_NN of_IN property_NN have_VBP already_RB been_VBN referred_VBN to_TO ._.
It_PRP was_VBD a_DT matter_NN of_IN great_JJ satisfaction_NN to_TO the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
355_CD Plague_NNP Committee_NNP that_IN no_DT credible_JJ complaint_NN that_IN the_DT modesty_NN of_IN a_DT woman_NN had_VBD been_VBN intentionally_RB insulted_VBN was_VBD ever_RB made_VBN either_DT to_TO themselves_PRP or_CC to_TO the_DT officers_NNS under_IN whom_WP the_DT troops_NN worked_VBD ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT troops_NNS at_IN the_DT plague_NN duty_NN camp_NN were_VBD under_IN the_DT medical_JJ charge_NN of_IN Surgeon-Lieutenant_JJ Kiddle_NNP ._.
The_DT men_NNS were_VBD paraded_VBN daily_RB before_IN they_PRP left_VBD the_DT camp_NN for_IN plague_NN duty_NN ,_, and_CC men_NNS found_VBD not_RB to_TO be_VB in_IN thoroughly_RB good_JJ health_NN were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN to_TO proceed_VB ._.
The_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN by_IN Surgeon_NNP Lieutenant_NNP Kiddle_NNP to_TO have_VB been_VBN excellent_JJ ,_, a_DT result_NN which_WDT is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN due_JJ to_TO regular_JJ hours_NNS ,_, good_JJ feeding_NN and_CC the_DT careful_JJ supervision_NN which_WDT he_PRP exercised_VBD ._.
Not_RB a_DT single_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD among_IN the_DT troops_NNS employed_VBN ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS to_TO hospital_VB from_IN March_NNP 12th_CD to_TO May_NNP 19th_CD was_VBD among_IN British_JJ troops_NNS 70_CD and_CC among_IN Native_JJ troops_NNS 19_CD ._.
The_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT admissions_NNS were_VBD due_JJ to_TO minor_JJ ail-_JJ ments_NNS ,_, and_CC only_RB 19_CD cases_NNS (_( 12_CD among_IN British_JJ and_CC 7_CD among_IN Natives_NNS )_) were_VBD of_IN sufficient_JJ importance_NN to_TO call_VB for_IN the_DT transfer_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS from_IN camp_NN to_TO a_DT regular_JJ hospital_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ case_NN that_WDT ended_VBD fatally_RB was_VBD one_CD of_IN heat-apoplexy_NN ._.
The_DT victim_NN was_VBD a_DT man_NN of_IN the_DT Royal_NNP Irish_NNP Rifles_NNP who_WP is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO have_VB contracted_VBN his_PRP$ illness_NN through_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ imprudence_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP much_JJ pleasure_NN in_IN acknowledging_VBG on_IN behalf_NN of_IN my_PRP$ col-_JJ leagues_NNS on_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN on_IN my_PRP$ own_JJ account_NN the_DT valu-_JJ able_JJ assistance_NN which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP received_VBN throughout_IN the_DT operations_NNS from_IN Major_NNP Paget_NNP ._.
His_PRP$ unfailing_JJ tact_NN and_CC courtesy_NN have_VBP contributed_VBN in_IN no_DT small_JJ degree_NN to_TO the_DT success_NN of_IN our_PRP$ measures_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT opinion_NN that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ recorded_VBN regarding_VBG the_DT officers_NNS and_CC men_NNS engaged_VBN on_IN the_DT operations_NNS we_PRP fully_RB concur_VBP ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT good_JJ work_NN that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ acknow-_RB ledged_VBN we_PRP desire_VBP to_TO place_VB on_IN record_NN our_PRP$ appreciation_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN Lieutenant_NNP Mackenzie_NNP and_CC subsequently_RB by_IN Lieutenant_NNP Owen_NNP Lewis_NNP in_IN connection_NN with_IN death_NN registration_NN and_CC the_DT supervision_NN of_IN burial_JJ and_CC barning_JJ grounds_NNS ._.
We_PRP consider_VBP that_IN the_DT work_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP by_IN Major_JJ Paget_NNP and_CC the_DT officers_NNS and_CC troops_NNS under_IN him_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN most_JJS successfully_RB performed_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ chiefly_JJ due_RB to_TO their_PRP$ exertions_NNS that_IN the_DT plague_NN in_IN Poona_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN practically_RB stamped_VBN out_RP ._.
XV.-FINANCIAL_NN ._.

4_CD ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN I_PRP would_MD record_VB my_PRP$ opinion_NN that_IN if_IN a_DT reasonably_RB high_JJ standard_NN of_IN sanitation_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB maintained_VBN in_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Poona_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN there_EX under_IN Surgeon-Major_NNP Barry_NNP 's_POS supervision_NN is_VBZ to_TO have_VB lasting_JJ results_NNS ,_, European_JJ control_NN will_MD for_IN some_DT time_NN to_TO come_VB be_VB absolutely_RB necessary_JJ ._.
The_DT exact_JJ shape_NN that_IN control_NN should_MD take_VB is_VBZ a_DT matter_NN of_IN detail_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP am_VBP convinced_VBN of_IN the_DT futility_NN of_IN expecting_VBG that_IN the_DT sanitation_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN will_MD be_VB better_RBR in_IN the_DT near_JJ future_NN than_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN the_DT past_NN ,_, unless_IN it_PRP is_VBZ under_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN a_DT supervising_JJ authority_NN that_WDT possesses_VBZ practical_JJ knowledge_NN and_CC appreciation_NN of_IN Euorpean_JJ standards_NNS of_IN cleanliness_NN ._.
358_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
Report_NN on_IN Sind_NNP by_IN Mr._NNP Wingate_NNP ,_, Acting_NNP Commis-_NNP sioner_NN ._.
First_RB protective_JJ measures_NNS ._.
Sea_NNP quarantine_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 3rd_CD October_NNP 1896_CD the_DT Karachi_NNP Chamber_NNP of_IN Commerce_NNP No_NNP ._.
2._CD addressed_VBD the_DT Commissioner_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP through_IN their_PRP$ Chairman_NNP ,_, the_DT Honourable_NNP Mr._NNP McLellan_NNP ,_, suggesting_VBG that_IN precautionary_JJ measures_NNS against_IN the_DT introduction_NN of_IN plague_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP should_MD be_VB taken_VBN ,_, such_JJ as_IN subjecting_VBG the_DT passengers_NNS of_IN vessels_NNS arriving_VBG to_TO a_DT medical_JJ examination_NN ._.
The_DT imposition_NN of_IN quarantine_NN was_VBD not_RB recommended_VBN ._.
Next_JJ day_NN a_DT letter_NN was_VBD received_VBN by_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP from_IN the_DT Principal_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Sind_NNP District_NNP ,_, inquiring_VBG as_IN to_TO the_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT law_NN in_IN respect_NN to_TO dealing_VBG with_IN vessels_NNS and_CC passengers_NNS infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT Honourable_NNP Mr._NNP James_NNP on_IN the_DT 5th_JJ idem_JJ com-_NN municated_VBN with_IN Government_NNP by_IN telegram_NN ,_, and_CC under_IN Notification_NNP ,_, dated_VBD 13th_CD October_NNP 1896_CD ,_, No_DT ._.
4530_CD ,_, Government_NNP published_VBD rules_NNS for_IN quarantine_NN against_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Karachi_NNP ._.
Under_IN these_DT rules_NNS ,_, no_DT communication_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN was_VBD permitted_VBN till_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP had_VBD ascertained_VBN by_IN inquiry_NN from_IN the_DT Commander_NNP whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN had_VBD suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN ._.
If_IN there_EX had_VBD been_VBN no_RB plague_NN ,_, pratique_NN was_VBD granted_VBN ._.
If_IN there_EX had_VBD been_VBN plague_RB ,_, the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NNS were_VBD to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO the_DT quarantine_NN station_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN varying_VBG from_IN 8_CD to_TO 1_CD 5_CD days_NNS ._.
Quarantine_JJ arrangements_NNS ._.
The_DT Commissioner_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP immediately_RB took_VBD steps_NNS ,_, in_IN consulta-_JJ tion_NN with_IN the_DT Principal_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Sind_NNP District_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT officers_NNS of_IN the_DT port_NN ,_, to_TO increase_VB the_DT accommodation_NN at_IN the_DT quarantine_NN station_NN at_IN Manora_NNP and_CC to_TO provide_VB extra_JJ police_NN for_IN enforcing_VBG the_DT restrictions_NNS imposed_VBN ._.
To_TO consider_VB these_DT questions_NNS ,_, a_DT meeting_NN of_IN officers_NNS assembled_VBN at_IN Government_NNP House_NNP on_IN the_DT 16th_CD October_NNP under_IN the_DT presidency_NN of_IN the_DT Honourable_NNP Mr._NNP James_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD arranged_VBN to_TO fit_VB up_RP the_DT hulk_NN Manora_NNP for_IN Europeans_NNPS and_CC to_TO erect_VB sheds_NNS for_IN 300_CD native_JJ passengers_NNS in_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT accommodation_NN for_IN 100_CD already_RB existing_VBG ,_, the_DT expenditure_NN to_TO be_VB divided_VBN between_IN Government_NNP ,_, the_DT Port_NNP Trust_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Municipality_NNP ._.
The_DT two_CD latter_JJ bodies_NNS subse-_VBP quently_RB intimated_VBN their_PRP$ consent_NN to_TO contribute_VB one-third_JJ share_NN each_DT ._.
The_DT operations_NNS were_VBD entrusted_VBN to_TO Mr._NNP Jackson_NNP ,_, the_DT Officiating_NNP Port_NNP Engineer_NNP ,_, and_CC ,_, with_IN commendable_JJ despatch_NN ,_, he_PRP reported_VBD on_IN the_DT 24th_CD October_NNP that_IN everything_NN was_VBD ready_JJ for_IN occupation_NN ._.
These_DT proceedings_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN to_TO Government_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN Gov-_NNP ernment_JJ Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
5202_CD ,_, dated_VBD 26th_CD November_NNP 1896_CD ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ,_, Government_NNP sanctioned_VBD the_DT estimated_JJ expenditure_NN for_IN temporary_JJ quarantine_JJ accommodation_NN and_CC also_RB the_DT expenditure_NN for_IN estab-_JJ lishment_NN and_CC other_JJ expenses_NNS to_TO be_VB incurred_VBN by_IN the_DT Principal_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, the_DT cost*_NN to_TO be_VB divided_VBN as_IN Rs_NNP ._.
*_JJ Spent_NNP by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Engineer_NNP 6,517_CD Spent_NNP by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP 5,136_CD APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ]_NNP Measures_NNP in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
359_CD proposed_VBN ._.
Government_NNP approved_VBD the_DT entertainment_NN of_IN the_DT addi-_JJ tional_JJ police_NN ,_, the_DT exact_JJ strength_NN and_CC cost_NN being_VBG finally_RB sanctioned_VBN by_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
1672_CD ,_, dated_VBD 2nd_CD March_NNP ,_, 1897_CD ,_, Judicial_NNP Department_NNP ._.
The_DT Port_NNP Trust_NNP placed_VBD a_DT steam-launch_NN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP Superintendent_NNP of_IN Police_NNP ._.
Ships_NNS in_IN quarantine_NN ._.
First_RB case_NN ._.
The_DT rules_NNS required_VBN that_IN healthy_JJ ships_NNS to_TO secure_VB pratique_NN must_MD carry_VB a_DT medical_JJ man_NN ._.
One_CD or_CC two_CD coasting_VBG steamers_NNS neglected_VBD this_DT rule_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN board_NN other_JJ steamers_NNS death_NN from_IN plague_NN had_VBD occurred_VBN ._.
Thus_RB a_DT considerable_JJ number_NN ,_, between_IN 600_CD and_CC 700_CD persons_NNS at_IN a_DT time_NN ,_, were_VBD detained_VBN in_IN quarantine_NN ,_, necessitating_VBG increased_VBN accommo-_JJ dation_NN ._.
The_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Karachi_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT instance_NN of_IN the_DT Honourable_NNP Mr._NNP James_NNP ,_, early_RB in_IN December_NNP ,_, made_VBD arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT supply_NN by_IN private_JJ charity_NN of_IN food_NN to_TO those_DT persons_NNS in_IN quarantine_NN who_WP were_VBD indigent_NN ._.
The_DT administration_NN of_IN the_DT quarantine_NN rules_NNS and_CC arrange-_JJ ments_NNS was_VBD supervised_VBN by_IN the_DT Principal_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Sind_NNP District_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT 16th_CD December_NNP ,_, while_IN on_IN tour_NN ,_, the_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP received_VBD intimation_NN from_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP through_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Karachi_NNP of_IN what_WP was_VBD reported_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT ``_`` doubtful_JJ ``_`` case_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
A_DT Brahman_NNP cook_NN ,_, aged_VBD 16_CD years_NNS ,_, resident_NN for_IN 9_CD months_NNS in_IN Karachi_NNP ,_, stated_VBN to_TO have_VB taken_VBN ill_NN about_IN the_DT 4th_JJ December_NNP ,_, was_VBD reported_VBN on_IN the_DT 8th_CD to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN bubonic_JJ fever_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD high_JJ temperature_NN and_CC a_DT bubo_NN ._.
The_DT same_JJ evening_VBG the_DT patient_NN was_VBD removed_VBN from_IN Rampart_NNP Road_NNP ,_, Bandar_NNP Quarter_NNP ,_, to_TO a_DT house_NN in_IN Maoji_NNP Street_NNP ,_, Ranchor_NNP Quarter_NNP ,_, where_WRB next_JJ morning_NN he_PRP died_VBD ._.
Thus_RB early_RB began_VBD that_IN removal_NN from_IN place_NN to_TO place_NN which_WDT to_TO the_DT last_JJ was_VBD difficult_JJ to_TO deal_VB with_IN ._.
Disease_NNP breaks_VBZ out_RP in_IN Karachi_NNP ._.

The_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP had_VBD consulted_VBN these_DT officers_NNS ._.
The_DT Collector_NNP considered_VBD that_IN section_NN 73_CD of_IN the_DT District_NNP Municipal_NNP Act_NNP was_VBD inadequate_JJ to_TO deal_VB with_IN the_DT disease_NN and_CC there_EX was_VBD no_DT provision_NN of_IN law_NN to_TO render_VB compulsory_JJ notification_NN of_IN plague_JJ legal_JJ ._.
The_DT Honourable_NNP Mr._NNP James_NNP ,_, in_IN a_DT letter_NN of_IN 3oth_CD November_NNP ,_, 1896_CD ,_, had_VBD expressed_VBN a_DT similar_JJ opinion_NN that_IN ,_, under_IN section_NN 73_CD ,_, compulsory_JJ segregation_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN would_MD be_VB unauthorised_VBN ._.
The_DT Principal_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Karachi_NNP and_CC the_DT Pre-_NNP sident_NN of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ,_, as_IN also_RB Mr._NNP Strachan_NNP and_CC Dr._NNP Kaka_NNP were_VBD of_IN opinion_NN that_IN no_DT segregation_NN of_IN sick_NN was_VBD possible_JJ without_IN compul-_JJ sion_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN the_DT present_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT public_JJ mind_NN compulsion_NN would_MD not_RB be_VB the_DT best_JJS way_NN of_IN meeting_VBG the_DT epidemic_NN ._.

Position_NN of_IN affairs_NNS at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN January_NNP ._.

Right_RB nobly_RB they_PRP discharged_VBD the_DT trust_NN ._.
Next_JJ morning_NN ,_, the_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP missed_VBD Surgeon-Lieutenant_JJ Niblock_NNP from_IN his_PRP$ side_NN ._.

Presently_RB ,_, he_PRP was_VBD to_TO be_VB seen_VBN with_IN an_DT attendant_JJ carrying_VBG a_DT small_JJ box_NN ,_, rigged_VBD up_RP as_IN a_DT little_JJ potable_JJ medicine_NN chest_NN going_VBG his_PRP$ rounds_NNS ,_, welcomed_VBN by_IN nearly_RB all_DT ,_, and_CC the_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT treatment_NN was_VBD electric_JJ ._.
Dr._NNP Corn-_NNP wall_NN was_VBD doing_VBG the_DT same_JJ splendid_JJ service_NN across_IN the_DT Lyari_NNP ._.
Without_IN hospitals_NNS ,_, without_IN appliances_NNS ,_, asking_VBG for_IN no_DT help_NN ,_, and_CC ignorant_NN of_IN the_DT language_NN ,_, these_DT young_JJ doctors_NNS in_IN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS had_VBD won_VBN free_JJ entrance_NN everywhere_RB ._.

Plague_NNP hospital_NN in_IN Karachi_NNP ._.

Hyderabad_NNP ,_, Kotri_NNP and_CC Tatla_NNP ._.

Tatta_NNP ,_, with_IN which_WDT its_PRP$ railway_NN station_NN ,_, Jungshahi_NNP ,_, must_MD be_VB included_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN Kotri_NNP ._.

381_CD Jungshahi_NNP ._.
unsparing_JJ and_CC well-directed_JJ efforts_NNS of_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP M._NNP D._NNP Mackenzie_NNP ._.

Kotri_NNP ._.

Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ._.
With_IN the_DT passing_NN of_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP had_VBD come_VBN increa-_NNS sed_JJ powers_NNS ._.
Sanction_NN to_TO the_DT following_JJ measures_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD all_DT already_RB in_IN operation_NN under_IN Municipal_NNP rules_NNS ,_, was_VBD solicited_VBN by_IN telegram_NN on_IN the_DT 9th_CD and_CC granted_VBN by_IN Government_NNP on_IN the_DT 11th_CD February_NNP :_: -_: Powers_NNS ._.
The_DT Commissioner_NNP and_CC District_NNP and_CC Sub-divisional_JJ Magistrates_NNS were_VBD empowered_VBN to_TO act_VB or_CC to_TO empower_VB any_DT person_NN by_IN name_NN to_TO act_VB as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) Enter_NN or_CC break_VB open_JJ any_DT house_NN or_CC room_NN ,_, day_NN or_CC night_NN ,_, disinfect_NN ,_, limewash_NN ,_, collect_NN and_CC burn_NN rags_NNS ,_, rubbish_NN ,_, pull_VB down_RP ,_, burn_NN ,_, open_JJ walls_NNS or_CC roofs_NN ,_, burn_NN suspected_VBD bedding_NN ,_, clothing_NN and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS ,_, and_CC disinfect_JJ persons_NNS or_CC their_PRP$ property_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Order_NN persons_NNS or_CC classes_NNS of_IN person_NN to_TO leave_VB certain_JJ place_NN for_IN another_DT ,_, or_CC prohibit_NN leaving_VBG given_VBN area_NN ,_, prohibit_VB com-_JJ munication_NN between_IN certain_JJ areas_NNS ,_, probibit_NN entrance_NN of_IN persons_NNS within_IN prescribed_JJ area_NN ,_, make_VBP regulations_NNS for_IN inspection_NN of_IN travellers_NNS ,_, by_IN land_NN or_CC water_NN and_CC ,_, if_IN necess-_JJ ary_NN ,_, their_PRP$ detention_NN and_CC segregation_NN ,_, and_CC destruction_NN of_IN suspected_JJ articles_NNS ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Direct_VBP that_IN any_DT place_NN for_IN supply_NN or_CC preparation_NN or_CC storing_NN of_IN food_NN be_VB closed_VBN ,_, or_CC the_DT food_NN removed_VBN ,_, if_IN so_RB permitted_VBN ._.
(_( d_NN )_) Direct_NNP compulsory_JJ notification_NN of_IN sickness_NN or_CC death_NN from_IN any_DT cause_NN ._.
(_( e_NN )_) Value_NNP and_CC pay_VB compensation_NN for_IN all_DT bedding_NN ,_, clothing_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, or_CC temporary_JJ huts_NNS destroyed_VBN ,_, and_CC after_IN summary_JJ inquiry_NN of_IN any_DT valuable_JJ article_NN or_CC house_NN ._.
(_( f_NN )_) To_TO give_VB notice_NN to_TO house_NN holders_NNS or_CC occupiers_NNS within_IN 48_CD hours_NNS to_TO limewash_VB and_CC clean_VB their_PRP$ premises_NNS or_CC specified_VBN parts_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO burn_VB or_CC collect_VB dirt_NN ,_, rags_NNS and_CC rubbish_VB for_IN cartage_NN ._.
The_DT Commissioner_NNP was_VBD also_RB empowered_VBN to_TO delegate_VB the_DT follow-_JJ ing_NN powers_NNS to_TO any_DT person_NN by_IN name_NN :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) Remove_NNP any_DT person_NN suffering_NN or_CC suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, or_CC likely_RB to_TO have_VB contracted_VBN the_DT disease_NN ,_, to_TO any_DT place_NN ;_: detain_VB him_PRP till_RB permitted_VBD leave_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Prohibit_NNP re-occupation_NN of_IN any_DT house_NN without_IN permission_NN ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Regulate_NNP removal_NN ,_, burial_JJ or_CC burning_NN of_IN corpses_NNS and_CC general_JJ conduct_NN of_IN funerals_NNS ._.
(_( d_NN )_) Prohibit_NNP import_NN or_CC export_NN of_IN specified_JJ articles_NNS ._.
(_( e_NN )_) Determine_NNP in_IN what_WP manner_NN and_CC by_IN whom_WP any_DT expenses_NNS ,_, including_VBG compensation_NN ,_, be_VB defrayed_VBN ._.

Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
383_CD Lastly_RB the_DT Commissioner_NN might_MD make_VB subsidiary_NN rules_NNS to_TO carry_VB out_RP any_DT of_IN the_DT above_JJ powers_NNS ,_, and_CC might_MD require_VB any_DT Municipality_NNP to_TO act_VB in_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT above_JJ ways_NNS in_IN such_JJ manner_NN as_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP might_MD prescribe_VB and_CC to_TO employ_VB such_JJ establishment_NN as_IN deemed_VBN neces-_JJ sary_NN ._.
These_DT powers_NNS were_VBD so_RB very_RB wide_JJ that_IN on_IN the_DT 17th_JJ February_NNP a_DT circular_NN was_VBD issued_VBN ,_, desiring_VBG that_IN every_DT officer_NN and_CC subordinate_NN should_MD recollect_VB that_IN exceptional_JJ powers_NNS carry_VBP with_IN them_PRP increased_VBD respon-_JJ sibility_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT powers_NNS must_MD be_VB used_VBN with_IN consideration_NN ,_, tact_NN and_CC judgment_NN ,_, and_CC only_RB be_VB put_VBN in_IN force_NN when_WRB and_CC so_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT necessity_NN for_IN preventing_VBG spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN required_VBN ._.
Hyderabad_NNP District_NNP ._.

401_CD bathed_VBN in_IN disinfectant_JJ tubs_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB the_DT passengers_NNS were_VBD passed_VBN on_IN to_TO the_DT Punjab_NNP and_CC to_TO Baluchistan_NNP ._.
Surgeon-Captain_JJ Milne_NNP turned_VBD his_PRP$ steam_NN disinfector_NN to_TO the_DT useful_JJ purpose_NN of_IN making_VBG all_PDT the_DT washermen_NNS in_IN the_DT town_NN carry_VBP their_PRP$ bundles_NNS to_TO it_PRP ,_, when_WRB the_DT soiled_VBN wearing_NN apparel_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ town_NN was_VBD thus_RB thoroughly_RB steamed_VBN ._.
Whatever_WDT he_PRP did_VBD ,_, Surgeon-Captain_NNP Milne_NNP did_VBD methodically_RB and_CC with_IN the_DT keenest_JJS eye_NN to_TO any_DT weak_JJ spot_NN in_IN his_PRP$ defence_NN ;_: but_CC ,_, as_IN he_PRP says_VBZ himself_PRP ,_, the_DT safety_NN of_IN Shikarpur_NNP is_VBZ primarily_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT attitude_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS led_VBN by_IN the_DT Judges_NNP ,_, Messrs._NNP Dayaram_NNP and_CC Tyabji_NNP ,_, and_CC seconded_VBN by_IN the_DT City_NNP Magistrate_NNP ,_, Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Choithram_NNP ,_, Ali_NNP Baksh_NNP Muhammad_NNP Husein_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Chainrai_NNP Kalro_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT Charitable_NNP Dispensary_NNP ,_, Lady_NNP Doctor_NNP Nash_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT Lady_NNP Dufferin_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Mathieson_NNP ,_, Engineer_NNP and_CC Secretary_NNP of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ._.

*_NN Khairpur_NNP State_NNP ._.

End_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ in_IN Sind_NNP ._.
As_IN already_RB stated_VBN ,_, the_DT last_JJ plague_NN cases_NNS in_IN Hyderabad_NNP and_CC Suk-_NNP kur_NN occurred_VBD on_IN the_DT 2nd_CD of_IN June_NNP ._.

The_DT Hyderabad_NNP hospitals_NNS were_VBD closed_VBN on_IN the_DT I5th_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Sukkur_NNP and_CC Rohri_NNP hospitals_NNS on_IN the_DT 30th_JJ June_NNP ._.

By_IN Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.

The_DT Gen-_NNP eral_NN used_VBD the_DT Military-officers_NNS and_CC men-freely_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT advent_NN of_IN this_DT large_JJ establishment_NN ,_, controlled_VBN in_IN every_DT detail_NN and_CC all_DT working_VBG together_RB ,_, had_VBD an_DT almost_RB immediate_JJ effect_NN in_IN diminishing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS ._.

The_DT latter_NN was_VBD the_DT executive_JJ officer_NN of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP to_TO whom_WP every_DT one_CD turned_VBN ,_, and_CC he_PRP met_VBD all_DT demands_NNS with_IN promptness_NN and_CC temper_NN ._.

Mr._NNP Tahliram_NNP Khemchand_NNP ,_, the_DT President_NNP of_IN the_DT Karachi_NNP Muni-_NNP cipality_NN ,_, greatly_RB assisted_VBN in_IN explaining_VBG the_DT necessity_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN measures_NNS to_TO the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO him_PRP the_DT thanks_NNS of_IN the_DT Acting_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN are_VBP specially_RB owing_VBG for_IN loyal_JJ support_NN ._.

And_CC now_RB follows_VBZ the_DT long_JJ roll_NN of_IN that_DT fine_JJ body_NN of_IN officers_NNS ,_, the_DT Superintendents_NNS of_IN quarters_NNS ,_, on_IN whose_WP$ shoulders_NNS rested_VBD everything_NN ,_, in_IN whose_WP$ hands_NNS all_DT authority_NN was_VBD concentrated_VBN ,_, and_CC who_WP each_DT and_CC all_DT worked_VBN with_IN tact_NN ,_, energy_NN and_CC patience_NN the_DT whole_JJ day_NN long_RB ,_, week_NN after_IN week_NN ,_, month_NN after_IN month_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT same_JJ painstaking_NN attention_NN to_TO detail_VB ,_, the_DT same_JJ gentle_JJ compulsion_NN and_CC persuasive_JJ decision_NN ,_, first_JJ turning_VBG people_NNS out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS and_CC then_RB putting_VBG the_DT people_NNS safely_RB back_RB into_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, till_NN at_IN length_NN they_PRP were_VBD rewarded_VBN by_IN success_NN and_CC the_DT confidence_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP P._NNP R._NNP Cadell_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, both_DT in_IN Karachi_NNP and_CC afterwards_NNS at_IN Sukkur_NNP ,_, did_VBD splendid_JJ work_NN ,_, the_DT worst_JJS quarters_NNS in_IN each_DT falling_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ share_NN ._.
His_PRP$ cleaning_NN of_IN Gharibabad_NNP in_IN Sukkur_NNP was_VBD a_DT fine_JJ bit_NN of_IN work_NN under_IN trying_VBG heat_NN ._.
Messrs._NNS Gloster_NNP and_CC Lawrence_NNP did_VBD excellent_JJ work_NN in_IN the_DT worst_JJS infected_JJ quarters_NNS from_IN the_DT beginning_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD conspicuous_JJ for_IN the_DT method_NN as_IN their_PRP$ arrangements_NNS and_CC the_DT authoritative_JJ weight_NN that_IN they_PRP lent_VBD to_TO the_DT Superintendents_NNP generally_RB ._.
To_TO the_DT work_NN of_IN these_DT three_CD officers_NNS must_MD be_VB attributed_VBN that_IN change_NN in_IN the_DT attitude_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS which_WDT prepared_VBD the_DT way_NN for_IN medical_JJ treatment_NN ._.

The_DT co-operation_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS was_VBD the_DT main_JJ factor_NN in_IN any_DT suc-_JJ cess_NN attending_VBG the_DT plague_NN measures_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT plague_NN ,_, though_IN it_PRP has_VBZ doubtless_NN left_VBD many_JJ sore_NN hearts_NNS ,_, has_VBZ left_VBN few_JJ bitter_JJ ones_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP trusts_VBZ many_JJ grateful_JJ ones_NNS ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ represented_VBN the_DT Government_NNP to_TO the_DT people_NNS in_IN a_DT new_JJ and_CC striking_JJ attitude_NN ,_, send-_JJ ing_NN forth_NN its_PRP$ officers_NNS of_IN all_DT Departments_NNS to_TO heal_VB the_DT sick_JJ and_CC stand_VBP between_IN the_DT pestilence_NN and_CC the_DT population_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT effect_NN must_MD be_VB to_TO draw_VB the_DT ties_NNS closer_RBR ,_, and_CC awaken_VB new_JJ thoughts_NNS in_IN the_DT minds_NNS of_IN the_DT multitude_NN ._.
To_TO Mr._NNP J._NNP Sladen_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, Assistant_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Wingate_NNP is_VBZ deeply_RB indebted_JJ ,_, and_CC latterly_RB also_RB to_TO Mr._NNP H._NNP S._NNP Lawrence_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, for_IN bearing_VBG with_IN marked_JJ ability_NN a_DT great_JJ share_NN of_IN the_DT burden_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT province_NN ,_, besides_IN assisting_VBG in_IN the_DT special_JJ work_NN caused_VBN by_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD ably_RB helped_VBN by_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP Commissioners_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Whittle_NNP and_CC Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Choithram_NNP ,_, who_WP worked_VBD unceasingly_RB to_TO get_VB necessary_JJ work_NN through_IN and_CC avoid_JJ arrears_NNS accumulating_VBG ._.
To_TO the_DT Head_NNP Clerk_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Cross_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT whole_JJ office_NN who_WP have_VBP worked_VBN so_RB hard_JJ ,_, and_CC who_WP do_VBP credit_NN to_TO the_DT training_NN they_PRP have_VBP received_VBN in_IN past_JJ years_NNS ,_, the_DT thanks_NNS of_IN the_DT Acting_NNP Commis-_NNP sioner_NN are_VBP given_VBN ,_, and_CC specially_RB to_TO Mr._NNP Tahilram_NNP ,_, the_DT Plague_NNP Clerk_NNP ._.
Upon_IN Mr._NNP Quanbrough_NNP ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP 's_POS Press_NNP ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ staff_NN ,_, devolved_VBD very_RB heavy_JJ work_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP ,_, like_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP 's_POS Office_NNP ,_, most_JJS cheerfully_RB undertook_JJ ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN ,_, the_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP would_MD desire_VB to_TO say_VB that_IN ,_, if_IN any_DT success_NN has_VBZ been_VBN attained_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT magnificent_JJ sense_NN of_IN duty_NN which_WDT has_VBZ inspired_VBN all_DT officers_NNS ._.
If_IN this_DT report_NN fails_VBZ to_TO convey_VB the_DT admiration_NN and_CC thankfulness_NN which_WDT the_DT Acting_NNP Commis-_NNP sioner_NN feels_NNS towards_IN the_DT very_RB fine_JJ body_NN of_IN officers_NNS serving_VBG in_IN Sind_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT fault_NN of_IN his_PRP$ pen_NN ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ conscious_JJ of_IN an_DT earnest_JJ desire_NN as_IN the_DT events_NNS pass_NN in_IN rapid_JJ succession_NN to_TO name_VB those_DT chiefly_NNS associated_VBN with_IN each_DT detail_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS ._.
Karachi_NNP ,_, 21st_CD September_NNP 1897_CD ._.

367_CD ,_, DATED_NNP THE_NNP 6TH_CD JANUARY_NNP 1897_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP directed_VBN to_TO forward_VB ,_, for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, a_DT copy_NN of_IN a_DT note_NN written_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Major-_NNP General_NNP Cleghorn_NNP ,_, Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP with_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, on_IN his_PRP$ recent_JJ visit_NN to_TO Karachi_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP will_MD observe_VB that_IN the_DT facts_NNS elicited_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Cleghorn_NNP 's_POS investigation_NN have_VBP led_VBN him_PRP to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN in_IN Karachi_NNP ,_, as_IN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ only_RB slightly_RB ,_, if_IN at_IN all_DT ,_, either_RB contagious_JJ or_CC infectious_JJ in_IN the_DT common_JJ acceptation_NN of_IN these_DT terms_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT incidence_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ mainly_RB due_JJ to_TO local_JJ causes_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP notice_NN with_IN great_JJ satisfaction_NN the_DT success_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN achieved_VBN by_IN the_DT authorities_NNS at_IN Karachi_NNP in_IN preparing_VBG and_CC arranging_VBG for_IN the_DT sanitation_NN of_IN camps_NNS of_IN huts_NNS in_IN the_DT open_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN securing_VBG the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT infected_JJ quarters_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN to_TO these_DT camps_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP trust_VBP that_IN these_DT measures_NNS will_MD help_VB greatly_RB in_IN checking_VBG the_DT disease_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP sure_JJ that_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP will_MD agree_VB with_IN them_PRP that_IN the_DT zealous_JJ endeavours_NNS made_VBN to_TO bring_VB about_IN these_DT ends_NNS by_IN Mr._NNP Wingate_NNP ,_, the_DT Commissioner_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Giles_NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP and_CC Magistrate_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Strahan_NNP ,_, the_DT Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP Kaka_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, are_VBP deserving_VBG of_IN great_JJ credit_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP desires_VBZ specially_RB to_TO commend_VB to_TO the_DT consideration_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP the_DT following_JJ suggestions_NNS made_VBN in_IN Dr._NNP Cleghorn_NNP 's_POS note_NN :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) That_WDT Dr._NNP Arnim_NNP ,_, the_DT Deputy_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP now_RB in_IN Karachi_NNP ,_, should_MD be_VB placed_VBN in_IN medical_JJ charge_NN of_IN the_DT different_JJ camps_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT Dr._NNP Cleghorn_NNP points_NNS out_RP that_IN the_DT population_NN will_MD require_VB careful_JJ supervision_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) That_IN a_DT house_NN evacuated_VBN should_MD not_RB be_VB re-occupied_JJ until_IN its_PRP$ interior_NN has_VBZ been_VBN thoroughly_RB cleansed_VBN ,_, disinfected_VBN and_CC whitewashed_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN these_DT measures_NNS should_MD be_VB extended_VBN as_RB widely_RB as_IN possible_JJ ._.
(_( c_NN )_) That_IN permission_NN should_MD be_VB refused_VBN to_TO the_DT re-occupation_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN or_CC room_NN until_IN it_PRP is_VBZ placed_VBN in_IN a_DT proper_JJ state_NN for_IN habitation_NN ._.
(_( d_NN )_) That_IN overcrowding_VBG in_IN houses_NNS and_CC rooms_NNS should_MD be_VB pre-_JJ vented_VBN ._.

4_CD ._.
NOTE_NN BY_NNP SURGEON-MAJOR-GENERAL_NNP CLEGHORN_NNP ON_NNP KARACHI_NNP ._.
The_DT first_JJ case_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD reported_VBN to_TO ,_, and_CC observed_VBN by_IN ,_, Dr._NNP Kaka_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT 10th_JJ December_NNP ._.
The_DT indivi-_JJ dual_JJ attacked_VBN was_VBD a_DT cook_NN to_TO a_DT Hindu_NNP merchant_NN ,_, whose_WP$ house_NN was_VBD situated_VBN in_IN the_DT Bunder_NNP quarter_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD said_VBD to_TO have_VB landed_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP on_IN the_DT 8th_CD or_CC 9th_CD December_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT evidence_NN on_IN this_DT point_NN is_VBZ certainly_RB not_RB clear_JJ ,_, was_VBD attacked_VBN with_IN fever_NN on_IN the_DT latter_JJ date_NN ,_, and_CC died_VBD on_IN the_DT 10th_CD ,_, with_IN all_PDT the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT fever_NN declared_VBD itself_PRP ,_, the_DT man_NN was_VBD removed_VBN from_IN the_DT house_NN in_IN the_DT Bunder_NNP quarter_NN ,_, to_TO another_DT in_IN the_DT Ranchore_NNP quarter_NN ,_, where_WRB he_PRP died_VBD ._.
No_DT other_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN in_IN either_DT of_IN these_DT houses_NNS ._.
The_DT second_JJ observed_JJ case_NN appeared_VBD on_IN the_DT 11th_CD December_NNP in_IN the_DT old_JJ town_NN quarter_NN in_IN the_DT person_NN of_IN a_DT broker_NN ,_, whose_WP$ office_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT Bunder_NNP quarter_NN in_IN close_JJ proximity_NN to_TO the_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT first_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD ,_, but_CC his_PRP$ residence_NN was_VBD situated_VBN in_IN the_DT Old_NNP Town_NNP quarter_NN ._.
Beyond_IN the_DT above_NN there_RB appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB no_DT clear_JJ and_CC distinct_JJ evi-_JJ dence_NN of_IN the_DT importation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN into_IN Karachi_NNP by_IN human_JJ inter-_JJ course_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ admitted_VBN that_IN cases_NNS may_MD have_VB occurred_VBN previous_JJ to_TO those_DT noted_VBN ,_, although_IN not_RB reported_VBN ._.
As_IN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT appearance_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN a_DT great_JJ mortality_NN among_IN rats_NNS ._.
The_DT population_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Karachi_NNP according_VBG to_TO the_DT census_NN of_IN 1891_CD amounted_VBD to_TO 98,195_CD ,_, one_CD fifth_NN of_IN that_DT number_NN may_MD be_VB added_VBN for_IN natural_JJ increase_NN ,_, which_WDT will_MD bring_VB the_DT present_JJ population_NN up_RB to_TO 117,834_CD ._.
The_DT town_NN ,_, excluding_VBG Cantonments_NNS and_CC Harbour_NNP ,_, is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN 31_CD quarters_NNS or_CC wards_NNS ,_, and_CC up_RB to_TO 24th_CD January_NNP 606_CD deaths_NNS have_VBP been_VBN reported_VBN from_IN 14_CD of_IN these_DT wards_NNS ;_: the_DT remaining_VBG 17_CD have_VBP been_VBN entirely_RB ?_. The_DT two_CD former_JJ face_VBP the_DT bed_NN of_IN a_DT dry_JJ stream_NN ,_, extending_VBG backwards_NNS until_IN they_PRP become_VBP contiguous_JJ with_IN the_DT other_JJ quarters_NNS ._.
Many_JJ of_IN the_DT houses_NNS I_PRP visited_VBD in_IN the_DT quarters_NNS abovenamed_VBD were_VBD quite_RB unfit_JJ for_IN human_JJ habitation_NN ,_, there_EX were_VBD no_DT openings_NNS for_IN the_DT admission_NN of_IN air_NN and_CC light_NN ,_, the_DT rooms_NNS were_VBD overcrowded_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT inmates_NNS lived_VBD in_IN complete_JJ darkness_NN ._.
The_DT Old_NNP Town_NNP is_VBZ the_DT worst_JJS in_IN these_DT respects_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT overcrowding_NN in_IN houses_NNS and_CC of_IN ground_NN area_NN is_VBZ common_JJ to_TO all_DT ._.
Of_IN the_DT 59_CD ascertained_VBD deaths_NNS from_IN plague_NN which_WDT were_VBD reported_VBN up_RB to_TO 31st_CD December_NNP ,_, 49_CD or_CC 83.1_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT Old_NNP Town_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT total_JJ 606_CD deaths_NNS ,_, 407_CD or_CC 67.1_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
were_VBD reported_VBN from_IN the_DT same_JJ quarter_NN ._.
It_PRP must_MD also_RB be_VB noted_VBN that_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT deaths_NNS reported_VBN from_IN other_JJ quarters_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN fugitives_NNS from_IN the_DT Old_NNP Town_NNP ._.

The_DT death-rate_NN from_IN plague_NN in_IN Karachi_NNP City_NNP has_VBZ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, been_VBN only_RB 052_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN estimated_VBN population_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT worst_JJS quarter_NN where_WRB the_DT greatest_JJS mortality_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ,_, only_RB 35_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
on_IN the_DT estimated_VBN population_NN of_IN that_DT quarter_NN ._.
This_DT ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, proves_VBZ that_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, can_MD only_RB be_VB slightly_RB ,_, if_IN at_IN all_DT ,_, either_RB contagious_JJ or_CC infectious_JJ in_IN the_DT common_JJ acceptation_NN of_IN these_DT terms_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT follow-_JJ ing_JJ additional_JJ facts_NNS warrant_VBP me_PRP ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, in_IN coming_VBG to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN the_DT incidence_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO local_JJ conditions_NNS ._.
1_CD ._.
No_DT death_NN has_VBZ as_RB yet_RB been_VBN reported_VBN from_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT houses_NNS on_IN the_DT exposed_VBN edge_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, i.e._FW ,_, on_IN the_DT one_NN with_IN a_DT frontage_NN to_TO the_DT dry_JJ bed_NN of_IN the_DT stream_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Comparatively_RB slight_JJ extension_NN in_IN the_DT other_JJ quarters_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN only_RB in_IN the_DT worst_JJS houses_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
Lyari_NNP ,_, a_DT suburb_NN ,_, containing_VBG an_DT estimated_VBN population_NN of_IN 27,000_CD locally_RB said_VBD to_TO be_VB 30,000_CD ,_, situated_VBD a_DT quarter_NN to_TO half_PDT a_DT mile_NN from_IN the_DT Old_NNP Town_NNP ,_, Machi_NNP Miani_NNP and_CC market_NN ,_, is_VBZ in_IN constant_JJ communication_NN with_IN these_DT quarters_NNS and_CC receiving_VBG fugitives_NNS from_IN them_PRP ._.
Only_RB 13_CD deaths_NNS up_RB to_TO 24th_CD January_NNP ._.
The_DT houses_NNS in_IN this_DT suburb_NN are_VBP scattered_VBN over_IN a_DT large_JJ area_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP as_IN a_DT rule_NN of_IN small_JJ size_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP numerous_JJ gardens_NNS and_CC open_JJ spaces_NNS in_IN the_DT area_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
Khudder_NNP ,_, a_DT village_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 2,000_CD ,_, chiefly_JJR fisher-_JJ men_NNS ,_, situated_VBD half_PDT a_DT mile_NN from_IN the_DT town-women_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, proceed_VBD daily_RB to_TO the_DT town_NN to_TO sell_VB fish_JJ ,_, but_CC there_EX were_VBD only_RB two_CD deaths_NNS up_IN to_TO 26th_CD January_NNP ._.
The_DT village_NN consists_VBZ of_IN huts_NNS ,_, each_DT occupied_VBN by_IN a_DT single_JJ family_NN ._.

8_CD ._.
The_DT immunity_NN enjoyed_VBN by_IN officers_NNS and_CC subordinates_NNS of_IN Health_NNP Department_NNP ._.
The_DT houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT a_DT death_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN are_VBP marked_VBN thus_RB +_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT mark_NN is_VBZ repeated_VBN for_IN each_DT death_NN ._.
In_IN visiting_VBG all_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN with_IN the_DT officers_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP I_PRP was_VBD struck_VBN with_IN the_DT localization_NN of_IN these_DT marks_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ absence_NN from_IN the_DT better_JJR class_NN of_IN houses_NNS ._.
The_DT measuers_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN ,_, and_CC are_VBP still_RB in_IN progress_NN towards_NNS arresting_VBG the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, are_VBP cleansing_VBG and_CC disin-_JJ fection_NN of_IN houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT a_DT death_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ,_, greater_JJR attention_NN to_TO general_JJ cleanliness_NN and_CC ,_, when_WRB possible_JJ ,_, removal_NN of_IN the_DT healthy_JJ from_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS ._.

Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
415_CD On_IN the_DT 11th_CD January_NNP the_DT construction_NN of_IN mat_NN huts_NNS on_IN a_DT large_JJ space_NN of_IN open_JJ ground_NN near_IN the_DT town_NN was_VBD commenced_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT people_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB induced_VBN to_TO occupy_VB them_PRP until_IN the_DT 24th_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT head-_JJ men_NNS of_IN the_DT Hindus_NNP living_NN in_IN the_DT Old_NNP Town_NNP agreed_VBD to_TO the_DT exodus_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 27th_JJ January_NNP ,_, there_EX were_VBD nearly_RB 400_CD huts_NNS erected_VBN ,_, which_WDT were_VBD then_RB occupied_VBN by_IN 2,500_CD to_TO 3.000_CD people_NNS ._.
The_DT huts_NNS are_VBP built_VBN separately_RB and_CC arranged_VBN along_IN wide_JJ streets_NNS ,_, water_NN is_VBZ laid_VBN on_IN and_CC all_DT sanitary_JJ arrangements_NNS are_VBP attended_VBN to_TO ._.
The_DT Muhammadans_NNPS and_CC Kutchers_NNS have_VBP also_RB agreed_VBN to_TO turn_VB out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, and_CC huts_NNS are_VBP now_RB in_IN course_NN of_IN construction_NN for_IN their_PRP$ occu-_JJ pation_NN ._.
A_DT population_NN living_VBG under_IN these_DT conditions_NNS will_MD require_VB careful_JJ supervision_NN ,_, a_DT Civil_NNP Officer_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN detailed_VBN for_IN the_DT duty_NN ._.
I_PRP also_RB recommend_VBP that_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Arnim_NNP ,_, now_RB in_IN Karachi_NNP ,_, should_MD be_VB placed_VBN in_IN medical_JJ charge_NN of_IN the_DT different_JJ camps_NNS ._.
The_DT Bombay_NNP Government_NNP might_MD be_VB informed_VBN that_IN ,_, if_IN further_JJ medical_JJ assistance_NN is_VBZ required_VBN ,_, officers_NNS can_MD be_VB supplied_VBN on_IN application_NN to_TO Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
A_DT house_NN evacuated_VBN is_VBZ not_RB to_TO be_VB re-occupied_JJ until_IN its_PRP$ interior_NN has_VBZ been_VBN thoroughly_RB cleansed_VBN ,_, disinfected_VBN and_CC whitewashed_VBN ,_, and_CC these_DT measures_NNS should_MD be_VB extended_VBN to_TO the_DT other_JJ houses_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO these_DT measures_NNS it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO me_PRP to_TO be_VB necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT future_JJ safety_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN that_IN all_DT houses_NNS ,_, declared_VBN by_IN the_DT local_JJ medical_JJ authority_NN to_TO be_VB unfit_JJ for_IN human_JJ habitation_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB demolish-_JJ ed_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT ground_NN acquired_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ._.
That_IN the_DT local_JJ authorities_NNS should_MD be_VB authorised_VBN to_TO refuse_VB permission_NN to_TO the_DT re-occupation_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN or_CC room_NN until_IN it_PRP is_VBZ placed_VBN in_IN a_DT proper_JJ state_NN for_IN habitation_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT law_NN should_MD be_VB passed_VBN to_TO prevent_VB overcrowd-_JJ ing_NN in_IN houses_NNS and_CC rooms_NNS ._.
*_JJ *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_IN It_PRP is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, generally_RB accepted_VBD that_IN the_DT limit_NN of_IN incubation_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN in_IN a_DT human_JJ being_VBG is_VBZ eight_CD to_TO nine_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT facts_NNS which_WDT have_VBP come_VBN to_TO my_PRP$ notice_JJ support_NN this_DT view_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP would_MD recommend_VB that_IN quarantine_NN should_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO ten_VB days_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD suggested_VBN to_TO me_PRP when_WRB in_IN Karachi_NNP ,_, that_WDT as_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Committee_NNP is_VBZ making_VBG such_JJ great_JJ endeavours_NNS to_TO stop_VB the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, their_PRP$ efforts_NNS might_MD be_VB frustrated_VBN by_IN allowing_VBG passengers_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP to_TO land_VB immediately_RB on_IN arrival_NN of_IN the_DT ships_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP think_VBP that_IN a_DT quarantine_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN date_NN of_IN departure_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, when_WRB no_DT case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN on_IN board_NN ,_, might_MD be_VB imposed_VBN on_IN all_DT arrivals_NNS ._.
The_DT cargo_NN to_TO be_VB landed_VBN in_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ course_NN ._.
This_DT appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB appropriate_JJ and_CC justifiable_JJ ,_, but_CC Mr._NNP Wingate_NNP ,_, the_DT Commissioner_NNP ,_, declines_VBZ to_TO recommend_VB its_PRP$ adoption_NN until_IN it_PRP can_MD be_VB clearly_RB proved_VBN that_IN arrivals_NNS are_VBP followed_VBN by_IN fresh_JJ importation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
