General_NNP Remarks_NNP on_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN Houses_NNP ._.
EXPERIMENTS_NNS MADE_VBN BY_NNP MR._NNP HANKIN_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
430_CD ,_, dated_VBN Agra_NNP ,_, the_DT 15th_CD July_NNP 1897_CD ._.
From-E._NNP H._NNP HANKIN_NNP ,_, Esq._NNP ,_, Chemical_NNP Examiner_NNP and_CC Bacteriologist_NNP ,_, North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS and_CC Oudh_NNP ,_, To-SURGEON-COLONEL_NNP WARBURTON_NNP ,_, Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Civil_NNP Hospitals_NNP ,_, North-Western_NNP Provinces_NNPS and_CC Oudh_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO forward_VB for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN Government_NNP an_DT account_NN of_IN experiments_NNS I_PRP have_VBP recently_RB carried_VBN out_RP in_IN Hardwar_NNP on_IN methods_NNS of_IN disinfecting_VBG plague_NN infected_VBN houses_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB convenient_JJ to_TO preface_VB my_PRP$ remarks_NNS by_IN a_DT short_JJ rsum_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN I_PRP have_VBP carried_VBN out_RP in_IN Bombay_NNP on_IN the_DT action_NN of_IN disinfectants_NNS on_IN the_DT microbe_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
A_DT full_JJ account_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN already_RB communicated_VBN to_TO the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ with_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT method_NN employed_VBD was_VBD that_IN that_DT is_VBZ most_RBS ordinarily_RB used_VBN in_IN testing_VBG the_DT action_NN of_IN disinfectants_NNS on_IN microbes_NNS ._.
The_DT results_NNS obtained_VBD may_MD be_VB tabulated_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: A.-Action_NN of_IN the_DT Phenols_NNP and_CC their_PRP$ Allies_NNS ._.
The_DT bubonic_JJ microbe_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB somewhat_RB resistant_JJ to_TO the_DT action_NN of_IN carbolic_JJ acid_NN ,_, a_DT one_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
solution_NN not_RB being_VBG always_RB sufficient_VBN to_TO kill_VB it_PRP under_IN the_DT condition_NN of_IN the_DT experiment_NN ._.
Phenyle_NNP ,_, Lysol_NNP ,_, and_CC Izal_NNP were_VBD found_VBN in_IN all_DT cases_NNS to_TO destroy_VB the_DT microbe_NN when_WRB in_IN a_DT quarter_NN per_IN cent_NN ._.
solution_NN ._.
The_DT limit_NN of_IN dilution_NN of_IN the_DT solutions_NNS of_IN these_DT substances_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO destroy_VB the_DT microbe_NN was_VBD not_RB however_RB found_VBN ._.
Naphthaline_NN ,_, both_DT pure_NN and_CC impure_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT patent_NN preparation_NN ``_`` naphtho-sublimate_JJ ''_'' were_VBD found_VBN to_TO exert_VB no_DT disinfect-_JJ ant_JJ action_NN although_IN tested_VBN in_IN solutions_NNS containing_VBG an_DT undissolved_JJ excess_NN of_IN these_DT substances_NNS ._.
B.-Action_NN of_IN Corrosive_NNP Sublimate_NNP and_CC Copper_NNP Sulphate_NNP on_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Microbe_NNP ._.
Sublimate_NNP was_VBD found_VBN to_TO destroy_VB the_DT microbe_NN in_IN a_DT strength_NN of_IN one_CD in_IN five_CD thousand_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT lower_JJR limit_NN of_IN its_PRP$ action_NN was_VBD not_RB investigated_VBN ._.
Copper_NN sulphate_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB efficient_JJ in_IN a_DT strength_NN of_IN one_CD in_IN a_DT thousand_NN ._.
A_DT five_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
solution_NN of_IN this_DT substance_NN was_VBD used_VBN by_IN the_DT French_JJ Government_NNP in_IN 1892_CD in_IN combating_VBG cholera_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ easily_RB obtainable_JJ in_IN India_NNP ,_, and_CC might_MD under_IN certain_JJ conditions_NNS be_VB used_VBN against_IN the_DT plague_NN as_IN shown_VBN by_IN the_DT above_JJ result_NN ._.
C.-Action_NN of_IN Alkalies_NNS on_IN the_DT Bubonic_NNP Microbe_NNP ._.
This_DT microbe_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB relatively_RB resistant_JJ to_TO the_DT action_NN of_IN alkalies_NNS including_VBG ammonia_NN ,_, caustic_JJ potash_NN ,_, and_CC freshly_RB slaked_VBD lime_NN ._.
Under_IN the_DT conditions_NNS under_IN which_WDT lime_JJ washing_NN must_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_IN b_NN 53_CD 420_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
in_IN India_NNP ,_, it_PRP must_MD not_RB be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT disinfectant_NN for_IN the_DT infection_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
D.-Action_NN of_IN Acids_NNP on_IN the_DT Microbe_NNP of_IN Bubonic_NNP Plague_NNP ._.
The_DT microbe_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ extremely_RB sensitive_JJ to_TO the_DT action_NN of_IN acids_NNS ._.
Even_RB certain_JJ organic_JJ acids_NNS were_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB capable_JJ of_IN destroying_VBG it_PRP rapidly_RB ._.
The_DT results_NNS obtained_VBD with_IN these_DT substances_NNS were_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: It_PRP is_VBZ destroyed_VBN under_IN the_DT conditions_NNS of_IN my_PRP$ experiments_NNS within_IN five_CD minutes_NNS by-_JJ Formic_NNP acid_NN of_IN a_DT strength_NN of_IN 1_CD in_IN 100_CD ._.
Acetic_JJ acid_NN of_IN a_DT strength_NN of_IN 1_CD in_IN 142_CD ._.
Lactic_JJ acid_NN of_IN a_DT strength_NN of_IN 1_CD in_IN 333_CD ._.
In_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN most_JJS articles_NNS of_IN diet_JJ either_CC possess_JJ an_DT acid_JJ reaction_NN or_CC rapidly_RB acquire_VB it_PRP on_IN the_DT onset_NN of_IN decomposition_NN owing_VBG to_TO the_DT appearance_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ acids_NNS or_CC their_PRP$ allies_NNS ,_, it_PRP seems_VBZ scarcely_RB probable_JJ that_IN food-stuffs_NNS should_MD retain_VB for_IN long_RB the_DT microbe_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN milk_NN this_DT speculation_NN has_VBZ been_VBN put_VBN to_TO an_DT extended_JJ test_NN by_IN Dr._NNP Srinivasa_NNP Rau_NNP in_IN my_PRP$ laboratory_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
He_PRP found_VBD that_IN as_RB soon_RB as_IN milk_NN has_VBZ been_VBN kept_VBN long_RB enough_RB to_TO acquire_VB a_DT well_NN marked_VBN acid_JJ reaction_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ to_TO say_VB ,_, within_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS of_IN milk-_JJ ing_VBG under_IN ordinary_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ the_DT power_NN of_IN destroying_VBG the_DT bubonic_JJ microbe_NN within_IN an_DT hour_NN ._.
If_IN on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN the_DT milk_NN is_VBZ made_VBN faintly_RB alkaline_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ incapable_JJ of_IN so_RB doing_VBG ,_, and_CC appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB a_DT good_JJ food_NN medium_NN for_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ microbe_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Rau_NNP has_VBZ also_RB carried_VBN out_RP experiments_NNS on_IN the_DT vitality_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ microbe_NN in_IN rotten_JJ grain_NN ._.
This_DT substance_NN nearly_RB always_RB has_VBZ an_DT acid_JJ reaction_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ then_RB capable_JJ of_IN rapidly_RB destroying_VBG the_DT bubonic_JJ microbe_NN ._.
I_PRP propose_VBP to_TO describe_VB his_PRP$ experiments_NNS at_IN length_NN in_IN another_DT report_NN ._.
The_DT tissues_NNS of_IN animals_NNS after_IN death_NN acquire_VB an_DT acid_JJ reaction_NN owing_VBG to_TO the_DT develop-_JJ ment_NN of_IN an_DT ally_NN of_IN lactic_JJ acid_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Rohak_NNP under_IN my_PRP$ direction_NN has_VBZ found_VBN that_IN this_DT acid_JJ reaction_NN appears_VBZ in_IN the_DT bodies_NNS of_IN animals_NNS dead_JJ of_IN plague_NN ._.
This_DT point_NN ,_, though_IN it_PRP has_VBZ no_DT bearing_NN on_IN the_DT admitted_JJ danger_NN of_IN handling_VBG and_CC washing_VBG plague_NN corpses_NNS ,_, may_MD if_IN worked_VBN out_RP ,_, be_VB found_VBN to_TO have_VB an_DT important_JJ bearing_NN on_IN the_DT old_JJ idea_NN that_IN graveyards_NNS may_MD be_VB a_DT lasting_JJ source_NN of_IN infection_NN ._.
As_IN may_MD be_VB expected_VBN ,_, inorganic_JJ acids_NNS were_VBD found_VBN to_TO have_VB a_DT still_RB more_RBR potent_JJ action_NN on_IN the_DT microbe_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT results_NNS were_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: The_DT bubonic_JJ microbe_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB destroyed_VBN within_IN five_CD minutes_NNS by-_JJ Nitric_NNP acid_NN in_IN a_DT strength_NN of_IN 1_CD in_IN 333_CD ._.
Hydrochloric_NNP acid_NN in_IN a_DT strength_NN of_IN 1_CD in_IN 500_CD ._.
Sulphuric_JJ acid_NN in_IN a_DT strength_NN of_IN 1_CD in_IN 1,429_CD ._.
?_. APP_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
421_CD A_DT mixture_NN of_IN four_CD parts_NNS of_IN sulphuric_JJ acid_NN and_CC one_CD part_NN of_IN nitric_JJ acid_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB as_RB efficient_JJ as_IN sulphuric_JJ acid_NN in_IN destroying_VBG the_DT plague_NN microbe_NN ._.
The_DT waste_NN acids_NNS from_IN the_DT Kirkee_NNP Cordite_NNP Factory_NNP consists_VBZ of_IN sulphuric_JJ acid_NN with_IN a_DT slightly_RB less_JJR proportion_NN of_IN nitric_JJ ,_, and_CC might_MD therefore_RB be_VB used_VBN in_IN combating_VBG plague_NN ._.
Sulphuric_JJ acid_NN is_VBZ recommended_VBN as_IN a_DT disinfectant_NN by_IN its_PRP$ great_JJ cheapness_NN ._.
E.-Action_NN of_IN Reducing_VBG Agents_NNS on_IN the_DT Bubonic_NNP Microbe_NNP ._.
The_DT microbe_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB extremely_RB resistant_JJ to_TO the_DT action_NN of_IN ferrous_JJ sulphate_NN ,_, a_DT substance_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN frequently_RB recommended_VBN for_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN sewage_NN and_CC filth_NN ._.
The_DT bubonic_JJ microbe_NN appears_VBZ generally_RB to_TO die_VB out_RP when_WRB evapo-_NN rated_VBN to_TO dryness_VB in_IN a_DT thin_JJ film_NN on_IN glass_NN in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT air_NN ._.
I_PRP found_VBD it_PRP still_RB alive_VBP after_IN five_CD days_NNS when_WRB evaporated_VBN to_TO dryness_VB in_IN glass_NN bulbs_NN in_IN a_DT current_JJ of_IN ._.
hydrogen_NN gas_NN ._.
F.-Action_NN of_IN Oxidising_VBG Agents_NNS on_IN the_DT Microbe_NNP of_IN Plague_NNP ._.
The_DT bubonic_JJ microbe_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB destroyed_VBN by_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN one_CD in_IN ten_JJ thousand_CD of_IN chloride_NN of_IN lime_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT lower_JJR limit_NN of_IN the_DT action_NN of_IN this_DT substance_NN was_VBD not_RB detected_VBN ._.
Permanganate_NNP of_IN Potash_NNP was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB capable_JJ of_IN destroying_VBG it_PRP ,_, under_IN the_DT artificial_JJ condi-_JJ tions_NNS of_IN my_PRP$ experiments_NNS ,_, in_IN a_DT dilution_NN of_IN 1_CD in_IN 50,000_CD ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ to_TO say_VB ,_, in_IN a_DT solution_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT pink_NN colour_NN is_VBZ but_CC faintly_RB marked_VBD ._.
In_IN certain_JJ cases_NNS it_PRP appeared_VBD that_IN the_DT organic_JJ matter_NN present_NN was_VBD sufficient_JJ to_TO destroy_VB all_PDT the_DT permanganate_NN used_VBN ,_, after_IN the_DT lapse_NN of_IN some_DT hours_NNS ._.
In_IN these_DT cases_NNS the_DT microbes_NNS were_VBD first_JJ destroyed_VBN and_CC afterwards_IN the_DT permanganate_NN was_VBD reduced_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD shown_VBN however_RB by_IN experiment_NN that_IN the_DT quantity_NN of_IN readily_RB reducible_JJ organic_JJ matter_NN present_NN on_IN a_DT cow-dung_JJ floor_NN is_VBZ so_RB great_JJ that_IN probably_RB a_DT four_CD per_IN cent_NN ,_, solution_NN of_IN permanganate_NN would_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO produce_VB a_DT safe_JJ disinfection_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT conditions_NNS under_IN which_WDT the_DT above_NN experiments_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN out_RP were_VBD probably_RB more_RBR favourable_JJ to_TO the_DT disinfectant_NN than_IN would_MD be_VB the_DT case_NN in_IN practice_NN ._.
This_DT fact_NN ,_, while_IN tending_VBG to_TO justify_VB the_DT condemnation_NN of_IN a_DT disinfectant_NN from_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN such_JJ experi-_JJ ments_NNS ,_, necessitates_NNS caution_VBP in_IN using_VBG such_JJ experiments_NNS to_TO recom-_JJ mend_NN a_DT disinfectant_NN ._.
The_DT fact_NN that_IN a_DT disinfectant_NN can_MD destroy_VB a_DT microbe_NN suspended_VBN in_IN water_NN ,_, as_IN was_VBD the_DT case_NN in_IN my_PRP$ experiments_NNS ,_, does_VBZ not_RB prove_VB that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB capable_JJ of_IN destroying_VBG the_DT microbe_NN when_WRB contained_VBN in_IN human_JJ dejecta_NN soaked_VBD into_IN a_DT cowdung_JJ floor_NN ._.
Hence_NN it_PRP appeared_VBD to_TO me_PRP to_TO be_VB advisable_JJ to_TO carry_VB out_RP some_DT experi-_JJ ments_NNS in_IN which_WDT practical_JJ conditions_NNS would_MD be_VB more_RBR closely_RB imitated_VBN ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT excreta_NN of_IN men_NNS and_CC rats_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO fall_VB on_IN to_TO the_DT floor_NN of_IN houses_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN 422_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.

such_JJ excreta_NN are_VBP likely_JJ in_IN some_DT ,_, but_CC not_RB in_IN all_DT ,_, cases_NNS ,_, to_TO contain_VB the_DT plague_NN microbe_NN ,_, and_CC owing_VBG further_RB to_TO the_DT probability_NN that_IN the_DT infection_NN of_IN plague_NN gains_NNS entrance_NN to_TO the_DT human_JJ body_NN in_IN the_DT major-_JJ ity_NN of_IN cases_NNS through_IN the_DT skin_NN of_IN the_DT feet_NNS and_CC legs_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ probably_RB the_DT floor_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN that_WDT is_VBZ most_RBS in_IN need_NN of_IN disinfection_NN ._.
The_DT floors_NNS of_IN houses_NNS of_IN the_DT lower_JJR classes_NNS in_IN India_NNP are_VBP usually_RB covered_VBN with_IN a_DT mixture_NN of_IN mud_NN and_CC cow-dung_NN ._.

The_DT most_RBS satisfactory_JJ way_NN of_IN carrying_VBG out_RP such_JJ a_DT test_NN would_MD be_VB to_TO impregnate_VB a_DT cowdung_NN floor_NN with_IN the_DT microbe_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB to_TO test_VB for_IN its_PRP$ presence_NN after_IN the_DT application_NN of_IN the_DT disin-_JJ fectant_NN ._.
Unfortunately_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, this_DT is_VBZ at_IN present_JJ impossible_JJ as_IN no_DT reliable_JJ test_NN exists_NNS for_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN microbe_NN when_WRB mixed_JJ with_IN others_NNS ._.
Hence_NN I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN to_TO experiment_VB with_IN floors_NNS that_WDT had_VBD not_RB been_VBN infected_VBN ._.
By_IN estimating_VBG the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN ordinary_JJ microbe_NN present_NN before_IN and_CC after_IN the_DT application_NN of_IN the_DT disinfectant_NN ,_, some_DT idea_NN can_MD be_VB formed_VBN of_IN the_DT activity_NN of_IN the_DT latter_NN on_IN a_DT cow-dung_JJ floor_NN ._.
No_DT doubt_NN some_DT of_IN the_DT microbes_JJ present_NN are_VBP more_RBR resistant_JJ than_IN the_DT plague_NN microbe_NN to_TO the_DT action_NN of_IN disinfectants_NNS ;_: others_NNS on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO be_VB as_IN sensitive_JJ ,_, and_CC hence_NN it_PRP would_MD probably_RB not_RB be_VB safe_JJ to_TO employ_VB a_DT disinfectant_NN against_IN plague_NN that_WDT had_VBD no_DT action_NN in_IN decreasing_VBG the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN harmless_NN microbes_FW present_NN on_IN an_DT ordinary_JJ floor_NN ._.
The_DT method_NN I_PRP have_VBP employed_VBN was_VBD to_TO remove_VB as_RB much_JJ of_IN the_DT material_NN of_IN the_DT floor_NN as_IN could_MD be_VB taken_VBN up_RP on_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN a_DT flattened_JJ needle_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD put_VBN into_IN a_DT test_NN tube_NN containing_VBG melted_VBN agaragar_NN ,_, mixed_VBD up_RP well_RB with_IN the_DT food_NN medium_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT mixture_NN was_VBD then_RB allowed_VBN to_TO solidify_VB ._.
On_IN the_DT following_JJ day_NN the_DT number_NN of_IN colonies_NNS that_WDT had_VBD developed_VBN was_VBD counted_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ needless_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN this_DT method_NN does_VBZ not_RB give_VB results_NNS of_IN any_DT absolute_JJ value_NN ._.
If_IN for_IN ins-_JJ tance_NN the_DT material_NN of_IN the_DT floor_NN was_VBD dry_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ likely_JJ that_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT microbes_JJ present_NN in_IN the_DT specimen_NNS removed_VBD for_IN examination_NN would_MD adhere_VB to_TO the_DT particles_NNS of_IN sand_NN and_CC dirt_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN each_DT par-_JJ ticle_NN would_MD produce_VB only_RB a_DT single_JJ colony_NN ._.

Though_IN the_DT method_NN has_VBZ no_DT absolute_JJ value_NN ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ some_DT relative_JJ value_NN ,_, if_IN re-_JJ peated_VBN sufficiently_RB often_RB ._.

In_IN the_DT first_JJ experiment_NN a_DT small_JJ godown_NN in_IN the_DT Collector_NNP 's_POS bungalow_NN in_IN Hardwar_NNP was_VBD treated_VBN ._.
The_DT room_NN was_VBD closed_VBN up_RP as_RB well_RB as_IN was_VBD practicable_JJ ._.
The_DT men_NNS employed_VBD to_TO fumigate_VB with_IN sulphur_NN in_IN Hardwar_NNP were_VBD called_VBN in_IN and_CC told_VBD to_TO treat_VB the_DT room_NN with_IN sulphur_NN as_IN was_VBD customary_JJ ._.
They_PRP first_RB brought_VBD in_IN an_DT ``_`` ungete_JJ ``_`` containing_VBG a_DT bright_JJ coal_NN fire_NN ._.
On_IN this_DT they_PRP put_VBD a_DT ``_`` degchie_NN ''_'' of_IN water_NN to_TO produce_VB steam_NN ._.
Then_RB another_DT ``_`` ungete_JJ ``_`` with_IN a_DT fire_NN was_VBD brought_VBN in_IN ._.
On_IN this_DT they_PRP threw_VBD a_DT handful_NN of_IN flour_NN of_IN sulphur_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT strength_NN of_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, was_VBD almost_RB immediately_RB consumed_VBN ._.
Then_RB one_CD of_IN them_PRP rushed_VBD into_IN the_DT room_NN and_CC threw_VBD a_DT small_JJ quantity_NN of_IN methylated_JJ spirit_NN on_IN to_TO the_DT fire_NN containing_VBG the_DT sulphur_NN ._.

Naturally_RB under_IN such_JJ conditions_NNS no_DT disinfection_NN took_VBD place_NN ._.

Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
429_CD general_JJ grounds_NNS that_IN human_JJ excreta_NN are_VBP apt_JJ to_TO contain_VB the_DT microbe_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT a_DT posteriori_JJ evidence_NN of_IN the_DT Hong-kong_NNP epidemic_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN public_JJ latrines_NNS may_MD become_VB sources_NNS of_IN infection_NN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB are_VBP greatly_RB in_IN need_NN of_IN efficient_JJ disin-_JJ fection_NN ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT existence_NN of_IN caste_NN and_CC other_JJ prejudices_NNS the_DT disinfectant_NN of_IN public_JJ latrines_NNS is_VBZ very_RB often_RB shirked_VBN ._.
Further_RB ,_, if_IN ordinary_JJ disinfections_NNS are_VBP used_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB easy_JJ for_IN an_DT inspecting_JJ officer_NN to_TO know_VB whether_IN the_DT work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN properly_RB carried_VBN out_RP ._.
Hence_NN I_PRP suggest_VBP that_IN public_JJ latrines_NNS in_IN infected_JJ areas_NNS should_MD be_VB frequently_RB treated_VBN with_IN burning_VBG grass_NN or_CC other_JJ fuel_NN ._.
The_DT sweeper_NN could_MD put_VB a_DT bundle_NN of_IN grass_NN on_IN to_TO each_DT compartment_NN and_CC light_NN it_PRP ._.
Afterwards_IN the_DT ashes_NNS could_MD be_VB washed_VBN out_RP with_IN a_DT dilute_JJ solution_NN of_IN sulphuric_JJ acid_NN ._.
The_DT probable_JJ efficiency_NN of_IN disinfectants_NNS is_VBZ not_RB the_DT only_JJ factor_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN into_IN consideration_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ cost_NN must_MD also_RB be_VB noted_VBN ._.

(_( 1_CD )_) Sublimate_NN 1_CD in_IN 1,000_CD ,_, ..._: ..._: .._VBZ 15_CD (_( 2_CD )_) Sublimate_NN 1_CD in_IN 1,000_CD plus_CC hydrochloric_JJ acid_NN 2_CD in_IN 1,000_CD ..._: 14_CD (_( 3_CD )_) Sulphuric_NNP acid_$ 1_CD in_IN 250_CD ..._: ..._: ..._: 1,920_CD (_( 4_CD )_) Sulphuric_NNP acid_$ 1_CD in_IN 250_CD plus_CC 1_CD in_IN 500_CD of_IN per-_JJ manganate_NN of_IN potassium_NN 128_CD (_( 5_CD )_) Phenyle_VBD 1_CD in_IN 100_CD ..._: 144_CD The_DT above_NN prices_NNS do_VBP not_RB include_VB cost_NN of_IN transit_NN which_WDT is_VBZ higher_JJR for_IN sulphuric_JJ acid_NN than_IN for_IN permanganate_NN or_CC sublimate_NN ._.
Another_DT question_NN that_WDT must_MD be_VB taken_VBN into_IN consideration_NN in_IN choos-_JJ ing_VBG a_DT disinfectant_NN is_VBZ whether_IN its_PRP$ action_NN is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO be_VB lasting_JJ ,_, whether_IN in_IN other_JJ words_NNS its_PRP$ employment_NN is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO make_VB the_DT medium_NN unsuited_VBD for_IN a_DT considerable_JJ time_NN for_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ microbe_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ possibly_RB more_RBR important_JJ in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN bubonic_NN plague_NN than_IN with_IN other_JJ diseases_NNS ._.
Not_RB only_RB in_IN this_DT disease_NN is_VBZ a_DT disinfected_JJ area_NN liable_JJ to_TO be_VB reinfected_VBN by_IN human_JJ patients_NNS ,_, but_CC in_IN addition_NN in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS this_DT may_MD occur_VB through_IN the_DT agency_NN of_IN infected_JJ rats_NNS ._.
Hence_RB a_DT disinfectant_NN that_WDT merely_RB destroys_VBZ the_DT microbes_JJ present_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC that_DT has_VBZ no_DT lasting_JJ action_NN is_VBZ not_RB sufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
As_IN shown_VBN by_IN previous_JJ experiments_NNS ,_, acidulated_VBD sublimate_JJ solution_NN is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ one_CD of_IN the_DT dis-_JJ infectants_NNS tried_VBD that_IN showed_VBD a_DT clearly_RB good_JJ action_NN on_IN a_DT cowdung_NN floor_NN ._.
Unfortunately_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, solutions_NNS of_IN mercuric_JJ salts_NNS ,_, even_RB with_IN the_DT addition_NN of_IN volatile_JJ hydrochloric_JJ acid_NN ,_, are_VBP by_IN no_DT means_NNS stable_JJ ,_, espe-_JJ cially_RB when_WRB mixed_JJ with_IN the_DT material_NN of_IN a_DT cowdung_NN floor_NN ._.
Dilute_NNP sulphuric_JJ acid_NN on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN is_VBZ not_RB volatile_JJ ,_, and_CC if_IN used_VBN in_IN sufficient_JJ 430_CD Measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.

quantities_NNS is_VBZ likely_JJ for_IN some_DT time_NN at_IN least_JJS to_TO make_VB the_DT floor_NN an_DT unsuit-_JJ able_JJ nidus_NN for_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ microbe_NN ._.
Although_IN ,_, as_IN shown_VBN in_IN previous_JJ experiments_NNS ,_, there_EX are_VBP many_JJ microbes_NNS in_IN a_DT cowdung_NN floor_NN not_RB readily_RB affected_VBN by_IN it_PRP in_IN the_DT strength_NN recommended_VBD ,_, the_DT special_JJ sensitiveness_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ microbe_NN to_TO acids_NNS in_IN general_JJ and_CC to_TO sulphuric_VB acid_NN in_IN particular_JJ makes_VBZ it_PRP likely_JJ that_IN the_DT latter_JJ substance_NN will_MD be_VB efficient_JJ when_WRB used_VBN on_IN such_JJ a_DT floor_NN ._.
The_DT acid_NN will_MD slowly_RB diffuse_VB to_TO the_DT deeper_JJR layers_NNS and_CC combine_NN with_IN calcium_NN salts_NNS and_CC various_JJ alkaline_NN substances_NNS that_WDT may_MD be_VB present_JJ ._.
But_CC the_DT upper_JJ layers_NNS which_WDT are_VBP in_IN most_JJS need_NN of_IN disinfection_NN are_VBP most_RBS likely_JJ to_TO be_VB affected_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT acid_NN will_MD be_VB less_RBR quickly_RB neutralized_VBN if_IN the_DT floor_NN has_VBZ been_VBN treated_VBN with_IN acid_JJ sub-_JJ limate_NN solution_NN on_IN the_DT preceding_JJ day_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT locality_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT soil_NN is_VBZ highly_RB calcareous_JJ ,_, sulphuric_JJ acid_NN is_VBZ not_RB likely_JJ to_TO be_VB a_DT convenient_JJ disinfection_NN for_IN cowdung_NN floors_NNS ._.
A_DT further_JJ consideration_NN bearing_NN on_IN the_DT choice_NN of_IN an_DT antiseptic_JJ depends_NNS on_IN a_DT view_NN that_WDT is_VBZ generally_RB held_VBN by_IN those_DT having_VBG experience_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT virus_NN is_VBZ sooner_RBR or_CC later_RBR destroyed_VBN by_IN ventilation_NN ._.
As_IN I_PRP have_VBP elsewhere_RB shown_VBN ,_, the_DT plague_NN microbe_NN is_VBZ some-_JJ what_WP resistant_NN to_TO the_DT action_NN of_IN drying_NN ,_, and_CC hence_NN it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO believe_VB that_IN the_DT asserted_JJ benefit_NN of_IN ventilation_NN is_VBZ only_RB due_JJ to_TO dessica-_JJ tion_NN tending_VBG to_TO destroy_VB the_DT microbe_NN ._.
Its_PRP$ action_NN is_VBZ more_RBR likely_JJ to_TO be_VB due_JJ to_TO the_DT oxidation_NN processes_VBZ that_WDT are_VBP produced_VBN by_IN the_DT evaporation_NN of_IN water_NN in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN air_NN and_CC light_NN ._.
Many_JJ authorities_NNS have_VBP brought_VBN forward_RP reasons_NNS for_IN believing_VBG that_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN microbes_NNS through_IN the_DT action_NN of_IN light_NN is_VBZ in_IN reality_NN due_JJ to_TO an_DT oxidation_NN process_NN ._.
Microbes_NNS are_VBP found_VBN not_RB to_TO be_VB destroyed_VBN by_IN light_NN when_WRB exposed_VBN to_TO it_PRP under_IN condition_NN in_IN which_WDT oxidation_NN processes_NNS can_MD not_RB occur_VB ._.
My_PRP$ experiments_NNS have_VBP further_JJ shown_VBN that_IN bubonic_JJ microbe_NN is_VBZ very_RB susceptible_JJ to_TO the_DT action_NN of_IN such_JJ oxidising_VBG agents_NNS as_IN chloride_NN of_IN lime_NN and_CC permanganate_NN of_IN potassium_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT evidence_NN in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN ventilation_NN is_VBZ consi-_JJ dered_VBN to_TO be_VB sufficient_JJ to_TO justify_VB the_DT costly_JJ and_CC troublesome_JJ method_NN of_IN removing_VBG the_DT roofs_NN of_IN houses_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT good_JJ effects_NNS of_IN ventilation_NN are_VBP admitted_VBN to_TO be_VB due_JJ to_TO oxidation_NN ,_, ought_MD not_RB cheap_VB and_CC convenient_VB oxidising_VBG agents_NNS such_JJ as_IN permanganate_NN of_IN potassium_NN to_TO be_VB used_VBN in_IN combating_VBG the_DT plague_NN ._.
Unfortunately_RB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN cowdung_NN and_CC mud_NN floors_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB likely_JJ to_TO be_VB practicable_JJ to_TO employ_VB sufficient_JJ per-_JJ manganate_NN to_TO produce_VB the_DT effect_NN desired_VBD ._.
It_PRP might_MD be_VB possible_JJ in_IN better_RBR built_VBN houses_NNS with_IN cement_NN floors_NNS ._.
Permanganate_NN might_MD be_VB used_VBN in_IN water_NN suspected_VBN of_IN being_VBG infected_VBN ,_, such_JJ as_IN water_NN used_VBN by_IN dhobies_NNS for_IN washing_VBG infected_JJ clothes_NNS ._.
But_CC owing_VBG to_TO the_DT risk_NN of_IN insufficient_JJ quantities_NNS being_VBG employed_VBN ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB most_RBS objectionable_JJ to_TO put_VB it_PRP into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN unskilled_JJ workers_NNS for_IN ordinary_JJ purposes_NNS ._.

431_CD in_IN destroying_VBG microbes_NNS than_IN either_DT of_IN these_DT substances_NNS used_VBD separate-_JJ ly_NN ._.

It_PRP must_MD further_RB be_VB borne_VBN in_IN mind_NN that_IN coolies_NNS employed_VBN in_IN dis-_JJ infecting_NN work_NN may_MD not_RB carry_VB out_RP the_DT process_NN thoroughly_RB ._.

The_DT above_JJ considerations_NNS lead_VBP me_PRP to_TO suggest_VB the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS for_IN treatment_NN of_IN infected_JJ buildings_NNS :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN corrugated_VBN iron_NN latrines_NNS ,_, isolated_JJ pucca_NN build-_JJ ings_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ pucca_NN buildings_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT work_NN can_MD be_VB done_VBN with_IN safety_NN under_IN intelligent_JJ supervision_NN ,_, a_DT layer_NN of_IN dry_JJ grass_NN or_CC other_JJ inflammable_JJ material_NN ,_, at_IN least_JJS two_CD inches_NNS thick_JJ ,_, should_MD be_VB laid_VBN over_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT floor_NN and_CC burnt_NN ._.

I_PRP trust_VBP I_PRP may_MD be_VB pardoned_VBN a_DT slight_JJ digression_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO bring_VB to_TO notice_VB a_DT few_JJ points_NNS ,_, which_WDT seem_VBP very_RB necessary_JJ to_TO bear_VB in_IN mind_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT success_NN of_IN any_DT plague-preventive_JJ operations_NNS ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB generally_RB admitted_VBN that_IN people_NNS may_MD carry_VB the_DT virus_NN of_IN plague_NN to_TO a_DT house_NN and_CC may_MD also_RB become_VB infected_JJ from_IN a_DT house_NN into_IN which_WDT the_DT germs_NNS of_IN disease_NN have_VBP been_VBN conveyed_VBN by_IN rats_NNS ._.

Again_NNP bedding_NN and_CC clothing_NN seem_VBP to_TO play_VB an_DT important_JJ part_NN in_IN conveyance_NN of_IN inspection_NN ._.
